2a1(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la pang / 'tsha
2a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dang snang ni'i la mengadu sems dpa'
2b1(rgyud): DA na pe sman pa sa pajigs dang drug sngan las langs
2b2(rgyud): thal le sbyar ras bcol ldan 'dres la 'di skad ces gsol/ 
3a1(rgyud): / to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la sprul pa du mchen po'i tr-in+dan gyi snying
3a2(rgyud): po'i 'khor lo zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen mo smon cing bgyi ba thams cad mngon par 'grub par
3a3(rgyud): bgyi ba mchis te/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos bdag gis bshad
3a4(rgyud): par gnang na// bcom ldan 'das kyi bin gyis brlabs kyi mthus sems can thams
3a5(rgyud): cad la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du ba shad par 'tshal lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
3a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu
3b1(rgyud): rin po che chen po dang / yid bzhin gyi ljon shing bzhin du smon pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid
3b2(rgyud): pas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legaso
3b3(rgyud): leg so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ khyod kyis snying brtse ba'i phyir sems can gyi ched du 'di ltar
3b4(rgyud): zhes pas na/ khod thogs pa med pa'i gzungs 'di bshad par ga nang bar ba'o// 
3b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de ltar ga nang ba dang / langs nas thal mau sbyar te
3b6(rgyud): phyag byas slar stan la 'dug te/ sems rtse gcig tu 'khor 'dus pa dag la rnam par bltas nas
3b7(rgyud): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sngags 'di smras so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ 
4a1(rgyud): na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma
4a2(rgyud): kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra pa ti tsi ru ma Ni ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha ta/ badz+ra ba ra/ A ke rA ye hAM swA hA/ 
4a3(rgyud): 'di ni lus kyi sngagaso// oM pad+me/ tsin+ta ma Ni/ ma hA badz+ra b+ha ra hUM/ 'di ni snying po'i sngag so// oM b+ha ra ta pad+ma
4a4(rgyud): hUM/ 'di ni snying gi snying po'i sngag sa lags so// de'i tshe byang chub sem sa dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
4a5(rgyud): phyug gis yid bzhin 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / sa chen po yang rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos par gyur/ 
4a6(rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
4a7(rgyud): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i khang khyim rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal po dang
4b1(rgyud): bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang shin tu skrag cing 'jigs pa chen po skyes par gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal po'i gzhal med khang yang rab tu 'bar bar gyur/ gnod
4b2(rgyud): sbyin dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang dang zhing skrag pas gdong bka' ste sa la 'gyel bar gyur/ sems can dmyal ba
4b3(rgyud): sgo thams cad phye nas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnam par thar te/ lha'i bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to// de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog
4b4(rgyud): dang / rin po che'i rkyen gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur/ lha'i rol mo rnams kying bar snang la sgra sna tshogs phyung
4b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshig su bcad
4b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ rigs kyi bu khyod sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir
4b7(rgyud): gzungs 'di bshad pa nyid kyis sems can rnams kyis phan yon chen po thob par 'gyur ba legs so legs so// zhes bsngags pa brjod do// 
4b8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sems can
5a1(rgyud): rnams kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di'i cho ga shos cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
5a2(rgyud): dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am
5a3(rgyud): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gzhon nu gang la la zhig gis tshe 'di nyid la rnam par smin pa mngon du myong bar 'tshal na// bdugs
5a4(rgyud): mtshan sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus kyis gzungs 'di mi bskyud par bgyis te/ gdugs dang dus mi 'dam par gtsang yang rung
5a5(rgyud): mi gtsang yang rung ste/ ka yar sngon du bzlas par gyur na dgyi ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur la/ sa so// ci yang rung ste/ don du 'phya
5a6(rgyud): zhing gnyer ba zhig mchis na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ don brgya stong du ma 'grub par 'gyur bas/ rig sngags gzhan
5a7(rgyud): gang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di dang skrun par bzod pa gang yang ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na// 'das pa dang / 
5a8(rgyud): da ltar gyi las ngan pa dang / sgrib pa lci ba rnams rab tu 'joms pas so// gang la la zhig gzungs 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na mnar
5b1(rgyud): ma mchis pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs dgas kyang thar par 'gyur la/ mchims ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams
5b2(rgyud): kyang 'byung bar 'gyur na/ las ngan pa dang / gdon bgegs dang / bro nad gzhan thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags// gang
5b3(rgyud): dag rims nang nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang // nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin mtshan du bro 'tshal ba dang / rlung dang
5b4(rgyud): 'khris pa dang / bad kan la sogs pas bro 'tshal ba dag la rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod/ bgyis par gyur na thams cad 'phyang zhing
5b5(rgyud): sos par 'gyur lags so// gang zhig du/ dang byang stems kyis phog par gyur tam/ lkog ba dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze nad
5b6(rgyud): dmaphol mig dang / rlung nad dam/ smyos pa 'am/ klad pa bro 'tshal ba 'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / mchu dang / lce dang / 
5b7(rgyud): ming pa dang / kha dang / gdong dang / gtsug dang / klad rgyas dang / brang dang / rtsibs logs dang / snying dang / lto ba dang / rkeng
5b8(rgyud): ba dang / rgyab dang / rkang pa dang / lag pa la sogs pa thams cad bro 'tshal bar gyur na yang thams cad sos par 'gyid/ ji tsam du lus kyi
6a1(rgyud): bro nad ci mchis pa thams cad kyang sos par bgyid lag so// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bi na ya ka dang / bdud sdig
6a2(rgyud): can dang / 'dre gdon dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lag so// mtshon cha dang / dmag tshogs dang / chab dang / zhugs dang / rlung dang
6a3(rgyud): char pa dang / ser ba ma rungs pa dag gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// dgra dang / chom rkun dang / rgyal mo ma rungs pa dang / rkun pa ma rungs
6a4(rgyud): bdag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// blo bur du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'armi lam ngan pa rmi bar mi 'gyur/ rlangs
6a5(rgyud): pa dang / sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / srin bu gyi med dang / rkang mang dang / gcan zan gdug pa ma rungs pa dang / seng ge dang / 
6a6(rgyud): stag dang / sbyang ki dag gis kyang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lag so// g.yul ngor 'thab pa'i tshe thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur lag so// gal
6a7(rgyud): te bla'i bgyi ba dag gis rtsod par gyur na yang 'dum par 'gyur te/ gzungs 'di lan gcig bzlas na gong du bstan pa de dag thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub
6a8(rgyud): par 'gyur lag so// gang la la zhig gis gdugs re gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
6b1(rgyud): dbang phyug gis 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs shig/ ci zhig smon cing ci zhig yongasu gnyer bar byed/ thams cad khyod la
6b2(rgyud): sbyin no zhes bsgo bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyang sku mngon du ston par 'gyur// mdo las gsungs pa bzhin
6b3(rgyud): dri 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bkod pa'i dngos po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi byang chub
6b4(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur// byang
6b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ga nas ri po Ta la yang ma thong bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyi lus
6b6(rgyud): kyang yongasu dag par 'gyur bas rtag par rgyal po dang / blon po rnams kyi bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur bar 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du ma'i
6b7(rgyud): mngal du mi skye zhing pad+ma'i steng du skye bar 'gyur/ bkod pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rje su dran par 'gyur/ 'di nas mngon par rdzogs pa
6b8(rgyud): 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nam yang ngan 'gro rnam su mi ltung zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur lags te/ 'di ni sngags pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'joms
7a1(rgyud): pa'i gzungs zhes bgyi ba lag so// sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi le'u sna dang po'o// 
7a2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po'i gzungs gsang ba'i cho ga bstan pa su yang rung
7a3(rgyud): ba gces pa'i don grub pa zhig mchis na/ thams cad rang zhi bar 'gyur lag so// de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi nor dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
7a4(rgyud): nor gang lags pa'o// de la 'jig rten pa'i nor ni gser dang / dngul la sogs pa'i rin po che rnamaso// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor ni bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi
7a5(rgyud): bkod pa rnam pa gnyis dang ldan zhing lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad
7a6(rgyud): yongasu skyob pa dang / byams pa'i sems rgyas nas blo dang ldan pa rnams bde ba stsol ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel zhing mthu stobs rtags pa gang lags pa'o// gsang ba'i
7a7(rgyud): mdzod kyi spyod yul 'di ni gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o// gang la la zhig bdag gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dngos grub mchog thob par 'tshal na/ sems rtse gcig tu
7a8(rgyud): dus thams cad dang / gnas thams cad du gtsang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung ste/ rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na nongs pa ci yang ma mchis pas bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs chang
7b1(rgyud): bar bgyis nas/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming dang / yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi ming dang / gang zag de'i ming nas brjod de/ gal te rgyal po'am/ 
7b2(rgyud): rgyal bu 'am/ btsun mo 'am/ sras sam/ rgyal po'i bu mo 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gdol pa 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gzhon nu ma 'am/ 
7b3(rgyud): mu stegs sna tshogs dag la sten cing mdza' bar 'tshal na/ de dag gi ming nas brjod de rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe bzlas pa'i grangs tshangs par bgyi'o// gal te dngos grub mchog gnyer zhing rgyal po la
7b4(rgyud): bsten par 'tshal na dgung zhag bdun gyi bar du rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na mjal bar 'gyur lag so// gal te btsun mo la bsten par 'tshal na lan dgu
7b5(rgyud): brgya bzlas par bgyi'o// rgyal bu la bsten par 'tshal na lan brgyad brgya bzlas par bgyi'o// sras dag mthong bar 'tshal na lan bdu na brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i bu mo la bsten
7b6(rgyud): par 'tshal na lan drug brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// bram ze la bsten par 'tshal na lan lnga brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// rgyal rigs la bsten par 'tshal na lan bzhi brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// dmangs rigs la
7b7(rgyud): ni sum brgya'o// gdol pa la ni nyis brgya'o// dge slong dang / dge slong ma la ni lan brgya'o// dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la ni lan dgu bcu'o// khye'u gzhon nu dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma la lan
7b8(rgyud): drug cu'o// 'di ni bsten cing 'dza' bar bgyi ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ste/ nor dang / bran dang / rta dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor par bgyid lag so// gang la la zhig snying du sdug cing
8a1(rgyud): mdza' ba dag ring po na mchi ba dang mjal bar 'tshal na yid la bsam pa bzhin du rlung bzhin du mchi bar 'gyur lag so// ci 'gyi'o 'tshal bzlas brjod pa
8a2(rgyud): ba'i grangs tshang bar gyur na don de dag 'grub par 'gyur lag so// gal te byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'tshal na lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na de'i
8a3(rgyud): lus yang dag pa nyid mthong zhing bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par bgyid lag so// gal te lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na bzlas brjod lan khri bgyis na lus mngon sum du bstan nas/ 
8a4(rgyud): de la brtse zhing phas bu la byams pa bzhin du sems kyi smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur lag so// gal te sangs rgyas dang / 'khor 'dus pa mang po mthong bar 'tshal na lan khri sum stong
8a5(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin du mthong bar chu ra lag so// gal te gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na rigs sngags 'chang
8a6(rgyud): rnams mngon sum du ston cing / so so nas rang rang gi sngags kyi mthu ci mchis pa gang zag de la srul na yongasu srung bar bgyid de/ zhag bdun pa la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
8a7(rgyud): rten gyi dbang po dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po rnams 'khor dang bcas te mchis na/ de'i smon pa rnams stsol ba bgyid do// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga gong du bstan pa bzhin du bgyis na smon pa
8a8(rgyud): rnams yongasu rdzogs par bgyid de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga zhes
8b1(rgyud): bgyi ba lag ste// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las thams cad khams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// 
8b2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ gang gis mthong ba dag byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman sbyar nas
8b3(rgyud): lus la thogs te 'gro na mchog tu mngon par 'grub cing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i cho ga bstan pa/ gi'u wang dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum dang / ga pur dang / 
8b4(rgyud): gla rtsi dang / 'dza' ti pa la dang / li shi dang / ka ko la dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / gser gyi khyim pa ga rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te/ brdungs nas sbrang rtsi dkar
8b5(rgyud): pos spras te/ snga ma'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzla sa nas lus la bdugs sam/ gos la bdugs sam/ mig la bskus sam/ dpral ba la thig le bgyes sam/ lus la
8b6(rgyud): byugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / blon po rnams dang / dran rnams dang / skyes pa dang / bud med la sogs pa byams shing dga' ba dang / lam gyi chos la bkur zhing byang chub sems
8b7(rgyud): bskyed nas/ lus kyi zho sha dang / nor rdzas dag pangs pa ma mchis par gtor rim gro bgyid par 'gyur te/ brjod kyi mi lang lag so// ji ltar nyi zla thams cad kyis mthong bar mos pa
8b8(rgyud): bzhin du sgrub pa'i don rnams 'byor cing 'grub par 'gyur lag so// gang la la zhig sman 'di thogs par 'gyur na kha na mtho ba'i sgrib pa rnams zhu byang nas bgegs thams cad las
9a1(rgyud): thar bar 'gyur lag so// rgyal po'i mthus nan gyis 'phrog pa dang / chab kyis ded pa dang / zhugs kyi tshig pa dang / mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dug dang / 
9a2(rgyud): 'ching ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur lag so// bsam pa thag pa nas sman pa a ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di bgyis na thams cad kyis byams shing dga' bar 'gyur
9a3(rgyud): lag so// sman 'dis bdugs pas bab tshol du g.yar khar stsal bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman gyi cho ga zhes
9a4(rgyud): bgyi lag so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras ga zigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman a
9a5(rgyud): ka ta sbyar ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse
9a6(rgyud): ba'i phyir thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman khar mur ba'i cho ga bstan pa/ ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum zhib mor btags te/ ge'u wang dang bsres
9a7(rgyud): na gong du bstan pa'i sngags rnam pa gsum re rer yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te chab gtsang mas sbyar nas ril bu che chung shing 'go sdong gi 'bras bu tsam du bgyis te/ yang
9a8(rgyud): sngags gong ma gsum lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grib ma la bskams te/ gdugs dang / rlung gis ma phog par bgyis nas/ ril bu re re la yang gong ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum/ 
9b1(rgyud): lan bdun bdun gyis btab ste/ ril bu gcig khar mur nas rgyal po 'am/ blon po nye phan nam/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag la gtab bgyis par gyur na bkur sti bgyis nas nor dang / rin po che dag
9b2(rgyud): 'phangs pa ma mchis par ci dang ci 'tshal ba thams cad stsol bar 'gyur tshig tu smraso 'tshal thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/ bsgo ba zhig mchis na yang thams cad nyan cing
9b3(rgyud): bgyid par 'gyur lag so// khar sman mur ba'i tshe rtag par sngags bzla 'tshal te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smon pa rnams 'grub par 'gyid lag so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzi
9b4(rgyud): dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du spos chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi chu zheng khru bzhis 'khor ba gcig bgyis te/ dkyil 'a khor gyi nang du rtsi shing gi me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ci 'byor pa
9b5(rgyud): bkram zhing / tsan+dan dkar po bsres nas sman gyi ri la bu snga ma blangs te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bzhag nas/ rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs shing / yol ba dang / bla re dkar po bris te/ 
9b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma dkar po bzhi yang bris te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyis lags pa'i rjes la snying po'i sngags dang / snying gi snying po'i
9b7(rgyud): sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bgyi'o// lus kyi sngags kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas tsan+dan dkar po bsres te/ me tog gtor na de'i tshe smon pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur la/ 
9b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi nang na mchis pa'i sman blangs te lus la bdags na phyogs gang du mchi yang rung te/ ci dang ci gnyer ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ tshig tu smras pa thams cad kyis yid ches
10a1(rgyud): shing nyan par 'gyur/ don du sgrub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lag so// sems brtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs te/ 'di ni yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las/ 
10a2(rgyud): smar mur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi lag so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las/ sman mur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// 
10a3(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir skye bo mang po thams cad kyis mthong na byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i cho
10a4(rgyud): ga bstan pa/ sman shi ri ka ku shu dang / pad+ma leb rgan dang / pad+ma sngon po dang / rgya mtsho'i chab kyi dbu ba dang / 2 rkun ma nag po'i rus pa dang / ba blas dang / ka kun ban s+ya dang / gi hang dgazung gu dang cu'i ga mu
10a5(rgyud): pi pi ling dang / na le sham dang / bca' sgra rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te/ brdungs nas zhib mor brtsegs te sman snga ma srang cig mchisan gla rtsi dang / ga pur srang phyed sprul
10a6(rgyud): nas zhib tu bdar te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du sbyar ba bgyis lags pas/ snga ma'i sngags rnam pa gsu ma re re yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ sems
10a7(rgyud): can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying brtse ba'i sems bskyang nas sman de dag byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa'i drung du bzhag par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la reg
10a8(rgyud): par bgyis nas/ khar ba'i thur mas blangs te mig tu stsal na/ mig dang / klad pa bro 'tshal ba dang / ling rtog gis bsgribs pa thams cad dang / sprin dkar dang / 'chi ma 'dzag pa dang / sprin dmar/ 
10b1(rgyud): ngang long nad dang / klad pa bro 'tshal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur lag so// rtag par gdugs ra bzhin du sman 'di mig tu stsal na mig nad thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur lag so// gdugs gnyis sprul
10b2(rgyud): na lus kyi bro nad thams cad 'byung bar 'gyuro// gdugs gsum stsol na smyo ba'i bro nad rnam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur lag so// gdugs bzhi stsal na phyi nang gi sgrib pa thams cad kyis sgrib
10b3(rgyud): par mi 'gyu ro// gdugs lnga stsal na dgra dang 'thab pa na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyuro// gdugs drug sprul na sdig pa'i las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lci ba bzhi dang / 'tshams ma mchis pa lnga dang
10b4(rgyud): rmi lam ngan pa dang / byang stems thams cad rnam par 'joms shing / ngan 'gro rnamasu nam yang ltung bar mi 'gyur lag so// gdugs bdun stsal na rgyal po dang / blon po chen po
10b5(rgyud): dang / skye bo mang po thams cad rjesu 'brang zhing bkur sti bgyis nas yid ches shing byams par 'gyuraro// zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du stsal na rang dbang chen po thob par 'gyuraro// 
10b6(rgyud): zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du stsal na rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dag mdza' bar 'gyu ro// zhag bdun phrag bzhi'i bar du stsal na gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rim gro bgyid par 'gyu ro// 
10b7(rgyud): zhag bdun phrag lnga'i bar du stsal na lA ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams g.yog bgyid par 'gyuraro// zhag bdun phrag drug gi bar du stsal na na mkha' lding dang / srin po'i mthu
10b8(rgyud): chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yongasu srung bar bgyid pas/ byang snyems dang / 'dre gdon rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyuraro// zhag bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du
11a1(rgyud): stsal ra lha rag po chen po dang / 'dre srin brgyad rnams nye bar lhag nas rjesu 'brang zhing g.yog bgyid par 'gyuro// zhag bdun phrag brgyad kyi bar du sprul na an trang nar 'gyur
11a2(rgyud): ro// zhag bdun phrag dgu'i bar du sprul na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyuraro// zhag bdun phrag bcu'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin gyi khang khyim gyi sgo rang bye nas de ni ci mchis pa thams cad mthong bar
11a3(rgyud): 'gyuro// 'byung zhing 'jug pa la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyuraro// zhag 'dun phrag bcu gcig gi bar du stsal na sman zhugs ltar 'bar ba ji snyed pa thams cad mngon sum du dga' bar 'gyur bas/ 
11a4(rgyud): tshe ring bar 'gyur 'tshal lam/ mthu chen po dang ldan par 'tshal na yang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyu ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du stsal na drang srong mang po rnams kyis rin po re'i
11a5(rgyud): gter rnams phye ste nye bar bstan nas yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyuraro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum gyi bar du sbrul na klu'i gzhal med khang rnams sgo rang bye nas lta ba dag la
11a6(rgyud): thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du stsal na 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag sgo rang bye bar 'gyur bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyuraro// zhag bdun phrag
11a7(rgyud): bco lnga'i bar du stsal na mtshan mo mun nag gi nang du yang gdugs bzhin du gsal bar 'gyuraro// zhag bdun phrag bcu drug gi bar du sbal na sa'i 'og gi rdo rje'i sa bzhi dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor
11a8(rgyud): yang mthong bar 'gyuraro// zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun gyi bar du stsal na gling bzhi po rnamasu sems can dmyal ba'i sems can ji snyed mchis pa yang thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de'i
11b1(rgyud): mthu'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyuraro// zhag bdun phrag bco brgyad kyi bar du stsal na gang zag de nyi ma lta bu'i mthu thob par 'gyuraro// zhag bdun
11b2(rgyud): phrag bcu dgu'i bar du stsal na lag na rdo rje'i lus yang dag par nyin mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par bgyid do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu'i bar du sprul na spyan ras gzigs
11b3(rgyud): dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du stsal na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par
11b4(rgyud): 'gyur gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi sgo rnams rang bye nas thams cad mthong bar 'gyu tsho/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
11b5(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyuro// lo gcig gi bar du stsal na yongasu dag pa'i mig lnga 'thob par 'gyur lag so// gang la la zhig spyod
11b6(rgyud): pa'i cho ga 'di mngon par 'grub par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des bstan pa 'di la shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing / sems can la snying brtse bar bgyi ste/ the tshom ma mchis
11b7(rgyud): na gong du bstan pa bzhin du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lag so// gal te the tsom 'tshal bar 'gyur na cho ga rnams grub par dka' ste/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi tsan+dan nor
11b8(rgyud): bu'i 'khor lo las mig sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi ba lag so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sems kyi 'khor lo'i las mig gi sman gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// 
12a1(rgyud): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i don thams cad grub par byed pa
12a2(rgyud): nyon mongs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa dang / las ngan pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ dgra thams cad 'dul ba/ bi na ya ka khro ba'i sems nye bar zhi nas skye bo mang po la gnod pa
12a3(rgyud): mi byed cing / byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba/ sbyin sreg tso bkra shis kyi cho ga bstan pa/ dog sa brkos te zhugs thab khru gang gru bzhi pa cig bgyis nas/ me tog man len tsa su dang / yungs
12a4(rgyud): kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / chab mar cha mnyam par bsres te/ a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / shing dri can so so nas srid du sor bcu gnyis zheng du sor gcig mchis pa btubs te/ thab
12a5(rgyud): tu sreg par bgyi zhing / sman nyung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngag sa btab ste/ zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam
12a6(rgyud): par 'joms shing / tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub par 'gyur lag so// zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par ha~M gyi cho ga bzhin bgyis na tshe lo stong thub cing lus kyang yongasu dag par 'gyuro// 
12a7(rgyud): zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du cho ga bgyis na rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po nye phan dang / skye bo phal pa rnams kyang skyabasu mchis nas bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag
12a8(rgyud): bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du cho ga bzhin du bgyis na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dang / nyi blo'i lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa yang nye bar
12b1(rgyud): lpags nas yongasu srung bar 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes kyang dngos grub chen po stsol bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smon pa chen po rnams yongasu sko
12b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur lag so// gal te yul khamasu char dkon par gyur na/ yungs dkar dang / chab mar la sngags 'dis btab ste/ gdugs gsum gyi bar du zhugs kyi nang du bsregs na char pa
12b3(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyur/ gal te char ches te mi khums na thab de'i thal ba blangs nas sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab te/ gnam du gtor na char pa khums par 'gyur ro// gal te ser ba ma
12b4(rgyud): rungs pa babs sam/ rlung drag po blo bur du langs par gyur na yang thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyang sngags kyi btab ste/ sprin mchis pa'i phyog su gtor na zhi
12b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur lag so// sngags 'di rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na mthu stobs mthu bo che dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas/ lus 'di spang sa nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du
12b6(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa thob par 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
12b7(rgyud): dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tsan+dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bdag gis bstan pa bzhin du dge slong ngam/ dge
12b8(rgyud): slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la zhig gis lan gcig 'chang bar bgyid na gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur bas the tshom gyi
13a1(rgyud): bsam pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o// yid la bsam pa'i don thams cad thob par 'gyur bas shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing the tshom bskyed par mi bgyid/ de nas
13a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod snying rje chen pos yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi cho ga gya nom pa 'di yang dag par bshad de/ 'jam
13a3(rgyud): bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar byas pa leg so leg so zhes bsngags pa brjod do// gang la la zhig gis sems bskyed de/ kha nas bzlas brjod byas na dngos
13a4(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyuraro// de ltar yin mod kyi ngas pa stan pa bzhin du sems can rnams la yang nas yang du na na tan brtson 'grus kyis rje su bstan nas/ dngos grub thob par bya
13a5(rgyud): ba'i ched du lus nye bar ston la/ nga'i tshig dga' gal bar ma byed cig dang / nga yang rje su yi rang ngo // de nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzi
13a6(rgyud): dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas/ byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis sems can la rjesu ston cing // rtag par
13a7(rgyud): yongasu bsrungs nas dngos grub stsal bar ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen cing dbang du gyur pa lag so// sems can rnams kyi slad du yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bshad pa
13a8(rgyud): lags pas/ gang la la zhig gis len cing 'chang ba dang / rtag par bdag nyid bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshangs par bgyis na smon pa rnams grub par 'gyur te/ bdag ni de ltar bcom ldan
13b1(rgyud): 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams yong su bskyab par bgyid pa lag so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
13b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gis yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad rab tu dga' nas mngon par yid ches pas yang dag par drangs te spyod par
13b3(rgyud): gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las/ sbyin sreg kyi cho ga sman sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// 
13b4(rgyud): 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod/ thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i
13b5(rgyud): gzungs rdzogs so// / zhu chen gyi mkhan po dang / ma tshab bcom ldan 'das ring lungs pa bcwo chos thab kyisaHdpel
13b6(rgyud): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
13b7(rgyud): phyug gi gzungs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa'i ngang las snying
13b8(rgyud): rje'i shugs kyis byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed nas/ pad+ma dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gdan la hI 'phro 'du las zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ dang po gnyis thal mo sbyar ba/ g.yas 'og cha
14a1(rgyud): na bgrang phreng mu tig dkar po/ g.yon 'og ma na pad+ma dkar po bsdams pa/ sku mdog dkar po zhabs rdzogs pa'i skyil krung bcas pa/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / 
14a2(rgyud): rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ ma lha mo drug ma dang / yab nor bu rin po ches brten pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / sems ma rab tu mang pos bskor te 'di skad ces gsungs so// rigs
14a3(rgyud): gyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos sngags 'di lan gcig brjod dam dran zhing yid la byas sam/ bris nas lus la bcangs sam/ mos shing gus par byas na mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba'i
14a4(rgyud): sdig pa'i las thams cad byang zhing / ngan song gsu ma dang / mi khom pa brgyad dang / sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi skye'o// mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / gcan zan gyis 'jigs pa
14a5(rgyud): thams cad las grol bar 'gyuro// nang dang gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyuraro// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ zhes brje dpas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi zhal mthong bar 'gyu
14a6(rgyud): zhing tshe 'phos nas kyang bde ba can du skye ste 'di la the tshom mam/ som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis ma za cig/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs rdzog so// 
14a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo// chos la phyag 'tsha lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzig kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshalo// de rnams
14a8(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di brjod kyis rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha sa ne/ ni pa sa ne/ ta pa ta pa ne/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ne/ tsa la tsa la na/ purba yo ga sma ra pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ gang gis
14b1(rgyud): rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgya stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyuro// 'phags pa sbyar ras gzigs kyi snying po rdzog so// 
14b2(rgyud): // rgya gar skad du/ pad+ma ma ku Ta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
14b3(rgyud): ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bskur sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs
14b4(rgyud): rje chen po'i sgo kun 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dza na la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'od zer gyis rnam par snang mdzang gang chen mtsho'i zhing gi rdul la reg pas reg ma thag tu bskal
14b5(rgyud): pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis la mchod nas/ 'od zer de bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub bo// nub ma thag tu thugs rje chen po phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa sku
14b6(rgyud): mdog gang gyi rtse la nyi ma shar ba lngar dkar ba/ zhal bcu gcig gi rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po/ steng gi zhal ser ba/ g.yas ljang khu/ g.yon dmar ba/ steng gi gsum nag po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
14b7(rgyud): dadu ni byi ru bcag pa lta bur gyur te/ 'dzum pa mdzad nas thugs rje chen po'i bdag po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gzig so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras
14b8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis thal mo sbyar nas/ gsol pa/ sku dang sngags dang las rnams dang / khyad par cho ga bstan par bgyis/ zhes gsol ba btab nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
15a1(rgyud): dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs zhes bya ba byin nas bka' stsal pa/ sku ri rnam pa 'di lta ste// thugs rje dag las chu shel te/ mnyam par bzhengs pas
15a2(rgyud): 'gre don mdzad// chu shel mdog 'dra zhal gsum dkar// ljang ku'i mdog can nag po che// ser po de bzhin bcom ldan dmar// drang srong dag tu ri dgas rgyal// zhi ba 'dzum dang bzhad pa dang // khros pa'i
15a3(rgyud): zhal mnga' spyan gsum mdzes// bcu pa sems dpa'i rtags can te// bcu gcig bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag/ yon tan nor bu mu tig phreng // phrin las sna tshogs smang bkris pa// dang po'i phyag ni thal
15a4(rgyud): sbyar te// g.yas pa rin chen phreng ba 'dzin// g.yon pa dri med pad+ma 'dzin// g.yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa'o// g.yon pa'i ril ba spyi blugs te// g.yas pa 'khor lo rab tu 'dzin// g.yon
15a5(rgyud): pan ni mda' gzhu ste/ lhag ma mchog sbyir spyan lnga no// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de cod pan gnyis nas rin po che rab tu 'phro ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
15a6(rgyud): la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs las byung ba'i pad+ma'i steng du rigs lnga 'byung ba ni 'di lnga ste/ rnam par snang mdzad dang // rin chen 'byung ldan dang // snang ba mtha' yas dang // don yod
15a7(rgyud): grub pa dang // mi bskyod pa'o// khang bu brtsegs pa'i rin po che de'i nang du seng ge dang / rta dang / rma bya dang / na mkha' lding dang // glang po che'o// de dag ni cod pan las byung ba'o// yang yum gyi sku mdog sngon
15a8(rgyud): mo ste// pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i steng // tshad med bzhi ste phyag bzhis mdzes// sems dpa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yi// mnyam pa yi ni skyil dkrung bcas// yab ni sku mdog ser po ste// pad+ma las byung
15b1(rgyud): pad+ma'i steng // thal sbyar nor bu bzang phreng 'dzin// rgyan rnams yongasu 'dzin pa'o// yang ni 'od zer rab bkye ste// zla ba'i ma las byung ba'i// nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma ni// gzhon nu ut+pal mchog sbyin mdzad/ 
15b2(rgyud): zla ba las skyes namakha'i mdog cung zad khros pas rdo rje can// dkar po gangs ltar dkar ba ste// zhi zla'i steng na pad+ma 'dzin// drag po gnyis dang hrI yig las// gnyis med tshul gyis 'bras bu rdzogs/ 
15b3(rgyud): ha ya gribs khams gsum sdang // khro gnyer can gyis phrin las mdzad// gshin rje gshed po gter 'dzin cing // khams gsum rnam rgyal bdud sde 'joms// 'khor lo dkar po dag pa'i steng // gru
15b4(rgyud): bzhi sgo bzhi rna babs bcas/ dang por dkon mtsho ga rab dang zhing / tshad med bzhi ni yongasu rdzogs// byang chub yan lag rdzogs pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin stong nyid do// gleng bzhi dang ni
15b5(rgyud): sku bstan pa'i le'u sde dang po'o// de nas gsang sngags bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad gangs chen mtsho'i zhing khams thams cad du
15b6(rgyud): 'od bkye nas gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas yang gsungs pa/ oM hrIHhUM dzA aHna mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra be ro tsa nA ya/ d+hu ha rA dzA ya/ da thA ga tA ya ar+tha te/ sa myag saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma
15b7(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ ar+tha b+h+yaHsam+baka saM bud+d+he D+ho/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te dzad+d+ha/ 
15b8(rgyud): le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su ma ba re/ i li mi li/ tsing dz+wa la ma pa na ya swAhA/ sngags 'di rnams la ngon byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos lamacig brjod dam/ dran cing
16a1(rgyud): yid la byas sam/ lus la bcangs na mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba'i las 'byung zhing sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
16a2(rgyud): mi skye zhing / mi khom pa brgyad du sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi 'gyuraro// gcan zan dang / srin po dang / mi ma yin pa dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyuraro// oM ra/ 
16a3(rgyud): rak+Sha zhes pas kyang bsrung bar bya'o// oM a kA ro mu khe sar+b+ba d+harmA NaM/ Ad+ya nung pan na twAta zhes pas gdor ma'i chus yi dgas la mchod par bya'o// oM aHhUM zhes pas so// de rnams srung
16a4(rgyud): ba'i sngag so// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ zhes pas so// 'dis ni rigs/ gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur te/ phan yon ni 'di'o// chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi sku'i thugs rje chen po mthong bar 'gyu
16a5(rgyud): oM na maHsarba ta thA ga da d+hu pe pU dza me b+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra sA ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta
16a6(rgyud): A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba thA ga ta nai wi d+ye pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa
16a7(rgyud): ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta shab+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta maN+Da la pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas mchod pas yang
16a8(rgyud): ngag mchod// stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan pa'i// hrIHyig dkar po yang dag ldan// sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// 
16b1(rgyud): las dang cho ga bstan pa'i phyir// dang po zhi ba'i las bsgrubs nas// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu// dkar po dag po gsal dus suka/ dri zhim chu yis lags byugs te// me tog dkar po
16b2(rgyud): dgram byas nas// khrus dang kha zas phyogs 'thun pa'i// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste// bum pa dkar po tsan+dan dkar// dris bkang gos kyis legs par bkri// maN+Dal dbus su legs
16b3(rgyud): par bzhag/ hrIHlas byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// phyag sdong sbyar yang de bzhin te// rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas// hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal
16b4(rgyud): ba ni// bzlas pa rab tu gsal ba ste// gsang sngags 'di ni brjo da par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA ra swa ga ra bai ro tsa na ya b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya ar+tha te/ 
16b5(rgyud): samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ a d+had b+h+yaHsa myaka saM bud+d+ha b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ 
16b6(rgyud): a mi ta b+ha la che ge mo shAn+ting ku ru swA hA// zhes bzlas par bya'o// bruMHrnam par snang mdzad bum pa'i chu// gang dag legs par khrus byed pa// dri ma thams cad yongs dag nas// 
16b7(rgyud): 'bras bu bde ba bde thob 'gyur// 'jigs pa kun las rnam grol nas/ myur du chu skyes mthong bar 'gyur// de nas rgyas pa sgrub 'dod na// nags chel shin tu mthong bar ni// dri
16b8(rgyud): zhim chu yis legs byugs la// 'bras bur bcas pa'i me tog dgram// rgyan rnams yongasu bdags nas ni// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste// rin chen sna lnga 'bru sna lnga/ rin
17a1(rgyud): chen ga bur blugs par bya// maN+Dal dbus su legs par bzhag/ hrIHlas byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// rgyan rnams rdzogs
17a2(rgyud): ba pad+ma bsnams// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin de// rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas// mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod// hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal bar bzlas// na mo rat+na tra yA
17a3(rgyud): ya na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+d+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ ad+had b+h+ya/ samyAka saM bud+d+ha b+h+yo/ na maHAr+ya ba lo ki te
17a4(rgyud): shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sAtwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ rat+na ku na puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA// bang mdzad stong pa'i thog bzhag na// 'bru yis yongasu khengs par 'gyur// de nas dbang gis las
17a5(rgyud): byed na// sdud par byed na chu klung 'gram// pa la sha dang a shwat+tha// me tog dmar po'i ril bu byas// bse gab dam ra po'i nang du bzhug/ me tog dmar pos rab tu mchod// hrIH
17a6(rgyud): yig las byung sgrol ma'i sku// ljang ku phyag na lha gas kyu 'dzin// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te// rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas// mchod pa lnga yis mchod byas te/ 
17a7(rgyud): hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal bar bzlas// na mo rat+na tra s+phA ya/ na ma Ar+tha dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa nA ya/ thA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+tha te/ samyakAka saM bud d+ha b+h+ya \u0f7fna maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ 
17a8(rgyud): an+yad b+h+yaHsa myaka sa bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba l-i ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo ti satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a mo b+ha b+hasmi ku ru oM tA re tut+tA tu re a mo g+ha b+hasmi ku ru swA hA/ rdzas kyi
17b1(rgyud): 'de gus lus byugs ra// byugs pa de yis khugs par 'gyur// de nas phrin las byed 'dod na// dur khrod shing gcig dag tu ni// ba yi lci bas lags byugs nas// me tog sngon po
17b2(rgyud): nim pa yi// spos kyi chom bu lnga steng 'gram// byang du 'dug ste las 'di brtsam// gcan zan steng du chu shel te// hrIHyi yi ge las byung ba'i// mdog dkar ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ 
17b3(rgyud): zhal gcig spyan ni gsum pa ste// ri dgas lpags pa 'dzin pa'o// drang srong khros pa'i cha byad can// phyag bzhi dang po mchog sbyin pa// g.yon na pad steng ral gri can// g.yas pa ltos
17b4(rgyud): 'gros rgyan pa'i mdung // rtse gsum dkar pos brgyan pa'o// g.yon mthod pa dkar po ste// dri zhim me tog ngag gis bkang // rgyal po chen po rol pa ltar// cung zhig
17b5(rgyud): zur gyis gzigs pa'o// phyag stong spyan yang de ba zhin stong // bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas te// pad+ma'i 'dab ma legs zhugs pa'i// rgyas pa'i sku ni legs bsams
17b6(rgyud): nas// hrIHyi 'phro 'du las byung ba'o// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa nA ya/ b+hu da rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ an+ta te/ sa myaH
17b7(rgyud): sam bud d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ ar+Yad b+h+yaHsa myaka saM bud d+he b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+ya bA lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ka te ni ka te/ kaH
17b8(rgyud): kate ka ro te ki ra ta bIHsAhA/ oM karma a mo g+ha badz+ra sa~M ha nA da hUM phaT// dri 'am byugs pa dag la ni// btab la lus la byug par bya// me tog sngon po mgo la gzhag/ maN+Dal chu yis/ 
18a1(rgyud): lus la byug/ nyi shu rtsa lnga bzlas pas ni// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas bzhi ka sgrub 'dod na// bkra shis dus su rdzogs dus su// 
18a2(rgyud): ri bo yid 'ong gnas dag tu// sa bzhi chag chag legs btab ste// maN+Dal legs byas me tog ni// dri zhim dkar pos yongs gtor te// gtsang zhing dag pa'i rdzas rnams dgram/ 
18a3(rgyud): gtsang ma bram zes byas te bzhag/ khrus dang ku sha'i steng gnas te// hrIHlas byung ba'i chu skyes steng // chu skyes mdog 'dra zhal gsum yang // 'dzum zhing zhi ba'i cha byad can// ljang
18a4(rgyud): ku gzhad pa zhal gsum pa// nag po khros pa dmar ser skya/ ser po'i zhal nas 'dzum pa ste// dmar po bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu// ri dgas lpags pas stod g.yogs can// 
18a5(rgyud): sna tshogs sham thabs bsnams pa ste// zhabs gnyis ma nyam por bzhengs pa las// g.yas g.yon dang po thal mo sbyar// bar ma bgrang phreng pad+ma bsnams/ 
18a6(rgyud): ma mchog sbyin spyi blugs 'dzin// bum pa rnam snang lha mo ni// la sre ma le gir+Ne ste// nir+Ne nang gi lha mo'i bdag zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// hrIHyi yi ge las byung
18a7(rgyud): ba'i tagasang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na ya/ b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ aR+tha te/ samyaka saM bud d+ha ya/ na maHsarba
18a8(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+yo/ a d+had b+h+ya/ sa myaka sa~M bud d+he b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+ya bA lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ oM ts+tshi Te ban+de Te/ 
18b1(rgyud): tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su ma ba re/ i li mi li tsi li/ dz+wa la ma pa na ya swAhA// bum pa'i chu la legs bsgrubs nas// lus la byugs na 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga
18b2(rgyud): gsang sngags grub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas thabs ni rim pa dang // gro ga ras sam shing shun la// ra yi 'o mas bris pa'o// chom bu lnga yi
18b3(rgyud): 'khor lo la// dbus su sku yi sa bon te// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa ste// shar du de yang bri bar bya// bzhi pa'i lnga pas dbusu mtshan// lho ru de ni yang dag dgod// lnga pa'i dang po bzhi pa'i
18b4(rgyud): gsum// nub tu da ni yang dag bgod// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la/ e yi rnam par sbyar ba ste// byang du de ni yang dag dgod// dbus su thugs kyi sa bon te// shan+tiM ku ru mtsham su'o// 
18b5(rgyud): swA hA dbu su dgod par bya// de ltar 'khor lo gsal bkod nas// dngul lam dkar po'i ga bur gzhug thams cad las kun zhi bar 'gyur// yung ba'i chu yis
18b6(rgyud): legs par bri// puSh+TiM ku ru mchem su'o// kham por ser por legs par gzhug/ rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// pa la sha yis legs par bris// ba shi ku ru mtsham su
18b7(rgyud): dgod// bam por dmar por legs par bzhug/ dbang gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// tsan+dan dkar po dri zhim zhing // nim pa'i chu yis legs par bris// mA ra ya ni mtsham su
18b8(rgyud): dgod// lcags sam thod par yang dag gzhug/ phrin las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// tsan+dan dkar po dri zhim zhing // zhi bas de ni me la sreg/ 'bras bu dmar po bcas pa'i shing
19a1(rgyud): rgyas pas de ni me la'o// dbang ni pa la sha yi shing // de la bsregs na khugs par 'gyur// nim pa'i shing la mtshar bcad pa'i// bsregs pas phrin las
19a2(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas las kyi rim pa ni// dur ba'i rtsa dang 'bras kyi 'dag/ til dang yungs kar tsi tse la// gas
19a3(rgyud): sngags bzlas na grub pa ni// da li'i shing la legs bsregs nas// thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// ku sha sngar pa shug 'brum dang // stag pa'i me tog dmar po dang // gsang sngags bzlas
19a4(rgyud): par rab byas nas// tsan+dan shing la legs bsregs nas// rgyas par bya ba'i las 'grub cing // nus pa'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur// pA la sha yi shing dag dang // khre dang ci rtse mo sran dang // 
19a5(rgyud): gsang sngags bzlas par rab byas te// pad+ma ka yi shing la bsregs// rus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur// tha// mas cad dbang du 'dus par 'gyur// gro dang so ba 'bras dang ni// 
19a6(rgyud): bra bo mon sran til nag po// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas te// kha ti ra yi shing la bsreg/ nus pa ldan te las rnams ni// myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// pra ba kha che'i shing dag la// 
19a7(rgyud): lo ma 'bras bur bcas pa dang // rdo rje'i shing la sngags bzlas nas// mya ngan 'chang gi shing la bsregs// nus pa thob nas myur du ni// mi rnams thams cad dbang du sdud// ldong ros pad+ma'i rtsa ba la
19a8(rgyud): mu la pa tra'i shing dag la// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas// a ru ra'i shing la bsregs// 'khor lo'i 'og tu bcug pa'i sa// rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur// pa la sha yi shing dag
19b1(rgyud): la ka ra bi ra 'bras dag la// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas// 'dzam bu'i shing la rab bsregs nas// ral gri 'og tu bcug nas ni// yul dbang yang ni dbang du 'gyur/ tshe rabs brgya ru lon
19b2(rgyud): ba'i rus// mtshon gyis bsnun pa'i rus pa dag/ gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas// skyer ba'i me la rab bsregs te// lcags kyu'i 'og tu rab bcug na// glang po dbang du 'gyur bar byed// ba le ta
19b3(rgyud): dang ta le sha/ kha ti Da dang d+ha ti ma// dur khrod shing la rab bsregs na// stag la sogs pa dbang du 'du// nas dang 'bras dang so ba dang // sman dang rin chen sna tshogs dang ka/ maN+Dal zlum po legs byas te/ 
19b4(rgyud): rgyan rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// pad+ma nu shel las skyes pa'i// chu shel mdog dang 'dzum dang bcas// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas bzhugs// ku sha'i stan la shar du 'dus/ 
19b5(rgyud): pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcas pa yis// byams pa'i sem sa kyis dbul bar bya'o// nad dang rims dang 'brum bu dang // shu ba g.yan pa me dpal dang // nad dang gdon dang thams cad bzlog/ mtsham
19b6(rgyud): med lnga dang mi dge lnga// 'bras bu sdug bsngal thams cad bzlog/ me'i las kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa la// maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la// tsan+dar
19b7(rgyud): dkar po'i dris bsgos te// mchod yon me tog bkang ba dang // ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa yis// rgyal po lta bu'i gzugs la mchod// sdig pa thams cad de mdun du// bshags nas myur du skyabs su
19b8(rgyud): 'gro gro ga dag gam shing shun la// rgyal po dag gi gzugs byas te// yig 'bru lnga yis btab pa yis// mtshon sna lnga yis rab tu bcing // byams pa'i sems kyi chu bo la// bkur na rgyal
20a1(rgyud): po'i chang las thar// oM tsU traM hriHa sho ha ri ma ka to// sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra swA hA// gcan zan 'jigs pa 'ong ba'i tshe// maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la// me tog dka
20a2(rgyud): bos rab tu gtor// mchod pa lnga yis rgyal po mchod// sdig pa shags myur du skyab su 'gro// 'bru sna lnga dang rin chen lnga/ tshen sna lnga yi phur ma la/ byas pa lus la btags pa la/ gcan zan su
20a3(rgyud): 'jigs thams cad la/ mur ba nyid du tshul par 'gyul/ chom rkun dag gis 'dzings pa la/ rdo rje sngongan po rdo rje can/ mthing nag sa gnod phyag rgya can// mchod nas bdag nyid skyab su 'gro// 
20a4(rgyud): ta ka ka ra Na ga ra kha tI Sha/ sa d+hi tsiH ta ya/ ri/ tsi tsa tra dzin du dan sa ra sa ra kar sAt+ma/ sbrul gyi gdus pas 'jigs pa la bal po se'u'i lcug ma la// bram ze'i gzugs kyi
20a5(rgyud): rgyan bsgoms nas// rin chen 'byung ldan bkur bsgoms te// skye ber mu tig byi ru dang // me shel pad+ma ra ka dang // in+d+ra nI la dung g.yas 'khyil// gser dang dngul dang ngur ba dang / 
20a6(rgyud): rin chen rgyan dang 'bru snar bcas// ku sha gla rtsi tsan+dan dang // bal lu skyer pa ut+pal la// gur gum dri zhim lus byugs la// oM rat+na saM b+ha ba// sa ti bi sha sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA// lce 'bab pa yi
20a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa la// stag dang 'brug gi rus pa la// mkhar ba'i phye ma lcags phye dang // zangs phye ra gan phye ma dang // gser gyi phye ma gro bar btum// snang ba mtha' yas bskur bsgoms te// byams pas
20a8(rgyud): phyogs mtshams kun tu bstan// dug rnams sna tshogs dud pas bdugs// oM a mr-i ta badz+ra dz+wa la badz+ra dz+wa la/ gardza gardza/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra sA hA/ me yi 'jigs pa dag la ni// 'brug
20b1(rgyud): rus sen+de 'a ga dang // ngal dang sa lu'i rtse dang / na pa dang gro dang rkun 'grub kyi// thang grom ngag la sngags btab ste/ me yi phyog su gter bar bya// ma tha ra tsan tra T+Ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la sa ra sar/ 
20b2(rgyud): ka ra ka ra swA hA// rnam par snang mdzad skur bsgoms la/ me la gtor nas yis gsod// chu bo dag gi 'jigs pa la/ mdze can po mo'i thod pa yi// ra dang khyi dang phag gi khrags bdag sde
20b3(rgyud): gzugs dang bcas// nang du bcug ste chu bor dor// don yod grub pa'i sku ru gsal// oM a mo g+ha sid+d+ha/ a~M ka be tA ra Ni sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra swA hA// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te// thugs
20b4(rgyud): chen po'i kha dogs ni// so sor gsal zhing bsgom par bya// byams pa kun la rab tu blta// 'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// / 'jigs pa kun srung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// 
20b5(rgyud): sku gdung me tog dkar pos mchod// sa bzhi dri yis chag chag btab// snying po gzungs dang bcas pa 'am// khru gang che da kyi mchod rten la// legs par bstod cing mchod
20b6(rgyud): par brtsi// stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i// thugs rje'i gzugs kyi rten du shar// rdzu 'phrul tshad med bzhi dang ldan// byang chub phyogs ni yong su rdzogs// dri med dung 'dra dkar po ste// 
20b7(rgyud): rgyal chen bzhi yang de bzhin no// byang chub chen po'i mchod rten no// khri 'phang bcu gsum tog dang ldan// lha yi rol mo char du 'bab// chos sgra rgyun mi 'chad pa'i gtar// rim chen lnga yi
20b8(rgyud): bdag nyid de// phur bus gdab cing yongasu bzung // sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs che// de yi bsod nams rab bstan pa/ mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu// nyon mongs dbang gyur sdig
21a1(rgyud): pa rnams zhang cig tsam gyings par 'gyur/ shin tu garbang ba'i gnas dag ni khyams ldan cing rje can gyis byas// bram ze'i rigs las byung ba yi/ 'drim
21a2(rgyud): snying rje can gyis byas// rang bsam rnam par dag pa yis// mdun du bdar te mchod par bya// tshang dang kha dog yongs dag gsal/ yid du 'ong ba dag la'o// zas dang yid du 'ong ba yi/ 
21a3(rgyud): dkar gsum sbags pa spangs pa yi// sha dang sgog pa la phug dang // zan dang chang ni shin tu spangs// shel phreng pad+ma'i snying po dang // bo d+hi tse dang mu tig shis// g.yal dang sbrid pa mi
21a4(rgyud): tshigs rnams// nam yang chod par mi bya'o// yo byad dam tshig snyan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// las rnams sna tshogs sgrub byed pa// po ti 'am
21a5(rgyud): lugs ma ras ris la// brten nas bdag ni byams sems ldan/ muM las 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni// dmar ser uH/ la po ti 'dzin/ mnyam pa snrel mo dkrung gis
21a6(rgyud): bzhugs// bum pa kha dog ser po ni// rin chen lngang bru snang bcas/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa la pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me/ man+da re/ i li mi
21a7(rgyud): li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA// lan bdun yongasu bzlas byas na// gti mug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur// ras ris mchod rten la rten nas// maN+Dal dri zhim
21a8(rgyud): me tog dmar// kar ra mngar gsum dag dang ni// 'bras dang til dkar yungs dkar dang // pad+ma'i rtsa ba dkar po la// ril bu rgya shug 'brum bu tsam// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ni// hrIHlas
21b1(rgyud): byung ba'i sku mdog dbar lag ra pad+ma ma chos sbyin mdzad/ sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs/ Narba thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra d+hi ra d+ha ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Ta re/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le bras le
21b2(rgyud): su me ku su me man+da re/ i li li li/ tsi dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/ ril bu dag la sngags btab ste// byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas bza'// srid pa'i 'dod chags ni gyur nas// rab tu bde
21b3(rgyud): ba thob par 'gyur/ maN+Dal sngon po legs byas nas/ ut+pal sngon po nim pa dang // a ka ru dang tsan+dan dang // dri yi chu yis bum pa dgang // phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can// sku mdog ldang sngon nung
21b4(rgyud): zhig khro/ rdo rje dril bu phyag na bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iHbaT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tse le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me
21b5(rgyud): mahA'o/ ma ma ma lo/ ci dri lam par ya hA/ Sh+T+r-iH/ dpyas na dza ni/ bum pa'i chu yis khrus byas nas/ 9ngarab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ seMd pachen pa zab pa
21b6(rgyud): 'gyur// dug rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / ras sam grog shing shun la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ che ge mo la rak+Sha
21b7(rgyud): rak+Sha zhes bya'o// bsrung ba lus la gdag byas nas// nad dang gdon dang rims dang ni// 'jigs pa'i nad dang gdon las thar// bde ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// skud pa dag ni dkar po la// 
21b8(rgyud): mdud pa dag ni rab byas te// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya rtsa brgyad ni legs bzlas nas// bsrung ba'i dam pa 'di byas na// srung ba yi ni dam pa 'dis// srung ba'i mchog tu
22a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o// mu tig rin che ru bi ru gser/ ga bur gur gum gla rtsi dang // a ga ru dang du ru ska// pur ma snying dkar gdags par bya// tsin+dan gla rtsi gur gum dang / gu gul
22a2(rgyud): nag po bsregs pa'i phye// ba yi 'o mas 'de gu bya// gnas gsum dag tu byugs pas ni// gdon dang nad kyis 'jigs kun las// byugs pas de ni srung bar 'gyur// srung ba'i 'khor
22a3(rgyud): lo'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / ser ba yongasu srung ba ni// seng ldeng ljang ti'i phur bu la// gzungs sngags bzlas pa dbusu ni/ hUM las byung ba'i sku bskyed do// phyogs bzhir
22a4(rgyud): khro ba chen po ni/ shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal ni// sku ma chog dkar po me dpung 'bar// rdo rje 'khor lo sdig mdzub mdza da// oM pradran kring can han hUM paT// lho ru ga shin
22a5(rgyud): gshed po ni// dmar po lag na be con 'dzin// oM ya man+ta kr-i da tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT// nub tu rta mgrin dmar po ni// me dpung rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin// oM ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu
22a6(rgyud): hUM phaT// byang du khro gnyer can sku ni// ljang sngon ral gri 'dzin pa ste// oM a mo g+ha ka b+h+r-i ku ti ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT// phyogs bzhir phur bu dag la ni// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// gcan zan
22a7(rgyud): dri ma yungs dkar bsres// gsang sngags bzlas shing mkha' la gtor// oM badz+ra kro d+ha hu lu hu lu tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na hUM phaT// ser ba srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// 
22a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ phyag stong dang spun stong la 'od zer 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ dkar po dang / dmar po dang / nag po dang / ljang khu dang / ser po dang / 'od
22b1(rgyud): zer de dag gis 'gro ba ris drug po de dag thams cad la khyab ste/ dbugs dbyung ba mdzad// de nas rgyal chen bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'ang
22b2(rgyud): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od chen dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dag
22b3(rgyud): chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min
22b4(rgyud): la sogs pa'i lha de dag gis/ mchod pa'i sprin gyis char phab nas// lha'i bus tshig su bcad pas bstod pa// spyan ras gzig sa dbang thugs rje'i sku// phyag stong nyon mongs
22b5(rgyud): grol ba'i phyag/ spyan stong shes rab 'od gsal te// 'gro dan mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod nas// bcom lnga na 'das thugs rje chen po'i sku de mi snang ba
22b6(rgyud): gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub par gyur to// de nas lha'i bus gsol pa// 'di la phan yon ci zhes zhus pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang
22b7(rgyud): zhig rgyud 'di yid byed na// nad dang rims dang gdon dang ni// rgyal po gcan zan 'jigs pa dang // 'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // 
22b8(rgyud): mtshams med sdig pa mi dge kun// rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur// dmyal ba ngan song sdug bsngal dang // mi khom brgyad las rnam grol te// nyan dang 'chang dang skem par 'gyur// dri
23a1(rgyud): med na mkha'i dkyil lta bur// bcom ldan 'das kyang mthong bar 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
23a2(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas// leg so leg so zhes bya ba gsungs nas/ stan la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa'
23a3(rgyud): 'bum phrag lnga stong dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud le'u lu
23a4(rgyud): gcig pa rdzog so// / paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang / le ts+tsha ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ le ke shwa ra ka lpa/ 
23a5(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gis rtog pa// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'a tsha lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// chos la phyag
23a6(rgyud): 'tsha lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tsha lo// 'jig rten mgon po'i rtog pa ni// mdor bsdud 'dir ni brjod bya ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rgyun chen po// 'dod pa'i don kun rab ster ba// dang por raM
23a7(rgyud): shig rig pa 'dzin pas gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogasu// hUM gis dag par byas par nye bar 'dug cing pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings la// oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko traM zhes brjod la/ 
23a8(rgyud): thams cad stong pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o// de'i rjes la oM tsid+ha pra ti bo d+hi ka ro mi/ de ltar brjod la/ sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bsgoms nas/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i
23b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o// zla ba'i steng du hrIHyig sngags gyur pa las bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu bsgom par bya ste/ sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis
23b2(rgyud): pa mdog dmar ba mtshan du ni gos dkar mo de la 'khyud pa/ pad+ma dmar po kha 'byed cing gar gyi tshul can khab kyi phyag rgyas kha 'byed par bsgoms la 'di brjod par bya sde/ ji ltar pad+ma
23b3(rgyud): dmar po 'di// 'dod chags skyon gyis ma gos shing // de bzhin sna tshogs bag chags skyon// khams gsum rnam par dag pa'o// dbu rgyan la 'od dpag tu med par bsgom par bya'o// 
23b4(rgyud): de nas 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya bak+tsi ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko Na/ de ltar bsgoms nas phyogs brgyad du lha mo bas me// oM bi lo ki ni/ a ba lo ki ni/ 
23b5(rgyud): a ba lo ka ya swA hA// shar gyi mdab ma la ni rnam par 'jigs ma zhes bya ba'i lha mo pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa 'o// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// lho'i pad+ma la
23b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma pa la sha'i 'dab ma lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM b+hu ri Ni ma hA tsakra brti ni hUM/ nub kyi mdab ma la b+hu ri Ni zhes bya ba'i lha mo ut+pal ljon po
23b7(rgyud): lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM b+h+r-i ku TI ta re tu ta ma tA hUM// byang gi 'dab ma la khre gnyer can zhes bya ba'i lha mo pad+ma ser po bsnams pa'o// oM ma hA shri ye ma Ni pad+me hUM/ 
23b8(rgyud): ngi ri d+h+ri gos can shar phyogs kyi mtsham su btsong lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM badz+ra pad+me shwa ra ma pad+me hUM/ lho phyogs kyi mtsham su pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o// oM baM
24a1(rgyud): shra pad+me hUM/ 'di ni sna tshogs kyi pad+ma ste/ nub phyogs kyi mtsham su pad+ma nag po bsnams pa'o// oM bi shra bak+She hUM/ 'di ni sna tshogs kyi zhal can te/ byang phyogs
24a2(rgyud): kyi mtsham su sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM pad+ma nirma shwa ra hUM/ ze 'bru'i dbus su 'dod chags chen po'i bcom ldan 'das sbyar ras gzigs dbang phyug go// de ltar gang sgom
24a3(rgyud): pa dang ldan zhing ting nge 'dzin la goms par byed na dngos grub bstan por 'gyu ro// de yis sangs rgyas nyid dang 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ste ro// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin
24a4(rgyud): grub cing // gzungs dang sa yang de bzhin no// 'dzi garten kur gyi bde ston cing // so so rang nyid rje su sgrub// sangs rgyas nyid ni byang sems nyid// rang rgyal nyid kyang de bzhin no// 
24a5(rgyud): yid 'ong sangs rgyas go 'bang ni// spyad mi nga gos par 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dang ga bur bcas// tsan+dan dmar dang rab sbyar te// rdo rje chu dang yang
24a6(rgyud): ngag ldan// sangs rgyas kun gyi bcud len yin// sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni// bcud kyis len ni de yang // 'gru ba 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po yis// gzhon zhing nad med
24a7(rgyud): dam bde zhing // tshe dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // skal bzang ye shes bla na med// skye ba 'di la 'grub pa'o// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang // 
24a8(rgyud): bsad dang bskrad pa la sogs pa// rengs dang phur bus gdab nyid dang // nam mkha' 'gro ba de bzhin no// sa bcu'i dbang phyug thob 'gyur zhing // ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur// 
24b1(rgyud): de phyir ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// rdo rje dam tshig de yis ni// rig pa dang ni bcas pa'i mchog 'jig rten mgon por 'grub par 'gyur/ oM hriHpad+ma ni rte shwa ra hUM/ rtsa ba'i sngags
24b2(rgyud): 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na nyin mo dang nub mo byas pa'i sdig pa nyams par 'gyuraro// yang na lnga brgya bzlas brjod byas na nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyuraro// yang na stong bzlas brjod
24b3(rgyud): byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par 'gyuraro// yang na stong phrag gnyis bzlas brjod byas na thams cad kyis mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyu ro// gzhan yang stong phrag gsum bzlas brjod
24b4(rgyud): byas na skal ba bzang ba dang // g.yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyu ro// gzhan yang stong phrag bzhi bzlas brjod byas na da bul ba med par 'gyu ro// yang na stong phrag lnga bzlas brjod
24b5(rgyud): byas na dgra thams cad kyi snying 'khrug par byed// stong phrag drug bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad med par 'gyuraro// stong phrag bdun bzlas brjod byas na bdud bzhi las
24b6(rgyud): mchog tu rgyal bar 'gyuraro// stong phrag brgyad bzlas brjod byas na rig 'dzin ma grub par 'gyu ro// stong phrag dgu bzlas brjod byas na sbyin mo grub par 'gyuraro// khri tshe gcig bzlas brjod
24b7(rgyud): byas na lha dang klu dang / mi'i bu mo rnams 'grub par 'gyuraro// stong phrag nyi shu bzlas brjod byas na bar snang la 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub par 'gyuraro// stong phrag sum cu
24b8(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyuraro// stong phrag bzhi bcu bzlas brjod byas na mkha' la spyod pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// stong phrag lnga bcu bzlas brjod
25a1(rgyud): byas na ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// stong phrag drug cu bzlas brjod byas na grub pa'i rig 'dzin du 'gyuro// stong phrag 'dun cu bzlas nas gsum gyi/ 
25a2(rgyud): bdag por 'gyur// stong phrag brgyad cu bzlas na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyuraro// 'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'gyuraro// 'bum
25a3(rgyud): phrag bcu bzlas brjod byas na rang dga'i gzugasu 'gyuraro// bzhi cha dang bcas pa'i 'bum phrag bzlas brjod byas na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyuraro// bye ba phrag cig bzlas brjod byas na/ 
25a4(rgyud): thams cad du rje su 'dzin par byed pa'i nus pa can sgra na ras gzigs dbang phyug lta bu 'grub par 'gyur zhing lus dang ngag dang yid kyang byin gyis rlob bo// 
25a5(rgyud): 'di ni bcom ldan 'das gsungs rdo rjes gsungs pa 'o// oM pad+ma ri ba si ni ba ri de hUM/ 'di ni gos dkar mo 'i sngags te lan cig brjod pas sdig pa'i
25a6(rgyud): rigs kyi tshogs sreg par byed do// nub bdun gyi nang rol tu rgyal po blon po dang bcas pa mdun na 'don dang / skye 'gro'i tshogs dang / btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du
25a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// bzlas pa com gyis phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi bskal pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de lta bu'i rim pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na gang yang sangs
25a8(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nus pa mnyam zhing / dngos su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyuro// oM bi lo ki ni a
25b1(rgyud): ba lo kA ya swA hA// 'di'i sbyor ba ni stong phrag bcu bzlas brjod byas na me long dang / 'theb chen dang / na mkha' la sogs pa la gsal po pra dbab par 'grub par 'gyuraro// 
25b2(rgyud): gang sngon byung ba dang yang da ltar dang phyis 'ong ba de ston par byed do// yang na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par sngags par byas la/ nub mo nyal ba'i dus su song 'tshas
25b3(rgyud): nas mi smra bar nyal na dgos pa gang yin pa rmi lam du ston par byed do// de yang 'khrul pa med par ston no// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma 'di 'bum phrag
25b4(rgyud): gcig bzlas na 'jig rten grub par 'gyuraro// lha'i bu mo dang / klu'i bu mo dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / mi'i bu mo ste/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas gang
25b5(rgyud): 'dod pa de'i chos 'byung du gur gum dang / rgya skyegs dang / rang byung gi me tog dang / byang chub kyi sems dang yang dag par ldan pas rtsibs drug pa shin tu rno ba'i
25b6(rgyud): 'khor lo dmar po 'khor bzhin pa rnam par bris pa bsam la/ chos 'byung de sgrub pa pos ri sul chu ngogs gsang ba'i gnasu bsam par bya'o// de yang myong shing sgrub pa po'i steng du
25b7(rgyud): ltung ba'i rnam pa bsgom par bya'o// de bkug la rang la chu shing nor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur bar lta'o zhes bya'o// yang na lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / rig pa
25b8(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / blon po dang skyes bu 'am gang 'dod pa de dmar por rnam par bsams la/ de'i snying dkar rdo rje lcags kyu 'od 'bar ba'i
26a1(rgyud): phreng ba 'khrug pa'i lcags kyus 'bigs bzhin pa dang / zhags pas rkeng pa nas bcings la 'gugs bzhin pa 'dod pas mos par gyur pas rab tu gsal
26a2(rgyud): por bsam par bya'o// bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa 'gugs shing dbang du 'gyuraro zhes bya'o// oM b+hu ri Ni ma hA tsakra ban+ti ni hUM/ 'di'i sbyor ba ni dri chen dang / rdo rje chu la sogs pas
26a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor byas la ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gis mnyam par mchod la// de na gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos gling ngam gling bzhan dang / grong khyer dang / grong dang / yul 'khor gyi rgyal por
26a4(rgyud): bsam zhing bzlas pa bya'o// de yis bdag po nyid 'gyur zhing long spyod pa la long spyad nas bde ba can gyis 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye ba thob par 'gyuraro// oM b+h+r-i kun+di
26a5(rgyud): tA re tu ta ma ta hUM/ lha mo khro gnyer can zhes bya ba 'di ni dgra'i rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs la/ dug dang / tsha dang / ske tshe dang / khrag dang / chu bo'i 'gram gnyis kyi sa dang / dri chen
26a6(rgyud): rdo rje chus bsnos la gzugs brnyan byas la mi'i rus pa'i rang bzhin gyis phur bus tshigs dang gnad kun la btab la/ thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag ste/ dur khrod kyi me la gdung
26a7(rgyud): par bya'o// zhag bdun du sbyor ba byas pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gal te sems la sdig pa med par gyur na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyang 'chi bar 'gyu ro// oM ma hA shri ye
26a8(rgyud): ma Ni pad+me hUM/ lha mo 'di la dri dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / bsod snyoms kyis zas kyis so sor mchod la bzlas pa byas na thams cad du bsrungs par 'gyuraro// yul chos kyi rtsod pa
26b1(rgyud): las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mnyam par 'gyuraro// nor chen po'i bdag por 'gyuraro// yang na pad+ma stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na rgyal por 'gyu ro// oM badz+ra pad+ma shwa ri ma
26b2(rgyud): ra pad+me hUM/ rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma 'di yid kyis bzlas na dbang dgug pa la sogs pa byed// lan bdun mngon par sngags te/ gdung bud mdun na rang srung zhing rims dang / lkog nad dang / 
26b3(rgyud): nad thams cad dang / mtshon dang / me dang / rkun po dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / sbrul dang / 'ching ba dang / rgya mtsho dang / sha za'i nang stong phrag gcig bzlas pas zhi bar 'gyuraro// lam
26b4(rgyud): gcig gis las kyis brjed byed kyi gdon dang / zad byed dang skyugs pa dang / bri bar dka' ba dang / sgom par dka' ba'i gdug pa can gyi sems can thams cad nyams par bye'o// 'bum
26b5(rgyud): phrag gcig bzlas na lus 'phel zhing skal ba bzang ba dang / lus gzhon zhing nang med par byed cing dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba nyams par byed// yang na klu thab khung du
26b6(rgyud): bris la der dug dang / ske tshe dang tsha ba'i sbyin bsreg bya zhing / klu'i ming dang spel bas 'bum phrag gcig sbyin bsreg byas na char chen po phab nas mu ge med par 'gyuraro// 
26b7(rgyud): bi shwa pad+me hrIHsna tshogs pad+ma 'di ni rmongs pa dang / rengs pa dang / mnan pa dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / phur bu dang / mig 'phrul dang / ngo mtshar dang / 
26b8(rgyud): mi mthong bar byed pa dang / phug du 'jug pa dang / na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / lcags sgrog gcod pa dang / ril por dgug pa gang dang gang yin pa rgyud las bstan pa dang / rgyud
27a1(rgyud): gzhan dang yang dag par ldan pa'i las thams cad byed do// lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi dngos grub sde ro// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras
27a2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug 'grub cing gang 'dod pa'i las thams cad ri 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya'o// oM bi shwa pad+me hUM/ sna tshogs rdo rje zhes brjod pa'i lha mo 'dis ni ngag gi dngos grub ster ro// 
27a3(rgyud): tshig shad mkhan du byed cing gzhan gyi ngag rengs par bye'o// rang nyid srung ba dang / gzhan yang srung bar 'gyur ro// rang skal ba bzang zhing gzhon po yang skal ba bzang po'i rang don dang gzhan
27a4(rgyud): don byedado// ji ltar 'dir ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can gyi don la spro zhing brtson pa de bzhin du/ 'dir bcom ldan 'das dbul ba dang / yi dgas dang / 
27a5(rgyud): byol seng gi skyes gan su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar bye'o// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnam sa la ma nyid kyis srung zhes thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin
27a6(rgyud): gshegs pas gsungaso// de ltar rtog pa'i rgyal po bsdus pa rab tu bstan to// sems brtan rtog pa med pa yi// blo dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig spyod lam bstan pa yi// 
27a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun rgyu ji lta bar// de ltar 'dir ni rab sbyar nas// de nas rtag pa'i go 'phang 'grub// ji ltar 'dod par gnas byed cing // kun la long spyod kun byed ltar// ji ltar 'dod pa'i
27a8(rgyud): snying rjes spyod// ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyod pa yis// 'dug pa 'am ni las kyang rung // 'chag pa 'am ni gang dang de// rgod pa 'am ni brjod pa 'am// gang de ji ltar don bzhi no// dkyil 'khor
27b1(rgyud): du ni ma zhugs pa 'am// sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa yang // rang mos lha yi rnal 'byor bdag bsod nams chung ba 'am 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// thams cad
27b2(rgyud): mkhas pa nyid dang ni// thams cad rdo rje 'chang nyid kyang // skye ba 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// yang gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor dag ni gzugs brnyan gyi// bcos ma'i sku las 'gyur ba min// 
27b3(rgyud): byang chub sems chen la brtson na// rnal 'byor dag ni de lha yin// khrag chen po dang ga pur bcas// tsan+dan dmar dang bsres pa ni// tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa na// kun las mchog gyur
27b4(rgyud): bcud la no// sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni// bcud kyi len ni swa ba ru/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe bzang dang // nad med bde ba bzang po thob// grub pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar gsum
27b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas pha rol phyin pa dang // gzungs dang sa dang de bzhin 'grub// bde ston thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // rang nyid so so rjesu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam
27b6(rgyud): sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos nyid kyang // sangs rgyas kun ni rab grub 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa byed par 'dod cing sems
27b7(rgyud): yongasu dag pa med na de'i tshe thang sku'i sgrub pa bshad/ bsnyen gnas dang ldan zhing bsrung bar gnas pa'i lha bzes tshen sna ma 'dres par ras sar pa de yang rang rang gi kun tu khru re'i tshad
27b8(rgyud): kyis bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/ sna tshogs kyis pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/ ze 'bru'i dkyil du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus bcom ldan 'das/ 
28a1(rgyud): mdog dmar ba mi bskyed pa'i dbu rgyan can// zhal gsum pa/ zhal gyi btso bo ni dmar ba ste/ 'dod chags chen po nyid kyi phyiraro// g.yas pa gnag pa ste zhe sdang
28a2(rgyud): chen po nyid kyi phyi ro// g.yon pa dkar ba ste gti mug nyid kyi phyiraro// phyag drug pa bya'o// g.yon pa'i phyag gcig gis gos dkar mo'i mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa dang / pad+ma dmar po bsnams
28a3(rgyud): pa g.yon pa nyid kyis me tog gi gzhu bsnams pa'o// g.yas pa gsum du khab kyi phyag rgyas pad+ma kha 'byed pa dang / me tog gi mda' dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// sems dpa'i skyil
28a4(rgyud): mo krung gi gnas par bya'o// shar gyi 'dam ma la rnam par gzigs ma mdog dkar mo// pad+ma dmar po dang rdo rje phyag na bsnams pa'o// lho phyogs kyi mdab ma la lha mo sgrol ma ljang ku
28a5(rgyud): rgya skyegs kyi shing gi lo ma dang / rin po che phyag na bsnams pa'o// nub phyogs kyi mdab ma la lU ri ser po ut+pal sngon po dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi
28a6(rgyud): mdab ma la khro gnyer can pad+ma dkar ser lta bu pad+ma ser po dang ral gri phyag na bsnams pa'o// shar gyi mtsham su pad+ma'i gos can ma gser lta bu'i mdog btsod lta bu'i
28a7(rgyud): pad+ma bsnams pa'o// lho phyogs kyi mtsham su rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma na mkha'i mdog can dkar po pad+ma dang shel gyi phreng ba bsnams pa'o// nub phyogs kyi mtsham su sna tshogs
28a8(rgyud): kyi pad+ma ston ka'i zla ba lta bu dkar ser gyi mdog pad+ma nag po dang po ti phyag na bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi mtsham su sna tshogs rdo rje ma sna tshogs kyi mdog can du byas la/ snatsho
28b1(rgyud): kyi rdo rje dang / sna tshogs kyi pad+ma bsnams pa'o// de ltar pad+ma la bkod cing bris la/ sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni mtsham su'o// dzaHhUM baM hoH'i yi ge las yang dag par byung ba'i lcags
28b2(rgyud): klu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu rnams ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnam su'o// yang thang sku gzhan brjod par bya ste/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom
28b3(rgyud): ldan 'das g.yas na skud pa dang / dbyug pa dang / rtse gsum dang / mchog sbyin pa'i phyag can/ g.yon na pad+ma dang ril ba spyi blugs dang / zhags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i dam
28b4(rgyud): tshig gi po ti bsnams pa'i phyag can/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thab 'chang ba/ sbrul mchod phyir thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan la 'od dpag med bzhengs pa 'am/ 
28b5(rgyud): skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa dbu rgyan du byas pa'o// de yi g.yas phyogs kyi cha ru sgrub pa po// mched yon gyi snod dang bdug spos kyi snod lag pas bzung bar bya'o// gzhan
28b6(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das phyag gnyis pa/ ri gru 'dzin la gnas shing seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ g.yon pa sa la gnas shing zhabs g.yas pa pad+ma'i steng gi gdan steng su bzhugs
28b7(rgyud): pa'o// phyag re re na phreng ba bsnams par sems pa pos phreng ba'i 'og tu 'dren pa'i tshul 'dis bsam par bya ba ni sems pa lta bur gnas pa zhes bya'o// cho ga gzhan yang bcom
28b8(rgyud): ldan 'das dkar zhing dmar ba phyag bcu pa ri dgas seng ge'i gdan la pad+ma'i steng du skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ g.yas na phreng ba bsnams pa'o// seng ge dang / glang po che dang / 
29a1(rgyud): me dang / sbrul gyi 'jigs pa rnams las grol ba'i cha byad ca no// g.yon na pad+ma dmar po sdong bu gnyis pa steng du po ti can te/ rkun ma dang / lhag sgrog gis bcing
29a2(rgyud): pa dang / mtsho dang thog chen po dang / sha zas za ba rnams sgrol ba'i cha byad ca no// gnas de brgyad du sgrub pa po rgyan thams cad kyi rgyan pa/ yan lag thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa sngon bzhin
29a3(rgyud): du langs pa 'am/ 'dug par bsam par bya'o// gzhan yang cho ga ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs kyi gzugs 'chang ba dbu bcu gsum pa spyi bo'i mgo bo ni ldang
29a4(rgyud): ku'i rta zha'o// yang na zhi ba sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhwa'o// phyag brgya pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sna tshogs kyi mngon ma bsnams pa'o// yang na zhal brgya pa phyag stong pa yang bya'o// 
29a5(rgyud): kha cig tu rdo rje skyil mo krung gi gnas pa 'am/ khan ngas pa yang bya'o// tsam pa lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan 'das/ thang sku de kun gyi g.yas phyogs kyi bar du sgrub pa po me dog pa
29a6(rgyud): mchod yon gyi snod dang bdug spos kyi snod lag pa na bzung bar bya'o// de rnams kyi dbu la dbu rgyan 'od dpag med pa 'am/ chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten bri bar bya'o// 'di ni thang sku'i cho ga'o// 
29a7(rgyud): thang sku'i mdun du rtsa ba'i sngags ji lta ba 'dod pa de bzla shing bsam gtan yang byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la// mchod yon snod dang / yongasu gang ba'i bdud rtsi lta bu'i
29a8(rgyud): zas dang / sgron ma'i zas la byas nas// mchod yon byin te/ sngags gang 'dod pa de bzlas pa byas na de la gsungs pa'i dngos grub du 'gyuraro// gsang ba po ni sngags 'di nyid// kha cig la
29b1(rgyud): yang mi sbyi na// blo ldan sems can don brtson pa'i// sems brtan pa la sbyin par bya// mchod rten las byed nyid la ni/ blo ldan 'bad par sbyin par bya// rang nyid dang ni nor dag gis// bla ma la
29b2(rgyud): rtag gus par bya// rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor la// mchog tu gyur pa'i yon yang dbul// gang dang ni btang bka' ba// mchog tu gyur pa 'dir ni sngags// chung ma sring mo dang yang ni// bu mo dang
29b3(rgyud): ni tsha mo dag bu mo rgyan kun brgyan par bya'o// glang chen rta dang shing rta dang // phyug dang grong khyer rgyal srid dang // yul 'khor rgyal srid ldan pa dang // rin chen sna tshogs dag kyang ni// gzhan yang rdo
29b4(rgyud): rje slob dpon dbul// rdo rje slob dpon dgyes gyur pa/ thams cad rab sbyin dbul bar bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzam+b+ha la dang bod kyi
29b5(rgyud): lo sde ba dge slong ba ris bskur cing gtan la phab pa// // / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
29b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong
