29b7(rgyud): brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag
29b8(rgyud): du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag
30a1(rgyud): pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
30a2(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dang bdag ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bla ma'i 'od las blangs pa kun tu bzang po'i gzungs yang dag par ston par 'tshal te/ gzungs de thos ma
30a3(rgyud): thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang
30a4(rgyud): sel to// long spyod chen po phun sum tshogs pa yang yong su 'dzin to// lus rnam par dag pa yang 'tho'o// ngag rnam par dag pa yang 'tho'o// sems rnam par dag pa yang 'tho'o// pha rol
30a5(rgyud): tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang yong su rdzogs par bgyidado// gzungs rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'tho'o// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mnyes par bgyid do// bcom
30a6(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gis gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin kyang 'thob// rin chen phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin kyang 'thob// 'bar
30a7(rgyud): ba'i sgron ma'i ting 'dzin kyang 'thob// rgya mtsho phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin kyang 'thob// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting 'dzin kyang 'thob// rin chen phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin kyang 'thob// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin
30a8(rgyud): kyang 'thob/ phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting 'dzin kyang 'thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la sogs pa'i ting 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdag la mngon
30b1(rgyud): sum du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das des na bdag da ltar dran pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/ blo gros 'di lta bu dang ldan/ chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan zhing / mthong ba dang thos
30b2(rgyud): pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i don mchis par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag thos pa don ma ris/ gzungs 'di thos pa'i don mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad cing
30b3(rgyud): 'khor bzhi po de yang yongasu dgod du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dag pa de'i dus la bab par shes ra smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor bzhi po
30b4(rgyud): 'di byin gyis brlabs zir to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la rdo rje'i dkyil
30b5(rgyud): 'khor gyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gzungs 'di smraso// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po
30b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// dad+ya thA/ khA ga me kha ka me tsak+Shu/ kha be/ shro tra kha be/ g+ha na kha be/ dza~M hu kha be/ ga la ya kha be/ ma na kha be/ sa ra kha be sa ra
30b7(rgyud): kha be sa ra kha be shA na dra kha be/ a na mi tra kha be/ a pra Ni hi ta kha be/ sa mA d+hi kha be/ pA ra mi tA kha be kho d+hi kha be/ sa ra sa ra sa ra/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ti/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/ d+harma a d+hiSh+Thi tak+Sha
30b8(rgyud): la ka la ka la/ saM b+ha a d+hid+d+hiH/ na mo dran ba ti nA~M/ bud d+ha ko nA NA~M/ a d+hin+dan du man/ tsang sra bar sha do A yu ba la cad dan du/ dad+ya thA/ su ra b+hi su ra b+hi/ ma hA su ra r+thi/ mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ ma tim
31a1(rgyud): bi ma hA ma ti/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+tha a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya/ sa mr-i dAn du nan/ sa man+ta b+ha dra d+ha ra NI swA hA// gzungs 'di thos
31a2(rgyud): ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag ni gzungs sna tshogs thob
31a3(rgyud): par gyur to// gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/ nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
31a4(rgyud): phyug mthong bar 'gyuraro// phongs par gyur pa'i tshe lan bdun yid la bgyid na thar par 'gyuro// rims nad thams cad la rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// rlung gis zin na mar dang / 'bru ma
31a5(rgyud): la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te bsku khar bgyi'o// so na na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas te bca' bar bgyi'o// rna ba na na ras bal gyi sa bon 'bru
31a6(rgyud): mar dang lhan cig tu bskol ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zangs kyi snod kyis rna bar blugs par bgyi'o// klad pa na ba la 'bru ma ro// lto na pa la byab par bgyi'o// gdon gyis btab pa la/ 
31a7(rgyud): tshon skud sna lnga la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te mgul du gdag so// mkha' gro ma'i gdon gyis btab na 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas te gshis thams cad du byA go// nad thams cad la khyab par
31a8(rgyud): bgyi'o// 'di ni sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i cho ga'o// ji ste sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / gzungs dang / ting 'dzin 'thob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / mi snang ba
31b1(rgyud): bgyi ba dang / mig bsdu ba dang / ldong ros la sogs pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ des sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor bgyis te bum pa gang ba brgya
31b2(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzhag la/ bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bres te/ me tog sna tshogs kyis chal par bkang la/ tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / kun tu ru'i bdug pas bdugs te/ mar me brgya
31b3(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bud cing mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ tshangs par spyod pa gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgos la gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis mtshams bcad par bgyi'o// na mo rat+na tra yA
31b4(rgyud): ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa tA ya/ mahA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ti li ban+d+ha mi/ mi li ban+d+ha mi/ tsi li mi li ban+d+ha mi/ sI mi ban+d+ha mi/ bdag gis
31b5(rgyud): mtshams la su yang 'da' bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ chu la lem nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas te phyogs bcur mtshams bcad par bgyi'o// gang gis 'gugs par
31b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di dag kyang thog mar brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya/ dad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li
31b7(rgyud): mi li mi li/ tsi le li/ e hi b+ha ga bAn/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki pe shA rA ya swA hA/ 'di ni bdag gi snying po bshad pa ste/ ngos bdag dgug par 'gyuro// de'i 'og tu zla ba yar gyi ngos ches
31b8(rgyud): brkyang nas bzung te nya'i bar du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi/ dus gsum du khrus bgyi/ dus gsum du gos rje bar bgyi'o// de nas res ba
32a1(rgyud): lnga la mchod pa chen po bgyis te bzlas brjod dpag tu ma mchis par bgyi'o// 'on tang nam gyi gung thun la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
32a2(rgyud): gser gyi kha dog gi lus dang ldan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par rgyan pa/ lus las 'od zer bye ba stong 'byin cing mchi bar 'gyuraro// de la rig sngags 'chang gis skrab
32a3(rgyud): par mi bgyi zhing bstan par bgyid na/ mthong ma thag tu sa thob par 'gyu ro// gzungs dang ting 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyu ro// shar phyogasu de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrug pa mthong bar 'gyur/ 
32a4(rgyud): lho phyogasu rin chen tog dang / nub phyogasu 'od dang / ga med dang / byang phyogasu de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra mthong bar 'gyu ro// de la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa
32a5(rgyud): grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rags pa'i chu la gyis mthong bar 'gyu ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa rnamasu skye bar 'gyur te/ thams
32a6(rgyud): cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid par 'gyu ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
32a7(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri
32a8(rgyud): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkha
32b1(rgyud): po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// // rgya bar skad du
32b2(rgyud): Ar+ya nI la kaN+Tha nA ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nI la kaN+Da zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
32b3(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshalo// btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
32b4(rgyud): phyag thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// bdag nges par shes rab chen po'i mig thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// 
32b5(rgyud): bdag nges par sems can thams cad yongasu skyob par gyur cig btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thu gas rje can khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bdag nges par myur du thab
32b6(rgyud): la mkhas par thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'ar lo// bdag nges par myur du shes rab chen po'i grur zhugs par gyur cig
32b7(rgyud): btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// bdag nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur cig / btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dang
32b8(rgyud): phrag thags rje can khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// bdag nges par rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje char khyed la
33a1(rgyud): phyag 'tsha lo// bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ri la 'jig par gyur cig / btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje car khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bdag
33a2(rgyud): nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'dug par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// bdag nges par myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig par gyur
33a3(rgyud): cig gang gi tshe bdag ral kri'i ri la mchi ba na ral gri'i ri de rang snyil zhing zhin par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag me ma mur gyi nang du mchi ba na me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe
33a4(rgyud): bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du mchi ba na sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stongs par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'chi ba na yi dgas
33a5(rgyud): rnams rang tshim par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag lha ma yin gyi gnasu 'chi ba na de dag gi sems rang dul bar gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag dud 'gro rnamasu 'chi ba na de dag
33a6(rgyud): ye shes chen po rang thob par gyur cig/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba ban+d+ha na/ ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ sarba pA pa
33a7(rgyud): sa mu dron+na Sha Na kA ra ya/ sarba bya d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ sarba i t+yu pa dra ba bi nA sha na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ye Shu tA NA ya/ ta s+ya na ma kri te/ i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ta ba nI la
33a8(rgyud): kaN+Tha/ na mA pa ra ma hri da yaM/ a bar+NaM ye Sh+ya mi sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nAn/ shu b+ha tse ta naM/ sarba bud d+ha nA ma/ pA pa mA ra ga bi sho d+ha kaM/ tad+ya thA/ A lo ke/ A lo ka/ A d+hi ba ti/ lo ka ti/ kran+ta/ 
33b1(rgyud): e h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he pre ya bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ hri da yaM e h+ya hi Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya pa ra ma mai tr-i tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka/ ku ru ku ru/ karmA sa d+ha ya sarba
33b2(rgyud): ya/ bi d+yAn/ di hi di hi me/ a raM ga maM ga ma/ bi haM ga ma/ sid d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bIr+yan+te/ ma hA bir+ya te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra NI shwa ra/ tsa la tsa la/ bi ma la mur+Ne/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ 
33b3(rgyud): kriSh+Ta dzi na/ dza nA ma ku TA/ A le kri ta/ sha rI ra laM ga pra lam+ba bi le ba/ ma hA sid+d+ha shud+d+ha d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ ma hA ma la/ tsa la tsa la/ ma hA tsa la/ kr-iSh+Na pak+Sha kr-iSh+Na pA sha ni r+g+ha ta na/ 
33b4(rgyud): pad+ma hAsta/ tsa ra tsa ra ni shwe tsa re shwa ra kr-iSh+Na sarba kri ta yadz+re ba b+hi ta/ e h+ye hi ma hA bi ra/ ma hA ba rA ha mu kha tre bu ra/ da ha ne shwa ra nA ra ya NA/ ru pa la be sha d+ha ri/ e h+ye hi ni la ka
33b5(rgyud): e h+ye hi ma sAl sal bi 'a ni rdzi ta/ lo ka s+ya rA \u0f7f/ bi bi nA sha na/ dwe Sha bi Sha bi nA sha na mo pa bi Sha bi nA sha na/ hu lu hu lu/ ma hA hu lu ha re/ mahA pad+ma nA b+ha/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ 
33b6(rgyud): su ru su ru/ bu d+h+ya/ bu d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha yA mi ta ba nI la kaN+Tha e h+ye hi/ bA ma s+thi ta/ ma hA di ha mu kha ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ ma hA T+yaT+Ta hA sa/ e h+ye hi D+ho b+ho ma hA sid+d+ha/ yo gi shwa ra/ 
33b7(rgyud): ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ pA tsa na/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi d+hun/ sma ra sma ra tA ma b+ha ga gaM lo ka nu bi lo ki stai/ ta thA ga tan/ de hi de hi/ me dang / sha na kA ma s+ya/ da sha naM pra sA d+ha ya sA hA/ sid d+ha ya
33b8(rgyud): sAhAM/ mahA sid+d+ha ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha yo gi shwa rA ya sAhA/ nI la katA ya sAhA/ pa rA ha mu khA ya sA hA/ si ha mu kha ya sA hA/ ma hA na ra siM ha mu kha ya sA hA/ badz+ra
34a1(rgyud): am+b+ha ya swAhA/ sid d+ha bi d+ha rA ya swAhA/ ma hA sid d+ha bi d+ha d+ha ra ya swA hA/ pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ kr-id+d+ha sarba tit+ta yadz+nyo pa pA ti ya swAhA/ ma hA mA la ma ku Ta d+ha ra
34a2(rgyud): ya swA hA/ tsaMkrA yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ she kha shab+da ni rA nA da na ka rA ya swA hA/ bo d+ha ra ka rA ya swA hA/ pA ma s+thi te kan+d+ha de sha kr-iSh+Na dzi na ya swA hA/ bya gA tsarma Ni ba na ya swA hA/ lo ke shwa ra
34a3(rgyud): ya swA hA/ ma hA yo gI shwa rA ya swA hA/ sarba sid+d+h+ya shwa rA ya swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha mUrti nA swA hA/ na ma Ar+ya oM ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwe ya ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA
34a4(rgyud): ya/ sid d+hun+da ma men+ta pa dA ni swA hA/ 'phags pa nI la kaN+Tha'i gzungs rdzog so// / bod skad du/ snying rjes mi bsho la ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum
34a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tsha lo// rdzogs pa'i sang+yas bye phrag bdun la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'pha gas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rjeche
34a6(rgyud): po mnga' ba/ gnod pa thams cad las thar bar mdzad pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/ 'byung po thams cad nges par bzlog pa/ sems can mi khom brgyad du lhung ba rnams yang
34a7(rgyud): dag par sgrol ba la phyag 'tsha lo// de la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bshad pa'i gzungs/ thugs rje chen po mi bshol ba zhes bya ba 'di brjod kyis/ 
34a8(rgyud): thugs rje chen po mnga' bdag la dgongasu gsol/ 'di lta ste/ oM dza ta dza ta/ dzi ti dzi ti/ dzu tu dz+ra tu/ ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ thugs rje chen po mnga'
34b1(rgyud): ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dus pa rjesu dgongs te gsheg su gsol/ tsaM ta tsaM ta/ tsi ta tsi ta/ tsuM tu tsu tu/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sprin du rjesu dgongs te
34b2(rgyud): thugs rje chen po mnga' ba myur du gshegasu gsol/ ra la ra la/ ri li ri li/ ru lu ru lu/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i bzhi la bzhengasu gsol/ 
34b3(rgyud): tsaM la tsaM la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ e hi e hi bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pas bzhengasu gsol/ bzhengasu gsol/ byams
34b4(rgyud): ba chen pos 'byung po thams cad bzlog du gsol/ thugs rje che na po'i sprin gyis bdag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha
34b5(rgyud): pra ma tha/ bzhengasu gsol/ bzhengasu gsol/ tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/ bdag gis bsam pa rdzogs par mdzadadu gsol/ la sa sbyang du gsol/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya swA hA/ mtha
34b6(rgyud): pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ pad+ma A sA nA ya swA hA/ shwe ta madz+dza u pa bi tA ya swA hA/ ki ri ta ne swA hA shu la ne swA hA/ tsakra Ne swA hA/ badz+re Ne swA hA/ ti Ne tri ya swA hA tri Na tri ya pra ha ru bA ya swAhA/ 
34b7(rgyud): A kA shA ya swA hA/  Ni shi ni sAhA/ pra tsa pa ta ye swA hA/ ya ma ye swA hA/ ya ma b+hu ya swA hA/ at+mA dze b+h+yo b+h+ya te b+h+yaHswA hA/ dza ra yu dze b+h+yo b+hu te b+huHswA hA/ saM swe da che b+h+yo b+h+ya te b+h+yaHoM ba pa tru ke b+h+yo b+huH
34b8(rgyud): b+h+ya bi ti ka b+h+yo byA d+hi b+h+yaHsA hA/ bai d+ha ti ki b+h+yo bA d+hi b+h+yaHswA hA/ bAlpA ke d+h+ye bA d+hi b+h+yaHsAhA/ sa ni na pa hi ke b+h+yo bA d+hi b+h+yaHsA hA/ sarba bA d+hi b+h+yaHsA hA/ b+hu me man+ta ri ShI tsIr+ye b+h+ye bA d+hi b+h+yaHsA hA/ 'di lnga snga
35a1(rgyud): traT tra na tI Ti tri Ti/ d+ha Tu trA nu/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / 'cha ba thams cad las srungs shig swA hA/ gra sa pra sa/ ma tha ma tha/ bra ma tha bra ma tha/ san sa ma
35a2(rgyud): da ha ba tse pa tsaM/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya A dz+nyA pa ti swA hA/ snying rjes mi bshol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ si ha nAd tan+d+ha nA ma khod skad du/ 
35a3(rgyud): seng+ge sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gsung gi lha la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dbang phyug tu bsgyur te rdo rje'i gdan la
35a4(rgyud): bzhug so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang lam rnams ji ltar sbyang
35a5(rgyud): e ma ho sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i mchog spyan ras gzigs seng ge sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ de yis smon lam sbya nga ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
35a6(rgyud): bsags par yid la byaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dbang phyug langs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smraso// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya
35a7(rgyud): ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka Te ka Te ka ro Te/ ka ro ke Ta/ bIr+ye swA hA/ oM AHhri/ si ha nA da hUM/ bruM e dzI khe hUM/ oM AHhUM/ oM ba la ni b+hu/ dz+r-IM dzI ba
35a8(rgyud): buN+ye d+hu be hUM/ sarba a mr-i te hUM/ oM ba ta li/ ma hA ba ta li/ hUM hUM hUM dzaMHswA hA/ oM bkra bak+Sha/ sa ma ya tiSh+Thadze hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ta pra te d+hU phaT/ sr-i ti ka ra hUM phaT/ oM ba ru Na A gaR+Sha ma
35b1(rgyud): A ban+na ya ma hA nA ga ki sa ti sar+b+ba b+hu ra/ phuHphuHphuHswA hA/ oM b+ha ga ba ti shru ti smr-i ti sa ma ba ti sa ra ma ti sid d+ha swA hA/ oM AHhriHhUM swA hA/ phuHhrIHoM sa~M phanA da hU~M phaT phaT/ ra sa dra ba la
35b2(rgyud): mA ra ya phaT/ dzA la dzA la hAM phaT/ au a big+h+nan+na kring hAM/ oM ag+na ye a ti byA/ a b+hi sa ma ya ya sha/ ma hA kri ye ha bya/ ka bya/ ma hA ni ya swA hA/ oM b+ha ba ga ag+na ya/ shAn di ku ru sA hA/ AHhrIHsaM ha
35b3(rgyud): nang badz+ra tsakra bidz+ra laM ki ka hU~M zla bruM/ le ket+tA ra No saM ha nA da bru br-i bruM hUM na b+h+r-i ra nA da bruM bruM bruM hUM hUM hUM swA hA// gsang ba'i bdag po 'di ni maN+Dal gyi bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// gsang pa dang / phyir ldeg pa dang
35b4(rgyud): dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / zhi ba'i las yin te/ nang par ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas maN+Dal byas te/ mngar gsum lag pa'i mthil du mnyes pas klu'i zhe sdang zhi bar 'gyu ro// 'di
35b5(rgyud): ni klu'i sde dpon zhes bya ste/ seng+ge'i steng du zla ba la/ rgyal po la pa'i stabs kyi bzhugs// g.yas nathong mtshan rtse gsum la// drab po'i rgyal rigs dbang du bsdus// pad+ma
35b6(rgyud): rtse la thod pa ni/ phrin las bzhi ldan ku mu da// shes rab sbyor ba'i ral grir bcas// dka' thub ldan pa'i sku de la// rig sngags rnam par rgyan pa po// gsum dang lnga ni mdun du 'phyang // rtse
35b7(rgyud): mor 'ong dpag med pas rgyan/ seng+ge'i cha las byung ba yin// 'das skyes dmar po'i lo ma gnyis// pad+ma bzhi la sngags bzhi ldan// rang lus reg nas thal mo sbyar/ sku la 'dud rtsing
35b8(rgyud): phrin las byed// rdo rje'i gdan la mi bskyod pa'i// thugs kha nas ni sngags 'od 'don// spro ba gsum du ldan pa'i sngags// nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bya'o// gsang ba'i bdag po rmang 'di
36a1(rgyud): la spong ba'i sems cad de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smod pa yin no// gsang ba'i bdag po rgyud 'di nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / mchod pa
36a2(rgyud): dang / 'chang ba dang / tha na 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag la rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / tshangs pa'i bu dang / tshangs chen rnams kyis srung ba dang / bslab pa dang / 
36a3(rgyud): sba ba dang / kun tu rje su 'brang bar byed de/ de bas ches lhag pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bu la mas srung ba bzhin du srung bar 'gyu ro// bdud kyi bar du gcod par
36a4(rgyud): mi nu so// gang shi 'phos nas nub phyogs bde ba can du pad+mo las skye bar 'gyur ro// mngal gyi sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyu ro// tshe 'dir me dang chu'i 'jigs pa las thar
36a5(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// 'dir ni mdo tsam smosu zad kyi/ de ma yin pa gang 'dod pa thams cad bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub bar 'gyuraro// gang rgyud 'di la gnod pa dang / 'tshe
36a6(rgyud): ba dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la mi byed na/ de la lha'i bu dang / klu'i bu khyed rnams kyis srung bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dang / tshangs ris kyi
36a7(rgyud): lha'i bu de dag rab tu dga' nas tshul bzhin du khas blang bar byaso// de nas gzhan srung ba'i phyir bdag sa dkar po la lan du mar bsngags na bar chad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// seng ge
36a8(rgyud): sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po baN+Dita pradz+nyA kA ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos khu ba lhas bcas kyis zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// 
36b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya sa~M ha nA da nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug song gi sgra'i gzungs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'tsha
36b2(rgyud): la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri bo Ta la'i rtse mo na/ rin po che'i khang bzangs rin po che
36b3(rgyud): dang mu tig dang / nor bu dpag med kyis spras pa/ 'od kyis stong gsum khyab pa/ me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis/ kun nas brgyan pa'i sa phyogs de na byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub
36b4(rgyud): sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang / nyan thos chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la sogs pa dge slong rab tu mang pos yongasu bskor zhing / bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gdan bshams pa la
36b5(rgyud): bzhug so// 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de rang gi stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig
36b6(rgyud): tu gzar nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
36b7(rgyud): ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ces bgyi ba 'khor dang btsun mo dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa las rgyal po de mdze dang / phol mig dang dbugs
36b8(rgyud): mi bde ba snying nang 'bar ba byung ste/ de ji ltar gsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal sngon 'jig rten
37a1(rgyud): gyi khams 'di nyid na 'jam dpal khyed nyid byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po zhes bya ba yin la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra 'di nyid byang
37a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis stong gsum du sems can gyi don la gshegs pa la seng ge dkar po gcig dbang du bsdus te chibs
37a3(rgyud): pa byas/ sku la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi brgyan/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri dang / pad+ma dang ut+pal thogs nas phyin pa la/ rgya mtsho chen po la rgal ba'i dusu seng+ge bzhag nas khur
37a4(rgyud): res byas shing byon pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che na po khyod nyid ni grogs la phan pa'i sems kyis rang gi ral gris rang bku mo// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje
37a5(rgyud): mchog gi bsam pa la steng 'og par snang gi klu dang / lha la sogs pas bsad dam snyam nas btung ba'i snod bram ze'i thod pa lag na thogs/ tri shU la rtsa gsum
37a6(rgyud): pa lag na thogs/ sang+ge dkar po la zhon/ mya ngan du ral pa thod du bcings nas steng gi lha la bsdigs te/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas// rang gi grogs pos spang
37a7(rgyud): nas cig pu lus// lha rnams kun gyis nyes na chad pa'i las// grong khyer 'joms shing lha rnams 'bum par bgyi// ces smras te lha rnams la tri shU la gdengs pa dang / rgyal po
37a8(rgyud): chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / khams gsum gyi lha dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/ lha'i me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pud+d+ha rika/ 
37b1(rgyud): ngang tsam pa ka la sogs pa phul te rjod pa bag // de nas par snang gi lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / lA ma yin dang / tshul bum dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa la bsdigs pa/ tri
37b2(rgyud): shU la gdengs nas/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas/ rang gi grogs po spangs nas gcig pu lus/ sde brgyad tshogs kyis nyes na chang pa'i las/ grong khyer 'joms shing sde brgyad 'phrul
37b3(rgyud): par bgyid/ ces smras te sde brgyad la tri shU la gdangs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug na rin chen dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po
37b4(rgyud): thags zangs ris dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo can dang / grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu dang / na mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang
37b5(rgyud): bcas pa dga' ba'i mngangs phyung ste seng+ge la rin po che'i rgyan bu'o// de nas sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i klu la bsdigs te/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems ca dor byas pas/ ra
37b6(rgyud): grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus// klu tshogs rnams kyi nyes na chang pa'i las// grong khyer 'joms shing klu rnams 'bum par bgyi// ces smras te rgya mtsho chen po tri shU las bkrug pa dang / 
37b7(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul med par byed pa/ klu'i
37b8(rgyud): rgyal po 'bum phrag drug g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa 'dus te/ dga' ba'i mdangs phyung nas klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas phyag 'tshal/ bskor ba lar gsum pas
38a1(rgyud): / te byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can// khyod la bdag ni skyabasu mchi// klu rnams kun gyi mgon mdzod cig/ nyams na klu'i gshed ma mdzod// ces smras nas tri shU lan gsum
38a2(rgyud): bkris// kha byang chub sems dpa' la bsgyur/ puHpuHzhes brjod cing gus pas kha nas khrag 'bin cing gan so// klu'i rgyal po gzhan rnams kyang thal mo sbyar nas bskor ba lan gsum gsum byas nas/ byang chub
38a3(rgyud): sems dpa' snying rje can/ khyod la bdag cag skyabasu mchi'o// klu rnams thams cad skyabasu zung // nyams na klu'i gshed ma mdzod// ces smras nas/ klu chen po brgyad sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas tshangs
38a4(rgyud): skud la 'khriso// klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang bdag cag ni bran bgyidado// ci bka' stsal pa nya no zhes smras nas klu rnams so so'i gan su deng so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de ni snying rje
38a5(rgyud): klu 'dul zhes bya'o// snying nad sel ba zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal de ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen bo de 'jam dpal smra ba'i sing+ge khrod nyid yin no// de'i dus kyi byang chub
38a6(rgyud): sems dpa'i snying rje mchog de ni da lnga'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng+ge sgra klu'i ded dpon chen po 'di nyid yin no// 'jam dpal ngas rgyal po chen po de'i don du thugs rje chen po'i snga
38a7(rgyud): brjod par bya'o// yid la zung cig na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM A ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te/ ka Te ka Te ka ro Te/ tsi ti dz+wa la ka re Ni
38a8(rgyud): bIr+ye swA hA/ gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcus gsungs la/ da ltar nga nyid kyis brjod pa'o// 'di'i cho ga ni mi dgos pas las thams cad 'grub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang
38b1(rgyud): drugasang+ge sgra'i sku lugs ma 'am/ khris sku'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas so sor ma 'dres par paN+Dal brgyad byas te/ maN+Dal re re la me tog rom bu lnga lnga bkram te/ me dog dang / 
38b2(rgyud): gdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / phye ma rnams kyis mchod nas/ maN+Dal re la gzungs lan bcu gsum bcu gsum gyi bar du bzlas la lci ba de bsdus te/ lci ba lhag ma las bsngags shing rang
38b3(rgyud): ba la byugs na rang thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro// lnga dang klu la sogs pa'i dug gi rad thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la grub par ma gyur na/ 'jam dpal thugs rje rer po nyid
38b4(rgyud): kyi mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa yi no// 'jam dpal thugs rje chen po nyid kyis dam bcas pa'i tshi go// 'jam dpal rgyal po chen po'i gnod pa ni gzungs 'dis snying nang 'bar ba
38b5(rgyud): grol nas skye ba phyi ma la bde ba can gyi zhing kham su skye bar 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal nyon cig/ sangs rgyas 'od da bag med la sogs pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus
38b6(rgyud): snying po 'di gsungaso// oM AHhriHsi ha nA da hUM phaT/ da ltar nga nyid kyis brjod de/ rig sngags kyi snying po 'di lan gcig brjod pas bsdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyuro// srid pa nyams pa
38b7(rgyud): 'gro mi 'gyur// lus la mtshon gyi tshugs mi 'gyur// dgra dang chom pos mi tshugs cing / klu la sogs pas 'tshe mi 'gyur// rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// bud med lusu mi 'gyur zhing
38b8(rgyud): rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur/ shi nas bde ba can du 'gro/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser
39a1(rgyud): thub dang / 'od srung gis kyang gsang sngags 'di gsungs la/ da ltar shAkya thub pa ngas kyang brjod pa ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ha ya grI ba ya/ na mo lo ki shwa rA ya/ dad+ya thA
39a2(rgyud): oM hrIHku lu su lu nI la kaN+Tha/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ hA hA hA hA/ badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gr-i ba hrIHhUM phaT/ 'jam dpal gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
39a3(rgyud): nying pad+ma ha ya prA ba'i sngags yin te/ lan cig klog par byed pa'i mi/ sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing // ngam song sgo rnams gcod par 'gyur// klu sogs gdon gyis 'tshe mi 'gyur/ 
39a4(rgyud): byad dang dug las grol 'gyur zhing // sangs rgya sa kun gyi gsung yin no// bye ba grangs med mthu las byung // de yi yon tan dpag tu med// lan gcig bklags na sdig pa
39a5(rgyud): sel// lan gnyis bklags pas dpal dang ldan// gsum gyi tshe rnams ring bar 'gyur// 'bum phrag bcu yis zhal mthong 'gyur// pad+ma can gyi zhing der 'gro// 'jam
39a6(rgyud): dpal mi gzhan dag la ni// khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa dang // rlung dang grang ba las gyur pa dang // klu rgyal rigs kyis zin pa dang // klu bram ze'i rigs kyis zin pa dang // klu gdol
39a7(rgyud): pa dang dmangs rigs kyis zin pa ni snying mi dga' ba dang // snying na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lho rgyab tu na ba dang / klang kor du na pa dang / gzhogs phyed du na ba dang / ma zhu ba dang / spros pa
39a8(rgyud): dang / zhwa grum gyis btab pa dang / sbrum pa lta bur na ba dang / srog chags su na ba dang / tshigs dang sha khol bur na ba dang / za khu can dang / lud pa klo can dang / rul khol du na ba dang / 'phres
39b1(rgyud): pa dang / zha ba dang / yi ga mi bde ba dang / thor pa lta bu'i nad dang / skan can dang / dmu chu can dang / 'bras dang / me dpal dang / ldog pa dang / gag pa dang / chu thig can dang / grang ljang lgang dang / che cig
39b2(rgyud): cig la sogs pa'i mdze rigs can dang / phol mig dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / bdud dang / tshangs pa dang / gshin rje dang / brag srin dang / sems 'khrug gi gdon dang / thab gzho ba dang / mtsho
39b3(rgyud): sman dang / klu la sogs pas zin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / log 'dren dang / sha za'i gdon rnams kyis zin pa dang / nad sna tshogs 'byung ste/ de yang mi dge ba'i las
39b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal 'byung ba yino// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po 'jam dpal nyon cig/ snying po gzungs kyi cho ga 'di/ 
39b5(rgyud): dang po thugs rje chen po la/ gus shing dad pa 'i sems bskyed nas// snum pa'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya// lci la brir bcas byugs nas ni/ tshon rtsi kha dog sna lnga yis
39b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor pad+ma lta bur bri// bum pa gang ba lnga dag kyang // phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru bzhag/ gang ba'i gtor ma lnga yang bshams// seng ldeng phur bu lnga yang dgod// dar gyis
39b7(rgyud): dkris pa'i mnga' bzhi dgod// tshon skud lnga yi dra ba bre// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sang+ge s+tha la phyag 'tsha lo// khro'i rgyal po rta mgrin la phyag 'tsha lo// bcom ldan
39b8(rgyud): 'das ma gos dkar mo la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol mo la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po ba ru na la phyag 'tsha lo// A hrIHtri pa ta ne/ yi
40a1(rgyud): ge drug pa'i sngags 'di ni/ brjod pas sdig pa sdug bsngal sel swA hA// sangs rgyas mchod la brtson par bya// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / 
40a2(rgyud): byug pa dang / bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phye ma dang / rgyan thams cad kyis mchod nas/ seng ldeng rgya shug me btang la// tshon skud bcang zhing 'bru rnams sreg/ rma bya rmagashad
40a3(rgyud): lcug ma yis// klu yi dug rnams sel bar byed// hrIHnA ga le le/ nA ga dum pa le le/ nA ga phung phud/ ha le ha le/ hA la hA laM/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta nA ga khrol khrol shig shig swA hA// klu dang / 
40a4(rgyud): log 'dren thams cad kyi yid kyi dug dang / mthong ba'i dug dang / bcings pa'i dug dang / kha rlangs kyi dug dang / reg pa'i dug dang / dug thams cad phyir phud cig swA hA/ 
40a5(rgyud): dug 'dir ma 'dug cig/ sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song shig/ 'dzin pa'i nang du song shig/ me'i nang du song shig/ chu'i nang du song shig/ zhi bar gyur cig/ swA hA/ 'jam
40a6(rgyud): dpal 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o// hri b+h+rUMHaM hUM khaM/ rigs lngas dbang bskur ba'o// rdo rje srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// bkra shis lha mo dpal dang
40a7(rgyud): ldan// bsnyen gnas la ni gnas gyur nas// dkon mchog rjes dran sems bskyed nas// bum chu dag pas las sgrib sel// lus ngag sems kyis dag pa thob// pha rol phyin drug gnas
40a8(rgyud): gyur cing // sangs rgyas sems can mkhyen par gyur// ting 'dzin thams cad mngon du 'gyur// bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi// skud pa dkar po sum sgrol la// bzlas brjod nyi shu
40b1(rgyud): brgyad byas nas// mgul du btags na nang las grol// nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la// gzungs sngags bzlas shing btab gyur na// nad rnams kun las grol bar 'gyur// chu la gzung
40b2(rgyud): sngags mang bzlas na// klu nad khong du sel bar 'gyur// le tog za ba kha bcings na// bye ma sa dang thal bas sel// ha cang char pa ches pa na// lha la phul ba'i snying pa la// kham por
40b3(rgyud): sar pa'i nang du yang // me tog gtsang ma blangs nas ni// bsregs na char pa 'chad par 'gyur// ser ba drag po 'ong ba na// thal chen nyungs dkar bzlas brjod kyis// ser ba nya lcib lhug
40b4(rgyud): ma dang // lhum po btags te btsugs gyur na// ser ba 'chad par 'gyur ba yin// lha klu dri za la sogs pa'i// gdon ni gnod par gyur pa la// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru ba'i
40b5(rgyud): la/ bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste// sman/ sbyar chus ni gang ba la// bzlas brjod brgya ni brtsa brgyad bzlas/ slob ma gos zas dkar po sbyar// dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gsu
40b6(rgyud): bum pa'i chu yis bkru bar bya// nad dang gnod pa kun las thar// klu sogs gdon rnams dpag med kyis// glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// bus pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa las// gi
40b7(rgyud): wang gis ni srung 'khor bri// yungs dkar dag dang bcas te gdags// byis pa gdon dang nang las thar// lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na// thu ba g.yas pa'i gos kyi grwar// bzlas brjod
40b8(rgyud): bdun byas mdud pa bor// song na bde zhing don yang 'grub// rta la sogs pa'i phyugs rnams la// chu dang yungs dkar bcas pa la// bzlas nas gtor na bde bar 'gyur// mi
41a1(rgyud): nad phyug nad thams cad la// yungs dkar dang ni bum pa'i chus// bkru shing btags na mi nad zhi// a sma ri yi gzungs sel ltar// las rnams thar
41a2(rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal rgyal po 'di'i khong na klu'i dug gi gang
41a3(rgyud): nas 'dug ste// 'di ni klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na 'di yis klu thams cad la dbang byed pa yin pas 'dis dbyung bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug sang+ga
41a4(rgyud): sgra la phyag 'tshalo// klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na la phyag 'tshalo// klu'i rgyal po tak+Sha ka la phyag 'tshalo// nu'i rgyu la po mtha' yas la phyag 'tshalo// klu'i rgyal
41a5(rgyud): be pad+ma la phyag 'tsha lo// klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po la phyag 'tsha lo// klu'i rgyal po dung skyong la phyag 'tshalo// klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan la phyag 'tsha lo// klu
41a6(rgyud): rgyal po dga' bo la phyag 'tsha lo// klu'i rgyal po nor rgyal la phyag 'tsha lo// oM ba ru NA swA hA/ oM a nan+ta ya swA hA/ oM bA su kA ya swA hA/ oM dkra kA ya swA hA/ oM karko TA ya swAhA
41a7(rgyud): oM pad+mA ya swA hA/ oM ma hA pad+mA ya swA hA/ oM shaM kha pA lA ya swA hA/ oM ku li kA ya swA hA/ klu yi gzugs ni mang po yang // dkar gsum mngar gsum 'bras zan la// legs byas kha dog
41a8(rgyud): bsgyur byas la// me tog spos dang byug pa dang // mar me zhal zas sgra snyan dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan me tog phreng // tshangs pa'i skud pas mnyes par bya// rtsa ba lo ma sdong bu dang // me tog 'bras
41b1(rgyud): bu sman gyi mchod// rma ba gzungs mo me long gis// rgyal po khong gi dug thon cig/ rin chen rmag shad mchod pa'i rten// mi ldog pa yi rdza su chongs// bum pa gter gyis gang ba mdzes// srog chags yid
41b2(rgyud): 'ong gzugs kyi mchod// zhi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// klu'i rgyal po 'dzeg po yis// zin kyang skad cig gcig la thon// 'jam dpal 'di gzhan gyi mthu ma yin te// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
41b3(rgyud): dbang phyug de'i mthu'o// stobs/ byin gyis brlab so// thugs rje dang ldan pa 'di'i yon tan brjod kyi mi lang yang bdag gis cha shas tsam zhig brjod na// oM bcom ldan 'das/ bya ba byas shing
41b4(rgyud): byeng pa byas// khur bor bdag don rje su brnyes// srid par sbyar ba yongasu zad// yang dag bka' las rnam par grol// sems dpa' dbang bsgyur thams cad kyi// mchog tu pha rol phyin theb
41b5(rgyud): pa srid las rgal zhing tshogs gnyis rdzogs// A gzhan la phan brtson thugs rtse can// sems can kun la mchog tu bames// khams gsum kun gyi gnyar cig pu/ 
41b6(rgyud): mtha' yas sems can sbrel la mkhas// hrIH'gro ba nyam thag kun tu sreb// dri ma gsum spangs pha rel phyin// mngon shes drug brnyes n+ya gro bu// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/ sum
41b7(rgyud): cu rtsa garis ngag dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes// sku mdog shel gyi kha des 'dra// gangs ri nyi shar lta bur mtshom// sku ched che la 'od zer 'bar/ rigs lnga sangs rgyas sku la 'phrog du
41b8(rgyud): skra ther tshugs gyen la mardzas// dbu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs// klu rnams thams cad 'dul mdzad pa// rtse gsum sbrul gyis rab tu bkris// rig gsum mgon po'i bir rlabs 'jar// dag
42a1(rgyud): gsum rtsang nas gcod la bstod// skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma bsnams// shes rab phun sum ral gri 'bar// nyon mongs dag pa bram ze'i mgo me tog dri zhim tshogs kyi bkang // 
42a2(rgyud): klu rnams kun nas dbang bsdus pas// sbrul gyi tshang skud mdzes pa bstod// siM ha/ pad+ma bdag gi gdan la bzhugs// bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon mdzad pa// seng ge dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs/ 
42a3(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don rnams sgrub pa'i phyir// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// ba spu nyag ma re re yang // sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// phyag 'tshal thugs rje can la bstod// dam chos rgyal tshab
42a4(rgyud): dbang bskur ba// lha mo sgrol ma rjesu 'brang // 'jigs pa brgyad skyob sku mdog ldang // gnod pa sel ba mi 'jigs sbyin// ut+pal thug sa rje'i bdag nyid can// btud de sprul pa mang po 'gyed/ 
42a5(rgyud): hUM/ gos dkar ma ni bka' bzhin byed// yid bzhin 'kho ra lo bde bar bskor// 'dod pa'i don yod sdug bsngal zhi// 'jigs pa brgyad po sel la bstod// phaT ha ya
42a6(rgyud): shrI ba khro bo'i sku// 'phags pa rta mgrin bdud bzhi 'jom sa// kro d+ha 'grin sngon gdug pa 'dul// klu bdud 'dul mdzad hUM gis bstod// nA na mkha' klu rgyal ba ru Na// chu lnga ston pa'i
42a7(rgyud): zhal mthong zhing // bstan la rab dga' klu rnams 'dul// sa dang po yi bden pa mthong // bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin// klu rgyal byang chub sems la bstod// oM tA re dut+tA
42a8(rgyud): tu re swAhA/ oM ka Te bi ki Te ni ka Te/ ka ti ka ra swA hA/ gang gis bstod cing bzlos pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang yongasu byang bar 'gyuraro// dkyil 'jir / 
42b1(rgyud): thams cad zhugs par 'gyuraro// gsang sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyuraro// bskal pa stong gi bar du ngan song du mi skye'o// bud med lusu mi skye'o// su zhig nang bar langs nas chu dri zhim
42b2(rgyud): pos khrus byas te gtsang sbra la gnas nas/ thugs rje chen po seng ge sgra'i spyan sngar gzungs 'di klog gam/ 'dri 'am/ 'chang ngam/ klog du 'jug gam/ kha don du bston ras snying po dang / 
42b3(rgyud): gzungs sngags zlos na ni de'i lus la mdze dang / shu ba dang / phol mig dang / 'bras dang / bas ljags dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / ldog pa dang / zag pa dang / spos pa dang / dmu chu
42b4(rgyud): dang skem pa dang / mkhal ma rdol ba dang / don snod du 'du sa pa dang / byad kyi dkyil 'khor la nad sna tshogs 'dus pa dang / glo ban pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / rlung mkhris bang
42b5(rgyud): kan 'dus pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyuro// 'jam dpal gzungs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// su zhig gam rgyal po
42b6(rgyud): des gzungs 'di gleg bam la bris te 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po
42b7(rgyud): yul 'khor dang bcas pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang du glegs bam 'di 'chang ni/ dpal nag po chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na dang / klu chen po brgyad rnams slang
42b8(rgyud): bzhin 'brang zhing / dpag tshad stong tshun chad du slar rgol ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang / log par 'dren pa dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad 'jom
43a1(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// skom nyes pa dang / bri nyes pa dang / sngags nor ba dang / phyag brgya nor ba dang / bshad nyes pa dang / mnyan pa nor ba yang gzungs 'di bklags pas ngag
43a2(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// gzungs 'di su la srung ba byas pa dang / yongasu bskyab pa byas pa dang / bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su byas pa de la mtshon dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byang dang / 
43a3(rgyud): gshed ma dang / rims dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin par 'chi bas mi chug so// gnod par byed pa tshar gcod par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa
43a4(rgyud): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / nyan thos chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ 
43a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng+ge sgra zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// 
43a6(rgyud): kha che'i yul dur khrod 'bris ka rang byung gi mchod rten kya/ dngos grub rnyes pa'i rje btsun ma rdo rje sems ma dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba 'gar shes rab 'byung gnas zhes bya bas bsgyur
43a7(rgyud): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya b+ha lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka
43a8(rgyud): Te ka Te ka Te/ ka ro Te/ ka ro Te/ bIr+ye swA hA// bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba sa lA lhung bas so sor maN+Dal brgyad byas la/ maN+Dal re re la lan bcu gsum gyi bar du/ 
43b1(rgyud): bzlas la/ lci ba lhag ma la sngags bzlas te/ nad pa la nye bar byugs na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// gal te nyi ma bdun nam/ bcu gsum lam nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub ste/ mtshams
43b2(rgyud): med pa lnga byas pa ni ma yino// de ltar ma grub na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyuraro// seng+ge sgra'i gzungs rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ngag gi dbang phyug dang / 
43b3(rgyud): glog skya shes rab brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o// 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kan/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
43b4(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa
43b5(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri bo Ta la'i rtse mo na me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa/ dzam bu na de'i gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra ga rin po che sna
43b6(rgyud): tshogs kun tu 'bar ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'che chen po dang / brgya byin dang / 
43b7(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bcom ldan 'das la sti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mched cing bkur
43b8(rgyud): stir byas te/ yongasu bskor nas mdun du byas pa la chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongasu byang ba
44a1(rgyud): yongasu dag pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongasu gsal ba/ tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu stor to// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas byang chub sem
44a2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ bya ba byas shing byed la mkhas khur bor bdag don rje su brnyes/ srid
44a3(rgyud): pa sbyor ba yongasu zad/ yang dag bka' la rnam grol sems// shes rab shin tu rnam par grol/ klu chen po ni cang she so// sems la dbang sgyur thams cad kyis// mchog tu pha rol
44a4(rgyud): phyin pa thob// ye shes tshogs ni yongasu rdzogs// srid pa'i dgon pa rab tu rgal// gzhan la phan pa mdzad la brtson// thug sa rje dang ni 'brel ba'i thugs// skye dgu kun la
44a5(rgyud): mchog tu byams// bde bar brtson pa byams las byung / mtha' yas sems can grol la mkhas// bde bar ga shegs pa nyid las skyes// bde bar gshegs pa
44a6(rgyud): nyid kyi bka'// khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig pu/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med// dri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs/ rigs pa gsum gyi pha rol phyin// mngon par
44a7(rgyud): shes pa drug kyang brnyed// n+ya gro nga ni lta bur zlum// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kyang // sku ni rnam pa kun tu #
44a8(rgyud): sku mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra// sku tshad che'i ka bam po// nag ge sar gzhon ltar/ cung zad dmar ba 'dra ba'i mdog/ dbu yi thor tshugs dag dang ldan// ther tshugs mang pos/ 
44b1(rgyud): 'bar g.yogs// dbu la 'ong dpag med pa bzhugs// 'od zer dag ni rnam par 'phro// 'od 'phro 'dom gang rab tu 'bar// gser gyi ri 'dra grags pas khyab// gzi brjid dag kyang rab
44b2(rgyud): tu me shar gyi ri la 'char ba yi// nyi ma'i gtsug dor dag dang ldan// no ru rin chen 'bar ba'i sa// se ral kha ni sku phyed rgyan// sa dag la ni rab tu mkhas// pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams
44b3(rgyud): spyod// tshul khrims ma nyams ral pa med// thon ka seng+ge'i ral pa 'dra// sku ni 'jam zhing ldeng bag can// gzigs shing gshegs pa khyu mchog 'dra// g.ya su 'khyil ba'i dung yang
44b4(rgyud): dpral ba zla ba bkam pa 'dra// dpral ba'i dbyings kyi rgya yang che// smin mtshams par yang yong ma chad// shangs kyi dbyings kyang cung zad mtho/ mgur kyang bum pa'i 'grin pa
44b5(rgyud): 'dra/ dpung pa dag kyang rab tu zlum// phyag sor rnams kyi tshi gas kyang ring // sor mo 'jam zhing cung zad dmar// phyag sor rnams kyi bar 'brel ba// phyag dang zhabs kyi thil
44b6(rgyud): rnams la// 'khor lo dag gi rab tu rgyan// ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra bar mdzes// sku mdangs 'jam zhing shangs kyang rgyas// gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar snyan// yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar
44b7(rgyud): 'gyur// blta na sdug cing mdangs dga' ba// pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma 'dra// pad+ma dag las kun tu skyes// pad+ma ngag gi bdan la bzhugs// phyag na pad+ma bzang po bsnams// ril ba spyi lkug
44b8(rgyud): phyag na bsdams// khri sAn sa le'i lpags pa brlabs/ dbyug pa dang ni bgrang phreng 'dzin// bkra shis ngag gis gtsang mar gyur/ snga nas gsung zhing gsong por gsangs// bdud rtsi'i
45a1(rgyud): char ni rab tu 'babs// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra// sems can thams cad dga' bar mdzad// bzang po snang ba'i ljor shing ltar// sems can kun gyi gso su 'gyur
45a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis ni sprul pa lags// bde bar gshegs pa'i cha lugs mnga'// bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin// ba spu nyag ma re re yang // sems can rnams kyi gtso bor
45a3(rgyud): gyur// bsod nams mdzad cing dge ba mdzad// bshol ba med cing nges pa mdzad// rab tu drag pa'i brtson 'grus can// 'khor ba dag las rab tu rgal// dam chos rgyal mtshan mnga'
45a4(rgyud): gsol ba// yid bzhin 'khor lo dge ba sbyor// don yod zhags pa sdug bsngal 'dren// ha yA grI ba bdud bzhi 'joms kro d+ha mgrin sngon gdug pa sel// lha mo sgrol ma
45a5(rgyud): rjesu 'brang // khro gnyer can ni bka' bzhin byed// rgyal ba can ni tshul dang ldan// mthu chen ldan zhing dran dang ldan/ yon tan ldan zhing byams dang ldan// shes rab
45a6(rgyud): ldan zhing dpal dang ldan// tshul khrims ldan zhi don dang ldan// don rnams kun ni rig pa po// the tshom thams cad gcod pa po// chos rnams thams cad smra ba po// 'jig rten
45a7(rgyud): rnams kyi ston pa po// zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra// sku smad rin chen kun gyis rgyan// gser gyi mchod sdong 'dra bar gnas// 'od zer nyi ma stong pas lhag/ rengs pa la sogs phyag bgyis pa'o// 
45a8(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis gang zhig bstod pa byed pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yong su byang bar 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor
45b1(rgyud): thams cad du zhugs par 'gyuraro// sang sngams thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyu ro// bskal pa stong gi bar du yang ngan 'gror mi skye'o// mnar med par ni mi 'gron/ su'is nang pa
45b2(rgyud): langs nas klog nam/ klog tu 'jug sam// khaton du 'don na mi de'i lus la mdze dang / shu ba dang / smin pa dang / dbubs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nang thams cad las thar bar 'gyur
45b3(rgyud): skyes so cog tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bad ba can du skye bar 'gyuraro// gar skyes kyang 'phags pa spyan ras gzi
45b4(rgyud): dbang phyug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyuraro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyuraro// sems dpa' bar 'gyuraro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyuro// gtsug lag thams cad
45b5(rgyud): la mkhas par 'gyuro// bstod pa 'dis bstod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed mchod pa byas par 'gyu ro/ rnam par smin pa
45b6(rgyud): yang de dang 'dra bas na bye brag mdo// rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel rin po che za ma tog ces bya ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// 
45b7(rgyud): // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
45b8(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/ ri gru 'dzin gyi rtse mo
46a1(rgyud): me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs bkram pa/ 'ja m+bu chu bo'i gser kha dog bzang po ltar snang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs snang ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / 
46a2(rgyud): shang sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lA ma yin dang / ni mkha' lding dang / mi ma chingang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khris 'bum phrag du ma dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
46a3(rgyud): la sI stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas te/ mchod cing rjes nas/ yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thogs par dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ za
46a4(rgyud): mar dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa yongasu rdzogs pa/ yong su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas 'phags pa spyan
46a5(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dgod pa mdzad pa/ mdzad rgyu mdzad pa/ khur bor gad ga gis don rjesu brnyes pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor
46a6(rgyud): ba yongasu gsal ba/ yang dag pa'i mkhyen pas thugs shin tu rnam par grol gtsang mkhyen pa/ glang po che chen po dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
46a7(rgyud): ye shes kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs pa/ srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba gzhan la sman pa/ thugs rje dang 'brel ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ skye dgu la mchog tu mnyes gshin pa// bde
46a8(rgyud): ba rab tu stsol bar mdzad pa// byams pas zhus pa/ sems can mtha' yas pa sgrol ba la mkhas pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po// srid pa gsum gyi rtsa lag gcig pu/ 
46b1(rgyud): 'dod chags mi mnga' bzhe sdang mi mnga' ba/ gti mug mi mnga' ba/ dri ma gsum spangs pa/ rig pa gsum gyi pha rol tu gshegs pa/ mngon par shes pa drug brnyes pa/ shing n+ya gro
46b2(rgyud): ltar chu zheng gab pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/ lpags pa srab cing mdog ser ba/ sku ring rgyu bzang zhing dkar ba sku
46b3(rgyud): shing gi me tog sar pa dang / dmar reng lta bu'i dbu thor tshugs mnga' ba/ lcang lo 'khyil ba mang po dbu khyebs pa/ 'od dpag med kyi 'od zer btang ba/ 'bar ba'i 'od 'dem gang
46b4(rgyud): gis gser gyi ri bo ltar snyan par grags pa/ gzi brjid rgya che ba/ gzugs 'char ka'i ri lta bu gtsug tor mnga' ga/ nor bu rab tu 'bar ba/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ sku la sa
46b5(rgyud): ral du thogs pa/ sa rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i zhabs dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims ma nyam sa pa/ tshul khrims ma zhig pa/ seng ge ltar
46b6(rgyud): thong ka phel ka che ba/ sku 'jam zhing mdzes pa/ gzigs pa dang gshegs thabs khyu mchog gi dbang po 'dra ba mkhur ba g.ya su 'khyil ba/ bral ba che zhing zla ba kham pa 'dra la thig
46b7(rgyud): le mnga' ba/ phyag pus mor sleb pa/ smin ma bar ma chad pa/ shangs mtho ba/ mgur bum pa'i mgrin pa 'dra ba/ phyag sor mo dang tshigs ring ba/ sen mo 'jam zhing zangs kyi mdog
46b8(rgyud): 'dra ba/ phyag dra bas 'brel ba/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los rgyan pa/ ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra ba/ sku 'jam zhing rgyas pa/ tshangs pa ltar dbyangs zab pa/ yid du mchi ba
47a1(rgyud): sdug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ nyams dga' bar bgyid pa/ 'od pad+ma 'dra ba/ pad+ma las 'khrungs pa/ pad+ma las byung ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag na pad+ma mnga'
47a2(rgyud): ba phyag na ril ba'i spyi blugs bsnams pa/ ri dgas nag po'i lpags pa brlabs pa/ phyag mkhar bsnams pa/ bgrang ba'i nor bu bsnams pa/ gceng pa spangs pa/ gsong por
47a3(rgyud): gsungs pa/ bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu/ blta na sdug pa'i shing 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad mos par mdzad pa/ dga' bar mdzad pa/ sems
47a4(rgyud): can thams cad nye bar 'chog sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa/ badre bar gshegs pa'i cha byad mnga' ba/ bde bar gshegs pa 'i ring bsrel 'dzin pa/ s+phu re re skyes pa/ sems
47a5(rgyud): can gyi snying po/ bsod nams mdzad pa/ dge ba maHda pa/ nges par mdzad pa/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba 'khor ba las shin tu 'das pa/ dam pa'i chos la
47a6(rgyud): rgyal tshab du dbang bskur ba/ sgron ma zhabs drung na gnas pa/ khro gnyer can bka' bzhin bgyid pa/ rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/ mthu rtsal che ba
47a7(rgyud): yon tan dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang ldan pa/ zhi ba dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ skal ba dang ldan pa/ don dang ldan pa/ don rnams thug su chud pa/ the tshom rnams
47a8(rgyud): gcod pa/ chos rnams gsungs pa/ 'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor yongasu rgyas pa/ sku rked pa'i phyogs rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ 
47b1(rgyud): gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu sku nyi ma stong bas lhag par mdzes pa/ tshangs pa'i dbang po la sogs pas phyag bgyis pa lag so// gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
47b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa sgrub pa byed pa de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam par byang bar 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs
47b3(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// de la gsang sngags thams cad grub par 'gyuraro// bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyuraro// mtshams med par 'jug par mi 'gyuraro// 
47b4(rgyud): su zhib nang bar langs nas 'don tam/ klog gam/ kha ton byed na de'i lus la mdze dang / rkang shu dang lud pa dang / mi bde ba mi 'byung zhing nad thams cad
47b5(rgyud): las thar bar 'gyuraro// tshe rabs so cog tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyu ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du
47b6(rgyud): skye bar 'gyuraro// tshe rabs so cog tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhung bar 'gyur/ dpa' bar
47b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ skad snyan par 'gyur/ bskal pa bzang por 'gyuraro// bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ tshig btsun par 'gyuraro// bstod pa sgrub pa 'dis
47b8(rgyud): bstod pa byas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi bye ma snyed dag la mchod pa byas par 'gyur te/ rnam par smin pa ma tshungs shing
48a1(rgyud): bye brag med par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi za ma tog zhes bya ba
48a2(rgyud): rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ru tsir ang ga yaSh+Ti nA ma d+ha ra nI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes pa ces bya ba'i gzungs
48a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// na mo pi bu la bi ma na su tra tiSh+Tha te a sang khA ya/ sUr+ya sha ta sa ha sra a ti re ka te dzaM/ pra d+hA
48a4(rgyud): a ba b+ha si ta mur+ha ye ma hA ma Ni mu tA kuN+Da la/ a ma kA ra d+ha ri Ni b+ha ga bA te pad+ma pA Na ye/ sarba lo ka a pa ya sha ma nA ya/ bi bi d+ha khu kha sa ma bA sha a biH
48a5(rgyud): sarba satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swA hA/ ma hA a lo ka ka ra Na ta ma sti mi ri pa ta la bi nA sha ka rA ga dA Sha ma hA mo ha dz+wa la sha ma/ sha sa ka rak+Sha ka/ 
48a6(rgyud): sarba a pa ya durba ti pra sha ma ka/ sarba satwa sa mA shA sa na ka ra/ sarba A shA pa ri bA ra ka/ sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+ha na ka ra/ he he ma hA bo ti satwa/ ba ra ba ra dA ya kA/ pad+ma a lo ka
48a7(rgyud): se b+ha ta/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ dza TA mu ku TA/ a lang kr-i ta shi ra/ ma Ni ka na ka rA dzi/ sha ta badz+ra bai DUr+ya a lang kr-i ta sha ri ra a mi tA b+ha dzi na ka ma la a lo kr-i ta/ pre b+ha ra Na rA dzA na
48a8(rgyud): sha ta sa ha sra A b+hi la sha ti kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra bi ta ma bi d+ha ma/ bi nA sha ga bi nA sha ya/ ma hA yAM tra kle sha ka ba Ta a ba ba d+ha bi bo d+hi satwa sa ra tsi ra ka pra ma thA na/ pu ru/ 
48b1(rgyud): Tha pad+ma/ pu ru dza nA ga/ pu ru Sha sA ga ra/ pu ru Sha si ha/ bi ha bi ra/ bi ra dzaM/ su dan+ta pa ri pri ta/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra shA sa ya pra shA sa ya/ pra d+han sa ya bra d+han sa ya/ 
48b2(rgyud): b+hi ri b+hi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bi d+hi ri bi d+hi ri/ bi ri bi ri khi bi ri bi bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu a mu ya/ muM tsa muM tsa/ d+hu na d+hu ne/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ khA ya gA
48b3(rgyud): gA d+ha ya bA d+ha ya/ has ha sa/ pra ha sa pra ha sa/ nA nA bi bi d+ha kle sha bA sa nA/ ha ra ha ra/ se ha ra saM ha ra/ d+hu ru Ti d+ha ru Ti/ ma hA maN+Da/ a laM kA ra Na/ sha ta pra se ka/ a ba b+ha si tA
48b4(rgyud): ma hA bi Sha sha ma ka/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da swA hA// bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma'i lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs byang chub sems dpa'i
48b5(rgyud): khang bzang dam pa/ rdo rje chen pos bgegs par gsu ngas/ pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / mi 'am ci dang / lha ma yin chen pos bstod pa/ 
48b6(rgyud): re ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed pa 'di/ sgrib pa chen pos bsgribs pa gang la la zhig nyan tam/ 'chang ngam/ 'don tam/ klog gam/ mthong nas lag
48b7(rgyud): par rtog par byed na/ de'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyuraro// nang par langs nas lan cig 'don na/ lag na pad+ma phyi bzhin 'brang bar
48b8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// yid la gang dag 'dod pa'i dgos pa bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyuraro// gcig pu rab tu dben par 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba mngon du
49a1(rgyud): dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma rje su dran par byas la lan bdun brjod na/ dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro// sems can
49a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyuro// de'i ngan 'gro thams cad 'gag par 'gyu ro// yud tsam zhig 'chag cing 'dug la yid la brjod na/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum
49a3(rgyud): phrag du mar bsags pa'i las byung bar 'gyu ro// 'khor los bsgyur ba stong gi bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyu ro// tshe rabs tshe rab su yang pad+ma'i
49a4(rgyud): rigs chen por skye bar 'gyu ro// skye bo khyad par du 'pha gas pas bskur bar 'gyu ro// me tog dri zhim pos snyim pa bkang ste/ 'phags pa span ras gzigs dbang phyug
49a5(rgyud): gi mdun du lan bdun brjod na/ yon tan chen po stong thob par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po'i chos nyid snang ba de la skye bar 'gyur/ dam po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur
49a6(rgyud): de nyid kyi gdong bltas te bzlas brjod byas na/ bcom ldan 'das zhal rtag tu bzhad pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing / chos snang ba'i gsal ba
49a7(rgyud): dang po dri ma med par byed pa zhes bya bar 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas rje su dran pa thob par 'gyur/ sems mnyam par gzhag bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/ 
49a8(rgyud): tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par byed par 'dod na/ ches bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba la bsnyung ba byas la gos dkar
49b1(rgyud): po bgos te/ ring srel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsen+dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor bskus la/ dkyil 'khor de dang / bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs ga
49b2(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri zhim po'i bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos kyi sti stang byas te/ de nyid du 'dug la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ des
49b3(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuro// mtshams med pa byed pa yang sdig pa byung zhing shin tu yong su dag pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / shin tu yong su dag pa'i lus dang nga
49b4(rgyud): dang / yid kyi spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshe gas pa rnams kyi rtag par rgyun tu ting 'dzin gyi stobs dang / dab nga bskur ba'i stobs dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin bI
49b5(rgyud): stobs dang / ye shes khyad par can gyi stobs sgrub par mdzad// gnam la gyen du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na char 'bab bo// sa la bltas de bzlas brjod byas na/ 
49b6(rgyud): le tog thams cad legs par 'gyu ro// 'bab chu dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu'i shul du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na chu 'byung bar 'gyu ro// nad thams cad la lag pas byab cing bzlas
49b7(rgyud): brjod byas na sos par 'gyuro// dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na dran pa rnyed par 'gyuro// bkres pa dang / skom pa'i gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na phyis par 'gyuraro// 
49b8(rgyud): mi ngas chen po byung na ras la bris te/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags na/ dpag chad tshun chad mtshams gcad pa dang / bsrung ba byas par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes
50a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzos so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+rA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ 
50a2(rgyud): Ar+ya a b+ha ya pra dA nA ma a pa rA dzi da/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gzhan gyi mi thub pa/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 
50a3(rgyud): grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo// ches la phyag 'tsha lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa
50a4(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba la phyag 'tsha lo// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal las grol bar
50a5(rgyud): mdzad pa la phyag 'tsha lo// sems can thams cad kyi bcing ba gcod pa la phyag 'tsha lo// sems can thams cad la mi 'a jigs pa sbyin pa la phyag 'tshalo// de nas 'jigs pa
50a6(rgyud): med pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po brjod par bya'o// las kun byed pa dge ba ste/ 'byung po kun gyi 'jigs pa med// bdud rtsi'i las ni bdud rtsi
50a7(rgyud): 'byung // 'di ni las kun byed pa yin// dgra kun 'jigs par byed pa ste// brjod dang de bzhin 'thab pa dang // gzhan yang dgras ni 'khor ba dang // rtsod pa'i nang du rtsod byed dang // rtag tu dgra dang phrad
50a8(rgyud): ba dang / rmugs par byed cing rengs par byed// rmongs par byed cing sdig pa sel/ dug dang me ni dengs par byed// rims dang nyes sdig thams cad sel/ chom rkun dang ni chu dang sbrul// rmi lam ngan
50b1(rgyud): pa thams cad sel// 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub 'dren pa dang // chos kun rab tu ston pa ste// 'di ni rigs sngags mthu stobs can// gzhan gyis mi thub srin po 'jom
50b2(rgyud): gang tshe rig sngags 'di 'chang ba// de nas 'di g.yo bar 'gyur// 'jigs med ldan pa zhes bya ba'i// rig sngags rgyal po bla na med// 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa ste// 'jig rten gsum
50b3(rgyud): bo kun gyi mchod// de nas 'jigs pa med par spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rjesu dran par byas nas/ rang gi snying po gzhan gyi mi thub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thad
50b4(rgyud): kyi gsungs pa 'di smra so// oM ta rang ra/ tA ra tA re/ mu ri ke/ tsan+d+ra pra b+he/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri sUr+ya kan+te/ he ma pra b+he/ bu d+hA bu d+hA/ bu d+ha ni/ sarba pA pa pra sha ma ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ bi dza prang ba ma
50b5(rgyud): ni tsi tsi ri/ mur tsu ru/ sa mabi d+ha rA na ma kri ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+h+r-i d+ha ri/ d+hu ru d+ha ru/ sarba ta thA ga b+hA ShiSha/ ba rab la bo ba~M ri pu ru pu ru/ badz+nyA pa ra mi ta/ a nu dz+nyA te/ wa
50b6(rgyud): ra mi da/ pa ri pA ri/ ga ga na/ d+hi ba lo ko pa ma/ ta thA ga ta/ ba shi ta/ pra ti ka ri/ shu b+ha ka ri/ pa bi tra/ mang ga la dA ri Ni/ sarba de ba ta a d+hiSh+Tha ta sarba ma ho ra ga a d+hiSh+Tha te/ sarba kin+da ra a d+hiSh+Tha te/ 
50b7(rgyud): sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/ a d+hiSh+Thi d+he pra sA d+ha b+hA Shi te/ in+d+ra b+hU dzi te/ tse tur ma hA rA dzaM b+ha Shi tA/ tsin+da sUr+ya b+ha Shi te/ oM ti ri ti ro tsin+da kA ri ni/ ki li ki li/ sarba sha truM bi nA sha ni hA phaT swA hA/ de nas byA
50b8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la 'di skad ces smra so// 
51a1(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo
51a2(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa/ gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de las bdag gis 'di
51a3(rgyud): ngag thos so// de las gzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sems can thams cad la yang bsnyad do// mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni/ yang dag par
51a4(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / graser thub dang / 'od srung dang / shAkya thub pa rnams kyi
51a5(rgyud): gsung so// gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni/ bdag ba srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / gnyi ga srung ba dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ldengs dang / yul
51a6(rgyud): 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba dang / srog skyob pa dang / tshe sbyin pa dang / lag pa rengs par byed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / 'gyes pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ dgra thams cad
51a7(rgyud): bzlog pa 'ching ba thams cad grol bar byed pa/ thams cad du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// shud d+he muk+She pra b+hA sA re/ shwa te pad pA ra bA si ni/ sarba duSh+Tan dza b+ha yA mi/ staM b+ha yA mi/ mo ha yA mi/ oM swA hA/ sa bi/ 
51a8(rgyud): tre swAhA/ shwe te swA hA/ shwe te pa ta pra bi ti swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ ta re ti re/ ta re Ni rAkA rAgA/ sarba ka la~M ka la ha~M/ bi gr-i ha/ bi b+ha ta/ duHsrab na / b+ha ye b+h+yaHswA hA// rtag tu le le med par ni// gang zhig gzungs 'dri/ 
51b1(rgyud): 'chang byed pa// de la lnga tshogs thams cad kyang // dus kun tu ni srung bar byed// de ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba med// de ni rtag srung ldan ner 'jug ji ltar nyi ma sa steng na// gzi brjid grags 'chang ldan
51b2(rgyud): re bzhin// de la bshed bang byung stems dang // srul po dag gis mi tshugs te// de la dpal yon 'jug par 'gyur// kha dog dang ni tshe yang 'phel// 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs
51b3(rgyud): pa sbyin pa ces bya ba rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 
51b4(rgyud): / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshes/ sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa'
51b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha lo// tad+ya thA/ oM dzaM ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ya/ dza ya ba hi ni/ dza yot+ta ri
51b6(rgyud): ka la ka la/ ma la ma la/ tsa la tsa la/ k+Shi na k+Shi na/ sarba karma/ A ba ra na ni/ me sarba dz+nyA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti ha sa pra b+ha d+ha/ sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ki ta tsak+Shu/ shro tra g+hA Na dzi hA kA ya
51b7(rgyud): ma ne bi d+yA dz+nyA na bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ phu ru phu ru/ su ru su ru/ phu rA phu rA/ pra phu rA pra phu rA/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ d+harma d+hA t+ya gar+b+ha swA hA/ a b+ha ba swA hA/ sarba d+harma a ba bo d+ha ni swA hA/ 
51b8(rgyud): gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ lan cig brjod pas kyang bskal pa stong gi bar du las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa thams cad zad par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsan
52a1(rgyud): par thob par 'gyuro// bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyuraro// tshe rjes nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par 'gyuraro// 'chi ba'i
52a2(rgyud): dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas stong mthong bar 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyuraro// nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum nyi shu rtsa re re brjod na ci 'dod pa rmi lam du
52a3(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyuro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi mdog can yang mthong bar 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yul rnams la yang mi phyed pa'i sems
52a4(rgyud): dad pa can du 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa phan yon chad med pa dag 'byung // stong 'gyur ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// byang
52a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha lo// tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki te/ pa lo ka
52a6(rgyud): ni pra b+ha lo ki ni/ dzI ba ha pa ri sho d+ha ni/ d+hi da ni ya ga me/ A shA pa ri sho d+ha ni/ sarba satwa ma nor the/ kA ya sid d+hi shru ti d+ha rat+ti s+thi ti d+ha na swA hA// cho ga zhag bdun gyi bar du shing a
52a7(rgyud): ba marga'i so shing la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te nang re zhing zos na/ nyin gcig la sho lo ka brgya brgya lob so// zla ba drug gi bar du byas ni thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// sho lo ka
52a8(rgyud): brgya lobs pa rdzog so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras/ 
52b1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha lo// drang thA/ kha li kha li ba li te swA hA// gdong 'khru ba'i tshe chu khyor yang la sngags 'dis lan gsum mam bdun bzlas te 'thungs na/ nyin gcig kya
52b2(rgyud): yi ge sho lo ka brgya lobs par 'gyur te/ sngon lobs pa rnams kyang brjed par mi 'gyuraro// sho lo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang
52b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// bI re bI re/ ma hI te dze te dza ma ti d+ha ra Ni/ shru ta d+ha ra
52b4(rgyud): dza yan ti bi dzaM yan ti ma ti d+ha ra NI swA hA// sman bram ti zho gnyis zhig tu btags te/ 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zhag bdun gyi bar du
52b5(rgyud): 'thungs na/ gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am/ bstan bcos kyang rung ste/ thos pa nyin zhag gcig la she lo ka stong
52b6(rgyud): lebs par 'gyuraro// sho lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzog so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
52b7(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ tri shA tI shu la sha khi/ Ar+ya ba lo ki tau shwa rA ya/ Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ ba re na bu ha ya/ mr-id d+ha t+ya swA hA// cho ga ni
52b8(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du dkyil 'khor byas te/ ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la/ chu la sngags kyi btab te/ bzhag nas/ nang bar tshul
53a1(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas brjod byas ta dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang spags te zos na zhag bdun lon na nyin gcig kyang sho lo ka stong lobs par 'gyuraro// yid ches pI
53a2(rgyud): rtags yod// sho lo ka stong labs pa'i gzungs rdzog so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub
53a3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha lo// tad+ya thA/ ka ba tsa kat+ta la la te swA hA/ tshu la len bdun
53a4(rgyud): bzlas te gdong bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyu ro// de'i cho ga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar chu bzhag la lan bdun bzlas brjod
53a5(rgyud): byas te 'thungs la/ dro khar kha zas 'om ba spags te bza' ba lta bur zhag bdun gyi bar du byas na nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho le ka stong lebs par 'gyu ro// sho lo ka
53a6(rgyud): stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzog so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phag 'tshal
53a7(rgyud): dad+ya byA/ smr-i ti ma ti ma ki te dzI bi d+yA/ d+hu ru me sar hutsu ru kriSh+Na hu ru me swA hA// shu dag dkar po la sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas te zos na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzir bar 'gyuraro/ mi brjed
53a8(rgyud): ba'i gzungs rdzog so// !// rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni na me d+ha ra Ne/ bod skad du/ shes rab skyes pa ces bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ 
53b1(rgyud): bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ tad+ya thA/ sA la te/ sla la te/ ma ni te swA hA// rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ri 'di yin te khyor tshul lan gsum bzlas te/ 'thungs na zhag bdun nas thos pa 'dzin par
53b2(rgyud): 'aro// shes rab skyed pa'i gzungs rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan pa dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+yA kA ra siM ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba
53b3(rgyud): ban+d+ha de ba tsan+das zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 6// rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs / na mo rat+na tra yA
53b4(rgyud): yi ra ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ aM bi ba bi ga pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni/ dza ra dza ra/ me d+ha bar d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud d+hi bar d+ha na
53b5(rgyud): swA hA/ rig sngags 'di'i cha ga ni 'di yin te/ nang re zhi ngartsab mo khyor gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thung na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur
53b6(rgyud): shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
53b7(rgyud): dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha lo// tad+ya thA/ smr-i ti ma ti ma ti/ te dzaM bi d+h+ya/ hu ru me hu ru hu ru me/ kr-iSh+Na hu ru me swA hA/ shu dag nag po la sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas
53b8(rgyud): zos na/ gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzog so// / 9// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarbata thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha na/ satwa a lo ka na/ 
54a1(rgyud): bud d+hak+She tra san darman b+hU ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs/ sems can la gzi shing / 
54a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
54a3(rgyud): pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/ lha'i nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po dang / me tog rgyas pa dang / lha'i
54a4(rgyud): sang+ge'i khri bkod pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang / dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dab
54a5(rgyud): gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis
54a6(rgyud): thogs pa dang / skye ba gnyis dang / skye ba gsum dang / skye ba bcu dang / skye ba nyi shu dang / skye ba sum cu dang / skye ba brgya'i bar dag gis thogs pa/ thams cad kyang sa brgyad pa dang / 
54a7(rgyud): sa bcu pa la gnas pa sha stag ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / dri med tog dang / nor dpal dang / glog gi tog dang / dri med 'od dang / n+dan
54a8(rgyud): dang bdud rtsi tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun brgya dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma thams cad kyang lung bstan pa dang ldan pa/ ting 'dzin/ 
54b1(rgyud): thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa lnga stong dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za thams cad kyang sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
54b2(rgyud): cho 'phrul mthong ba brgyad stong dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes thob pa/ lung bstan pa thob pa/ phyir mi ldog pa/ dpe meng ma dang / dri med
54b3(rgyud): 'od dang / 'od can ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / dung can la la sogs pa gnod sbyin mo chen mo brgyad cu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rnam
54b4(rgyud): thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / gang ba bzang bo la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad
54b5(rgyud): kyi bar dag dang / thabs cig tu bzhug so// de nas de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i khri la bzhu gas par rig nas/ rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gi
54b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i rgyan dang / na bza' dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par byas/ ri mer byaso// kha cig
54b7(rgyud): gis ni lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/ bstod do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sems can tha~Md la dmigs pa/ snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa zhes bya
54b8(rgyud): ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// ting 'dzin de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od kyi snang bar gyur cig// gzugs thams cad kyang
55a1(rgyud): snang bas khyab par gyur nas/ sems can dmus long gang yin de dag gis ni/ mig gi gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur to// 'on pa rnams kyi ri rna bas sgra
55a2(rgyud): dag thos par gyur to// nad kyi btab pa rnams ni nad dag dang bral bar gyur to// gos med pa rnams ni gos dag thob par gyur to// smyo ba rnams ni dran pa thob par gyur to// lus 'am
55a3(rgyud): pa dang / dbang po ma tshangs pa rnams ni lus dang dbang po yong su rdzogs par gyur to// dbul po rnams kyis ni nor dag thob par gyur to// sems can gang dag nor dang / ye byad dang /
