105b7(rgyud): ha tu ha/ ha re ha zhes pa bris te kha sbyar ka pa lar bcug te skud pa sngon pos bcings te dur khrod du sbas na bskrad par 'gyuro// smad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// 
105b8(rgyud): de nas phye ba'i 'khor lo ni dur khrod kyi sel ba dang / bya rog dang / 'us pa'i khrag dang / dug mnyam por bsres pa'i sna tshogs 'khor lo phyi nang dang bcas pa le rtse dgu pa bris te dbu su
106a1(rgyud): phaT swa hi ba data ta ha phaT ces bya bar bri'o// le rtse nang pa brgyad la phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT ces pa bri'o// le rtse phyi ma brgyad la phaT oM phaT/ phaT tA phaT/ 
106a2(rgyud): phaT re phaT/ phaT tu phaT/ phaT tA phaT/ phaT re phaT/ phaT tu phaT/ phaT re phaT/ zhes bya ba bris te/ bya rog dang / 'ug pa'i sgo ngar bcug ste brag dang chu 'thab sar sgo ngasbas na 'bye bar 'gyuro// dbye ba
106a3(rgyud): 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas gsad pa'i 'khor lo ni dug dang khrag dang / ske tshe rnams mnyam par sbyar bas le tse dgu pa'i 'khor lo phyi nang dang bcas pa bris te dbus
106a4(rgyud): su hUM sA mA ra ya sA phaT ces bya ba bri'o// le tse nang ma la hUM phaH hUM/ phaT hU~M phaT/ hUM sa hUM/ phaHhUM pha/ hUM pha hUM/ phaT hUM phaT/ hU~M phaT hUM/ phaT hUM phaT ces bya ba bri'o// le tsa byi
106a5(rgyud): la hUM oM phaT/ hUM tA phaT/ hUM re phaT/ hUM tud phaT/ hUM tA phaT/ hUM re phaT/ hUM tu phaT/ hUM re phaT/ ces bya ba bris te rabs chang pho mo'i thad pa la bris te sngags mang du bzlas nas ngur
106a6(rgyud): khrod sbas na 'chi bar 'gyuraro// bsad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// myos pa'i 'khor lo ni da ru ra'i chus ras sam/ shog shog la le tse dgu pa phyi nang dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo
106a7(rgyud): bris te bu su hra ha de ba tad ta ha ha zhes pa bri'o// le tse nang ma la hA d+ha hA d+ha d+ha d+ha hA h+ya bri bar bya'o// phyi ma brkyang ba la ni d+ha oM d+ha/ d+ha t+ta d+ha/ d+ha re d+ha/ d+ha tu d+ha/ d+ha d+hAd+ha/ d+ha re d+ha/ b+had+ha d+ha/ sA re hA
106a8(rgyud): zhes bya ba bris te rtsi'i ga 'ur bcug nas bzlas pa ci nas myur bar byas te lam rgya gram du dong dang bcas par sbas te dngu ras srungs na myos par 'gyur// gso na mar sbrang rtsi 'o mas ling / 
106b1(rgyud): ka bkrus na 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// myos byed kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas mnan pa'i 'khor lo ni g.yam pa la le tse dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris te/ yung ba'i chus la
106b2(rgyud): tsa dgu pa la dbu su ga swa b+ha ya staM b+ha ya g+ha ha zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o// le tse brgyad pa la ga oM ga/ ga tA ga/ ga re ga/ ga tu ga/ ga tA ga/ ga re ga/ ga tu ga/ ga re ga/ zhes bya ba bris te/ 'khor lo sbyar nas
106b3(rgyud): lam rgya gram du sbas na 'gul mi shes par 'gyuraro// mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas mnan pa chen po ni yung ba'i khu bas snag che byas te kham pa'i
106b4(rgyud): ga'u'i nang du phyi nang le tsa dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris la sngags dgod pa ni dbusu rma swa staM b+ha ya rka ha zhes bya ba'i bri'o// nang ma la/ ha ha ha ha/ ha ha ha ha zhes bya ba brgyad bri'o// de'i
106b5(rgyud): phyi rol gyi le tse dgu la ni rga oM rbarba tA na/ na re na/ rba tuta na/ rba tArba/ rga re na/ rga tu rmA/ rga re rga/ zhes bya zla sa te sgrub pa 'phags ma la dgra gang nas 'ong ba'i phyog su s+thaH
106b6(rgyud): na srung bar 'gyur zhing dgra'i sgor sbas na mnan par 'gyu ro// dgra mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u s+ye sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas rig sngags kyi sbyor ba gnon par byed pa'i 'khor lo ni
106b7(rgyud): yung ba'i khu bas g.yam pa 'am/ lhang tsher ba gnyis gang yang rung ba la 'khor lo bris te le tse dgu pa la phyi nang dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// sngags dgod pa ni dbusu ni wa swa staM b+ha ya s+t+waM
106b8(rgyud): b+ha ya ha/ 'khor la nang ma la/ wa wa wa wa wa wa wa wa/ zhes bya ba bribar bya'o// phyi ma la wa oM wa/ wa tA a wa re wa/ wa chub rba/ wa tA na/ wa re wa la tu ma/ wa re wa/ zhes bya ba bris te/ 5
107a1(rgyud): tshun g.yas g.yon du 'khor lo re re sbas na mnan par 'gyuro// rig sngags kyi sbyor ba mnan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
107a2(rgyud): sems dpa' 'jam dpa gzhon nus/ me tog man+da ra ba dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la gtor ro// lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra du ma yang bsgrag so// de nas bcom ldan
107a3(rgyud): 'das la gsol pa/ dam tshig kyang gang gis 'grub par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ so so'i dam tshig sdom gnas te// lha'i 'khor lo dang ldan pas/ 
107a4(rgyud): srog chags dag ni bsad pa spang // ma byin pa da ga mi blang zhing // bud med mi bsten smad mi bya// brdzun ni rnam pa kun tu spang // myos gyur dag dang sha dag dang // rku zhing rnam pa dag tu spang / 
107a5(rgyud): mo rnams thams cad kun la ni// chags pa'i sems kun spang ba ste// ma bzhin du ni kun la ni// phan pa'i sa mas kyis kun la bskur// dam tshig sdom pa gnas pa yi// 
107a6(rgyud): las rnams kun la mthu yod 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// dam tshig dang sdom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang
107a7(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhonu la sogs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa rje su yi
107a8(rgyud): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rgyud las sna tsho/ bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI mi tra dang / 
107b1(rgyud): lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// / !// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ra b+ha dra nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka/ bod skad du/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 
107b2(rgyud): rje btsun ma 'phar ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tsha lo// dang ldan yid 'ong po Ta la// sna tshor khams kyi rnam par spras// sna tshob ljon pas bkram pa ste// skye gnyis du ma sgra 'byin pa// 'bab chu sna rgor ku
107b3(rgyud): che ri dgas sna tshoDa 'khrugs pa ste// me tog sna tsho Da riDa rnams kyis// kun tu dri yis bkang ba ste// sna tshoT yid 'ong 'bras bur ldan// rkang pa drug pa klu yi sgra// mi 'am ci yis glu snyan len// 
107b4(rgyud): glang chen smyon pas yang dag khengs// riDa 'dzin grub pa'i choDa rnams dang // dri za rnas kyang glu len pa// thub pa 'dod cha bral rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga gzhan dang // sa
107b5(rgyud): bcu'i dbang phyug rnams dang ni// 'phaT ma sgrol sogs lha mo rnas// rig pa'i rgyal mo stong rnas kyis// rtag tu leDa par sten pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po che Da gzhan dang // rta mgrin la so/ 
107b6(rgyud): kyis bskor ba// sems can kun la phan par brtson// bac+doMs ni spyan ras gzir// bzhugs te de phyir dpal dang ldan// pad+ma'i snying po thub pa'i gdan// dka' thub chen po dang ldan pa// byams pa dang ni
107b7(rgyud): snying rje ldan// lha yi 'khor ni chen po la// chos gsungs po ni yang dag bzhug// de ru nyer 'dug yang yang dag langs// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che// mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pas// spyan ras gzi la
107b8(rgyud): zhus pa ste/ rkun pa sbrul dang seng+ge dang // glang po stag dang chu 'jigs pas// zhe mdzad thub pas sen rnams/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying pa rnams// 'khor ba'i zhar pas bcings pa rnas/ chaDa sdang gti mug dri ma
108a1(rgyud): las/ glang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba/ de gsungs bdag la thub chen po// de skad zhus nas bcom ldan 'das// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad gsungs// dang ldan de ni
108a2(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs// phyag na rdo rje rab rtog byed// snyan pa'i tshig ni 'di skad gsungs// nyon cig gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po// skyob pa 'od dpag med pa yis// smon lam stobs kyis byung ba ste// nga yis
108a3(rgyud): 'jig rten ma ru shes// snying rje tshe dang ldan pa yis// 'gro ba 'don par brtson pa mo// nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba/ zla ba nya 'dra byed kyi 'ong // lha bcas mi dang lha min dang // mi rnams thaMd gsal bar byed// 'jig
108a4(rgyud): rten gsum po g.yo bar byed// gnod sbyin srin po 'dziT par byed// phyag na ut+pal sngon po ste// ma 'dzir ma 'jigs zhe/ sa brjod ma// bar snang du ni 'bar bar gnas// 'gro ba yang dag gzung
108a5(rgyud): don du// mtshon gyi bskal pa byung ba dang // 'ji pa sna tshogs 'khrugs don du// rgyal ba rnams kyi bdag bskyed// ming rnams dran pa nyid kyis ni// sen thad bdag gis srung // 
108a6(rgyud): sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho las// sems can thaMd bdag gis bsgral// des na bdag la 'jig rten du// rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis sgrol mar bsgrag/ thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// spyan sngar
108a7(rgyud): 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// gsung cig mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' bas// sdig pa spong byed bsod nams dang // bkra shis
108a8(rgyud): grar pa 'phel bar byed// gter dang nor rnams 'phel byed nyid// nad rnams thaMd brlag par byed// dpal dang shis pa 'jog par byed// nad med che ni 'phel bar byed// sen rnams la byams bsgom la/ 
108b1(rgyud): de dag sgrog shig thung chen po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang rab tu bzhad/ mchog rnams rab tu rnams gzigs nas// 'di lta bu yi byams pa spro// phyag ni g.yas pas phyag thab mdzad// bsod nams mtshan
108b2(rgyud): nyid ldan pa yis// de gsungs shes rab shin tu che// legaso legaso dka' thub che// sems can kun la gcig tu brtse// bskal pa chen po mi rnams nyon// mi rnams gang zhig 'di sgrogs pa// nor gyi
108b3(rgyud): dbang phyug yang dag 'gyur// nad rnams thams cad yang dag grol// dbang phyug kun dang yang dag ldan// dus min 'chi ba nges par bsregs// 'chi ba bde ba can 'gro ba// de rnams bdag gis bshad
108b4(rgyud): bar bya// lha yi dge 'dun bdag la nyon// 'di la rje su yi rang gis// legs par bsdam par 'gyur la bstod// oM/ dge pa can ni gzi brjid che// 'jig rten gso byed snyan pa che// dbyangs
108b5(rgyud): can ma ni spyan yangs ma// shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma// gso byed ma dang rgyas 'debs ma// swA hA/ oM gyis rnam par 'dod gzugs ma// seMn kun la phan par brtson/ 
108b6(rgyud): g.yul las sgrol byed rgyal ba mo// lha me shes rab pha rol phyin// 'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma/ rdza rnga dung can rgyas pa mo// rig pa'i rgyal mo tshig snyan ma// zla ba'i gdeng can dkar ma
108b7(rgyud): che/ mi pham gos ni ser mo can// sgyu ma chen mo dkar me tsho// stobs po che la pha rol phyin// rtsub mo chen me gtum chen mo// sdang ba'i sems kyis brlag byed ma// rab tu zhi ba zhi pa'i
108b8(rgyud): gzugs// rnam par rgyal ba 'bar ba'i 'od// glog gi phreng ba rgyal mtshan can// ral gri 'khor la gzhu thogs mtshon// 'chol byed rengs byed nag me ni// mtshan me nag mo mtshan spyod ma// srang byang
109a1(rgyud): rmongs byed zhi ba mo// mdzes ma dge ma 'dra ba'i lding / tshangs pa mo dang rig byed ma// gsang ba mo ni brag phug gnas// bkra shis don byed zhib mo// skyes nas rig byed yod 'a
109a2(rgyud): ma thod pa can ni shugs chen mo// tshangs ma bden ma gzhan mi rgyal// ded dpon chen mo snying rje gnas// chud zos pa la lam rab ston// mchog ster ster byed ston pa mo// bud med gzugs la dpag
109a3(rgyud): med gnon// ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor ma// grub ma gtum ma bdud rtsi ma// des ma nor ma bsod nams ma// skal chen skal bzang mdzes ston ma// mthar byed 'jigs byed 'jigs byed ma// drag
109a4(rgyud): dang brtul zhugs chen mo ma// 'gre la gcig tu phan par brtson// skyabs byed gus la gsong mo ma// ngag gi dbang phyug zhi phra ma// rtag ma kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma// don kun sgrub byed
109a5(rgyud): bzang mo ma// gsang byed gso byed ner sten ma/ mi 'jigs bsod nams gau ta ma// spyan ras gzigs dbang ba dag nyid skyes// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// phan par byed
109a6(rgyud): par grags pa ste// mchog tu rmad byung gsang ba'o// lha yul na yang rnyed dka' ba/ skal bzang skal ba dang ldan byed// dug ni thad nyams byed la// nad ni thad zhi byed ma// sen kun la bde
109a7(rgyud): ster ma// blo ldan gang zhig lan gsum klog/ mnyam gzhag gtsang sbra byas pa yis// des ni dus mi rung ba ru// rgyal srid dpal yang thob par 'gyur// rtag tu sdug pa'ang bde bar 'gyur
109a8(rgyud): 'akren pa phyug por 'gyur ba'o// rmongs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur/ yid gzhung 'gyur ba the tshom med// cings pa bcings las grol bar 'gyur// tha snyad las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur// dgra / 
109b1(rgyud): bshes por 'gyur ba ste// rwa can dang ni mche ba can// dog pa'i 'thab mo rgyal dka' ba// sna tshogs 'jigs pa 'khrugs pa las// mtshan ni 'di rnams dran pa yis// 'jigs pa kun las/ 
109b2(rgyud): sgrol bar byed// dus min 'chi las sgrol bar byed// skyes bu snyan pa thob par byed// mi ni skye ba don dang bcas// de gcig pu yi phan yon gyis// gang zhig 'di ni sngar langs nas// skyes bu
109b3(rgyud): gang zhig sgrogs byed pa// de yi dus ring tshe dang ldan// mi ni dpal gyi dga' 'gyur te// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang ni lus srul po// 'byung po gshed byed srin po dang // ma mo
109b4(rgyud): rtsub pa'i sems ldan pa// gnod sbyin ma dang yi dgas byed// smyo byed dang ni gdon chen rnams// grib gnon dang ni brjed byed dang // sha za la sogs pa rnams dang // ro langs la sogs
109b5(rgyud): sna tshob rnams// bskul byed gzhan sems sdang ba rnams// grib ma yang ni 'gom mi 'gyur// ji ltar slar ni mchod par 'gyur// sdang ba'i sen 'ching bar 'gyur// nad la
109b6(rgyud): sogs pas thebs mi 'gyur// byuka dang longs spyod yon+tan ldan// bu dang che bo 'phel bar 'gyur// blo ldan skye ba dran par 'gyur// riDa dang ldan zhing mthong dkar 'gyur// gzi brjid ldan
109b7(rgyud): zhing tshims gsal ba// bstan bcos thams cad rig par 'gyur// dge ba shes bsnyen bkur yang dag bsten// byang chub sems kyis rgyan pa dang // gang dang gang du skyes pa der// rtag tu sang+yas
109b8(rgyud): kyis mi spong // dang ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa rje tsun 'pha' ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzog so// // rgya bar skad du/ 
110a1(rgyud): tA ra de bI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kan bod skad du/ lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ba'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi don la
110a2(rgyud): dang na bza' dang / sham thabs kyi gshale kas 'jig rten gyi khams chen po'i bla res byas pa la phyag 'tsha lo// de nas lha mo sgrol mas de'i tshe sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i gzungs kyi mchog
110a3(rgyud): brjod pa// au trai lo kya bi dza ya/ a tsit+ta dza ya/ a ni ra tsi dza tA ya/ su dzaM ya/ bi dza ya/ ma hA dza ya bi dza ya/ dza ya dza ya/ he he/ sma ra sma ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra da/ ma hA de gi bi la sa/ bi la sa/ bi la sa/ 
110a4(rgyud): badzaM a mo ta ka ri bi dza ya de bi hI hI/ ki na kin bi laM ba se/ sma ra sma ra ma ya badz+nyA a ni ba ta/ badz+ra ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bI gi ni hUM hUM/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+pho ta s+pho ta/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ 
110a5(rgyud): d+hun d+hu ma bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ kam+ba kam+ba/ kam+ba ya/ su ra bi gan+d+ha/ a ti si ta/ mu khe ha la nga ba la/ saM ga rA dzA na bi ma bi gi/ bi nA sha ya bi nA sha ya/ he b+ha ga ba ti/ san trA sa ya bi ga
110a6(rgyud): nA na/ pa ri ba lA ya/ asma kaM asma kaM/ mA da ni mA da ni/ saM bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ha ra ha ra/ hi ri hi ri/ hu ru hu ru/ bi ta ra ka ba ra dzaM/ haM haM/ tro tA ya haM haM/ san tri tA ya/ san tro ya/ man+ta man+ta/ man+da
110a7(rgyud): mar+tha/ tsa ra tsi ra/ saM tsa ra se tsa ra khe ga be ga be ga ba ti/ na mo na mo na maHswA hA// de nas lha dang lha min tshegs// srin po gnod sbyin mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams dang // 'byung po
110a8(rgyud): dri za log 'dren rnams// 'jig rten gsuM du gra ba'i mchog/ gsang sngags chen po 'di thos nas// skrag cing mgo bo smad gyur te// lag pa chen po yongs spyod nas// gang gis 'di nas sagasuM
110b1(rgyud): 'di mtshan dag khyab par bya ba'i phyir// 'dod pa'i lha yi dag bzlog pa// sgrol ma spyan yangs phyag 'tsha lo// spyan ras gzigs kyi gzir smras pa// che ba nyid kyis gran pa'o// spyan yangs
110b2(rgyud): khyed ni sems can rnams// phan bzhed slad du 'byung ba lags// de nas dbang phyug la sogs pa// lha dang lha min 'dus kun dang // rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po dang // de bzhin
110b3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba rnams// bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te// bskor ba mchog ni byas nas kyang // pus mo'i lha nga sa steng du// btsugs nas tshig ni 'di skad smras// sgrol ma 'ong 'bar
110b4(rgyud): de la ni// phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshalo// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yis// dpe med ming ni brjod par bgyi// bkra shis rnam rgyal dpal bzang ba// skye dgu'i dbang phyug
110b5(rgyud): mngon shes myur// dbang phyug rab dga' 'ji la drag rgod bag med cing dreg pa med// pad+ma'i spyan dang pad+ma'i zhal// pad+ma'i lte ba rab gcing sbyin// spyan bzang spyan
110b6(rgyud): ni yangs pa ste/ sde ba ut+pal sngon po'i 'od// skyob dang skyabs 'od bde ba sbyin// de bzhin stobs sbyin gzur sbyin pa// mgon po mgon mdzad drag mo ste// dkon mchog gsum
110b7(rgyud): bo rgyal mdzad ma// skyes dmar sen ma dmar ba ste// spyan rtsa dmar pos gzir bar mdzad// dga' mdzad dga' stobs pad+ma lags// pad+ma'i mdog can pad mdog dgyes// 'jig rten
110b8(rgyud): gsuM 'dul zhi ba ste/ 'jin pa'i cha luT stobs mo che// 'dul du 'jug ma 'dul mdzad ma// bstod ldan mi mchog dam pa la Da// rab gsal 'dul ba rdo rje can// rnam par rgyal ba 'od
111a1(rgyud): / gsal ba/ byang chub rdul med dri ma med zla ba lha mchog rnams kyi rje/ sred bya dang ni sred bya'i bar/ rgyu zhing gsher la 'od zer mdzes// tshul g.yul 'gyed 'gying bag can/ 
111a2(rgyud): skyes mchog rang bzhin yid 'phros rgyas// gtsug pud gsum po lto tshil gsum// spyan gsum dri ma gsum sel ba// srid pa sel mdzad khong dge ba// tshig ldan mar yang de bzhin grag// rgyal
111a3(rgyud): ba sbyin pa bsod nams sbyin// sdig pa 'joms pa 'jigs pa med// nor sbyin mder sbyin zhi ba ma// gzugs bzang byal bzang nu ma bzang // rgyu 'phrul sgyu 'phrul ldan zhing 'dul// dul ba srung ba rdul
111a4(rgyud): sel ba// phreng ba thob ma rgyag mdzad ma// rgyags ba sbyin ma dregs sbreng ma// drag mo la Da ni gzi bskyed ma// dkar mo zhi mdzad bde ba mo// skye dgu'i bdag mo tshangs par ldan// tshangs sbyin
111a5(rgyud): dbang phyug dam pa lags// zla ba'i 'od can zla bI zhal/ zla ba'i gzi ni 'phrog par mdzad// nyi ma'i gzi 'phrog dgyes ba mo// yid 'ong bzang zhing zhim mo// bde ma bde ldan mu dang stor
111a6(rgyud): bkra shis bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma// nor spel bsod nams rnam par rgyal// 'dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser dngul 'ang // 'dziT pa sel ba 'dzin med sbyin// sgrol ma la Da te zla ba'i zhal// sen
111a7(rgyud): kun la med mi 'gyur// mchod gnas phyag gnas dga' mdzad ma// cha luT sngo ba cha lugs bzang // rgyan dmar rgyan du tho ba ste// na bza' gser ba nabs gang ga ma/ dkar mo 'bar ba rnam
111a8(rgyud): bar gzigs/ gi'u wang gi thig le spos// 'khor ldan rdo rje chu lha nyid// dkyil 'khor mchog mnga' 'dzir mdzad ma/ choms dkar bzhad cing tshems dkar 'dzum// dpung rgyan snyan cham du
111b1(rgyud): 'khor thogs/ do shal 'bar ba'i chun po can// 'od dpag bzang ldan zhal bzang ma// grog ni nim pa'i lo ma thogs// nor bu'i cod pan nor bu 'chang // nor bu'i rgyan rnams rgyan du thog
111b2(rgyud): ner bu'i 'od zer snang ba can// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba// 'bar ba'i mdog mnga' rdo rje can// skyes pa bud med sad par mdzad// zhi ba dbyig thogs mche ba can/ tshangs pa'i zhu
111b3(rgyud): can rlung dang ldan// bud med lags te mkha' las gshegs// lha mo mchog gi 'od 'phro ma// 'od dang ldan pa 'dod pas 'dul// 'dod pa'i khro bo rab 'joms ma// drag po thor tshugs
111b4(rgyud): gtsug phud can// tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gsungs ldan rgyal// ping ka'i skad 'dra pheg bzang ma// 'jig rten dbang phyug rigs mchog skyes// dbyig pa'i shing la rdo rje thogs/ 
111b5(rgyud): drag mo rin chen 'od kyi brgyan// gshegs na snyan cha dri med g.yo// gshin rje ba yi yid la 'jug rig snga gas 'chang ma gzugs 'chang ma// stobs lnga stobs dang
111b6(rgyud): ldan par mdzad// stobs dang stobs med mnga' ba ste// shes rab mtshon gyis gcod par mdzad// sgyu sbrul lags te sgyu sbrul ldan// de bzhin brjod dang smra ba lags/ steng nas
111b7(rgyud): khyams dang khyams bza' tshul// tsam pa ka'i chun pos gsal// ser mo cen pa legs pa'i rten// drag mo phyag na chun po thogs// bskal pa bzang mo gshal ka can// de bzhin
111b8(rgyud): shin tu shas cher dgyes// rigs mtshan shin tu stobs dang ldan// rdo rje khro bo dga' mdzad ma// bde ldan blo ldan rdo rje'i thogs// blo mdzad shes rab bskyed par mdzad// lha mo laM/ 
112a1(rgyud): me cod pan can// lha rnams kun la tshul lhag ma// sred med bu mo sdig pa sel// bkra shis ngo tsha shes dang gyes// rab tu dga' mgrog na dga'// spyod tshul dga' la das la
112a2(rgyud): dang ldan// dga' ma dga' bar mdzad pa ste// chos rnams kun gyis legs pa'i rten// sangs rgyas sprul pa sprul mdzad ma// nga rgyal sel bar mdzad pa ste// las dang nyon mongs rab
112a3(rgyud): 'joms shing // 'dod pa'i sde rnams rab 'joms ma// shes pa bcu mnga' sangs rgyas pa// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sa bcu dag la mnga' brnyes pa// stobs rnams bcu pos
112a4(rgyud): cher gsal ma// rdo rje cod pani rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje phra mo lha min sel// dus kyi rdo rje rab tu rgyags// rdo rje lcags kyu bde ba dpal// rdo rje zhags pa zhags pa bzang // sgeg mo
112a5(rgyud): rdo rje phyag na bsnams// yid 'ong yid la tshim bar mdzad// pha rol bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma// tshim mdzad shas char bde ba ste// rol cing gar thabs ston par
112a6(rgyud): mdzad// chos can ha la ha la'i 'od// chos sbyin rnam par gzigs pa lags// khyod ni rdo rje 'phro ba dang // bdud rtsi rdo rjer brjod pa ste// rdo rje 'bar ba stobs mo che// lha mo chen mo
112a7(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal// bdag cag rnams kyis bskyed pa yis// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'di brjod// kye kye bcom ldan mchog nyid ni// smra ba rnams kyi mchog laT gsungs// de nas
112a8(rgyud): zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'bar la 'phro bar ldan pa yi// lha mo sgrol ma brjid bag can// 'dzum bzhin du ni rab smras pa// dbang phyug chen po la sogs kun// nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis// 
112b1(rgyud): thams cad rtag tu 'thun par ni// stobs bcu dag la brtson par gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul chen yang // dus kun du ri srung bar gyis// zhi ba'i lam la dmigs pas ni// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho
112b2(rgyud): mi bzad cing // 'jigs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa// rgal dka' khyed kyis rgal bar gyis// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer la// dmigs nas brtson te 'jug par gyis// de nas nyi 'od 'bar ba yi// phreng
112b3(rgyud): ba lta bu mdzes pa'i zhal// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug gi sgra// 'dra ba'i tshig ni bka' stsal pa// kye ma rig sngags sgron ma'i mchog/ mun pa sel bar byed pa dang // mthu stobs rgya chen skyed
112b4(rgyud): byed pa// sgrib pa thams cad gcod byed pa// tshogs rnams skyes pa'i gzi brjid kyis// dag par byas pa ma yin pas// shas cher dga' bar byed pa yi// gzungs 'di thos par mi 'gyur
112b5(rgyud): sngon chad sangs rgyas brtson byas pa'i// brtan pa gzi brjid dag rnams la// dam tshig chen po rig sngags kyi// dam tshig 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur// nyon mongs mtha' dag pa
112b6(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad sel byed pa// sems can thad rab 'byed pa'i// gzungs sngags rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa// su zhig mnyam par gzhag pa yis// nyan tam 'chang ngam klog byed na// rang
112b7(rgyud): byung gis ni gsungs pa bzhin// de yi don kun 'grub par 'gyur// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing // sems can kun las lhag pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten dag tu chos shes la// 'dzud
112b8(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs// su zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di// 'don cing sgrol ma zla ba'i zhal// de bzhin stong byed de dag ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur// de yi den kyang
113a1(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur zhing // rgyal po rnams dang stobs chen mi// gzhan yang sems can bgrang ba gang // thams cad de yis dbang du 'gyur/ lha mo sgrol ma zhal bzang
113a2(rgyud): pa'i/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad grags pa 'di// 'jig rten dag na rgyags pa dang // nyon mongs mi rigs kun sel ba'o// de nas bdud res gyen du g.yos pa'i ri bo 'khrug byed pa// de bzhin ga sh+ya
113a3(rgyud): pa'i ri bo mchog dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' ba// 'od bsal lnga dang mi rnams legs par sang bar mdzad pa po// rgyal sras thu bo rnams kyis khyad par stobs kyis brten pa yis// 
113a4(rgyud): gsung rab rtag tu tshogs chen brda sprod la// don chen grags shring phan phyir zhugs pa gang // rab des chos de dang ni sdud byed dang // de bzhin khyad par sems pa'i rims sel bas// 
113a5(rgyud): bzed med nyon mongs sel ba dang // zhi ba'i yid ni ba skyed pa'i tshig rgyal ba mchog gis bka' stsal nas// gan sa par gyur te mi gsungs bzhugs// de nas
113a6(rgyud): sgrol mchog lha mos gtsor gyur dga' bar byed cing yid 'phrog la dga' ba rgya chen skyes cing tshe dang bde sbyin bstan pa'i tshig thos pas// lha tshogs lha min tshogs bcas mtha'
113a7(rgyud): dag dga' ba rgyas shing rmad byung nas// rab tu dga' zhing spyi bos thal mo sbyar te smra ba zhi bar 'gyur// sgrol ma'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs te lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
113a8(rgyud): brdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ b+ha Ta tA rA aSh+Ta sha da ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rje btsun sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa ces bya ba rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tsha lo// 
113b1(rgyud): dpal ldan dge ma gzi chen ma// 'jig rten ma ma grags chen mo// dbyangs can spyan ni sgyus rings la// blo dpal shes rab 'phel mdzad ma// swA hA brtan phyir rgyas sbyin zhing // 'dod pa
113b2(rgyud): gzugs can yi ge au// sems can kun la phan brtson zhing // g.yul las sgrol bar mdzad pa mo// lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin// 'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'od ma// 
113b3(rgyud): rnga chen dung gi sgra sgrogs shing // rig sngags rgyal mo sAn smraso// zla ba'i zhal can dkar mo che// mi thub na bza' sar mo bsnams// sgyu 'phrul chen mo dkar mo che// 
113b4(rgyud): stobs chen pha rol gnon pa mo// drag mo chen mo gtum pa che// gdub pa'i sems can 'dul ba mo// rab tu zhi zhing zhi ba'i sku/ rnam rgyal 'ba' ba'i 'od ldan ma/ 
113b5(rgyud): glog phreng rdo rje 'khor lo dang // gzhu dang 'da' yi phyag mtshan can// nag mo gnod dang sdom byed cing // mtshan mo nag me mtshan spyod ma// srung mdzad rmongs mdzad zhi
113b6(rgyud): mdzad ma// mdzes ma dge ma 'gre lding ma// bram ze mo ste rigs byed yum// zab mo'i phug na bzhugs pa mo// zhi ba bkra shis ri khrod ma// rig pa bskyod cing yid ltar 'gyogs// thod pa
113b7(rgyud): can te shugs chen zhing // gzhan gyi mi thub dus bden ma// ded dpon snying rjes gnon pa mo// lam brgyad ston par mdzad ma ste// mchog sbyin ston mdzad bstan ches ldan// ma pham bud
113b8(rgyud): med gzugs kyis gnon// grub pa rnal 'byor ri khrod ma// gtum me bdud rtsi rtag pa mo// nor ldan bsod nams skal ba che// bskang bzong mthong na dga' ba mo// mthar byed skrag byed
114a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa mo// shin tu drag cing cher 'bar ma// 'gro ba cig tu phan brtsor zhing // skyabs 'od mos la byams pa mo// tshig gi dbang phyug phra ba mo// rtag par kun tu
114a2(rgyud): 'dod sbyin ma// don kun grub pa bzang mo ste// sbas ma ma ma nor sbyin ma// 'jigs byed bsod nams go'u tam/ dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug yum// sgrol ma yon+dan mtha' yas
114a3(rgyud): shing / bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad ma// ming ni brgya dang brgyad po 'di// tho rangs langs te gang zhig klog/ sgrol mas 'dod pa'i don thams cad// phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed/ 
114a4(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzog so// // kha che'i paN+Di ta bud d+ha A kar dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba ga rub chos kyi shes rab kyis// kha che'i dpe la bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
114a5(rgyud): phab pa'o// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Amya ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ b+ho d+his/ ya ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ 
114a6(rgyud): oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TAn ma ma kr-i te dza~M b+ha ya/ sta~M b+ha ya mo ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta staM b+ha ni ta re swA hA// 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs rdzog so// 
114a7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA swa pra tI dz+nyA nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa ces bya'i'iri gzungs/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// de nas sgrol ma
114a8(rgyud): rang gi dam bcas pa'i gzungs smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tA re yaM/ hUM hUM hUM/ sa ma ya s+thi te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sarba b+ha ra Na/ bi b+hu dzi te/ pad+ma ni pad+ma/ ma hA pad+ma/ a sa na s+thi te/ ha sa ha sa/ trai lo
114b1(rgyud): ba ra de/ sarba de ba da na pa/ pu dzi She sma rA hI/ bA ga ba te tA re/ sma rA hi/ b+ha ga ban+ta/ ta thA ga tA s+ya/ pu ra taHsa ma ya d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA satwA a ba lo ki te/ ma Ni ka ni ka bi tsi tra b+ha ra Na/ oM bi lo kA ya/ 
114b2(rgyud): che ba mo b+ha ba ban+te/ tA re/ hI hAM hU~M phaT swA hA// gzungs sngags 'di yid kyi dran pa tsam gyi 'jigs pa thams cad sel bar 'gyuraro// dngos grub thams cad theb par 'gyuraro// sems can thad
114b3(rgyud): dbang du 'gyuraro// dkar po'i tshes brgyang dam bco lnga la 'phags ma sgrol ma la mchod pa chen po byas te sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong gi bar de tsam du bzlas par bya'o// gang 'dod pa
114b4(rgyud): de sbyin no// mchog thams cad ste ro// ma byin na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byaso// gzhan yang phan yon dpag tu med par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rdo rje mchog gi rgyud
114b5(rgyud): las 'atus/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs rdzog so// / 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ya sho ba ti d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa grags ldan
114b6(rgyud): ma'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thang la phyag 'tsha lo// na mo rat+na tra ya ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ b+ho d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ tad+ya thA/ dzA re ma hA dz+wa re/ du
114b7(rgyud): ma khe su pan ne/ ma hA saM pan ne/ saM pata te/ ma hA saM pa ta ti/ ka se ma hA ka se/ kats+tsha dzA ra muka te si swA hA// skud pa 'am chu la lan gsum bsngags na rims las thar bar 'gyuraro// na me rA
114b8(rgyud): tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ b+ho d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/ rAk+Sha rAk+Sha mAM/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA sA hA// gden thaMd la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa
115a1(rgyud): 'am skud pa dmar po la lan gsum bsngags te mdud pa gsum bor te bcings na bar du gcod pa zhi bar 'gyuraro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ b+ho d+hi satwA
115a2(rgyud): ya ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ki li ki li/ tsi li tsi li/ ni gi li swA hA// 'bru mar la lan gsum bsngags te bskus na sman 'tsho'o// na mo rat+na tri yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya bA lo ki te shwa rA ya b+ho d+hi sa
115a3(rgyud): ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sa re sa re/ bi sa re bi sa re sa ra Na/ sha ni swA hA/ shi ba'i rna bar lan gsum bzlas na sos par 'gyuraro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ d+ho d+hA
115a4(rgyud): satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ye/ tad+ya thA/ ni si ri ni si re/ ka la ni mi re ka la ri tsi rI/ bi tsi la swAhA/ lba ba dang / lkog ma'i lha gor dang / lce'i kyi ba na ba dang / gdon nang thaMd la 'jim
115a5(rgyud): pa le lan gsum du bsngags te bskus na phan no// na me re tA tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya bra lo ki te shwa rA ya/ badz+ra pA Ni d+ha ma/ oM au kA ra pra b+ha be b+ha ga ba ti bud+d+he/ pra ti bud+d+ha/ 
115a6(rgyud): shud+d+he shan+ti ki r-i ha na ha na/ ma ma pA pa maM/ da ha da ha/ ma ma pA ba daM/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma ma pA pa kan/ oM au De/ gra sa gra sa/ ri to De ri ti De/ shan+ti ka ri ye swA hA/ shu b+ha ka ri ye swA hA/ shu d+ha
115a7(rgyud): ri ye swA hA/ kle ma ka ri ye swA hA// rims nad kyis btab pa la byab pa byas na rims nad sos par 'gyur ro// sman la sngags kyi btab te blud na/ nad pa sos par 'gyuraro// zas la sngags
115a8(rgyud): kyis btab te zos na dug mi gnod par 'gyuro// 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te bcings na thar bar 'gyu ro// 'pha
115b1(rgyud): ba grags ldan ma'i gzungs rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ur+d+ha dza Ta ma hA ka lA ma hA bo d+hi satwA bi kur+m+ma Na paT la bi sa rA b+ha ga ba tI Ar+ya tA rA mu kalpa nA ma/ bod skad du/ ral
115b2(rgyud): pa gyen rjes kyi rtog pa chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa le'u rab 'byams las bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba/ 'pha
115b3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma'i gru'i steng gi na mkha'i mthil na rab tu bzhugs te/ ngo mtshar smad
115b4(rgyud): du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan par bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi
115b5(rgyud): lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu khyed rnams nyon cig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi slang du byung ba bsam
115b6(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa ting 'dzin dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrubab sen thang nye bar 'tshe bar
115b7(rgyud): byed pa dang / tshe dang / nang meng pa dang / dbang phyug dang / yid kyi shing rta yong su rdzogs par byed pa'i rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi gzhi/ sems can thaMng la phan pa'i cheng du bshad
115b8(rgyud): kyis// de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig/ ngas bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes so// de nas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams thal mo
116a1(rgyud): sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis spyod pa ring 'dzin gyis khyab par so sor
116a2(rgyud): thob par byed pa/ rdo rje'i gdar gnon par byed pa/ bdud 'dul bar byed pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar byed pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung bar byed pa/ lha dang mi
116a3(rgyud): rnamasu skye bar byed pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dbul ba dang nad kyi btab pa thams cad kyi nang sel bar byed pa nyid dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa zad kyi
116a4(rgyud): rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa zil gyi mi non pa nyid dang / bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed pa de ga sung du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thang
116a5(rgyud): don med par gsungs par byed pa ma lags na// bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i sems dang / bdag cag dang / sems can tha mas cad la rjesu brtse ba nye bar gzung nas de gsung
116a6(rgyud): du gsel/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas rnam par dag pa'i yul
116a7(rgyud): la 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// snyems par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mjed spu nas me tog lta bu'i byang
116a8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams kun tu bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongasu bskor ba nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
116b1(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa 'das nas nung phyogs kyi char gang+gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gis bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das
116b2(rgyud): pa ma bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rje su zhugs te/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med bzhugs pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
116b3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug kyang sngon gyi smon laM gyi dbang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa la so sor gnas pa rnams kyi thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa de 'od zer gyi snang
116b4(rgyud): bas mthong bas cung zad rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal te// kye rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'di ni bdag cag rnams kun tu
116b5(rgyud): bskul bar byed pa'i 'od zer 'dir 'ongs pa yin par khye nga cag gis shes par gyis shig/ de nas yang sems dpa' chen po de rnams spyan 'dzum pa spyan gdangs
116b6(rgyud): nas/ 'di'i 'od zer gyi snang ba gang yin pa der mngon par phyogs te gan so// de nas kun tu bskul bar byed pa'i 'od zer des bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chen po kun tu
116b7(rgyud): snang bas kun tu snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
116b8(rgyud): gzigs kyi ye shes kyi spyi bor nub par gyur to// de nas sems dpa' chen po de stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la lan gsum
117a1(rgyud): bskor ba byas nas mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dgong su
117a2(rgyud): gsol bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi khams de
117a3(rgyud): dang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lta ba dang / phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i
117a4(rgyud): rtog pa dang / gsang ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga dang / bzlas pa dang / rig pa'i dbang bskur ba thams cad khyad par du bstan pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yong su rdzogs par
117a5(rgyud): 'tshalo// de skad gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'angs de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la 'di skad ces bka'
117a6(rgyud): stsal te// sems dpa' chen po gang da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na song cig pa'i tshig gis kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ ldang ba
117a7(rgyud): yang ngam/ reg par gnas sam zhes smad par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
117a8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po gang+ga'i klung brgya stong phrag gang+ga'i bye ma la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
117b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi rigs dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa dang / gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya dang / ras ris kyi cho ga dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas
117b2(rgyud): ba'i nges pa bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kun nas dga' bar byed pa/ rin po che snang ba'i le'u rab 'byam/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
117b3(rgyud): byung ba'i ye shes rnams kyis rang gi rig sngags dang / gsang sngags la 'jug par byed pa ston pa/ mthar thug par zin pa dang / nang gi dus dang ldan pa dang / dam tshig rab 'byam gyi le'u dang / 
117b4(rgyud): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa mtha' ngag ma lus par bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thang dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang
117b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i sa la bzhugs pa dang / spyod pa mthar thug pa gsung ba dang ldan pa dag gsungs pa la ya pa 'di la rje su yi rang ba kho na'o// sem dpa' chen po da lta
117b6(rgyud): de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song shig shAkya thub pa'i drung du de la mngon du phyogs pas dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grang 'di nyon la khyod kyang smra bar 'gyuraro// 'di la yang rtswa bI ri sngag
117b7(rgyud): su 'gyur ba ni// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te sa myaka saM bud+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tre shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba t+ye AH
117b8(rgyud): tArA ye kho d+hi satwA yai/ tad+ya thA/ bI re ri dzuka d+harma ni t+yai te/ tA re tut+ta re/ shAn+ta d+ha ma ni t+ya te/ tA re e ni b+ha la bya/ d+harma nin+ya te/ tut+te ra bu re ku re hi ni/ tra sa ni tra sa ni/ e ha ni/ ma ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ 
118a1(rgyud): stam+b+ha ni/ pra b+he/ tsen+da pra be hi li hi li/ tsi li tsi li/ be ma ga sA ma ni/ kur+t+ti kur+t+ti ma hA kur+N+Na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha na pa ni tA re/ hu ru hu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ a ha yA ya/ tsit+ta yA mi tsit+ta d+hi ma ku ru sA
118a2(rgyud): d+hA ya swA hA/ 'di ni sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa de yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thaMd kyis gsungs shing / gsung bar 'gyur ba te/ khyod kyis kyang da lta smra bar
118a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dri rgyas pas rnam par phye ba'i mthar shAkya thub pa byon te/ shAkya thub pas rjesu gnang ba'o// 'di la mchog gi snying por 'gyur ba yang // na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ 
118a4(rgyud): nam Ar+ya bA lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 'di la nye ba'i snying po yang / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA na/ oM ku ru kul+le swA hA/ 
118a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo 'phags pa spyan ras dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis rjesu gnang nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa byang
118a6(rgyud): chub kyi snying po kun tu thob par byed pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin wa snyoms par zhug so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi rnams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thang
118a7(rgyud): ka'i mthar thug pa'i thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kun tu gang bar gyur to// rgyal ba'i sras po lengs/ 
118a8(rgyud): leg so// gang khyod kyi ting 'dzin khyang par 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pas bcu la
118b1(rgyud): rab tu bzhugs pa rnams kyis kyang snyoms par 'jug par mi nu so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis thabs cig
118b2(rgyud): byams pa dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mchog gi snying po mchog gsang ba don thams cad sgrub par byed pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i son
118b3(rgyud): thams cad kyis las thams cad byed ma/ rig sngags gzhan rnams kyis kyang rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i khyad par gyis sgrub par byed pa dang 'thun pa'i rig sngags gsung
118b4(rgyud): bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yud tsam zhig ci yang mi gsung bar gyur to// thams cad du tha~Md dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la sangs rgyas kyi
118b5(rgyud): spyan gyis kun tu gzigs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dgongs pa byams pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems kyi rig sngags gsung bar gyur to// na maHsarba bu
118b6(rgyud): ne oM gIH'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting dwe las
118b7(rgyud): langs nas 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs ldan pa zhes bya ba de lag pa bskum pa la brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa dang se gol tog pa tsam gyis kyang mig 'byed 'dzum pa
118b8(rgyud): skad cib tsam gyis ting 'dzin rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mgyogs pa'i blo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa nyid ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te mi mjed kyi/ 
119a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khamasu 'ongs nas kyang slar 'khod de/ steng gi na mkha'i mthil du nor bu rin po che chen po la so sor 'khod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po slar 'khod nas thaMd
119a2(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'od zer chen po'i kun tu snang bas kun tu snang bar byas nas rin po che'i snang ba'i bdag po'i rgyan gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms
119a3(rgyud): par zhugs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che du mas
119a4(rgyud): rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che'i gdug du mas dang / ga ched brgya stong phrag tu khyab pa dang / lha'i gos dang / dar gyis rgyan gyis mdzes par spras pa dang / lha'i me tog dang / ba ngan
119a5(rgyud): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che g.yer kha'i dra ba bcings pa/ sgra snyan pa 'khrol ba 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' so sor gnas par byed pa/ lha'i dri dang / 
119a6(rgyud): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i char 'bebs par byed pa/ mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i las ngo mtshar smad du byung ba'i tshe 'phrul byang chub sems
119a7(rgyud): dpa'i rnam 'phrul mthong ngo // de nas gnas gcing ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams dga' ba dang bcas pa spu zing zhes byedado// lha'i gnas thad rab tu g.yos pa dang ldan pa mthong
119a8(rgyud): nas skrag cing snying 'dar te 'on te 'byor pa yongasu nyams sam ci zhes phan tshun ring thab su skad mthon pos smra bar brtson zhing / 'di skad ces smra so// bcom ldan 'das yongs su/ 
119b1(rgyud): skyobs shig/ shAkya thub pa yongasu skyobs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor la bka' stsal to// ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ 'di ni
119b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas me tog can lta bu nas nga nyid lta ba dang
119b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur bar 'dod de/ don chen po spyod pa/ rig sngags kyi tshig dang / chos kyi tshig rmad du byung ba yang nges par bstan pa'i phyir 'ong so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
119b4(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par bltas te zhabs gnyis la btud nas yi ge'i tshig rab tu smras pa 'di rnams kyis bcom
119b5(rgyud): ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mkhyen khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// spyod pa'i don kun sgrub pa po// phyag 'tshal skyes
119b6(rgyud): bu gtso khyod la// don med thams cad bzlog pa po// phyag 'tshal skyes bu seng+ge khyod// ngan song thams cad 'joms pa bo// dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// bsod nams dri ni
119b7(rgyud): mtha' yas pa/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad dkar byed// srid gsum 'dam ni rnam sbyong ba// phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad+ma khyod// sdug bsngal thams cad rnam grol byed// thams cad
119b8(rgyud): brel khyed phyag 'tsha lo// gdung ba thams cad legs 'dul byed// zhi ba khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sngags kyi spyod don sgrub pa po// thams cad khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bkra shis kun gyi
120a1(rgyud): bkra shis pa/ bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// chos rnams thams cad kun tu rtogs// sangs rgyas dam tshig khyod phyag 'tshal// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// spros pa
120a2(rgyud): med pa'i rnams pa ni// yang dag rjes 'jug stor pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod phyag 'tshal// shes dang shes bya'i dngos po kun// legs par byas shing yang dag thos// theg gsum la
120a3(rgyud): dang myang 'das la// rab tu gnas 'jug rab gnas pa// kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// zhes yi ge'i tshig rab tu smras pa 'di rnams kyis bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
120a4(rgyud): sngar mngon par bstod nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di nas gang+gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char
120a5(rgyud): kun nas me tog ldan zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ gyur pa deng / bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
120a6(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ lha dang mi
120a7(rgyud): rnams kyi ston pa/ tshe dpag tu med pa bzhugs pa te/ de chos ston par mdzad pa ni/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yong su dag pa/ 
120a8(rgyud): yongasu byang ba'i tshangs par spyod pa/ yang dag par ston par mdzad cing de 'di ltar bzhugs te mche zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston par mdzadado// rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi don gyi
120b1(rgyud): spyod pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang / lam gsum gyi spyod pa'i rjesu 'jug pa'i lam dang / skyobs pa dang / gnas dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / bde ba dang / 
120b2(rgyud): shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu yongasu mthar btugs pas sems can thams cad la ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mdzad pas rje su gnang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
120b3(rgyud): zhabs drung dang / nye ba 'dir 'ongs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ bstan
120b4(rgyud): mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes yongs su 'dri bar byed de/ 'di skad ces kyang gsung so// gang rnams pa 'di lta bu'i snyig ma'i dus gang du bcom ldan 'das
120b5(rgyud): shAkya thub pa'i sku de yang chos ston par mdzad cing rjesu rtog par bya ba'i skye bo la lam gsum gyi byang grol dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye ba rnyed par mdzad pa de ni ngo mtshar/ 
120b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i brtson 'grus kyis gang du skal pa med pa'i sems can gyi tshogs srid pa gsum yang dag par 'joms pa'i lam du mthar thug pa'i 'jug
120b7(rgyud): par byed gtan du grub pa dang / bde ba'i rje su 'thun pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god par mdzad pa ni ngo mtsha ro// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang sangs rgyas
120b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen gyis bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi
121a1(rgyud): khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi rnam 'phrul du shes par 'dod pa 'am/ thugs kyi spyad pa spyod pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa dang / sems dpa'
121a2(rgyud): shes par 'dod pa 'am/ mtha' dag nges par ston pa ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag rnams kyis kyang brjod par yang ga la nus/ gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
121a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sgrub pa sdus pa dang / so so ba ma lus pa'i ngo bo 'dus ma byas chos nyid du lta bar bya ste/ mthong bas spang bar bya ba spong ba dang / ring por mi thogs par
121a4(rgyud): spyod pa smra bar 'dod pa 'am/ yon tan ston par 'dod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kho nas mabya na gyis// bdag gis ni ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems
121a5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs da bang phyug gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sprul te/ rin po na na/ na po pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta bzhin
121a6(rgyud): du bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtam gyi
121a7(rgyud): rjesu 'brang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtam gyis mthar gyi dri ba sngon du 'gro bas phan tshun chos bstan pa'i mthar rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa'i don du nye bar
121a8(rgyud): tshogs pa rnams la tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la bing ka dang / ku ta ra dang / bi ta ras bsgrub pa'i rnga bo che'i dbyangasu grags pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
121b1(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod legs par 'ongs sam/ sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad

121b6(rgyud): mthar 'jug par byed pa/ sems can gzhan dka' bar byed pa/ mi snang ba dang na mkhar 'gro bar byed pa/ rkang pa rab tu brgyus pa/ yid gzhungs par byed pa/ 'chug par byed pa/ sa 'og tu

121b8(rgyud): par byed pa byis pa dang / rgan po dang / lang tsho ji ltar gnas bzhin du gnas par byed pa ste/ mdor bsdus na las thad byed pa/ yid kyi shing rta dzang rdzogs par byed pa/ rgyas pa can dang / zhi ba
122a1(rgyud): can gyi las rab tu byed pa/ ji lta ji ltar las rab tu sbyar bar bya bzhin pa/ de lta de ltar bsgrub par bya bzhin pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang ldan pa phal po che
122a2(rgyud): rtog pa chen po rin po che'i le'u rab 'byam ngas rje su gnang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ dag pa'i sems can rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don// ches kyi mdzod/ 
122a3(rgyud): skye bo mang po la phan pa'i ched dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i ched du/ lha dang mi rnams dang / sems can thams cad la ston cig / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
122a4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kun tu bskul bar byed pa rgyan bkod pa'i 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// snyoms par zhugs
122a5(rgyud): ma thag tu dag pa'i sems can du ma gang+ka'i bye ma snyed kyi 'dzi garten gyi khams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'od zer gyi sna nga bas ji srid 'og min gyi srid pa nas ji srid

122a7(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par bskul nas slar yang 'od zer de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
122a8(rgyud): po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor nub par gyur to// 'di la gzhan shar phyogs la sogs pa rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang yin pa der sangs rgyas bcom ldan
122b1(rgyud): 'das rnams bskul ba'i 'od zer des rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bskul bas sgrub pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nyid kyi snang ba dri kun tu gsal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / 
122b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po

122b5(rgyud): zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas yongasu bskor ba mtha' yas shing mu med pa'i 'jig
122b6(rgyud): rten gyi khams rnamasu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu sgrol ma'i gru'i tshal na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs
122b7(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa
122b8(rgyud): nges par ston pa'i rig gi don gyi le'u rab 'byam gsungs pa de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams 'dzum pa yang dag par ston par mdzadado// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi
123a1(rgyud): phyogs rnamasu phyogs bral rnamasu zhes pas/ steng dang / 'og dang / thang ka thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu snang bar byas nas sangs rgyas kyi
123a2(rgyud): zhing rnam su thams cad du yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad dpa' bkod par byas te byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dang bcas pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du
123a3(rgyud): bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid chen po nyid lta bar 'dod pa/ mchog gi rig pa'i rje su spyod pa

123b5(rgyud): snang ba dang / kun tu lta ba'i snang ba dang / 'ong dpag med dang / dpag yod snang ba dang / spyan bzang snang ba dang / legs 'byung snang ba dang / mtha' yas snang ba dang / mi tshugs snang

123b7(rgyud): rgyas pa dang / 'jig rten zhi ba dang / nye ba'i mchi bltas dang / rnga bo che dang grub pa dang / dkar por grags pa dang / lha rab tu bzod dka' la gdul dka' ba dang / gsal dka' ba dang / ring du seng ba
123b8(rgyud): dang / ring por len pa dang / ring por gnas pa dang / mthe zhing mthe ba'i mun pa dang / mkha' snang dang / kun nas snang dang / snang min dang / khyu mchog dang / kun nas snang ldan dang / nges par mnyam pa
124a1(rgyud): dang / lha chen po dang / shim tu nges pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / dri ma mthar thub pa dang / mnyam pa'i mtshan ma bzang po dang / dkar po dang / i li ki mi dang / tha chung dang / dka'
124a2(rgyud): bas mche ba dang / bde bar 'tshe ba dang / legs par skyes pa dang / du ba'i tog dang / mchod sbyin tog dang / dkar po'i tog dang / tog bzang po dang / dbyig gi teg dang / nor dgag tu med pa dang / pha chen po dang / de

124a7(rgyud): tu snang bar byas nas pad+ma'i gdan la so sor bzhugs par gyur to// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshegs de rnams kyang bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ phyag na rin chen dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / phyag na

140a7(rgyud): yin no// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' de rang gi rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos kyi tshig gsungs pa chos gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

140b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gnyis po ngag gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems yongasu mi gtong ba dang / son thams cad la mnyam pa nyid/

140b3(rgyud): dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba nyid dang / rang gi gsang sngags yongasu mi gtong ba nyid// chos bzhi yang dag par ldan na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rig sngags

140b5(rgyud): sems nye bar gnas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po sgom pa'i sems te chos bzhi po 'di dag dang yang dag par ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags 'grub par
140b6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// chos lngas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la yang dag par 'jug cing gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i yul
140b7(rgyud): bsten pa nyid dang / khas mtha'i dgon pa brten pa nyid dang / sems can gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / spyod
140b8(rgyud): pa la gnas par byed pa nyid de/ chos lnga po 'di dag gis sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// chos drug ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i dngos grub yongasu rdzob par 'an
141a1(rgyud): te/ drug gang zhe na/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa nye bar gcod pa med pa nyid dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab mo tshig gi don mi 'dor ba nyid dang / skyo ba med pa'i sems nyid kyis
141a2(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don yongasu tshol zhing dge ba'i phyogs yongasu mi spong ba nyid de/ chos drug po 'di ni rig sngags kyi spyod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub la yang dag par kun tu 'jug pa
141a3(rgyud): / nyid du 'gyuraro// chos bdun rnams ni/ rig sngags grub pa'i cho ga dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa la rjesu 'jug par byed pa nyid du 'gyur te/ bdun gang zhe na/ shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul zab mo sgom
141a4(rgyud): pa dang / zlos pa dang / nyan pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / 'dri bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pas dus gsum du ston pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / 
141a5(rgyud): sgra gcas dang / dka' thub la ma thogs pa dang / blo gros dang / dran pa dang / shes rab dang / brtan pa dang du len par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang theg pa chen po'i chos zab mo'i tshul
141a6(rgyud): la yang dag par rab tu 'jug pa'i tshul dang / rang gi gsang sngags dang / sngags dgug pa dang / srung ba dang / sgrub pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po
141a7(rgyud): dang / dga' ba chen po yongasu sgom par byed pa las dang / sems can gyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang dag par 'jug pa/ gnyi su med pa'i rnam pa thang mkhyen pa
141a8(rgyud): ye shes yongasu tshol ba las dang / sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong la theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med pa las te chos bdun po 'di rnams ni rig sngag dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub yongs
141b1(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyuraro// chos brgyad mi rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyis dngos grub yang dag par 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu la dang phra
141b2(rgyud): ngo mtshar bar sems par 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chub sems sI ra gI 'bras bu rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa the tshom med pa las dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa las bla ma
141b3(rgyud): la gus pa las dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang gi sngags dang rgyu dang spyod pa nye bar bstan pa mi slu bar 'dzin cing bdog pa thang yongasu gtong ba las dang / dngos grub kyi
141b4(rgyud): zhing gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa rmi lam du mthong ba ston pa la mkhas pa nyid dang / ser sna dang / gnyid dang / rmugs pa mtha' dag dang bral bar byed pa/ rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la sangs rgyas
141b5(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed pa las dang / mdor bsdus na dge ba'i rtsa ba la ngoms mi shes pa'i go cha bgos te 'gegs thams cad
141b6(rgyud): rab tu sel bar byed pa las dang / byang chub kyi rgyud gnon par byed pa dang / longs spyod chen po dang / dbang che bar grags pa bdag nyid so sor 'dod pa dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la
141b7(rgyud): yang dag par 'grogs pa dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang yang dag par 'grogs par byed pa ste/ chos brgyad po 'di ni gsang sngags kyi
141b8(rgyud): spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyu ro// grogs po dag mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing dkon mchog gsum la lhag par mos pa mchog tu tshul khrims
142a1(rgyud): 'chal pa la yang skyo ba med pa'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pas yid sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam mtha' yas shing rma du byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu
142a2(rgyud): 'thun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyuro// de nas gzhan du rtogs par bya ba me yin no// rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid du gyur pas nyams sang pa'i rgyur yang bsgrub par bya ba yin no// de nas yang
142a3(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rnams 'di skad du brjod par byed/ kye rgyal
142a4(rgyud): ba'i sras sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du gsang sngags dkyi spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i don bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug bI rjesu 'thun pa'i chos ston cig leg so leg so// e
142a5(rgyud): ma byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams sna tshogs pa'i chos ste/ na pa'i rjesu 'jug par byed pa gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dge ba legs par gsung so// rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig 'dus
142a6(rgyud): pa'i le'u 'di 'dzin par 'gyuraro// yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang / g.yul du yang thob mar glang po che'i steng du 'jog par 'gyur ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa
142a7(rgyud): mchod par 'gyur ba de la bdag cag mtshungs par brtag par bgyi/ phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo dag dbang du bgyi/ pha rol gyi dmag dpung dag 'jig cing bzlog par bgyi/ glegs bam du bris nas rang gi khyim
142a8(rgyud): du 'jog par 'gyur ba'i// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po chen po 'am/ rgyal mo chen mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ srung ba chen
142b1(rgyud): po dang long spyod chen po dang / tshe rings por 'gyur ba dang / nang meng ba dang / rtag tu long spyod 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o// de skad smras nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur to// 
142b2(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa nges par bstan pa las/ ral pa gyen rjes kyi rtog pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam 'phrul gyi le'u rab 'byam
142b3(rgyud): las bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sbrel ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa las 'dus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
142b4(rgyud): dbang phyug thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjesu 'jug cing kun tu lta bar zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// 
142b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyoms pA zhugs ma thag tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor
142b6(rgyud): ba'i 'od zer phyung ste sems can gyi khams thams cad kun nas snang bar bya bar byas nas sngar nyi du 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po kun tu snang bar byas nas 'khod par gyur to// de
142b7(rgyud): nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes dag pa'i sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig la rjesu 'jug pa las
142b8(rgyud): bya ba'i dkyil 'char gyi le'u rab 'byam kyi spyong ba sgrub pa sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du gyur pa khyed kyis tshogs shing du son rnams yang dag par rje su zhugs nas 'jid ce
143a1(rgyud): dang 'jig rjen las 'das pa'i rig sngags dang bsang sngags kyi dngos grub yang ngas par thob pa dang ldan pa khyod spros shig spros shig/ gsang ba'i bdag po gnod sbyin dbang pos
143a2(rgyud): de skad smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud gsungs pa/ rig sngags thams cad yang dag par
143a3(rgyud): bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par byed cing lag pa g.yas pa btig nas sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la ston par byed cing / sor mo'i rtse mo der rin pa'i
143a4(rgyud): rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nges par phyung ste/ phyung nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de snang ba chen pos kun tu snang bar byas nas gnas
143a5(rgyud): par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol ma sa non pa'i snying po las zad pa dpa' bo gcig pa
143a6(rgyud): spyan drangs pa dang / gshegasu gsol ba dang / zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can dang / mngon spyod can dang / mi snang ba dang / na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / rkang pa rab tu rgyu ba dang / dgug
143a7(rgyud): pa dang / rnam par sdang ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / mar me thams cad rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis rab tu sbyin par byed de/ mdor na ji ltar sbyang ba de bzhin/ de lta de ltar sgrub
143a8(rgyud): par bya ba bzhin pa ni yi ge gsum zhes bya ba brtson 'grus chen pos don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i khro bo rgyal po chen po'o// de gang zhe na/ oM A hA/ 'di ni khro bo chen po de'i snying po/ 
143b1(rgyud): las thams cad pa ste dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / gsang sngags spyod pa thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nges par bstan te bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed
143b2(rgyud): pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas pa bteb nas khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces smra so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
143b3(rgyud): 'das rnams dgengasu gsol/ gang la la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shing mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa
143b4(rgyud): rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig// de skad ces smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po de bskor ras btang bar gyur to// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i
143b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas skad cig tsam gyis gdug sems can gyi sems can rdzu 'phrul chen po de rnams tshar bcad cing bkug nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
143b6(rgyud): chen po dag pa'i sems can la yang dag par bcug ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par byas nas sems can gdug pa rnams kyi spyi bor kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs par
143b7(rgyud): gyur nas gnas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas seMn khyed cag thad
143b8(rgyud): nyon cig/ gang yang nga'i dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed pa de la khro bo'i rgyal pos char gcod par 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dam tshig ni
144a1(rgyud): 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyiro// rig sngags gsang sngags kyi don gyi tshig gsang chen ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis
144a2(rgyud): ting 'dzin nges par bstan pa 'chad par byed do// de legs par nyon la legs par yid la zung shig dang / ngas bsha // na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aH
144a3(rgyud): samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba t+ye/ Ar+tha tA rA ye/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ri dzAka d+ham nin+ya ti/ tA re trat+ta re/ shAn+ta d+ha ma rir+ya
144a4(rgyud): tA a na bI lAM bya d+harma nin+ya te tut+tA re tu re hi mi trA sa ni bi trA sa ni/ o ha ni/ mo hi ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ prad+d+he/ tsan+da pra d+he hi li hi li/ khi li ngi li khe ga rA mi mi kuN+Di mahA kur+t+ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha nA pa ti/ 
144a5(rgyud): tAre hu ru hA ru/ ku ru ku ru/ a \u0f7f/ ya yaM/ tsin+d+ra yA mi/ tsit+taHme ku ru swA hA// grogs po dag 'di ni nga'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'pha gas ma sgrol ma'i rig sngags las thams cad
144a6(rgyud): byebya ma/ srid pa gsum gyi chos nye bar gcod pa/ ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog par byed ma'o// phyag rgya yang 'dir rtsa ba'i sngags shes pa rnam par grags pa de la rab tu sbyar bar 'gyu ro// 
144a7(rgyud): 'dir mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa/ zhi ba thams cad byed pa/ sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas
144a8(rgyud): pa/ rang nyid nga'i grogs po byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir mchog tu gsang ba'i rig sngags kyi ngo bo nye bar gnas pa bsam pa thams cad yong su rjon
144b1(rgyud): bar byed/ gang dang gang dran pa nyid kyis las thams cad mthar byed pa/ 'jigs pa chen po rnams yongasu sbyong bar byed pa ste/ bzlas pas lta mos kyang ci dgos de gang zhe na/ na mo
144b2(rgyud): rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA re swA hA// phyag rgya yang 'dir ut+pa la zhes rnam par grags pa longs spyod thams cad mngon par
144b3(rgyud): 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'dir nye ba'i snying por gyur pa yang mchog tu dpal dang ldan pa'i ngag byed chen po ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA/ oM ku ru ku l+le swA hA/ 
144b4(rgyud): phyag rgya yang 'dir pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes rnam par grags par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed ma'o// 'dir mchog gi snying por gyur pa yang / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ 
144b5(rgyud): oM rI/ 'di ni snying po'i mchog te mdor bsdun bya ba tham sa cad la yon+tan chen po rgyas pa ste/ yon tan mur thugs bar brjod pa ni dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
144b6(rgyud): brgya stong phrag du mas kyang ma nuso// phyag rgya yang 'dir brtson 'grus chen po zhes rnam par grags pa bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dir spyan drang pa'i
144b7(rgyud): rig sngagasu gyur pa yang / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ oM he he b+ha ga ba ti bi shwa ru pi Ni sarba ba la/ b+ha dzi \u0f7f/ pra bo d+hi na A yA ni/ b+ha ga ba ti/ kr-I DA ut+pa la d+hi ni/ ma ma shud+d+ha ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ sa ma ya ma
144b8(rgyud): nu sma ra a pra ti ha ta/ shA sa na hUM/ ma b+hi lam+ba ku ru ku ru phaT swA hA// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma spyan drang pa'i rig sngags te/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thang
145a1(rgyud): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
145a2(rgyud): chen po dang / sha za dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi yang yin no// tsan+dan gyi chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te phyogs bzhi dang / de bzhin du steng dang / 'og dang / 
145a3(rgyud): thad ka thams cad du gtor bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad
145a4(rgyud): kyi gsang sngags 'di yin te/ 'byung po'i tshogs thams cang dang / sems can thams cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyuraro// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM d+hur+ya
145a5(rgyud): d+hu ru/ d+ha ma thA si ni/ ma mA rtsi Sha hUM/ tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA// bdug pa'i rig sngags te/ tsan+dan dang / gur gum dang / ga bur gcig tu byas nas bdug pa dbul bar bya
145a6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad byon pa rnams spos kyi bdug pas yid tshim nas khug par 'gyuraro// 'dir phyag rgyar gyur pa yang
145a7(rgyud): pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes grags pa sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed cing zhi ba ste/ spyan drang pa'i rig sngags la yang phyag rgya pad+ma'i phreng ba bzang po 'di nyid do// sangs rgyas
145a8(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md dang / sems can thams cad byon pa la yang mchod yon dbul bar bya ste/ ga pur dang / tsan+dan dang / gur gum chu dang sbyar nas dzA ti'i me tog dang / 
145b1(rgyud): mA li ka gsar pa dang / 'byar gyi me tog dang / pun nA ka dang / ba ku li dang / rgya spos rnams te 'di dag gang yang rung ba'i me tog gam/ dus ji lta ba'i me tog kam/ dri bzang po'i me
145b2(rgyud): tog rnams dang bsres nas sngags 'dis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ he he ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ bi shA rU pa d+hA ra Ni ar+g+haM pra ti
145b3(rgyud): ts+tsha sa ma ya sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Thade be tA d+hiSh+Tha na/ ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a nu kaM ba ka/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ am+ba ri bi tsA ri Ni/ swA hA// phyag rgya 'dir gang ba zhes
145b4(rgyud): grags te/ sems can thams cad kyis rjesu 'jug cing brtan pa'o// 'dir dri'i rig sngagasu gyur pa yang / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ na maHsa man+te b+han+d+ha a da b+ha tri te shri ye ta thA ga ta ya tad+yaH
145b5(rgyud): gan+d+he gan+d+he d+hA de gan+d+ha ma nor me pra tits+tsha pra tits+tsha / gan+d+haM sa ma nA nu tsA ri Ni swA hA// 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba yang / lo ma zhes bya ba bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par
145b6(rgyud): byed pa'o// 'dir me tog gi sngagasu gyur pa yang / na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA naM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sA nA nAM/ na maHsaM ku su mi ta rAdz+nya s+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku su me ku su me ku su mA
145b7(rgyud): d+ho kra su mA sU ra ShA si/ ku su mA ba ti swA hA// bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyis sngar bshad pa'i 'dug pas bdugs par bya'o// rmang byung bsam mi khyab pa'i sku/ sangs rgyas kun
145b8(rgyud): la phyag byas nas/ yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i// gtor me'i rig sngags rab 'chang byed// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ he
146a1(rgyud): b+ha ga ba ti ma hA satwe sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ki te/ mA bi laM ba i daM pa la gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM hUM sarba ra raT phaT swA hA// lha bshos 'dis dbul bar bya ste/ 
146a2(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor mar 'gyuraro// 'dir yang phyag rgya ni dbyug pa ste/ bdug pa thams cad bzlog par byed pa'o// na maHsarba bud+d+ha be d+hi satwa nAM a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ sarba
146a3(rgyud): ta mau an+ta kA ra bi t+yaM si tA nAM/ na maHsa man+ta dz+yo ti gan+d+ha a ba b+ha sa pri yA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga bAn dz+yo te ra smai sha ta sa ha sra/ pra ti mat+nI ta sha rA ri/ bi kur ba bi kur ba
146a4(rgyud): mahA bo d+hi sarba man+t+ra dz+wa lo t+ye ti mu d+hi/ khur+ya wad+ha/ a ba ma~M ki ya/ a ba lo ki ya/ maN+Da laM sarba satwa nAM sA hA// mar me'i rig/ sngags te/ 'dis mar me dbul bar bya'o// phyag rgya
146a5(rgyud): ni kha bye ba zhes sems can thams cad rnam par snang bar byed pa'o// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa na nAM/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya hUM bi bo d+ha ka tsa
146a6(rgyud): kr-iSh+Na bi ga swA hA/ me'i bya ba byed pa'i rig sngagasu 'gyuraro// 'dir yang phyag rgya ni/ kha sbyor zhes pa'i 'jig rten grags/ sems can kun 'od kyi gsal byed// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang / thub pa
146a7(rgyud): mchog gi sngon gsungs pa'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngag
146a8(rgyud): kyi tshig 'di ni/ gsang chen dang bcas shing mchog tu gsang ba yin te/ bu khyod la phan drag po'i mtha'/ mi bzad ba'i rig su grags// sngags rnams thams cad gang kho na// mkhas pa rnams kyi sgrub
146b1(rgyud): bya'o// spyi bo'i gdu bu zhes grags pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang // de ni nges par gzhig don du// rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa na nA~M/ oM ka ra kar
146b2(rgyud): ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kAr+yaM dzaM b+ha/ dzaM b+ha/ sarba phad ha/ sarba badz+ra bi nA sha ka/ mAr+d+ha DA ka dzI ban+d+ha ta ka rA ma hA bi tri ta rA pi ne pa tsi pa tsaM sarba duSh+TAM ma hA ga na pa ti dzI ban+d+ha ta ka ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ sarba gra hA/ dza Da mu kha Tha
146b3(rgyud): b+hu rbaM Sha Ta tsa ra Na ru tra mA na ya prah+ma tI de pa na na yA mI ba laM ba mA pa laM bai b+hu dza hrI maN+Da la mad+h+ye pra b+he sha ya sa ma nu sma ra hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA// gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba grom
146b4(rgyud): 'grus chen po sgrol ma'i yan lag zhal drug pa zhes bya ba rbarba rgyal po chen po tha~Mng rnam par 'joms pa po ste/ 'di bklags pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa'i dbang phyu
146b5(rgyud): rnams kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na/ ma rungs pa'i 'gegs rnams lta ci smos 'di bklags pa tsam gyis srung ba chen po byas par 'gyuraro// 'dir phyag rgya yang rigs chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur
146b6(rgyud): de bgegs rnams par 'jig par byed pa'o// zla ba'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyi snying po ni/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHbi kr-i tA na na hUM sarba na truM swam+b+ha ya phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'dis dgra thang gzer chen po'i nang dang / yang rim
146b7(rgyud): nyin cig pas zin par 'gyur// rtag tu bzlas pas ji srid snang bar byams pa nyi du mi 'gyur// yang na snying rje'i sems thob par mi 'gyur te/ bzlas pa zin gyi bar du grol bar mi 'gyur zhing 'ching bar
146b8(rgyud): mi 'gyu'o// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa la bya'i// zhi ba'i sems yod pa gzhan la ma yin no// phyag rgya mdung chen po yang sbyar bar bya'o// 'dir nye ba'i snying por gyur pa yang / oM hrIH
147a1(rgyud): kA la rU baM hUM swA hA/ snga ma'i mdung chen yang sbyar bar bya'o// dug pa thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyuraro// mchog gi snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin
147a2(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba ni hUM 'di ni las thams cad byed pa ste/ phyag rgya mdung chen po yang sbyar bar bya'o// phung khrol thams cad bzlog par byed pa 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed pa ste/ 
147a3(rgyud): mdor mkhro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni las thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbu su bzlas pas grub pa'i dus su yang khyad par 'byung bar 'gyuro// gshes su gsol ba'i sngagasu rgya
147a4(rgyud): pa yang na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA na nAM/ tad+ya thA dza ya dza ya/ su dzaM ya/ ma hA ku ru Ni ka bi shwa rU bi ni/ gas+sa ban+d+he swa ba naM/ sarba bud+d+ha sA bi sa mA ya/ sa pa ri bAr+Na/ swa b+ha bA nA tsa nu pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma
147a5(rgyud): nu sma ra/ sar+b+ba r+tha swa me sid+d+hi tu/ bi d+h+ya sa dA/ ma no ra~M thaM tsa me pa'i pU ra ya swA hA/ 'di ni gshegasasu gsol ba'i sngags te la sa thams cang la sbyar bar bya'o// phyag rgya 'azang po'i gdan zhes
147a6(rgyud): grags pa ste/ 'dis gangan yang sbyin par bya'o// yid kyi lan bdun bzlas pas thams cad gsheg su gsolo// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ sngags rnams nyid la
147a7(rgyud): yang sngags kyi dngos grub dang / dam tshig dang / bzlas pa dang / dus dang / nges par sdom pa rnams la yang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos slar yang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu
147a8(rgyud): rnams la kun tu gzigs te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la rang gi rig pa'i tshogs sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam gsungs par gyur to// na maHsarba bud+d+hA naM/ a pra ti ha ta ga tI nAM a~M ni Ti sA hA// 'di ni
147b1(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjesu sbyong ba'i sgra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa las thams cad ba ste dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'i snying po dug gi las thams cad la kun tu skyo'o/ na maHsa man+ta budz+nyA na/ 
147b2(rgyud): a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM ni Ti/ 'di ni nye bar spyod pa'i skra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa las thams cad pa ste/ phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes pa gza'i las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// na maHsa man+ta
147b3(rgyud): bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa na nAM/ oM ni/ rig pa 'di ni sdong bu can zhes bya ba spyod pa'i dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa ste/ phyag rgya ni bzang po'i gdan gyis gnod sbyin mo rnams dgug par bya ba la sbyaro// 
147b4(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+d+ra d+hU ta rU pa ni/ oM b+h+rUM swA hA/ mtha' 'gro ma kun 'joms pa yi// phyag rgya sbubs can yang ba sbyar// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yi// rig sngags thod pa can
147b5(rgyud): zhes bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi pad+ma nyid// rab bsngags lnga yi gzu bas can ma// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta ga ti/ tsA ra nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba ra de swA hA/ phyag rgya ut+pal zhing ni/ dpal
147b6(rgyud): gyi bdag nyid spyan la sbyar/ gzugs mang 'chang ba'i lha mo ni/ myur du longs spyod rab sgrub pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+d+rar+N+Na ta pU ra Ni oM su ri sAhA/ phyag rgya mdung dang yang dag ldan// rims
147b7(rgyud): rnams thams cad rnam 'joms pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+ta d+h+wa dA r+'u pi Na oM tu re swA hA/ bsam pa'i sgrol ma ldan pa zhes// rab sngags las rnams thams cad pa// dbyug pa'i phyag
147b8(rgyud): rgyar yang dag ldan// bgegs rnams 'joms byed ma la sbyar// na maHsaM man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsi t+yad+hA rA pi NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi lo ki ni swA hA/ rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba// 'jig rten thang dbang du byed/ 
148a1(rgyud): bde ba thams cad rang sbyin pa/ bad+ma phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya/ na mangs man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsi t+yad+d+ha tA rU bi NaM/ Shad+ya thA/ oM bi shwe bi shwa sa~M b+ha be tsi shwa rU pi Na ka hwag sa A bi sha A bi shas
