148a2(rgyud): ma ya ma nu s+pha ra ru ru tiSh+Tha swA hA// rig pa brtson 'grus chen mo ni// 'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa ste/ snying po phyag rgya mnyam pa nyid// sems can thams cad 'bebs shing dge/ sna tshogs zhes bya yang
148a3(rgyud): ngag bsgrags// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM tsin+d+rad+b+ha da ru pi Na/ tad+ya thA/ oM shwe te prA ba su swA hA/ pad+ma'i mngar gyis rnam par dgod// las rnams thams cad byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti
148a4(rgyud): ta ga ti pra ti ri Na/ tad+ya thA/ oM hrIHrig pa 'di ni dpal mo che/ 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste// phyag rgya la sbyor ldan pa yi// rgyal sring chen po rab sbyin byed/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sarbas
148a5(rgyud): b+ha ya pra dA yi kA/ tad+ya thA/ a~M swa dzi te ku ma rA rU pi NI/ aM hi A bats+tsha ma ma kar yaM ku ru swA hA/ mi thub ma zhes rnam grags ma/ gzhonu 'dud rtsi las byung ba// gang ba'i phyag rgyar
148a6(rgyud): ldan pa yis/ dgra rnams thams cad bzlog par byed/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a tsin+nad+hA ta rU bi Na~M/ dad+ya thA/ oM dza ye swA hA/ bi dza ye swA hA/ a dzi te swA hA/ sring mo bzhi zhes rnam thags pa/ byang
148a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i rjes 'gro ba// sa rnams mtha' dag yongs rgyu zhing // sems can rjesu 'dzin byed pa// ming po tuM bu ru zhes grags// 'di rnams kyis ni rje su spyod// gru'i bzhon pa mnyam zhon nas
148a8(rgyud): rgya mtsho la ni nges par gnas/ khu tshur phyag rgyas rnam par dgod// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ lo kA kA d+hi pa tI nAM/ tad+ya thA/ a~M ku mA ri ma hA ku ma ri kri Da kri Da/ 
148b1(rgyud): ma hA rak+Sha si bo d+hi satAn+da d+hA dz+wa la yU ra sa ne snang sa sa ra shu sA ni rad+hi b+hI raSh+Tha Shan+t+ra nu le pa na pri ye bri ye/ kha kha khA hi bA hi d+hA nri t+ya raHpra d+hA R+Yati mu rti sa ma nu sma ra b+h+r-i ma d+hA ma/ trA~M ma ya b+h+ra ma ya hu ru
148b2(rgyud): hu lu mAM bi laM/ sarba karma Ni me ku ru ku ru/ bi tsi tra rU pa d+ha ri Ni/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ hUM hU~M sarba bud+d+hA nu dz+nyA te swA hA// sems can rjesu 'dzin byed pa'i// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa na// sa rnams ma lus
148b3(rgyud): kun nas ni// rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// sems can kun la phan don dang // gdug pa'i sems cam bzlog byed pa// bdag gi rig pa rtag tu grag/ rtag tu srung bar yongasu grags// srung ba ltos 'gro
148b4(rgyud): de nyid kyi// 'jig rten mtshan mas legs par mtshan// snying rjes thugs ni brlan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' de nas gsungs byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che khyim pa
148b5(rgyud): rnams la phan don du// gang las sems cad spyod gsungs ba// 'gro ba rnams la rnam spyod ldan// phyag rgya dbyug pa'i srog shing ldan// bdag nyid chen pos sbyar nas ni/ 
148b6(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs 'gugs byed na// mi rnams 'bras bu smos ci dgos// gzho nu'i semasu ma lus pa'i// rtog pa 'di ni bsdus nas su// srin po rnamasu grags pa yi// ring sngags 'di ni yang
148b7(rgyud): ngag bstan// sems can rjes bzung 'dod pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar bshad// yig gsum zhes bya'i snying po 'di// rig sngags 'di ni yang dag bshad// sems can kun la phan
148b8(rgyud): don du// nye bar longs spyod 'gug pa'i mchog phyag rgya dbyug pa'i srog shing ni// rnam bkod las rnams zad pa'o// oM hUM dzaHrig sngags 'di ni mdor bsdus nas// mi rnams 'azas bu/ 
149a1(rgyud): byed pa yin/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sa man+to d+yo ti ta mUr+t+ti nA~M/ a bi kri ta gra ha hUM phaT swA hA// nye ba'i snying po 'di yang ni// phyag rgya ngagra sta yang dag ldan// de bzhin 'byung po 'bru/ 
149a2(rgyud): par byed// de bzhin gza' dang ma mor bcas// thams cad phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa// bkod na 'bras bu bcas par 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni rnam skrag byed// bdug pa zhugs pa rnam par grol// 
149a3(rgyud): 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i pho nya mo chen mo las thams cad pa ral gcig ma zhes bya ba rjesu spyod pa las thams cad pa ste bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thang
149a4(rgyud): byed do// 'byung po thams cad skrag par byed pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad rdzogs par byed do// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ 
149a5(rgyud): a pra ti ha ta shA sa na nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM brah+ma su brah+ma brah+ma/ bar+tha/ se shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po ste// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin// 'byung po zhi ba rab
149a6(rgyud): tu thog skad cig nyid le bsil bar 'gyur// phyag rtse bad+ma yang dag ldan// myur du dge legs thob par 'gyur/ mngon spyod kyi las rnams la/ srid srung gi ni rog byed 'dod/ 'di ni mdor bsdus
149a7(rgyud): brjod pa ste// cho ga 'di ni mdor bsdus pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti he ta shA sa na nA/ tad+ya thA/ oM ka ru Da ba ha na tsakra bI na tsaM tur b+hu dza hUM hUM/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra bo d+hi satwa a drA ba ya ti
149a8(rgyud): swA hA/ byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa// zhi ba'i don ni myur du byed/ 'byung ba rnams ni rnam 'jig byed// khyab 'jug gzugs kyi lus can yin// phyag rgya'i 'khor lor yang dag ldan/ 
149b1(rgyud): brtan pa'i don ni yang dag byed// gang 'di khyab 'jug rlung du ni// cho ga rgyas par bstan pa de// sems can kun gyi sgrub byed de// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ta
149b2(rgyud): ha Sha shA sa na nAM/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA ma he/ shA ra b+hu tA d+hi ba ti br-i dza g+ha d+ha dza pra laM ba dza Ta mu ku Ta d+hA ri NI/ si ta b+hasma d+hu sa ra ta/ mU rdi sa aM phaT phaT bo d+hi satwa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ sems can rnam
149b3(rgyud): la phan 'dod pas// sngags 'di bdag gis rab tu brjod// mdung gi phyag rgya mnyam par ldan// 'byung po thams cad rnams 'jigs pa// 'di yang bstan pa'i tshig 'di// sems can sa stengs
149b4(rgyud): gnas pa la// sngon ni zhi ba'i rgyud du bstan// yon+tan sna tshogs rgya chen pa/ zhi ba'i rgyud kyis kyang brjod do// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa na nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sha ku ni pa taH
149b5(rgyud): bak+Shi Na/ sha ka kha kha khA hi khA hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM tiSh+Tha do d+ha satwa adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ sngags 'di brtson 'grus chen po ste/ na mkha' lding zhes rnam par grags/ gdul dka'
149b6(rgyud): 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog// gdengs ka can gyis gdum rnams 'joms// phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan// phung khrol mi bzang bcas pa 'joms// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dug rnams ni/ gso bar byed
149b7(rgyud): par the tshom med/ gdul bya'i sems can la brtse bas// byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag dka'/ na mkha' lding gi gzugs kyis sbred/ 'dab chags rgyal po 'od chen ldan/ ji srid mamakha' lding rgyu
149b8(rgyud): dur bstan pa'i cho ga rgyas de rnams/ sems can kun la phan pa'i rgyud // bdag gis kyang ni brjod pa yin/ mkha' lding mngon par brjod rgyud du// khro bo'i rgyal po ma bstan na// gdengs can dug ni/ 
150a1(rgyud): gzhom pa'i phyir// 'dab chags gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu/ ji srid 'jig rten pa'i sngags// de rnams cho ga dper brjod pa/ 'dul bya'i sems can ngon du ni// de lta de ltar rnam par
150a2(rgyud): spyod/ gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang // rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang // de rnams cho ga rab 'byam 'dir/ snga ma kho nar gsungs pas yin// ji ltar ma ma rnam mang po// byis pa 'bad pas srung
150a3(rgyud): byed pa// de bzhin byis mtha'i blo can la/ nga ni rig sngags gzugs kyi rgyu// stobs bcu ldan pa'i sngon gsungs pa// nga lta'ang nga yi bstan pa yin// sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa/ rtog pas rab gsung
150a4(rgyud): 'od chen po// rgyal ba mchog gi gang gsungs pa// stobs bcu ldan ba'i sras kyis gsungs// rmang byung bsam mi khyab gzugs can/ spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o// de nas yang
150a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzir dbang phyug thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la kun tu gzin nas dam tshig
150a6(rgyud): thams cad yang dag par bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// gang du ting 'dzin la gnas pas sems can ma lus pa'i sgrub pa'i spyod pa'i yid sems can thang la rab tu gan
150a7(rgyud): par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po gnas rnam par bkra ba'i phyag na rin po che'i snying po rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'jor
150a8(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab cing rma du byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas tha~Md dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sa bcu dang ldan pa/ 
150b1(rgyud): sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang / dkyil 'khor de bri ba 'am 'drir 'jug par mi nus na/ so so'i skye bo'i gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'phags pa'i
150b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bzang po de'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i gnas la gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thaMd dang / 'phags
150b3(rgyud): pa nyan thos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa rgyal tshang du mngon par dbang bskur zhing dam tshig theb pa thams cad dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang / zag
150b4(rgyud): ba dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sems can thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyong ba bsam
150b5(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu 'thun pa dang / tingange 'dzin gyi khyad par gyis thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to// so so'i skye
150b6(rgyud): bo thams cad kyis de yid kyis dmigs par mi nus na/ bri ba 'am 'drir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
150b7(rgyud): phyug gis dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig la rjesu rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can de rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag nyon cig/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems
150b8(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyis kyang 'da' bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig yin na/ sems can rnams dang / 'phags pa gzhan rnams kyang lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos phyag ma
151a1(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba pa'i bdag po la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ mi las 'das pa'i dam tshig yid las byung ba ni nges par bstan to// mi rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa
151a2(rgyud): rnams yongasu mya ngan las 'das na yang dag du sems can rnams yang dag par zhugs nas/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig pa dang / sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par
151a3(rgyud): 'gyur bar bshad par bya'o// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gang da lta
151a4(rgyud): dus la bab par shes na gsungs shig gsungs shig/ shAkya seng+ge 'jig rten mgon// yongasu mya ngan 'das pa na/ mi rnams mchog gi sangs rgyas zhing // sems tsams steng khyod dkyil 'khor/ mthong
151a5(rgyud): bcom gyis 'jig rten na// sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu skye// mi shes cho ga nyams pa 'am// dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na/  sa pa bdag nyid chen pos kyang // rig sbubs dngos
151a6(rgyud): grub mi 'gyuraro// sngags la mngo lnga mi brtson dang // dam tshig bstan pa mi mthong na// rnam pa du mar 'bang byas kyang // rig pa'i dngos grub mi 'gyuraro// dam tshig sbyor ba nyams pa na// brgya byin gyis kyang
151a7(rgyud): rab 'bad las/ rig pa'i dngos grub mi 'gyur na// sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos// dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes// spyod ba'i las rnams sgrub pa de// 'jig rten pa dang 'phags pa'i
151a8(rgyud): sngags// bklags pa tsam gyi 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du// rab zhugs las rnams thams cad byed// byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa la// de yi rig pa'i dngos
151b1(rgyud): grub rtag/ de nas yang gsang papa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ sems dpa' chen po de la gsol ba btab par gyur to// kye kye sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
151b2(rgyud): phyug gis sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor cho ga gsung so// dang po re shig cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam// nag pa can nam/ sa gcan gyi zla ba'i dkar po'i phyogs la rab tu bsngags pa'i nyi ma
151b3(rgyud): gza' bzang po bltas te/ rgyu skar dge ba dang yang dag par ldan pa dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig dang / zla ba nya ba 'am/ dus gzhan la dbyar gyi zla ba spangs te/ snga dros rab tu gnas par bya'o// 
151b4(rgyud): grong khyer chen po la rten pa 'am/ gang du dkyil 'khor gyi slob pa bon rang nyid gnas par te/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'am/ chu klung la ban pa 'am/ rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang nye bar grong khyer chen
151b5(rgyud): bo'i byang shar gyi phyogs kyi char ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song nas/ nyi ma bdun nam/ zla byed du mtha' gcig tu bsrung ba 'am/ nye bar gnas
151b6(rgyud): nas so sor gnas par bya'o// gang gnas de rnamasu yang gtsang ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / thal ba dang / sol ba dang / phub ma dang / thod pa dang / rus pa dang / rus pa gnas pa dang bral ba/ 
151b7(rgyud): shin tu yongasu sbyang ba byas pa'i sa phyogasu/ srog chags med pa'i chu la/ 'byung lnga dang bsres pa'i tsan+dan dang / ga pur dang / gur bum gyi chus khro bo'i rgyal po sbrel mas non pa stong phrag
151b8(rgyud): brgyad kyis mngon par bsngags pa des bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya chen po yang dag par ldan pas/ sa phyogs de la phyogs bzhi rnamasu mngon par gtor zhing steng dang 'og dang thang ka
152a1(rgyud): dang phyogs bral rnamasu yang kun nas gtor bar bya'o// de nas sa phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gam/ bru bcu gnyis sam/ khru brgyad bya ste/ de la chen po ni
152a2(rgyud): khru bcu drug go// bar ma ni khru bcu bzhi so// chung ngu ni khru brgya do// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum po 'di thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa yin// rgyal srid 'dod phyir chen po ste// bar ma long spyod
152a3(rgyud): 'phel bar byed// chung ngu sngags kyi dam tshib ni// las rnams kun byed zhi ba yin// de la yid la 'dod pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// de la sa'i phyogs der bru gnyis tsam
152a4(rgyud): brkos la// der rdo ba dang / sol ba dang / thal ba dang / rus pa dang / sgra la sogs pa dang / srog chags kyi rigs rnams pa sna tshogs pa gal te mthong na sa'i phyogs gzhan du brko bar
152a5(rgyud): bya'os gnod pa med pa dang / nye bar 'tshe ba med pa der 'chu mo ri'i rtse mo dang / rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung chen po'i chu ngas sa rnamasu yang sang rab tu 'bad pa chen pos shin tu so sor
152a6(rgyud): brtags te shin tu gtsang zhing srog chags med par byas nas bri bar byaso// sa'i phyogs der slar yar srog chags med pa'i chu la ba'i rnam lnga bsres pas chu klung gi 'gram gyis gtsang ma 'am/ grog
152a7(rgyud): 'khar gyis gang du srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o// bkang nas kyang legs par brdungs te kun nas mnyam par byas la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum bya'o// 
152a8(rgyud): seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po nyid kyis lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas phyogs bzhi rnamasu gdab par bya'o// tshen sna lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i rgyal pos
152b1(rgyud): lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas kun nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i rnam par dkri bar bya'o// de bzhin du dbus kyi gnasu// nang du yang zur bzhi'i rnam par bya'o// dbus kyi nang na sa m+ba
152b2(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rig pa 'am/ rtsa ba'i snying po stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsug tor bcings te khro bo'i rtsa ba'i
152b3(rgyud): sngags kyis grogs bsrungs nas bdag nyid srung bar byas te/ bzlas pa byed bzhin du phyi rol du byung ste/ dkyil 'khor la ga ya su bskor ba byas nas kha shar du phyogs te ku sha'i khres la
152b4(rgyud): nye bar 'dug na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid la byas te dkyil 'khor de kun nas gru bzhi'i rnam par kri bar bya'o// de nyid kyi phyi rol tu zhag gcig bskur
152b5(rgyud): bar gnas pas rab tu gnas par bya'o// de la 'di ra dkyil 'khor gyis slob dpon gyi sngon spyad pa rnams byas te/ rang gi rig pa dang / sngags dang rgyud la mkhas pa'i mkhan
152b6(rgyud): bos sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir theg pa chen po la lhag par mos pas zhag gcig bsnyung bar gnas pas grogs bzang po dang yang dag par ldan pa/ bstan bcos rnam pa
152b7(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i bya ba mthong bas tshon lnga'i phye ma zhib po 'bar bas legs par sbyang ba byas nas/ rtsa ba'i rig sngags dang snying pos mngon par bsngags pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor dbu su
152b8(rgyud): gdab par bya'o// pha rol tu yang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba dang / rta babs bzhis rgyan pa dang / chu shing gi sdong bu 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g.yur za zhing kun nas 'bras bu'i tshogs
153a1(rgyud): rnams kyis rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / dung gi sgra nges par sgrogs pa'i sa'i phyogasu bsgrags par bya'o// ngos bzhir rjesu 'thun pa'i bar du bsngags pa'i
153a2(rgyud): sgra chos mnyan par bya'o// phyogs bzhi rnamasu theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i glegs bam bklag par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho phyogasu bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa zla ba sgro
153a3(rgyud): ma'i ting 'dzin nub phyogasu'o// 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa byang phyog su'o// 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa shar phyog su'o// de ltar glegs bam klog pa po med na mdo sde bzhi po klog par rtogs
153a4(rgyud): pa'i gang zag chos smra ba po la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dben langs nas tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / gur gum rnam par 'asres
153a5(rgyud): ba'i me tog dkar po dro zhim pa la rtsa ba'i rig pa 'das te/ dkyil 'khor de thams cad du gcal du dgram par bya'o/ mngon par bkram nas phyi rol du byung ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar
153a6(rgyud): du 'dod pa'i kha zas bsten pa gnyis sam/ gsum/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong nye bar gnas pa bsten pa la gnas pa'i ri mo mkhas pa de grogs sam/ slob ma des khas blangs
153a7(rgyud): pa rab tu gzhug par bya'o// gang rtsa ba'i rig pa nyid kyis gtsug tor bcings pa byas nas/ de nas gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i go 'phangs rnam par bkra zhing / 'bar la mdzes
153a8(rgyud): pa'i zangs kyi phye ma zhib mo so sor bzung nas longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing / chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chen po rnams 'dir gzhugs par bya'o// dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid las
153b1(rgyud): nges par byang chub la gzhol ba yin na/ sngags sgrub par byed pa lta ci smos// shAkya skyes mchob mya ngan 'das// sems can bsod nams chung rnams la// 'di lta'i long spyod ga la yod// chos
153b2(rgyud): 'di ni bstan par bya// byang chub sems dpa' 'ong chen ldan// skye bo bkren pa gzigs nas ni// nyung zhing mdor bsdus dkyil 'khor ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin// 'bras sa lu dang thug
153b3(rgyud): po che'i phye ma shin tu zhib mo tshon sna lnga pa 'bar bas/ dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / nag po dang / ljang khu'i kha dog tu kha bsgyur la/ sngar bzhag pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon
153b4(rgyud): gyis blangs nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te rtsa ba'i rig pas phye ma la phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o// gzhan zhi ba sgrub pa'i slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol
153b5(rgyud): lho shar gyi phyogs las kyi cho ga mthong bas me thab bya'o// khru gnyis kyi tshad la dpangs khru gang tsam kho ra khor yug tu pad+ma'i ze ba'i rnam par shing pa la sha'i yaM shing
153b6(rgyud): rnams kyi me rab tu sbar te/ shing dpal 'bras kyi yaM shI mtho gang tsam gyi tshad la rlan dang bcas pa/ zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa rnams kyi rtsa ba'i snying pos sam/ phyag rgya
153b7(rgyud): dang / rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis me lha spyan drang bar bya'o// spyan drangs nas kyang sngar brjod pa'i yi ge gcig pa nyid kyis rig pa 'am/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'i snying pos slar yang brgya rtsa brgyad
153b8(rgyud): sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi sa gtsug tor gtsang zhing yo byad tshogs par byas nas bdag nyid dang ri mo mkhan ches mkhas pa 'am slob ma byed du gzhu'o// 
154a1(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la byas nas sngar brjod pa'i gdug pa'i rig pas sreg go// thal
154a2(rgyud): mo sbyar ba byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag
154a3(rgyud): byas nas phye ma blangs te/ gzugs kyi rnam par bya zhing / ri mo mkhan mkhas pas rdzogs par bya'o// cho ga 'di dag gis dang po kho nar re shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
154a4(rgyud): shAkya thub pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa rin po che seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ gnas gceng ma'i gnas na chos ston par mjed bzhin pa kun tu bri'o// dkyil 'kho
154a5(rgyud): gyi slob dpon gyis kun tu bris nas rjesu sgrub pa pos bdag nyid srung ba'i cho ga dang / rig pa byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi
154a6(rgyud): phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang steng dang 'og dang gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas nas me thab dang nye bar song nas gos gcing ma bgos te gtsang sbra dang / srung ba'i cho ga byas te rtsa ba'i rig
154a7(rgyud): ba sa gur gum dang / bsres pa'i mar gyi bsreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste de nyid du bzlas pa byed cing de nyid du gnas par bya'o// yungs
154a8(rgyud): kar dkar po la khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par sngags te/ mngon par bsngags nas khaM bor kha sbyor du bzhag par bya'o// bgegs kyi rnam par 'gyur/ 
154b1(rgyud): ba'i gzugs rnams du ma dang // nga ro drag po dang / rlung dang / char dang / yul ngan gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba 'ongs pa mthong na/ khros pas yungs kar gyi sreg srugs lan bdun sbyin bsrab
154b2(rgyud): bya'o// de nas bgags rab tu 'jigs par 'gyuraro// mi'i 'gegs la ni lan lnga chang ba nas sbyin sreg byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba 'am/ nus pa med par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chi bor
154b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba 'am/ skad cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyuraro// de nas rje su sgrub pa pos de nyid du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pas bzlas pa byed cing
154b4(rgyud): gnas par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bcom lnga na 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs g.yas kyi gzhog su rang sangs rgyas gnyis pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa skyil krung
154b5(rgyud): gis nye bar bzhugs par bya'o// de'i 'og tu 'an thos chen po gnyis chos nyan par bya'o// de rnams kyis 'ang g.ya su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgya mthong
154b6(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa ston ka'i sprin gyi mdog ltar dkar ba pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa phyag g.yon pas pad+ma bsnams nas/ g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o// de'i yang ga ya su bcom ldan 'das ma gos
154b7(rgyud): dkar mo phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ ngar la dkar po'i
154b8(rgyud): na bza' bsnams pa/ dar la'i stong g.yogs bla gos bsnams pa/ thal ba nag po'i thig le gsum byas pa'o// de bzhin du brtan pa dang / khro gnyer can ma yang / rang rang gi gdan la rang rang gi
155a1(rgyud): spyod lam du gnas shing nye bar bzhigs pa yang bya'o// de rnams kyi g.yasu bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ma dang / 
155a2(rgyud): gtsug tor rgyal mo yang bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bya ba la/ 'di lta ste/ kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / na mkha'i mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 
155a3(rgyud): ngan song spong dang / byams pa phyag na rnga yab thogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lta bzhin pa dang / dri ma med pa'i blo gros dang / dri ma med pa'i tog dang / nor bzang dang / zla 'od dang / dri ma
155a4(rgyud): med par grags pa dang / nad thams cad gso bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / 'jig rten 'gro ba dang / blo gros chen po dang / mngon par 'dzin pa zhes pa ste/ byang
155a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' bcu drug po 'di rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sku dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri'o// rig pa'i rgya la po'i gtso bo dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo dang / pad+ma'i rigs baphra
155a6(rgyud): dang / phyag rgya rnams lung las ji ltar bshad pa bzhin dang / gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bri'o// mtha'i gan su yang gru bzhi'i rnam par gnas bzhag par bya'o// pad+ma'i me tog legs par byas pa dang / 
155a7(rgyud): rig pa'i lha gang gi dran pa yang gnas de rnamasu bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yas kyi gzhog su rang sangs rgyas na mkha' dang / yongasu zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ngo // 
155a8(rgyud): de bzhin du shar du kha bltas pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo rnams bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi gzhog su rang sangs rgyas tsan+dan dang / grub pa zhes pa gzhan
155b1(rgyud): gnyis kyang kun tu bri'o// de rnams kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po 'od srung chen po dang / ka t+ya na dang gnyis kun tu bri'o// de rnams kyi yang gzhog su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs snang ba rab tu ni ba'i
155b2(rgyud): gzugs rgyar thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas rnga yab thogs pa/ g.yon pas khro bo'i spyi bor gzhag pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje lcag sgrog dang / dpung bzang dang / rdo rje sde rnams cha byad ji lta pa
155b3(rgyud): dang mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du bgegs rnams 'joms pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal po dang / rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / gzugs dang phyag rgya la sogs pa rnams ji ltar dran pa bzhin du bri'o// 
155b4(rgyud): de rnams kyis yang g.yon du gru bzhi'i rnam par rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bri bar bya'o// bris nas kyang gnas gang du rig pa'i tshogs ma dran pa de rnams gnas 'dir bzhugs shig ces brjod
155b5(rgyud): bar bya'o// de rnams kyi steng du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / bcom ldan 'das ma ma mA ki kun tu bri ste rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rab tu zhi ba'i las so// de rnams kyi yang steng du gtsug
155b6(rgyud): tor gyi rgyal po brgyad kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ phyag rgya bcings pa rang rang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugasu kun tu bri ste/ gser mdog dbang po rab tu zhi brgyan thams
155b7(rgyud): cad kyi brgyan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la cung zad blta ba sbyin pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / gtsug tor gdug dkar po
155b8(rgyud): dang rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / pad+ma'i gtsug ter dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid phung po dang / gtsug tor mthon po zhes pa ste/ gtsug tor brgyad po 'di rnams kun tu bri'o// 'jug pa'i
156a1(rgyud): phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bya ste/ g.yas phyos su ni 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes bya ba rab tu zhi ba'i lus ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ phyag g.yas
156a2(rgyud): mchog sbyin pas phreng ba 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin cing sgo la mngon du phyogs pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang bcas pa kun tu bri'o// 'jug pa'i sgo'i g.yon phyogasu ni byang chub sems
156a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba bri bar bya ste/ rab tu zhi ba'i lus ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ phyag g.yon dbyug gu dang / ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yas pas bgrang phreng bzung nas
156a4(rgyud): mchog sbyin pas rab tu sbyin par byed pa bzhin cung zang khro gnyer can 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa kun tu bri'o// sing+ge'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyis 'khor lo kun nas 'bar ba la
156a5(rgyud): phreng bas 'khrugs pa de'i 'og tu rin po che'i gzhal yas khang de la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma rig/ pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ha cang mi skem/ ha cang mi sbom pa'i
156a6(rgyud): lusu gnas pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i sku/ gzugs mdzes shing cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin/ phyag g.yon pas ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas dpal 'bras bsnams pa/ byis pa'i
156a7(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs par byas pa/ dar la'i stong g.yogs bsnabs pa/ dar gyi na bzas smad g.yogs pa/ 
156a8(rgyud): kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ khro bo'i rgyal por gyur pa/ sgrol mas non pa la gzigs par gyur pa/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon
156b1(rgyud): bar phyogs pa/ lta na sdug pa thams cad du srin mo ral gcig pa byas pa'i gzugs 'chang ba kun tu bri'o// de'i g.yas phyogs kyi gzhog su pad+ma'i 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po'i sgrol mas non pa dri
156b2(rgyud): ste/ rnam par 'gyur ba chen po'i gzugs can kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ bka' so sor bzhes bzhin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen por gyur pa la blta ba kun nas bri'o/ 
156b3(rgyud): g.yon gyi gzhog su pad+ma'i 'og tu gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' lnga bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu dul ba dang / dag pa dang / 
156b4(rgyud): mun pa sel byed dang / kun tu snang ba zhes ga de rnams thams cad kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas na 'dug pa/ rin bo me 'bar 'du ma'i rdo'i mthil dang 'dra ba/ kun nas 'a
156b5(rgyud): ba rnam par bkra ba'i me tog rnams kyis gcal du bkram pa/ gzugs mdzes pa kun tu bri'o// phyi rol gyi khor yug du gru bzhir rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa rnam par bkra ba'i
156b6(rgyud): tshon sna lngas gsal ba/ shin tu drang ba'i me dma' bas nang gi dkyil 'khor bya'o// shar gyi phyogasu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo'i dbu su me tog gi rgyal po'i dbang po
156b7(rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shin tu chung tsam du bya ste/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ phyag mchog sbyin pa rab tu sbyin pa/ skra'i gtsug
156b8(rgyud): tor la bzhugs pa'o// de'i g.ya su gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// g.yon du gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan ma'i steng
157a1(rgyud): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i ga ya su bcom ldan
157a2(rgyud): 'das 'od dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bya ste/ phyag mchog sbyin pas rab tu sbyin pa pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'o// de'i yang g.ya su
157a3(rgyud): lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis 'jug pa'i gnasu pad+ma'i phyar rgya bya'o// bcom ldan 'das me tog kun nas rgyas pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon
157a4(rgyud): du gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri ste ku na nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'o// de'i yang g.yon du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi sku rin po che'i ri la nye bar bzhugs pa chos
157a5(rgyud): ston par mdzad bzhin pa bai DUr+ya sngon po dang / mar gang dang / pad+ma rA ga rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'bar ba'i 'od 'byin pa/ kun nas kun tu 'ong gsal ba bri'o// de'i yang g.yon du rgyal
157a6(rgyud): ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'khrugs pa kun tu bri'o// de'i yang g.yon du chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba bri'o// de'i yang g.yon du ril ba spyi blugs dang bgrang phreng dang
157a7(rgyud): bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o// sgo'i gnasu rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis ka nas kun nas 'bar bar bri'o// bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi log tu phyag rgya chen po dbrug pa cam
157a8(rgyud): dang ut+pa la'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'di dag phan tshun ma 'byar bar kun tu bri'o// dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa kun tu bris pa'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de yang tshon sna lngas 'bar ba rnam par ba
157b1(rgyud): zhing lta na sdug pa/ zur bzhis rnam par mdzes pa/ rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs bzhi ro// nang gi dkyil 'khor las khru gnyis tsam gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogasu tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste/ gdong bzhi pa/ 
157b2(rgyud): gos dkar po bgos pa/ stod g.yogs gos dkar po can/ mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po can/ gser gyi mdog ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ g.yon na dbyug pa dang spyi blags thogs pa/ phyag na rdo rje'o// de'i
157b3(rgyud): yang g.yasu 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ lus dar la'i gos bgos pa/ da la'i sted g.yogs can bzhin rab tu zhi ga/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ skyil krung gis
157b4(rgyud): nye bar 'dug pa/ phyag g.yas mchodag sbyin pa'o// de'i yang g.ya su 'og min pa'i lha'i bu bya ste rgyan thams cad kyis rnam bar brgyan pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i lus/ sems bsam gtan gnas
157b5(rgyud): pa dang la'i gos bgos pa/ nga la'i steng g.yeHcan/ skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po cano// de'i rims pas dga'
157b6(rgyud): ldan dang / 'phral dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'thab bral dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams bri bar bya ste/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs ji lta ba
157b7(rgyud): bzhin// brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris te/ ba myos dang / phreng thogs dang / lag na bzheng thogs dang / pi wang gnyis pa dang / sa zla ba'i lha'i bu rnams te rims ji lta ba dang / 
157b8(rgyud): cha byang ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogasu mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong / gya nom snang dang / dge chung dang / bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams cha byang dang
158a1(rgyud): dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs dang / de bzhin du yang byang gi phyog su yang // nub kyi phyog su de rnams kyi 'og tu phreng gnyis la brten nas bri bar bya'o// 
158a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur te/ phyogs bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi ge rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o// byang phyog su 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos nor spyir gter dang nye bar
158a3(rgyud): gnas brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ cod pan cung zad 'acom pa/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs cano// de'i g.yas nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dag bri'o// de bzhin du rim gyis gnod
158a4(rgyud): sbyin ma chen mo 'phrog ma bri ste/ gzhonu dga' byed pa ngan 'dug pa/ dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog bzhin pa bri'o// lngas rtsen dmar ser 'jig su rung ba'ang bri ste/ de rnams kyi nye log su gnod sbyin
158a5(rgyud): rnams kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du rim gyis nub kyi phyeg su lha lag na zhags pa thogs pa dang / klu dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / 'jog pa dang / nar rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal
158a6(rgyud): po chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du phreng gnyis pa la brten nas go rims bzhin du gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / drang srong dang / grub pa dang / yi dgas
158a7(rgyud): dang / sha za dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / sman dang / nor bu rin po che'i bye brag dang / ri bo dang / chu bo dang / gling rnams go rims bzhin du gtso bor grags pa dang / mchog
158a8(rgyud): tu gtso bo thams cad kyang bri bar bya'o// lho phyog su gshin rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// nga gyi phyog su me lha kun 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi brug dang / 
158b1(rgyud): bgrang phreng lag na thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod par 'chang ba/ ges dkar po bgos pa/ dar la'i snod g.yogs can/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ gser gyi mdog thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa/ 
158b2(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i rgyan pa dang / mtshon cha dang / chu byad dang / dbyibs dang / kha dog de yang phreng gnyis pa la brten nas bri bor bya'o// thams cad nas 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dka' bzlog gi
158b3(rgyud): bdag po khyu mcheg la zhen pa/ lag pa g.yas rtse gsum thogs po/ lha mo dka' bzlog ma yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// smin drug gi bu'ang rma bya la zhon pa/ lag na mdung thung thoT
158b4(rgyud): pa gzho nu'i gzugs can/ gdong drug pa lus dam ra bor snang ba gos ser po bgos shing stod g.yogs gis ser po can/ phyag g.yon pas dril bu thogs nas ba dan dmar po thogs
158b5(rgyud): pa'o// go rims bzhin du b+h+re gi ri ti shin tu ris pa'i rnam pa dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po dang / ma mo bdun po rgyan dang / cha byad dang
158b6(rgyud): dbyibs ji lta bzhin du mngon par bri'o// nor lha brgyad dang / drang srong bdun dang / khyab 'jug phyag bzhi pa/ phyag na 'khor lo dang / be con dang / dung dang / ral gri thogs pa/ na mkha' lding gi gzhan pa/ 
158b7(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// gza' brgyad dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / gang sa steng gi dkyil 'khor lo rab tu rgyu ba'i nye ba'i gza' brgyad kyang bri'o// ge rims bzhin du/ dkar po dang / 
158b8(rgyud): nag po'i tshes bco lnga dang / khyim bcu gnyis dang / dus drug dang / zla ba bcu gnyis/ lo tshigs dang / sring mo bzhi gru la zhon dang / lnga pi mang po chu la gnas pa rnams te/ mdor na/ phyag rgya rnams
159a1(rgyud): su rnam par gzhag par bya'o// lha rnams go rims bzhin du phreng gnyi su bya'o// mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum par yang / dkyil 'khor gsum la brten nas mngon
159a2(rgyud): par bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gsum po rnam su'ang gru bzhir rnam par bzhug par bya'o// 'di rnams bcom ldan 'ad so// mdor bsdus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'
159a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi gtse ba ni nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni ga ya su nges par bri bar bya'o// rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje
159a4(rgyud): ni g.yon du nges par bri bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun tu bzang po yang nges par bri bar bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nges par bri
159a5(rgyud): bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams ji ltar rnam par bzha ga pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnamasu nges par bri bar bya'o// 'di dag ni nang gi dkyil 'khor// dkyil ba la yang / shar gyi phyog su
159a6(rgyud): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho'i phyog su 'od gsal ba'o// 'og min dang gzugs can min pa rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'o// 'du shes
159a7(rgyud): med 'du med min gyi skye mched mi gsal ba'i lha rnams ni ma yin no// byang gi phyogasu brgya byin lha'i rgyal po dang / rab 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
159a8(rgyud): 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'od chung la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha'i rgyal po re re nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnam/ 
159b1(rgyud): su mngon par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gsum par yang byang gi phyog su 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan dka' thug zlog pa dang bcas pa nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// sgo gnyis
159b2(rgyud): pa'i nye log su gzhonu smin drug gi bu rma bya'i gdan la/ lag na mdung thung thogs pa/ lus dmar por snang ba/ gos ser po'i stong g.yogs bgos pa/ phyag g.yas na dril bu dang ba ngan dmar
159b3(rgyud): po thegs pa/ gzho nu'i gzugs can dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog bzhin pa'o// shar gyi phyog su na mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi gzugs can dang / drang srong mA rka N+Da nges par mngon par bri bar
159b4(rgyud): bya'o// lhag ma rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnamasu yang // lho shar du gzho nu bzhi dang / gzhonu ming mo dang lhan cig pa gru'i gzhen pa la kur dru gnas pa chu gter chem
159b5(rgyud): po la yongasu rgyu bar byed pa/ me lha'i rgyal po ya nga nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho'i phyogasu lar ka'i grong gi srin po bdag po shin tu 'jig su rung ba ste der
159b6(rgyud): shing pi tsu marta la brten nas gnas pa dang / rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma phyag rgya rnam
159b7(rgyud): su yang rnam par bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogasu klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo nges par bri bar bya ste/ gza'i gtso bo nyi ma yang // nub kyi phyog su thub pa ser skya
159b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba drang srong mchog dang / mu stegs can gcer bu pa'i khyu mchog/ gcer bu'i gzugs su go rims bzhin du phyag rgya rnamasu rnam par bzhag par bya'o// byang nub kyi phyogasu gnod sbyin
160a1(rgyud): gyi rgyal po nor sbyin dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ste 'di rnams nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma dbyibs ji ltar kun tu gnas
160a2(rgyud): ba bzhin du go rims bzhin phyag rgya rnamasu yang mngon par bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa mngon par bri'o zhes pa phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor bzhi par ri mo lngas spras pa phyag rgya'i phreng bas mdzes
160a3(rgyud): bar byas pa gru bzhi dang rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis rnam par rgyan pa/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa 'di lta ste/ 'jug pa'i sgor phyag rgyar gyur pa ni ut+pal
160a4(rgyud): sngon por bri'o// g.yas dang g.yon du ni pad+ma dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / dung dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / be tshon dang / 'khor lo dang / srista ka dang / bum pa dang / nya dang / dung dang / 
160a5(rgyud): gdub skor dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan dang / zhags pa dang / dril bu dang / gri dang / tho ba dang / gzhu dang / lcags mda' ste 'di rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchon
160a6(rgyud): cha'i mchog gi phyag rgyas khor yug du grwa bzhir phreng bas khyab par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir phyag rgya chen po bzhi bzhag par bya ste/ byang phyogasu dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i rnam pa
160a7(rgyud): can byas nas rdo rje gnyis ka nas rtse mo gsum pa'i rnam pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// shAr phyog su dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'i rnam pa can kun nas 'bar ba can bzhag par bya'o// lho'i phyon/ 
160a8(rgyud): su dkyil 'khor gzhu'i rnam pa can byas nas lhung bzed kun nas 'bar ba can bzhag par bya'o// nub kyi phyog su dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i rnam pa can byas nas ut+pa kha sngon po rang gi sdong bu dang / 
160b1(rgyud): 'dab ma dang ldan pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// phyogs bral rnamasu phyag bzhir 'gyu ro// nub byang gi phyogasu dkyil 'khor zlum po'i rnam pa byas nas zhags pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// lho nub kyi phyogasu
160b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ring po'i rnam pa byas nas dbyug pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// lho shar gyi phyogasu dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'i rnam pa can byas nas dgra sta kun nas 'bar ba'o// byang shar gyi phyogasu
160b3(rgyud): ral gri kun nas 'bar ba bzhag par bya'o// thams cad nas mngon par bris nas steng dang 'og dang thang kar phyag rgya gsum phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang nye bar phye ma nyid kyi bri bar bya ba la 'di
160b4(rgyud): lta ste/ gos dang / bsil yab dang / lham kun nas 'bar ba de rnams mdor bar bri bar bya'o// zhes so// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pas/ sems can phan don 'dod pa yi// 
160b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di rnams kyis// mdor bsdu sa 'dir ni bstan pa yin// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi dang po nyid du slob ma bzung bar bya ste/ dbang po ma rang
160b6(rgyud): med pa dang / yan lag thams cad mdzes pa'i bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs byang chub tu sems bskyed pa theg pa chen po'i theg pa pa/ theg pa gzhan mi
160b7(rgyud): 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can gyi sems dpa' chen po dang cing dge ba'i chos can dang / rgyal srid chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang / longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang / longs spyod chen po
160b8(rgyud): mngon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / bzang zhing dul la tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma sdom pa la gnas pa/ gso
161a1(rgyud): skyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po la zhe mi sdang ba dang / phyogs chen po dang / rigs dang ldan pa dang / rang bzhin gyis chos spyod
161a2(rgyud): ba nyin dang mtshan du bsnyung bar gnas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ skra dri zhim pa dang / khrus gsum byas pa/ mi smra bar gyur pa/ de'i nyin mo ga bur dang / gur kum dang / ma la ya'i tsin+dan dri zhim
161a3(rgyud): pos dri zhim par byas pa/ rtag tu nye reg byas pa dang ldan pa/ ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ srung ba'i cho ga byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / bden pa dang ldan pa dang / rgyal bar dgongs pa
161a4(rgyud): phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du ha cang yang mi nye ha cang mi ring bar bzhag par bya'o// gtsang zhing gtsang sbra byas pa ji srid cig nas brgyang la sogs pa'i bar rnams te/ gzhan
161a5(rgyud): rnams ni ma yin no// de rnams kyang phan tshun kun tu chags pa/ rgyal rigs spyi bar mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dang / de rnams kyi bu gzhe nu ma rnams grong pa'i ches ma
161a6(rgyud): shes pa ste bcom ldan 'das gzho nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal byis pa'i skye bo rab tu sad par byed pa/ gzho nu'i skye bo dga' bar byed paso// de nas ches theb mar
161a7(rgyud): de lta bu'i phreng ba'i chos mi shes pa rab tu gzhug par bya/ rgyal po chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang / tshe dang nang med pa dang / dbang phyug dang longs spyod chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang / khyad par du yang
161a8(rgyud): tshul khrims dang ldan pas rig pa'i dngos grub nges par gnas pa'i phyiro// de ltar sngar bzhag pa byas nas grogs bzang po dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis ga bur gyi bdug pa bsregs te/ rgyag
161b1(rgyud): kyi phyogs pa yin par phyi rol tu 'byung bar bya ste/ byung nas kyang ji ltar bde ba'i chu shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa/ srog chags med pa/ rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgya mngon par bzlas pa phyag rgya chen pos
161b2(rgyud): rgyas btab pa'i chus khrus byas nas/ nye reg byas te gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang mas me thab du song nas/ ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste byang shar du mngon par phyogs pas ga pur
161b3(rgyud): dang gur gum tsan+dan dang bsres pa'i mar gyi bsregs blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o// sngar brjod pa'i cho gas spyan drangs pa dang / gsheg su gsolo// slar yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par
161b4(rgyud): bya'o// zhugs nas bum pa gang pa brgyad gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa shing sa ha ka'i yal mngab dang 'bras bus rnam par brlan pa gser dang dngul dang rin po che dang / 'bru nang du bcug pa/ de lta bu
161b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la so ser dbul bar bya'o// gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la'o// gsum pa ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la'o// bzhi
161b6(rgyud): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'o// lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la'o// drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o// bdun pa dang brgyad pa ni
161b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khang du bzhag par bya ste/ gcig pa ni sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du gyur par yongasu bsngos nas bzhag par bya'o// de nas sngar brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis
161b8(rgyud): bdug pa bsreg cing ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas slar yang slar yang spyan drang bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang
162a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang sngar brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis spyan drangs par bya'o// de bzhin du me dog
162a2(rgyud): dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / mar me dang / lha bshos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis lha bshos thams cad kyis thams cad du go rims bzhin du bya'o// mar me smos pa nyid kyis mar gyi
162a3(rgyud): mar me dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa thams cad la lba ba shos smos pas/ sa lu'i zan zho dang / snang rtsi dang ldan pa/ 'o thug khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyar
162a4(rgyud): ba'i mar la btsos pa'i snum khur gyi mya ngan me da pa 'khyil pa dang / khaN+Da la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin gshe gas pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o// phyi rol gang ba dang / tsan+dan
162a5(rgyud): gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma/ 'o thugs bcos pa'i bza' ba rnams rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / la4\u0f7fpa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / 'pha
162a6(rgyud): pa'i lha rnams la me tog dri zhim po rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o// la du can dang / gar+b+ba d+hA khyad par dang / sngar gyi yo byad rnams lha thams cad dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sems can tham
162a7(rgyud): cad la dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du sna ma dang / rgya spos kyi me tog dang / pun+d+ha ga la sogs pa rnams sngar nges par bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan
162a8(rgyud): thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o// khyad par du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
162b1(rgyud): la snga ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i rigs la pad+ma dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje'i rigs la ut+pa la dang / gzhan rnams la tha mal pa'i sngags kyi so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la
162b2(rgyud): ga pur gyi bdug pa'o// pad+ma'i rigs la tsan+da no// de bzhin du gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje can nyid kyi gu gul du shes par bya'o// sngags gzhan thams cad la bdug pa tha mal pa dbul bar
162b3(rgyud): bya'o// 'phags pa rnams ni thams cad la/ mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o// 'phags min pa'i sngags rnams la// dri zhim til dmar dbul du bzhug/ cho ga'i go rim bzhin du ni// bdug pa
162b4(rgyud): mthong ba'i rgyu yi so// de bzhin kho nar brjod pa'i dri/ sngags rnams kun la rtag par de'i// de bzhin gshegs la gang brjod dang // phyag na rdo rje gang brjod pa// rang rang gi ni rgyud rnams/ 
162b5(rgyud): sngags brjed don du sgrub pa pos// 'dir ni cho ga lta bar bya// kun nas rje su 'jug pa'o// zhes pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sngar cho ga mthong bas spyan drang / mchod pa
162b6(rgyud): dang / bdug pa la sogs pa dang / lha ba shes rab tu dbul ba rjesu 'jug pa'i bya ba byas nas/ de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog mkhas shing skyes pas/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma
162b7(rgyud): med pa thams cad dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / dung gi sgra'i sgra dbyangs nges par sgrogs pas// bdug pa dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / phreng bas rnam par spras pa phyogs bzhi rnams dang / phyogs bral
162b8(rgyud): rnams dang steng dang 'og dang zang ka thams cad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor la bskor ba byas nas 'byung ba thams cad pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas nas slar yang zho dang / 
163a1(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa'i 'bras sa lu dang / thug po che'i sbyin sreg rtsa ba'i rig pa 'am snying pos stong phrag brgyad bya'o// sbyin sreg byas nas kyang sngar bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor
163a2(rgyud): la rje su zhugs pa'i sems dpa' chen po la srung ba'i cho ga rnams byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi slob ma nyid khas blangs pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang / 
163a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid kyi lus dngos grub kyi don du phul ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar longs spyod pa thun mongs par gyur pa bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gnon par byed pa/ 
163a4(rgyud): dge ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa rnams la dkyil 'khor bstan pa nyid las sdig pa thams cad las tshol bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa'i skye
163a5(rgyud): rnams kyang skad cig de la grol bar 'gyuro// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gos ma nyams pa zag pas btags ma thag pa/ swa dang bral ba rtsa ba'i rig pas lan bdun mngon par
163a6(rgyud): bsgrims pa/ dri zhim po'i tsan+dan dang / gur gum gyis bgos pa'i dar gyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyi gdong g.yogs nas thog ma nas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub pa pos rab tu 'jug
163a7(rgyud): bar bya'o// rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'am/ rgyal rigs kyi bu 'am/ gzhan yang spro ba chen po rgyal srid chen po 'dod pa yang rab tu gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis par gnas pa gdo
163a8(rgyud): g.yogs nas dri bzang po'i me tog can+dan dang gur gum dag gis rnam par bsres pa byin te/ shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa'i lag pa dag gis me tog mthor du bzhug par bya'o// gang du de'i me tog babs/ 
163b1(rgyud): ba de la de'i rig pa'i sngags sbyin par bya'o// skye ba gzhan rnamasu de nyid dang 'di rje su 'brel pa'o zhes kun tu grags pa yin zhing / de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang byang chub kyi snying po gnon par
163b2(rgyud): byed pa dang / byang chub chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o// de nyid 'di'i bsgrub par bya ba dang / longs spyod chen po dang / rgyal srid chen
163b3(rgyud): po dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag dang 'grogs pa 'di'i mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o// skye ba 'di nyid du sgrub pa gang dang ldan pa lhag par spyod pa las/ las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyu'o/ 
163b4(rgyud): bzhin du rim gyis de lta bu la sogs pa ji srid brgyad po rnams de srid de gzhan rnams ni ma yin no zhes// sgrub par 'dod pa gzhan yang ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sdig pa zang pa'i don du dam tshig tsam
163b5(rgyud): du 'gyur zhes pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin na dang po re shig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ha cang mi ring / ha cang mi nye ba'i byang shar gyi phyogs kyi
163b6(rgyud): cha'i sa phyogs rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs shing sngags kyis dag par byas nas de nas rgyal po mngon par dbang bskur ba de bzhin du sems bzhin pas mtha' gcig tu sangs rgyas dang / 
163b7(rgyud): chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dang ba'i dad pa dang / spro ba chen po dang ldan pa byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ dkon mchog gsum la bsnyen bkur byed pa/ dbang po
163b8(rgyud): ma tshang ba med cing ma smang ba/ skye ba 'di nyid la rigs pa dang / sngags sgrub par 'dod pa/ bsam pa bzang zhing / sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ dge mtshan 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can/ 
164a1(rgyud): sang pa'i rgyur yang rig pa'i ngor la rnam rdob med cing der bdang pa'i yid can de lta bu la sogs pa lnga ji srid par mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams spang bar bya'o zhes
164a2(rgyud): so/ shes rab can dang spyod pa la ma rmongs pa'i khyad par las te/ gzhan rnams bsten par bya ba ma yin no// de nas rgyal po thams cad dbang bskur bzhin du yo byad thad ba sogs te/ slob dpon dang
164a3(rgyud): mkhan po mnyes par bya'o// de nas bla re bres te rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang gdug dkar po mgo bor 'dzin bzhin pa dang / rnga yab dkar po g.yo ba bzhin pa dang / bkur sti chen po sa dung dang / rnga bo che dang / 
164a4(rgyud): rnga rnga'i dga' ba'i sgra nges par sgrogs pa dang / rgyal ba'i sgra dang / bkra shis kyi tshogasu bcad pas mngon par bsngags pa dang / bde legs kyi tshig su bcad pa rgyal bas gsungs pa rnams
164a5(rgyud): kyis mngon par bstod bzhin pas bskor ba dang / bkra shis de byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// slob
164a6(rgyud): dpon sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod pa mngon par sgrub pa la yang dag par rjesu 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten pa thams cad las 'das pa'i gsang cheran rnam
164a7(rgyud): par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang dag par rje su 'jug pa dang / chos kyi rgyal srid thams cad kyi sangs rgyas nyid mngon par rtog par 'dod pa dang / mdor bsdus nas brjod na sangs rgyas nyid
164a8(rgyud): 'byung ba'i phyir bdag nyid spro bar bgyi'o zhes so// de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste shar du mngon par phyogs pas dkyil 'khor mthong zhing rtogs pa la dang po re shig rig pa'i mngon
164b1(rgyud): bar dbang bkur babyim nas/ phyag rgya chen po rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa dang / sngags dag gang gnas pa/ gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi ha~M gis bri bar bya'o// bris nas tsan+dan dang gur gum dag gis las
164b2(rgyud): pa dag dang kham phor kha sbyar bkrus nas de nas gro ga'i 'dab ma kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
164b3(rgyud): phyag gi zhabs kyi drung du bzhag par bya'o// de nas der nye bar 'dug ste rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad snga ma nyid du brjod par bya'o// de nas der ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pa mngon par dbang bskur
164b4(rgyud): bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang ba sgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs nas slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas shing spyi bor mdor bar
164b5(rgyud): dbang bskur bya'o// slob ma ji ltar 'dod pa'i chus spyi bo nas mdo na bar dbang bskur bar bya'o zheso// de nas de la kham por kha sbyor de de'i chedu sbyin par bya'o// mar me la klog tu gzhug
164b6(rgyud): par bya'o// gal te des bcom ldan 'das rig pa 'am sngags bzung ba nyid yin par gyur na bslab pa nyid las kyang las kyang las byedado// rnam par gzhan du na rim gyis 'bad pas bsgrubs pas
164b7(rgyud): byed par 'gyuraro// gzhan rnams ni sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par byeda'o// de nas sngags yongasu bzung bar 'gyuraro// dang po bsgrub pa kho nas 'grub par bye'o// zhes pa rnam par rtog pa med pa pas so// 
164b8(rgyud): de kho na sngar bris pa slob dpon gyi sgrub pa gsum gyis nges par 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'bad pa med par ro// de bzhin du thog mar rig pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis
165a1(rgyud): par mngon par dbang bskur ba ni/ dkyil 'khor gnyis par dkyil 'khor thams cad lnga dang / lha thams cad la gang rab tu bstabs pa'i bum pa gang ba des snga ma'i cho ga gang
165a2(rgyud): yin pa ji lta ba de nyid kyis spyi bor mngor par dbang bskur bar byas na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rje su gnang bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten las 'das pa tha~Md kyi dam
165a3(rgyud): tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya sgrub pa la yang lhag par 'dod par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis slob dpon du mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin no// dkyil 'khor gsum
165a4(rgyud): par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phul ba'i bum pa gang pa cho ga de nyid kyis spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// khyod la sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang
165a5(rgyud): ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i sngags rnams dang / dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang / nye bar ston pa dang / rgyud dang rgyud kyi phyag rgya
165a6(rgyud): dang spyad pa nges par ston pa dang / rang gi che ga nges par ston par rje su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// skye ba 'di nyid dam gang phyi ma gzhan dang gzhan rnamasu sangs rgyas nyid nges par thob po// de bzhin du
165a7(rgyud): rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang sngar nges par bstan pa'i tsho gas bcom ldan 'das la sngar phul ba'i bum pa gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba'i bum
165a8(rgyud): pa gang bas de bzhin po nar mngon par dbang bsku po/ de bzhin du yang khyod la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi 'bru
165b1(rgyud): po thams cad kyi mi tshugs pa dang / lus can thams cad kyis mi thub cing rnam par rgyal ba dang / khyod sngags thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bsgrub shig ces rje su gan zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas
165b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sems can lnga po nyid re re la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o// de nas de dag rim gyis dkyil 'khor du bcug nas sangs rgyas dang byang
165b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul te/ dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gsheg su gsol bar bya'o// de nas nyi ma gzhan la rim gyis rig pa dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa rnams
165b4(rgyud): la bslab par bya zhing rnam par sbyar bar bya'o// skad cig de nyid la song nas sngar brten par phul ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po la sngar phul ba'i chu bum pa gang bablangs nas/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs
165b5(rgyud): pang rnams la chu khyor ba gsum shar du mngon pa phyogs par byas nas 'thung du gzhug par bya'o// 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ kye byang chub sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig sa
165b6(rgyud): gis 'bar byed pa bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor gang du 'am/ der yang rigs dman pa gang gis dkyil 'khor du 'ongs pa de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor gyis slob dben
165b7(rgyud): gyis snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas grogs byed pa'i lag par gos dkar po gtsang ma mgo bar bcings pa gzhan gyis sam gos kun tu g.yogs te gnas pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings
165b8(rgyud): nas rigs dman pa rnams kyis me tog gtang bar bya'o// de nas grags byed pa de rnams kyis kyang / rab tu zhums pa'i sems can thams cad kyis khrus bya'o//  rnams kyis yang dam tshin tsam
166a1(rgyud): de 'byung bar 'gyuraro// sgrub par yang grub par 'gyuraro// de sngar byas pa'i me'i bya ba'i gnasu song nas rtse mo ma nyams pa'i ku sha rnams kyiso// der yang me thab rnam pa gsum du
166a2(rgyud): brjod do// zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod do// zhi ba'i don du pad+ma'i rnam pa'o// yang na tshim par byed pas dbang du byed pa yang // mngon spyod la zur gsum mo// de la me'i bya ba'i cho ga thams cad
166a3(rgyud): la ku sha dgram par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas/ shar gyi rtse mor me'i bya ba bzhag par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nas me'i bya ba mdzad
166a4(rgyud): pa rnams la phyag byas nas lho'i rtse mer ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas byang gi rtse mor sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin du yang bya ba rnams grogs byed pas
166a5(rgyud): gnas pa'i ngang tshul can gyis me'i bya ba ku sha rnams kyis// thog mar rtse ba'i rigs paso// thog mar zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la btags pa'i 'bras yos kyi sbyin sreg nyi shu
166a6(rgyud): rtsa gcig sbyin par bya'o// zhi ba'i don du snying pos mar gyiso// rgyas pa'i don du shing a pa man gsum gyi sbyin sreg go// mngon spyod la ka Ta ke yis so// me'i bya ba'i cho ga 'di yang thang du thun
166a7(rgyud): mong ba'i sgrub pa rnams la yang // dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nye bar spyod pa rnamasu ya // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi gnas gcing mas gtso bo'i lha nyid bstan nas/ me'i tshe da/ 
166a8(rgyud): bya ba byas te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu zhugs pa rnams la/ de nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas mchod yon no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / 
166b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha'i khyad par rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyang gsan du gsol/ gang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor
166b2(rgyud): 'dir cho ga las 'das par yang rung ste/ gus par byed pa dang / gzhan yang gang cung zad bdag nyid nyams par bya ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu gnas pa dang / 
166b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul dang ma bral bar thob par gyur cig/ myur du bde ba dang ldan pa thob par gyur cig de
166b4(rgyud): skad ces brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams thams cad la/ mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o// sbyin pa la ra
166b5(rgyud): tu chags pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa dang / mdor na lung dang rig pa dang gsang sngag
166b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa rnams blta bar bya/ byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpam
166b7(rgyud): gyis byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa de rnams thams cad la dri bzang po'i me tog gis mchod yon phul nas sam de nas yid kyis mchod yon phul nas rtsa ba'i rig pa
166b8(rgyud): bzlas pas gats+tsha gats+tsha zhes pa dang / swA hA zhes pa kho na bzlas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas gyen du nges par bltas
167a1(rgyud): pas gsheg su gsol bar bya'o zhes pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa byer rjes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ dkyil 'tshol
167a2(rgyud): gyi cho ga rab 'byam gyi le'u ste gnyis pa rdzog so// de nas sems dpa' chen po de slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas lha'i bu rnams thams
167a3(rgyud): chang la smras par gyur te/ khyed rnams nyon cig mchog gi grub pa mchog tu gsang ba sgrub thabs thams cad kyi cho ga rig pa'i las thams cad byed pa dang / rig pa'i las bzang po byed pa chen
167a4(rgyud): po nyid dang / don chen po byed pa/ phung khrol thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ mchog tu bkra shis pa thams cad kun nas bkra shis pa sangs rgyas
167a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ bdag gi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par gyur pa/ las phran tshegs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo
167a6(rgyud): las chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub byed pa'i sgrol ma gang zhe na/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yAHlo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tA re
167a7(rgyud): tut+tA re tu re swA hA// grogs po dag 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma las chen po thams cad byed pa las phran tshegs thams cad bklags pas grub pa/ mchog tu gsapa shin tu gsang na
167a8(rgyud): mchig tu grub pa gzhan gyis rab tu sbyar ba'i las thams cad 'jig pa byed pa'i rig pa 'di yang dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga dang / sgrub thab su gyur te/ 'phags ma sgrol mas
167b1(rgyud): las chen po thams cad mdor bsdus pa dang / las phran tshigs thams cad la yang nye bar sbyar bar bya zhing / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis cho ga dang sgrub thabs rnams la yang // nyin mtshan
167b2(rgyud): gang du 'am der yang rung ste/ gtsang ma'i phyogasu bri bar bya'o// bdag nyid nyes pa med pa dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gcig pus dang po re shig gru bzhi mnyam pa sgo bzhi pa khru bzhi'i
167b3(rgyud): tshad dang ldan pa'i dbus pad+ma'i phyag rgya de'i g.ya su ut+pal sngon po dang / dbyug pa'i phyag rgya dang / ril ba spyi blugs kyi phyag rgya g.yon du rdo rje rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya dang / gos dkar mo'i phyag
167b4(rgyud): rgya dang / rta mgrin dang dpal chen mo'i phyag rgya'o// shar sgor pad+ma/ byang du ut+pal/ lde ru rdo rje/ nub tu 'jug pa'i rim pa las 'das par/ steng du 'khyil pa'i rnam pa'i zhags pa'i
167b5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// de'i 'og tu phyi nas me'i bya ba byas nas sngar brjod pa'i tshogs mchod pa la sogs pa byas te/ dkyil 'khor du 'a drug par bya'o// de la rgyal srid 'dod pas
167b6(rgyud): hat+pa'i shing du'o// longs spyod 'dod pas rang gi khyim gyi'o// rta 'dod pas rta'i bres su'o// glang po che 'dod pas glang po che'i bres su'o// bu 'dod pas bo de rtsi'i shing gi drung du'o// rangs
167b7(rgyud): pa'i srin pos zin pa la tshangs pas bskyangs pa ru'o// klus zin pa la klu shing dang nye ba ru'o// mkha' gro mas zin pa la lam bzhi mdo ru'o// gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la pa Ta'i shing gi drung ngu
167b8(rgyud): srul pos zin pa la khron pa'i drung du'o// gzhan rnams kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gang du'ang / de ru yang nyes pa med do// grogs pa dag mdor bsdus na/ rig pa 'di ni dkyil 'a
168a1(rgyud): dpalas thams cad pa ste/ las thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// gsang chen 'di dang lhan cig rab tu sbyar bar bya ste dkyil 'khor 'di ni sems can rnams la
168a2(rgyud): phan par 'dod pa'i 'bras bus yod pa'o// longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rin pa sgrub pa po rnams la phan pa'i don gyi phyir khyer
168a3(rgyud): pa thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa ste/ mdor na phyi ma'i lus can 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa rab tu grag so// de nas dkyil 'khor chen por gyur pa
168a4(rgyud): gang thob nas dpal med pa 'joms par byed cing zhi bar byed/ nang dang dgra 'breg pa de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang stobs sgrub par byed pa mthong
168a5(rgyud): zhing thos nas de nas cho ga la rab tu dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub tu bdag gis lung ston par the tshom med de/ gang yA
168a6(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi 'dren pa de rnams kyang rje su yi rang bar 'gyuraro// sa steng dkyil 'khor smra ba ni// zhi ba'i las rnams thams cad byed// bkren pa
168a7(rgyud): rnams kyi phan pa thob// sems can mgon med sdug bsngal can// rnams kyis dkyil 'khor rab sbyar bya/ in+d+ra nI la sogs phye mas// dkyil 'khor yang dag kun tu bri// in+d+ra nI la sogs
168a8(rgyud): med na// sa lu'i phye mas yang dag bri// sa lu'i phyi ma sogs med na// so phag phye ma sogs kyis bri// so phag phye ma sogs med na// bye ma rnams kyis yang dag bri// de ltar yon+dan
168b1(rgyud): kur bsdus pa'i// sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba// 'jig rten mgon po'i yang dag bka'// byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa yin zheso// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang ldan pa thes
168b2(rgyud): chen po'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sbrel ma ral pa rkyen rjes kyi rtsa ba'i che ga las sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi che ga rab 'byam gyi le'u ste gsum pa rdzog so// 
168b3(rgyud): de nas sems dpa' chen pos slar yang dkyil 'khor chen po de la kun tu gzigs nas dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yang dag par 'phags pa dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal
168b4(rgyud): pa chen ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs shing mngon par yid rang bar gyur pa/ mchog gi sgrub pa'i cho ga ras ris kyis cho ga gsungaso// dang pa re shig dge ba'i'i
168b5(rgyud): la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i ras bal blang sa nas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag pas ras bal byed du bzhug par bya'o// de nas ras bal de la lhag par gnas par bya ste rtsa ba'i
168b6(rgyud): rig pa dpa' bo rin gyis nyos pa'i dog pa blangs nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad lhag par
168b7(rgyud): gnas par mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams legs par 'tsho zhing bdag gi skye ba 'bras bu yod pa dang / sngags kyi dngos drab ldan par la
168b8(rgyud): par mdzod cig de'i dusu rba ba Tas dang / rnga bo che dang / dung dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / mkhar rnga dang / dza mu ra dza'i sgra thos par gyur pa 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rgyal rigs po 'ag nga
169a1(rgyud): mang dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ mi rnams blo bur du 'di skad ces rgyal dang / grub dang / dngos grub sbyin pa dang / byin pa dang / zung shig dang / dpal dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang / 
169a2(rgyud): las kyi 'khor lo dang / mang po zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa gzhan yang dge ba'i sgra rab tu 'don pa dang / dril bu'i sgra byung ba dang / dga' ba'i sgra yang rung ste/ de rnams rig pa 'dzin pas
169a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o// gzhan du dngos grub 'bras bu med do zhes paso// de'i dusu de rnams ma rungs
169a4(rgyud): ba'i sgra 'byin pa 'am/ zung shig ze shig 'dzin du chub shig 'am pa rnam par brlas pa/ ci hud ring ba med pa/ de lta bu la sogs pa'i sgra 'byin par byed pa dang / midang / mahe dang lde
169a5(rgyud): spyang dang / beng bu dang / byi la dang / dud 'gro dman pa rkang gnyis pa/ rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi sgra 'den par gyur na/ de la sgrub pa pos bad ga gis dngos grub med do zhes shes par bya zhing
169a6(rgyud): skye ba 'di nyid la kun tu brtul bar bya'o// slar yang snga ma bzhin du byas nas brtsams par bya ste/ de lta bu lan bdun gyis mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang bdun pa'i las kyi sbyor bas
169a7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyuraro// zhes so// de nas sgrub pa pos gzho nu ma de la srung ba byas nas ku sha'i bres la nye bar 'dug tu bcug ste shar du mngon par phyogs pa 'am/ byang du mngon par phyogs pa
169a8(rgyud): bzhag nas/ bdag nyid tsa ru'i ston mo bza' zhing gzhe nu ma de la yang tsau ru'i ston me bzar gzhug par bya'o// snga ma kho nar yongasu brtags pa'i ku sha'i khres la cho ga de nyid kyi ras bal
169b1(rgyud): mkhal du bzhug par bya'o// dog pa de 'jam pa dang / legs par sgrim pa sngar bslab pa'i bu mos yang dag par blangs te gcig dang gsum dang lnga dang brgyad la sogs pa nas ji srid bcu drug
169b2(rgyud): tsam gyi bar du kaR+Sha'i srang grangs legs par bgrangs pa dang ldan pa'i gzhonu mas bya'o// de la rab ni bcu drug bya// de bzhin 'bring ni brgyad pa ste// phran tshegs las rnams sgrub pa la/ lnga
169b3(rgyud): dang gcig ni tha ma'o// sngags rnams kun la sngags rig pas// ji ltar nus pa bzhin du bya// de nas brtsams te gang cung zad// sdig pa'i las rnams sngon byas pa/ dog pa la dmigs sems
169b4(rgyud): kyis ni// de yi skad cig nyid la 'jig nges pa 'di ni blangs nas su// gtsang ma'i snod du 'azhum par bya// phyog su gyur par 'anas byas nas// ga pur gyi ni bdug pas bdus srog chags yan
169b5(rgyud): lag min 'byung ba 'am// gur gum tsan+dan la sogs sam// tsam pa ka sogs ma li ka dri zhim me tog rnams kyis bgos/ gtsang ma'i phyog su bzhag nas ni// srung ba'i tshe
169b6(rgyud): ka byas nas ni// sngags rig las kun shes pa yis// shin tu mnyam gzhag bzlas par bya// de nas tha ga par song nas// ji ltar 'dod po'i grwa byin te// yan lag bral min skems min
169b7(rgyud): nyid dkar po'i chos la brtag tu dga'// nad kyis gdungs min rgan pa min// lung pa dbugs mi bde las grol// ma ning mtshan nyid min pa dang // de ni dman pa min nyid dang // 
169b8(rgyud): ngan par ltung ba spangs pa ni// kun nas mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// rab bsngags lta na sdug pa dang / blo yis kun tu spyod pa dge/ 'jig rten pa yi 'jug pa rten// dngos grub 'ad
170a1(rgyud): ba de la ni// ras mchog 'thag pa byed pa la// rab bsngags dge ba'i stobs ldan nam// blo ldan bzo ni shin tu mkhas// shin tu mkhas par mchog gyur pa'i// ras ni
170a2(rgyud): 'thag byed mchog gi ni// ras kyi rab la bya ba yin// 'bring la 'bring po sgrub par byed// tha mas phran tshegs las rnams ni// dman pa nyid ni kun la so// bzo bos ji ltar smra ba bzhin// de
170a3(rgyud): las gru ni ji bzhin sbyin// bzo bo yi ni dang po'i ngag / smras pa de las sngags rig pas// myur du rin ni sbyin par gyis/ dpa' bo'i tshong zhes de la brjod// don du gnyer ba nyid dang de'i/ 
170a4(rgyud): rin gyi dngos po bzlog par byed// myur du dngos grub byed gang 'di'i// ras ni bla na med pa'i mchog/ las rnams shin tu ma chod par 'os// lha dang mi nyid bde nyid dang // 
170a5(rgyud): 'byung po kun gyi dpal yin zhes// yang dag rdzogs sa ngas rgyas kyis gsungs// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas tha ga pa la gso sbyong byin nas/ shin tu dag pa'i rgyu
170a6(rgyud): skar la 'am/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed la 'am/ dkar po'i nyi ma 'am/ dkar po'i bza' nges par bltas te dkar po'i zla phyed gzhan la yang rung ste/ shI sa ha kA ri'i sI ma dang me tog skyes shing
170a7(rgyud): shing gi me tog dang yal ga rgyas shing dpying ka'i dus/ dus kyi mchog der snga dro nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe sngar bstan pa'i rgyu 'thun dang bcas pas za ga pa tsa ru'i bza' ba zos shing shes dkar po
170a8(rgyud): gyon pa mgo la gtsug tor bcings nas legs par bkrus pa/ tsan+dan dkar po dang / gum gum dag gang yang rung bas legs par byugs pa/ lus la rjesu byugs pa/ ga pur gyi dris kha bsgo
170b1(rgyud): ga yid dga' zhing bkres pa dang / sgom pa dang bral bar byas nas/ thags kyi snas la sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad kyang sa dang / ba lang gi lci ba dag gis bkrus te gsar pa rnams
170b2(rgyud): kyang slar yang ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o// de nas srog chags med pa'i chus bkru bar bya'o// tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyis mngon par gtor bar bya'o// sa'i phyogs gtsang ma ca tse dang bral
170b3(rgyud): zhing ljongs kyi mi dang bral ba rnam par dben pa'i gnas bla khab dang bcas shing gsang bar me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas mchod do// de nas rjesu sgrub pa pos yang dag par sbyong bar byed
170b4(rgyud): pa'i sngags nyid yungs kar dkar po la brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas phyogs bzhi rnams dang / steng dang 'og dang phyogs bral rnamasu gtar bar bya'o// de nas tha ka pa la yungs
170b5(rgyud): kar gyis yang dag par bsnun nas phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga pa bcings te/ chug tor bcings pa byas nas srung ba nan po byas par 'gyur// gal te ras rab yin mdzad
170b6(rgyud): pu khru bzhi mchur khru brgyad kyi tshang 'di tsam du tha ga pas bran par bya'o// 'bri bar gyur na zheng du khru do mchur khru lnga nyid do// tha ma ni bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad la mchur ni sangs
170b7(rgyud): rgyas kyi khru gang nyid do// de las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtho gang ni yul dbus kyi skyes bu tshang dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste/ 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i mthe bo zhes bsgrags pa
170b8(rgyud): tshang 'dis chad kun tu bshad// 'di ni 'phur ba'i dngos grub tu// skyes bu mchog gi gsungs pa yin// thub pa mi snang gyur 'og tu// rgyal srid 'dod pa la 'bring po ste// longs spyod/ 
171a1(rgyud): chen po don gnyer ba'i// skyes bu lha dang lha min dang // gdengs can tha ma grub par bshad// 'bring la dngos grub 'bring po'o// ras 'bring po ni rtag pa ru// sems can kun gyi
171a2(rgyud): las rnams sgrub// phran tshegs las rnams sgrub bya la// ras tha ma ni rtag pa ru// las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed// rdzas rnams kun la rtag tu ni// las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed/ 
171a3(rgyud): ras ris gsum gyis nges bstan pa'i// dngos grub dpal don gnyer ba'i mi// brgya byin bde sogs bdag po yang // cho ga nyams na mi 'grub ste/ cho ga yang dag ldan gyur na// mi yi skye bo phal pa
171a4(rgyud): la'ang // 'bad pa yis ni las rnams kun// myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal dang rgyal mchog sras rnams kyis// sbyor ba 'di dag yang dag bshad// sems can bkren pa mgon med pa/ 
171a5(rgyud): sdug bsngal gyis gdungs kun gyi dpal/ byang chub lam du gang 'di ni// de nyid gzigs pa rnams kyis bstan// chos 'di byang chub rgyu yin par/ sngags kyi lam gyis bstan
171a6(rgyud): pa yin// dkyil 'khor yang dag bstan pa gang // 'jig rten dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'ang 'grub 'gyur te// 'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub// gang zhig
171a7(rgyud): byang chub rgyur 'dod pa// de la rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur// rtag tu 'gro la mi phan pa// gzhan la dngos grub med par gsungs// byang chub che du 'jug kun la// ras ris thams cad 'grub par gsungs
171a8(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi// dam tshig 'di ni khyad par du// myur du bya ba'i don sgrub phyir// 'dir ni mtha' dag thob pa ru// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin// de nas rim gyis/ 
171b1(rgyud): bzo bo yis// 'bad pas ras ni btags par bya// nyin zhal lnga dang brgyad rnams dang // bcu drug gnyis ga bzhi dag dang // nyin mtshan nyid kyi myur ba ru// ras ni 'thag pa rdzogs pa dang // bzo bo mchog
171b2(rgyud): tu grub pa ni// nyin mtshan gyis ni dge ba yin// gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs// bzo be rtag tu byin rlabs pa// thag ring gnasu song nas ni// bshang dang gci ba yongasu dor// 'ong pa'i gos dang
171b3(rgyud): bcas bkrus nas// gzhan pa'i gos gzhan bgo bya zhing // gos dkar 'chang zhing phreng bar ldan// yang dang yang du nye reg bya// lus la tsan+dan dkar pos byug/ bco la sogs pa gtsang bar bya// rtag
171b4(rgyud): tu 'jam zhing legs sbyangs pas// slar yang 'bad pas rtag par bya// de la sogs pa'i rab sbyor ni// rgyal ba gzhan gyi gsungs pa 'am// 'bad pas rnam dpyad ngang tshul gyis/ 
171b5(rgyud): ras ni ma lus btags par bya// ras kyi thags ni rdzogs pa dang // sngar rtsi las kyis legs sprul pa// de rnams tshad ldan ma nyams pa/ bya'o bzang po'i nyin zhag la// rlud
171b6(rgyud): dang rgyud du mnyam par 'jug/ dkar po'i phyogs kyi mdzes pa la// 'od ma'i shing ni khru bzhi la// ras ni blangs nas de nas 'gro// nor ni rgya cher 'god pa yis// bzo za bde legs byas nas
171b7(rgyud): ni/ brtul zhugs bzang po legs skyed pa'i// sngags pa ji ltar 'dod song nas// dri zhim me tog gis mchod de// gtsang ba'i phyogasu rnam par dgod// 'di nyid kyis ni sngags kyis ni/ 
171b8(rgyud): srung ba'i cho ga rab tu byed// gang zhig ras bal sngon du ni// slar yang rnam mang yongs sbyangs pa// de nyid kyis ni bdag nyid dang / ras nyid bsrung bar bya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po che/ 
172a1(rgyud): sngags bzlas pa yis gsungs pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams ni mang pos dang // ngas kyang de ni slar yang ste// de nyid gsang sngags thams cad kyis// rnam par spyod pa'i sngag
172a2(rgyud): kyi gzugs// brtson 'grus chen po gzi brjid che// sngags kyi den kun sgrub pa po// sna tshogs skyob pa'i rgyu rnams ni// rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// 'dzam+bing gnas pa'i sems can
172a3(rgyud): rnams// sems kyi spyad pa kun tu rmongs// dad pa med cing phyin ci log/ log pa'i kun spyod la rab brkam// sngags rnams sgrub par mi byed pa'i// de nyid phyir na slar gsungs pa// 'khor ba
172a4(rgyud): mun pa'i btson rang 'khyam// gang yang rtag tu yid dag cing // dang ldan ltas mo bkra shis dang // sngags rnams kun la rtag tu spyod// bdag nyid chen po dngos grub 'dod// 
172a5(rgyud): tu 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang // spro ba che zhing gaN+DI brjid che// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams gang // 'bad ba med par yang dag 'grub// dad pa med pa'i skye bo la// 
172a6(rgyud): dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste// sa bon cha skor btab pa la// myu gu med cing 'bras med bzhin// dad pa rtag tu chos kyi char// don kun gzigs pas gsungs pa yin// chos den
172a7(rgyud): ngang tshul can de rnams// sngags kyi dngos grub rtag tu brjod// de nas sgrub pos bzo ba ni// ri mo mkhan nam bdag kyang rung // ri mo mkhas pas ma 'dres pa'i// tshon rtsi kha dog gsal
172a8(rgyud): ba dang // kha dog can gyi tshon blangs nas// ji ltar tha ka pa la ni// sngar ni cho ga de nyid kyis// mtshan nyid yang dag ldan pa yis// ri mo mkhan la gong bzhin du// rgyas pa ru ni bya ba'o// 
172b1(rgyud): ji ltar sngar bzhin tha ga pa'i// cho ga de nyid kyis ni de// ras la ri mo bri bar bya// yang na rang gi ri mor bri// ga pur gur gum tsan+dan las// so phag tshon la bsgo bar bya// bdug pa bsregs shing
