198a3(rgyud): par dga' bas las mchog gzhan nyid bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa nyid na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rjesu 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sa rjesu theb par
198a4(rgyud): byed pa nyid dang / lus 'di nyid kyi 'jig rten kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang / stobs bcu'i rgyud yong su rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'phabs pa byams pa mngon sum du mthong ba
198a5(rgyud): nyid kyi phyir dang / chos bsten pa don yod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas gdung rgyun mi gcod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu gnom
198a6(rgyud): cing rje su thob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos kyi sprin rnam par 'byor pa la rjesu 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang / nyon mongs pa'i yongasu gdung ba med cing bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun gyis
198a7(rgyud): rab tu zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dang / 'jig rten rjesu 'dzin pa la rab tu 'jug cing nan tan byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin
198a8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gsung don yod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rab tu sgom pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub
198b1(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos bdag nyid chen po rnams 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir/ rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di sgrub par bya ste/ sngags kyi mtha' rab 'byam
198b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa ras ris thu bo spyan snga dang nye bar 'dug nas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad sngags kyi cho ga dang / rgyud thams cad du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lam
198b3(rgyud): ste mdor na 'dir rtog pa gzhan du gsung ba'i las rnams kyis kyang ras ris kyi rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ myur du de rnams kyi dngos grub du 'gyur te/ gang ngas bstan pa de dag
198b4(rgyud): gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyu ro// byang chub se mas dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma
198b5(rgyud): ral pa gyer rjes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ ras ris mchog gi sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyang pa rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil
198b6(rgyud): 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs par ma yod do// de mdor bsdus nas
198b7(rgyud): bshad par bya yis// legs par yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan
198b8(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ston pa 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can dang / seMn thams cad la phan par dgyes pa// bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i don dang ma
199a1(rgyud): 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs ras gang de'i dus la bab par dgongs na de gsung du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
199a2(rgyud): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ dang po re shig tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang / gtsang
199a3(rgyud): / sgra'i kun tu spyod pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / bsam gtan dang / cho ga dang / gang du rab tu gnas pa ste/ sems can thaMd kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu
199a4(rgyud): dang bcas shing don med par mi 'gyur ba dang / sngags zad kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i dngos grub grub par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ de ngas bshad kyis sems dpa' chen po nyon cig dang po re shig rig pa'i
199a5(rgyud): brtul zhugs dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba dang po nyid yang dag par blangs te/ dang po re shig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis nye bar bstan pa'i dam rig la yang
199a6(rgyud): dag par rje su 'jug par bya'o// khyod kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/ sngar nges par bstan pa gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/ slob dpon du dbang bskur ba thob pa/ khyod kyis bsku
199a7(rgyud): ba'i cho ga shes pa/ mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ bden par smra ba/ spro ba che ba/ byas pa gzo ba/ brtan pa/ sems bzang ba/ ha cang mi rgan cing ha cang mi gzhen pa/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti
199a8(rgyud): thams cad la 'dod pa med pa/ tshangs par spyod pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ rnyed pa tsam gyis sam long spyong rgyur ram/ rjesu chags pa'i rgyur yang brdzun mi smra na/ shin tu chung ngu tsam nyi
199b1(rgyud): dang rnyed pa dang / rmongs pa'i rnam pa lta smos/ dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / 'byung po thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du snying brtse ba dang ldan pa dang / sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / sngar spyang ba byas
199b2(rgyud): ba khyod kyi gsang ba'i rig pa dang / sngags rjesu zlos pa dang / rig pa sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten shes pa/ yang dag par rje su 'dzin par byed pa
199b3(rgyud): 'bras bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa legs pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ mi 'jigs shing mi gnod la/ chags pa med pa/ dpa' ba/ brtson 'grus brtan pa/ nad med pa ste/ nang gang gis la su mi rungs
199b4(rgyud): ba'i ngang tshul can dang / rig che zhing mtho b.raratu skyes pa zhes pa/ yon+tan 'di rnams dang ldan pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur te/ sgrub pa po yang de dang 'dra ba la
199b5(rgyud): yan lag cung zad ma rdzogs pa'o// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la mchod pa byas nas 'di'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ slob nga pon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sem
199b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po'i rig pa dang sngags dang bcom ldan 'das ma de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la rjesu 'jug par 'tshab na bdag cag la rjesu brtse ba'i don dang / phan pa'i thugs bskyed nas de
199b7(rgyud): slob dpon gyis gsung du gsol// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma ji lta ba bzhin rim gyis brtags nas bzhugs par bya zhing sngar bzhin du mngon
199b8(rgyud): par dbang bskur ba byin nas rig pa dang sngags byin la rim pa ji lta bar dam tshig bstan par bya'o// gsang chen dang / phyag rgya dang / rgyud dang / sngags dang las rnams kyang dus ring mo nyid
200a1(rgyud): nas yongasu btags te/ bsam pa shes nas rgyung dang sngags la sogs pa dang / las rnams thams cad bstan par bya'o// gzhan du ma yinano zhes pa'i cho ga 'di rab tu bsgrag so// 
200a2(rgyud): de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la ji ltar nus pas gang gis slob dpon dgyes pa 'am bdag nyid dang long spyod kyang dbul bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sleb dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye
200a3(rgyud): bar bzhag par bya'o// bu bzhin du bskyang bar bya'o// ma bzhin longs spyod kyi nye bar bsdu bar bya'o// de nas sgrub po des rig pa dang sngags gang yang rung ba zhig bzung nas mtha' gcig tu song ste/ sngar
200a4(rgyud): bstan pa'i gnas rgya cher gong ma bzhin du sbyar bas rig pa la sogs pa de rnams nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang / gshes/ su gsol ba dang / mar me dang / dri dang / gdug pa dang / gter ma
200a5(rgyud): dang / lha bshos dag dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i cha gnyid kyis rgyas par byas te spyan drangs nas gangan phul ba thun maHmas gsum du khrus gsum bya zhing gis lan gsum brjes
200a6(rgyud): te nyi ma so so la bzlas pa bya'o// de la thun mtshams kyi dus zhes bya ba ni mtshon mo'i mtha' nas brtsam te ji srid nyi ma 'char ba'i dus tsam gyi bar 'di la dang por bshad// nyi ma gung ni nyi
200a7(rgyud): shar ba'i mthar dus tsam gyi tshad kyi mtshams nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor na mkha' la yang dag par brten pa ni cho ga shes pas gung gi thun mtsham su shes par bya'o// nub pa'i dusu yang
200a8(rgyud): lhag ma bzhi tshatsam thum mtshams gsum par brjod par byal/ slob dpon mkhas pa shes nyin can// tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan// chen po'i rigasu 'brangs pa dang / kun
200b1(rgyud): / nas brtson 'grus bcan pa ni// sngags dang chung sogs yang dag ldan/ byA bkun la blo gras byang / phra zhing mkhas la tshang shes pa// chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin/ smrab che zhing gzi brjid ldam
200b2(rgyud): 'jig rten chos la ltos pa med// thub pa mchog gi chos la dang // 'jig rten pa rnams dor ba dang // bzlas pa byas shing rnam dben byas// sngon du bsnyen pa rjes brten pa// byang chub sems
200b3(rgyud): dpa'i gsang sngags shes// de las gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams mthong // sangs rgyas kyis gsungs gsang sngags dang // 'jig rten pa yi rab sbyor shes// srung ba byas shing mthu brtan pa// gtsang
200b4(rgyud): sgra'i kun spyod la rtag dga'// sangs rgyas nye bstan lam la ni// kun nas rjesu 'jug pa dang // gsang sngags rgyal bas gsungs pa yin// gsang sngags zlos la rtag tu brtson// rtag tu mthong
200b5(rgyud): chos 'bras bu dang // 'jig rten pha rol de bzhin nyid/ sdig pakun la 'jigs pa dang // phra mo tsam la'ang de bzhin no/ gtsang zhing mkhas la le lo med/ yid gzhungs ldan sdug pa
200b6(rgyud): dang / stobs bcu pas bshang sngags gang dang // de bzhin kho nar rgyal sras dang // 'jig rten pa yi sngags gang nyid// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs ngag la'ang // de la rtag tu ngal bar byas// gzhung dang bstan bcos
200b7(rgyud): den 'dzin pa// nad med nus pa med min pa/ rga dang nang ni rnam par spangs// de bzhin shes nyen can sngags grub// kun nas myur du byed pa dang // mtha' yi ring min zhing de bzhin// tshangs par spyong
200b8(rgyud): cing shes rab che// khyad par du ni shes pa dang // gcig tu 'du 'dzi med pa dang // dpa' zhing dbang bskur thob pa dang // de 'dir byang chub pha rol son// srid pa zhi bar byed la brtson// de bzhin
201a1(rgyud): nyid du rig sngags byas// mthu cher 'jig rten shes pa dang // 'gro ba sems can rjes sems pa// dpa' nyid dang ni rab tu ldan// sbyir dang 'byung po phan la dga'// de bas
201a2(rgyud): byad 'phags slob dpon la// rtag tu gsol ba gdab par bya// des ni dkyil 'khor bris pa yis// sngags kyi dngos grub ster bar byed// de nyid kyis ni dbang bskur gyis// 'bras bu chen po sbyin par
201a3(rgyud): 'gyur// dngos grub 'dod pa'i slob mas kyang // thub pa bzhin du rtag tu mchod// de yi gsungs ni mi 'gom pa// slob mas 'bad pas bya ba yin ni// ji ltar 'byor cing bdog pa yi// longs spyod
201a4(rgyud): / de la dbul bar bya// nyung ngu tsam mam mang yang rung // gang gis mnyes par 'gyur ba dang // lus ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu yi phyir// ba la nor ni ster ba ltar// de bzhin slob ma chos shes pas// sleb dpon la ni
201a5(rgyud): nor dbul bya// mtha'i dbang phyug dngos grub thob tshe dang de bzhin nad med dang // rgyas pa'i 'gro ba thob par 'gyur/ slob mas bla ma de mchod na// de yi sngags rnams 'grub par
201a6(rgyud): lam dang cho gnyer mthong dang // bsnyen pa las kyang brten pa las// de bzhin ri mor byas mchod las// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par 'gyur// de bzhin rgyal mchog sras rnams dang // lnga
201a7(rgyud): rnams thams cad dgyes par 'gyur// bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur na// bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba yi// 'di dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur// sgrub pas ston dang thog mar ni// dam tshig
201a8(rgyud): la ni rjes 'jug bya// dman rnams de dag mnyam yang rung // gal te ches mchog gyur pa yang // rmongs pa 'am lhag par khro ba yis// rtag tu bla ma brnyas mi bya// des kyang rgyud 'di
201b1(rgyud): de la ni// man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya// gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub byin// 'dis ni ser sna byas pa min// sngar bstan slob ma de la ni// man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya// gang tshe sngags kyi
201b2(rgyud): dngos grub byin// lus can zhen pa 'phel byed pa'i// mig ni gang la yod gyur pa// de nyid slob ma nyid bya'o// slob dpon 'am ni slob ma'i rgyur// phan tshun rjesu 'jug byed pa// gang du zhen
201b3(rgyud): pa'i rgyu skyong ba// 'jam po'i rgyun ni 'dzin pa ste// de la sngags ni sbyin par bya// slob dpon de bzhin slob ma ni// slob ma bla mar mthong ba la// rtag tu spro bar 'gyur ba 'am// gnyis
201b4(rgyud): kas dngos grub yang dag 'byor// de la rtag tu lam nyid dang // sngags kyi spyod pa rjes bstan bya// gnyis kas pa dang bur shes pas// sngags ni 'bras bcas rjes
201b5(rgyud): 'jug pa// brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob// rtag tu slob mas bla ma ni// rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya// bu ni bdag nyid chen po rnams// sangs rgyas chos rgyan mi 'chang
201b6(rgyud): 'gyur// de med mgon med de rnams la/ ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags rnams sbyin// sems can bkren dang ma ning la'ang // thams cad la ni khyad par du// sngags kyi spyod pa byang ba
201b7(rgyud): 'phags// tha ma mchog dang bar ma la// dus rnams kun tu bya ba'o// yong su thob pa'i chos rnams la// rjesu gzung ba'i rgyun bya'o// 'gro ba blo gros nges pa yi// 'dod pa rnams la'
201b8(rgyud): rab sbyin bya// de phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags// slob ma nyid kyis blang bar bya// de nyid kyis ni nyer bstan pas// lam nyid yi no gzhan du min// dngos grub 'dod pas gang de la// 
202a1(rgyud): pa ni pha rol song ba na// pha bzhin mgo bos phyag byas te// de nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro// de nas 'dir ni song nas ni// mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas/ 
202a2(rgyud): slong mo slong ba'i rjes 'jug cing // smra ba bcad de dus gsum bzlas// de ltar bstan pa nyid du 'gyur// ji lta'i lam la rab 'jug pa// de tshe rnam 'gyur de gcod pa/ khang stong dang ni
202a3(rgyud): dgon pa che// ri bo che dang chu klung ngogs// gtsang dang ba lang gnas mtsho chen// rnam dben skye bo spangs pa bsten// lha khang dang ni shing drung dang // mtshan gcig ri ni mthon po dang // rgya mtsho
202a4(rgyud): che 'jam nyams dga' dang // chu gling ngam ni gling rnams dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sngar bstan pa'i// yul rnams sna tshogs yid 'ong ba// 'di rnams las kyang phyogs gzhan du// mnyam par
202a5(rgyud): bzhag pas sngags bzlas bya// grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni// sngags don nges pa'i rtog ge ba// ltas ni rnam pa de nyid shes// dpa' zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba// 
202a6(rgyud): snying stobs ldan zhing bzod pa cam// dang dang tshul khrims phun tshogs ldan// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i yul 'dir ni// rab bsngags mtshan nyid dang ldan pa// bzod dang ldan pa'i grogs po yi
202a7(rgyud): 'bad pa med pa'i nyin gyis ni// las rnams rgyal ba 'grub par 'gyur// tho rangs mal nas langs nas ni// 'bab chu mtsho chen las byung ba'i// srog chags med cing dri ma med// chu de nyid
202a8(rgyud): la khrus byas nas// sa dang 'byung phye ma yi/ sngags shes lus ni dril phyis bya// de nas sngags kyis sbyang byas pa'i// chu nyid shim tu dri med la/ zlos po brtson pa'i khrus bya'o// ha cang yun rings
202b1(rgyud): klus mi bya// de nas langs la lag pa dag/ sa dag gis kyang bkru bar bya// bdun dang bdun dang yang lan bdun// nyi shu rtsa gcig nye rag bya// yang dang song shing kun tu spyad// so sbyang nas ni dor bar bya// de nas skyo ba la phyag
202b2(rgyud): byas shing // 'jig rten mgon la phyag byas nas// sngags rig mchod pa yid 'ong bya// bya ba sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis// yang dag yang du yang dag bstod// de bzhin dri zhim me tog gis// stan pa sgrub la
202b3(rgyud): mchod yon dbul// sangs rgyas rnams la mgos phyag byas// de tshe slob mar gyur pa rnams// 'jig rten mgon po de rnams kyi// spyan snga nyid sdig pa bshags// bdag nyid dag kyang phul byas nas// ras ris spyan
202b4(rgyud): sngar 'khod par bya// ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'jug/ sngags rig gnyis ka 'dus nas ni// mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin te// de ni bgrang phreng nyid kyis ni// rab tu 'bad pas bzlas par bya// de tshe snga
202b5(rgyud): gzhan mi bzla so// che ga dman pa yang spang zhing // ha cang mchog kyang de bzhi no// bar ma bar ma'i las dag la// brtul zhugs can dag snga Ta bzlas bya// ha cang mthon po spang bar bya// gal te tshig ni dman pa'ang min
202b6(rgyud): bar ma bar ma'i las rnams la// rab tu span par rgyal bas gsungs// ha cang mtho min dman pa min// bar mar rtag tu bzlas pa bya// sngon gyi sangs rgyas zad kyis// tshig ni dpal dang ldan par gsungs// gzhan gyi drung du mi
202b7(rgyud): bzlas shing // gzhan gyi las lam rtag tu gsang // bdag nyid rig pa'i yul du bzlas// sngags ni bar ma de bzhin du// bzlas pas rab tu 'byer par 'gyur// sngags ni leT par thos pa 'ga'// dngos grub 'bring po 'dod pa nyid/ 
202b8(rgyud): snga ni dge bar bzlas par bya// de phyir skye ba dang bral bar/ sngan gyi de nyid don len thos/ choT dang bral zhing rnam dben par/ zlas pa pos ni spa bzlas pa// mtshan mo yin bzhi cha dang / de yi phyed kyi phyung nyid kyi// skya re dmar po'i
203a1(rgyud): / dus tsam ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba na// thun ni dang por re bzhin du// thub pa'i skyes mchog gis gsung so// dus kyi tshad ni bzhi yin te// bar mar yongasu bsgrags pa yin// de nas nyi ma byed nub na/ 
203a2(rgyud): sngags kyis bzlas pa de che btang // sngags zlos por ba de yi tshe// mchod yon phul nas gshegasasu gsol// brtul zhugs can gyi rnam gzhan spangs// de tshe bor ba'i dug lhag na// thub pa'i bstan pa dge' bya// shes
203a3(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin la sogs// dam pa'i chos ni klog pa dang // sa bcu pa yi glegs bam ni// mchod dang klog pa rtag tu'o// de nas dus la bab gyur na// rang sngags sngags kyi mgo bo dang // thub pa skyes ma rnyog phyag
203a4(rgyud): byas nas// de nas 'tsho ba la 'gro zhing // de bzhin du su spyod par ldan// dusu za zhing dbang por thul// sgrub po chos dang ldan pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang brtson// grong gzhal du na 'jug pa na// mi skrag cing
203a5(rgyud): sgra spyod la dga'// sems can rtag tu chos ldan pa 'i// khyim du bsod snyoms dag la 'jug/ zlos po srog chags med pa 'i chu// chos par grub pa gceng mar 'dod// yang dag lta ba phun sum
203a6(rgyud): tshogs// sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dang // de lta'i khyim du rtag tu ni// bsod snyoms don du slong mo blang // dper na brtson pas go bgos te// nyam nga'i yul du rab tu 'jug/ rtag tu dgra ni 'joms par byed// 
203a7(rgyud): dgro rnams kyis gzhom mi nus pa// de bzhin sngags pa spongs mos 'tsho// rtag tu grong du 'jug pa na// de bzhin chags par 'os pa yi// gzugs sgra mthong nas mi dge ba// 'dod chags zhi ba
203a8(rgyud): der gyi phyir/ mi sdug dge ba bsgom par bya// lang tshe'i rnam pas rgyan pa yi// bud med lus ni mthong nas kyang // smad cing rul ba'i lus rnams ni// srin pos zos shing dur khrod gnas// lus kyi mi
203b1(rgyud): rtag sdug bsngal ba// mi gtsang dri mi zhim par bsgom// gang la byis pa rmongs pa yi// 'gro ba lnga por 'gro zhing 'khor// las kyi sras bus brgyus pa ni// yun rings du su mya ngan byed// mi shes sgrib
203b2(rgyud): pas rmongs pa ni// dmus longs sdug bsngal rgyu cano// gang du blo ni phyin ci log// chags pas skye ba phongs par 'gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs las lam gyis// rnam pa du mar chags gyur pa// ring
203b3(rgyud): nas khyogs kyis 'gro ba ni// 'gro dang 'ong ba spyod par byed// rtag pa nyid phyir rjes chags pa// 'dzin pa'i kun tu spyod pa spyod// gang du sems can mi dge dga'// lam du yun rings rgyu bar byed/ 
203b4(rgyud): rje tshun khyud mo'i rnam pa bzhin// srid pa'i mtsho chung 'byung ba rnams// 'gro ba de rnams mi bzang ba'i// sdug bsnga la chu bos kun tu g.yengs// de bzhin bud med sdug bsngal gyi/ 
203b5(rgyud): rtsa ba 'ba' zhig yin pa ru/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang // thub pa rnam sa kyis gsungs pa yin// srid pa'i rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa'i// 
203b6(rgyud): 'tsho chen 'di dag bskam par dka'/ bud med sems kyis bslus pa yi// sems can gnas gang bying ba de// dmyal ba dud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang // yi dgas 'jig rten lA ma yin// de bzhin
203b7(rgyud): mi yi 'jig rten nyid// lha yi 'gro bar 'gro bar bya// rtag tu kun nas yongasu 'khor// bud med chags pas bslus pa ni// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btsor ra yi// 'dam rdzab chen por bying bar 'gyur// 
203b8(rgyud): bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi// re la chags pa'i ce spyang bzhin// gang la sems can rtag dga' ba// mi bzang sdug bsngal bzed par byed// dkar po chos la nges par nyams// sangs rgyas bstan la
204a1(rgyud): / rab tu gnas/ srid pa'i mtsho yi sdug bsngal nyid// thams cad bzlog par byed pa yin// sngags bzlos pa la dga' zhing brtson// dbang cher grags shing yid dang ldan// gzi brjid
204a2(rgyud): ldan zhing sngags thub pa// der rnams la ni sdug bsngal med// yang dag sdom dang tshangs bden shes// lha ma lha la mchod pa byed// ma dang pha la gus pa rnams// gsum po rnams la sdug bsngal med
204a3(rgyud): / mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang // gzhan gyi ngan la rje su bsnyen// bud med lus la 'byung po'i gzugs// de bzhin 'bras dang zug rngu dang // blo ngan phung po'i lcags kyus zin// 'khor ba las
204a4(rgyud): ni mi 'da' ba// rtag tu bud med chags gyur pa// de la dngos grub yod pa min// de la mchog 'gro yod ma yin// 'gro ba 'bring yang yod ma yin// dngos grub chung ngu'ang yid ma yin// 'dir ni
204a5(rgyud): zlos po khrims 'tshal na// tshul khrims 'chal la thub dbang gis// sngags kyi dngos grub ma bstano// mya ngan 'ang sa grong 'gro ba yi// lam yang med cing phyogs dang bral// 
204a6(rgyud): 'dir ni byis pa smad pa la// sngags grub pa ni ka la yod// skye bo tshul 'tshal 'di la ni// de la bde 'gro'ang yod ma yin// bde ba nyid la gzhol ba'ang med// de bzhin rgyal bas gsungs bI
204a7(rgyud): sngags// grub par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// ta la'i shing gi mgo bo ni// gang tshe bcad na slar yang ni// sngon po nyi du mi 'gyur zhing // myu gu slar yang nam zhig 'gyur// de bzhin sngags grub rmongs
204a8(rgyud): pa ni/ tshul khrims 'chal shing sdig pa'i las// rtag tu slar yang bud med chags// mi dge'i grogs dang phrad pa la// sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub// de bas gang che zlos pa pos// bde/ 
204b1(rgyud): bar gshegs pas spangs pa yi// bud med nyes pa rnams spyad de// gang gi dngos grub bsgrub bya ste// byis pa bud med la rmongs pa// gzhan gyi grub par ma bstano// de nas dang por blo ldan pa// gcad
204b2(rgyud): zhing 'du 'dzi med la dga'// rigs ldan brtan zhing dga' ba dang // sems bzang ldan zhing mthong na dga'// chos dang chos min rnam dpyod shes// de rnams grub pa rnyed mi dka'// de lngar sngags
204b3(rgyud): shas zhugs pa ni// gleng du bsod snyems phyir du 'jug/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin song nas// sngar ni brtag pa'i gnas dag tu/ mkhas pas dag pa'i blos bza' ba// bza' ba phyog su bzhag nas ni/ 
204b4(rgyud): phyi rol seng nas rkang pa bkru/ de nas slar yang gan sa de ru// srog chags med pa'i chu rnams kyis// dang po 'dren pa nyid yin te/ gnyis pa la ni lag g.yon gyi// rkeng pa man
204b5(rgyud): chang dris phyis bya// kun tu g.yas pa slar byin nas/ lag pa sa yis bkru bar bya// sngar bzhag pa yi dag pa dang // gtsang ma rnams kyi bdun nyid du// bza' zhing dag chus gcing sbra
204b6(rgyud): byas// ser skra'i ba las byung ba yi// ba yi lci ba ser po dag gtsang zhing dri med snang brang la// srog chags med pa'i chus sbyar te// dang por ston pa thub pa yi// mchog la dkyil 'khor bya ba yi
204b7(rgyud): khyad par khru gang tsam du'o// gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la// gsum pa rigs kyi lha mo la// gang zhig sngags pa bzlos pa ba// slar yang rtag tu bya ba yin// bzhi pa sems can thams
204b8(rgyud): cad kyi// nye bar leng sbeng don du grags// ga ya su 'jig rten mgon po yi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtag tu bya// dkon mchog gsum gyi ched du ni// dkyil 'khor de ni gru bzhi pa'o// gnyis pa rang
205a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams dang // gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras/ dkyil 'khor bdun po 'di dag ni/ kun nas gru bzhi pa ru'o// khru gang 'am ri khru phyed rung gnyin re zhing yang bya
205a2(rgyud): zlos pos de tshe sbas pa'i phyogs// sdig pa 'joms byed nyin re bzhin// de nas sngags pa thub pa langs// lag gnyis 'bad pas bkrus nas ni// gtsang ma'i chu yis nye reg pa// dag cing sreg
205a3(rgyud): chags spangs pa yi// dri ma med pa'i gtsang ma ni// 'bad pas gtsang ma'i snong du blang // mtsho chen dang ni 'ba' chu 'am/ chu mig chu bo la gnas pa// gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung ba yi// sems
205a4(rgyud): ma gtsang ma lag gis bcus// sngags pas slar yang nye reg bya// gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang // de nas kha la reg bya zhing // de bzhin nyid du rna ba'i rgyun// mig dang sna yi bu ga dang / 
205a5(rgyud): spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs reg bya// dge ba spyod pas lan lnga 'am bdun/ che ga bzhin du thams cad bya// gtsang sbra'i sgra da pa phun sum tshogs// zlos po gtsang mir gyur nas ni/ 
205a6(rgyud): bsod snyoms snod ni blangs na su// chu yi nang du 'gro bar bya// gang du chu bo rab gnas pa// de bzhin dma' bar gyur pa da nga/ chu klung rab tu 'bab la sogs// mi yi 'jig rten rjes
205a7(rgyud): bzung rgyur// de bzhin rtag tu sngags bzlas bya// de nyid phyir na thub pa'i gtsos// brtson 'grus chen pos 'di gsung so// mtshan ni 'od srung zhes bya bas// sngon gyi tshe sa steng nger// sprul
205a8(rgyud): ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir// 'byung po rnams la legs don du// sngags ni rab tu gsungs pa yin// sdug bsngal gyur pa'i 'jig rten kun// dbul zhing skyo la sha thang ba// 
205b1(rgyud): mchog tu nyon mongs gyur pa rnams// 'di rnams don du gsungs pa yin// 'byung po rnams la legs pa nyid// slar yang kun tu bsten pa rnams// 'byung po kun gyi zas don du// 
205b2(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsungs// nga yis gsang sngags 'di brjod kyi// byang sems la bsten thams cad dang // nyan thos rnams ni mnyan par gyis// nad kyis zin pa 'joms
205b3(rgyud): byed cing // bkres pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang // gang yang sems can skom pa dang // sdug gasngal thams cad zhi don dang // 'byor pa 'dod rnams mnyan par gyis// 'od srung 'ong ni chen
205b4(rgyud): bo la// thub pa'i gtso bos de skad gsungs// nyon mongs rnams ni yid 'gu nas// khyab bdag de la gsol ba 'debs// chos kyi rgyal po thub pa che// chos mkhyen
205b5(rgyud): gsang sngags bshad du gsol// dam tshig mchog la gnyer gnas pa'i// sems can rnams la rjes brtser mdzod// / de skad gsol nas thub pa yis// sngags mchog rgyas
205b6(rgyud): par gsungs par byed// ka la bing ka sgra dbyangs dang // rnga bo che dang sprin gyi sgra// tshangs dbyangs brtson 'grus chen po dang // tshangs pa'i sras gang rgyal mchog gis// gang yang cung zad
205b7(rgyud): 'dir 'ongs pa// rkang med pa dang rkang mangs dang // rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun 'on cig mdor na sems can don kum tu// bde 'byung sngabs mi
205b8(rgyud): bshad par bya// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// sems can la sogs 'dir lhag pa// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// 'byor pa 'dod pa rnams nyon cig/ na maHsa maH
206a1(rgyud): bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha tra sha sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga ki ne/ ga ga na/ kan+do A nA ya/ sarbal hul hu/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ a kaR+Sha Ne/ mA bi lam+ba/ ya the bi ta saM pA dra ya
206a2(rgyud): swA hA// bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de skad ces gsungs nas/ cang mi gsungs par gyur to// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/ rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di
206a3(rgyud): rgya cher gsungs pa'i bar skabs 'dir na mkha' thams cad chen po la 'os pa'i zas kyi sprin gyis yongasu gang bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
206a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi na mkha'i mthil thams cad zas kyi sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs par snang bar gyur to// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa'i don du blangs par bkru ba
206a5(rgyud): bya/ slar yang de nas langs nas ni// gtsug lag khang ngam gan su 'gro// gang sus sngon ni yang dag bsten// gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya// song nas zlos pos
206a6(rgyud): phyogs de ru// lhung bzed de ni bzhag par bya// de nas myur du nye reg bya// de bzhin slar yang lhung bzed blang // lhung bzed sa la lo ma 'am// dngul lam de bzhin gser nyid dang // zang
206a7(rgyud): sam shing shun dag kyang rung // ston pa la ni lha bshes dbul// ston la lha ba shos phul nas ni// slar yang rang rig sngags rgyal la'o// 'gron po gcig ni 'ongs gyur dang // sdug
206a8(rgyud): bsngal can la'ang ci nus sbyin// bshos nyid kyang ni thams cad du// kun nas nges par bza' ba nyid/ ha cang mang po sbyin mi bya// sngags shes 'dir ni gdung mi bya// kun nas/ 
206b1(rgyud): rigs par ldan par bya// lto ba'i tshad tsam bzhag nas ni// gzhan pa'i zan ni rtag tu'o// bkres dang skom pas nyen pa yis// sngags don sgrub par mi nus te// ha cang nyung dang mang zos
206b2(rgyud): na/ sngags don bsnyen par mi nus so// de nyid phyir na rgyal dbang gis// sems can zas kyis gnaso zhes// lus can kun la gsungs pa yin// gang gi mi rnams 'tsho ba dang
206b3(rgyud): lha dang lha min dri za dang // klu dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci// srin po yi dgas sha za dang / 'byung po skar ma bza' dag ni// gang zhig zas la mi ltos pa// de ni 'ga' yang yod ma
206b4(rgyud): yin// rtag tu kha zas rag pa ni// khams kyi zas zhes grags pa'o// sems can phra mo'i zas can spang // / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni// bsam gtan zas
206b5(rgyud): can rtag par ni// gzugs ni spyod cing g.yo ba ste// gzugs med nyid kyi lha rnams kyang // ting 'dzin 'bras bu za ba'o// srid pa bar ma'i sems can yang // dri za bar ni
206b6(rgyud): rab tu grags// de bzhin 'dod khams sems can rnams// zas ni rnam pa sna tshogs za// 'dod dang ldan pa'i lha dang mi// khams kyi zas ni za bar byed// de nyid phyir mthub dbang
206b7(rgyud): gis// sems can zas kyis gnas pa zhes// chos kyi rgyu ru bstan pa yin// gang de rnams ni rab tu grags// zlos po rtag tu brtson pa ni// zas kyi tshod ni rig par bya/ gang byi
206b8(rgyud): rig pa bsnyen pa ni// zas 'di la ni rab tu gnas// kun spyod ma nor dag pa dang // dag zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang // zas kyi tshod kyang shes pa la// de yi dngos grub rnyed mi bka'// dpa
207a1(rgyud): khur ni drang ba'i rgyur// shing rta yun rings gnas don du// shing rta'i mig ni slu bar byed// de bzhin sngags pa sngags rig pas// zas ni gnas pa'i che du spyad/ 
207a2(rgyud): lus ni gso ba'i don du ni// zlos po rtag tu gso bar bya// sngags rnams sgrub pa'i don phyir dang // byang chub chog kyi rgyu yi phyir// zas thams cad dang // ji ltar mngon par srid pa'i
207a3(rgyud): bza' ba de// de rnamasu char 'bab par gyur to// ji ltar mngon par srid pa'i bza' ba de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba bkres pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don dang // skom pa rnams kyis
207a4(rgyud): btung ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu bo'i rgyun lta bu btung bar bya ba yang yid la 'dod pa bzhin du der bab par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la
207a5(rgyud): bkres pa'i nang thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / skom pa thams cad gsal bar byas par gyur to// tham sa cang dang ldan pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang ngo mtshar thob cing
207a6(rgyud): tshim pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rje su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zha gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi
207a7(rgyud): snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das 'od srung kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la yongasu bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ngas kyang de'i tshe rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho sa
207a8(rgyud): 'di la sen thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa gsal ba'i don gyi phyir dang / khyad par du sngags bzlos pa po thams cad kyi phyir gsungs pa la mngon par
207b1(rgyud): rje su yi rang ngo // dang po re shig zlos pa pos sngags 'di bsgrub par bya'o// gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar mi spro na ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas 'bum phrag bdar bzlas pa bya/ de nas dkar
207b2(rgyud): gsum bza' ba 'am/ 'o ma btung ba'o// ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhag nas mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma dang lnga bshos rgya chen
207b3(rgyud): bo byas nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung kyis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing rnams kyi me sbar nas u dum ba ra'i yam shing
207b4(rgyud): la zhe dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la bdags parlan dang bcas pa 'am/ dpal 'bras kyi yam shing kyang rung ste stong phrag brgyad cu sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas mtshan byed
207b5(rgyud): kyi dus kyi tshe sprin rag po chen po dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'ong bar 'gyur te 'jigs par mi bya// langs na 'gro bar yang mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i
207b6(rgyud): snying pos bdag nyid bsrung bar bya zhing / dkyil 'khor bcings pa dang / grogs rnams kyang sngar bzhin bsrung bar bya'o// de nas rlung nag po'i dkyil 'khor mi snang bar 'gyur te/ bud
207b7(rgyud): med kyang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'od kyi phreng ba dang ldan pas phyogs rnams kyang kun tu snang bar byed bzhin pa/ sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dug ste/ kye kye sem
207b8(rgyud): dpa' chen po longs shig grub pa yino zheso// de nas sgrub pa pos sna ma'i me tog dang bsres pa'i dri chus mchod yon dbulo// de nas de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyu ro// 
208a1(rgyud): nyi ma de nas bdag nyid dam 'di'i grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga la deng ras ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba rnams rab tu ster bar byedado// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang
208a2(rgyud): kun tu sbyin par byedo// de nas sgrub pa pos mchod yon phul nas gsheg su gsol bar bya'o// ras ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ras ris blangs te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
208a3(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas de nas ri'i rtse mo 'am/ mi med pa'i gnasu 'gro bar bya'o// der bdag nyid dam/ grogs pos phyag dar byas nas dgram par bya ba rnams bkram la gnas der
208a4(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o// de nas sgrub pa pos sngar bzhin du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhug su gsol nas seng ldeng gi me sbar
208a5(rgyud): la thun gsum du pad+ma dkar po'i me tog zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa rnams kyis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa ga cig tu/ rtsa ba'i rig pa 'am snying po 'am nye ba'i snying pos
208a6(rgyud): las chen po thams cad kyi ched du 'am yi ge gci ga pa'i ched du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas maHna phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das ma
208a7(rgyud): sgrol ma sngon gsum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing / 'dod pa'i mchog gnang bar byedado// na mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang ba 'am byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ 
208a8(rgyud): mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam/ tshe ring ba nyid dam/ rgyal srid chen po dang / longs spyod chen po nyid kyi ched dam/ rgyal po chen po mnyes pa nyid dam/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
208b1(rgyud): dbang phyug gi rje su rnam par spyod pa nyid dam/ mdor na yid la 'dod pa de thams cad gnang bar byed// gang blangs kyang rung ste/ de mthun par gnang bar byed cing / grub pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad
208b2(rgyud): kyang thob bo// sems can chen po rnams 'gugs par byed pa 'am/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar zhus pa de thams cad mdzad// las kyi nyes pa rab tu sngags pa yang yang dag par sbyong bar byed do// 
208b3(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsung so// las kyi tshi ga gzhan pa bar ma'i sgrub thabasu 'gyur ba ni/ dang po re shig khyad par gyi gnas sam gtsang ma'i phyogs sam chu klung ngam/ chu gling
208b4(rgyud): gi 'gram du sngar bzhin du thams cad byas nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag la/ bdag nyid kha shar du phyogs pas gnas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug
208b5(rgyud): sde rgyas pas gong bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste thun pa/ sum du 'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o// bzlas pa yongasu rdzogs pa dang / dong ka'i me tog tsan+dan dkar po dang bsres pa 'am gur
208b6(rgyud): gum dang bsres pas snga ma de bzhin khe nar me sbar nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o// sbyin sreg gi mthar ras ris 'gul na blon po nyid// ras ris la 'od kyi snang ba byung na 'ong
208b7(rgyud): las rgyal sring // ras ris kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi rgyal srid do// ras ris la me byung na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid nge 'argya byin
208b8(rgyud): nyidado// ras ris ston par byed pa byung na byang chub sems dpa' gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid// ras ris kyi phyag spyi bor reg na mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sa bdun rje su thob pa dang / stobs
209a1(rgyud): bcu nges pa nyid rim gyis thob par byed pa nyid do// de nas sgrub pa pos bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrub te bkres pa dang skom pa phyir gzhil ba'i
209a2(rgyud): dor rje su thob pa de nyid kyis dang / cho ga de nyid kyi yo byad kyis rig pa'i spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i chos la yang dag par nan tan bya'i gzhan du grub par mi 'gyur// de ltar rim gyis
209a3(rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa la rjesu 'jug cing mdor nan tan nges par sgrub par byed/ rdzas dang sman dang yo byad kyi khyad par dang / nor bu rin po che rnams ji ltar sngar nges par bstan pa bzhin du sgrub
209a4(rgyud): par byed// sngags shes sngags ni bzlos pa po'ang // cho ga bshad pa la sems pa// sngags pa de tshe de phyog su// gtsang ma'i 'gro bas zas kyang ni// zos nas yid ni dga' ba dang // dbang po
209a5(rgyud): yangasu rdzogs pa dang / lhung bzed lhag ma rtag bla ngas te// sems bzang chu bo gtsang mar 'gro// mtha' gcig tu ni bor nas ni// brtul zhugs cadan gyis dud 'gro sbyin// dung 'gro
209a6(rgyud): rnams la 'thun byin nas// 'bad pas lhung bzed bkru bar byed// lhag ma lhung bzed bya ba ni// skum med zas dang dri bral gang // lhung bzed lhag mas thub pas gsungs// gang du slong ba'i snod
209a7(rgyud): du ni// de ru zan ni mi bza' ste// der ni bzang ba wa khu dang // rdzas rnams rtag tu bza' mi bya// pad 'dab kyis kyang ma yin te// ut+pa la las byung bas sam// dri bzang ldan rnams spangs pa te// sngags
209a8(rgyud): bas der ni mi bza'o// gang yang sngags pas ku mu da// sla kla u dum ba ra las byung // ba Ti'i 'dab ma dang yang ni// tsher ma'i yal ga'i ri khrod byung // A mra'i 'dab ma ru'ang min// de bzhin
209b1(rgyud): sA Ta la las byung // sa la'i 'dab ma shi ri Sha// byang chub shing las byung ba dang // gang du bcom ldan 'das rgyas ni// shAkya seng+ge bzhugs pa yi// shing de 'bad pas spang bar bya// shing de yi ni yal
209b2(rgyud): ga dang // na ga ke sar shing la'ang min// gang du nam yang bza' mi bya// mkhas pas de kun cis kyang spang // thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil po ni// rmongs pas nam yang 'gem mi bya/ sngags pa dam
209b3(rgyud): tshig nyams par 'gyur// zas ni lo ma de rnams las// gzhan pa'i lo ma rnamasu bza'// sa byung zas su nges bstan pa// de bzhin gser dang dngul las byung // shel dang rdo ba las byung ba// de
209b4(rgyud): bzhin bza' ba blangs nas ni// rtag tu sngags pas der ni bza'// lo ma'i rgyar du mi bza' ste// de bzhin lag pa'i mthil du'ang min// stobs bcu pa yi sras rnams dang / 
209b5(rgyud): rang rgyal bse'u lta bu gang // de bzhin gshegs pI nyan thos gtso// lo ma gzhan dang lha bshos 'byung // zlos pos de rnams spang bar bya// yi ge rkang pas kyang mi 'gom// sna tshor
209b6(rgyud): bza' ba snam khur dang // de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams// sngags pas 'bad pas blang bar bya// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos skyes bu mchog/ dkon
209b7(rgyud): mchog gsum la phul ba yi// lha bshos thams cad nyid dang ni// zlos pos rtag tu spang bar bya// chung ngu tsam yang lus can la// sngags rnams de yis mi 'grub ste// kun nas
209b8(rgyud): bkra shis thams cad dang // rtag tu dpal ni smos ci dgos// rgyal ba can dang zhi ba can// lha bshos gtor ma za byed pa// de tshe de yi kun mi 'grub// gtsang zhing mkhas la tshul khrims
210a1(rgyud): / ldam snying rje snying rje'i las can dang // gtsang sbra'i spyod pa la dga' ba// rig sngags kun tu sgrub par byed// sems can gzhan la byin pa'i zas// zlos pos de ni bza' mi bya
210a2(rgyud): gzhan gyis rab tu ma btags pa'i// zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o// rang la byin pa'i kha zas ni// cung zad tsam yang blang bar bya// sngags shes de ltar 'jug pa ni// de yi dngos grub sdig pa'i dgra
210a3(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par byed par gnas// zlos pos cho ga 'di yis ni// bza' ba len pa'i brtul zhugs can// thub pa rnams kyis legs par sngags// sngags rnams thams cad sgrub pa la// mdor
210a4(rgyud): na cho ga mthong ba yis// bza' ba kun dang las rnams la'o// de nas gzhan yang rab 'chang byed// sngags ni thams cad sbyong bar byed// de nas zlos pos nye reg bya// de tshe sngags ni brjod par bya// 
210a5(rgyud): de tshe sngags pas lan bdun du// lus sbyong byed ba bzlas byas nas// 'byung ba'i tshogs dang lha rnams 'dir/ de don rgyas pa mnyam par gyis// lus kun nye reg byas nas
210a6(rgyud): thub pas sngags 'di brjod par bya// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba kil+li Shawa/ nA sha ni/ nA sha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta pra yuMk+taM/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM dzaHswA hA/ sngags
210a7(rgyud): 'dis bslab pa'i zas gzhan gang yang rung ba yongs spyod pa na sngags lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas yongasu longs spyod par bya'o// zos nas snga ma bzhin du nye reg byas te spyi
210a8(rgyud): bo la sogs pa'i lus thams cad du byug nas de nas ngal bso bar bya'o// ngal sos nas yud tsam phyed dam thun gcig la'o// de nas ras ris dang / sangs rgyas thaMd la mngon par
210b1(rgyud): phyag byas nas/ dam tshig chos kyi gleg bam bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting 'dzin dang / 'phags pa sa bcu pa dang / 'phags pa gse
210b2(rgyud): 'od dam pa dang / 'phags pa rma bya chen po dang / 'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs te 'di rnams las gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o// nyi ma'i dus kyi tshang bzhi cha tsam du'o// 
210b3(rgyud): de nas yongasu zhi nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bklag par bya ste gleg bam brtul nas gos gtsang ma bgos te dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas de nas khrus kyi che du chu klung gi 'gram mam
210b4(rgyud): mtsho phran chen por 'jug pas song nas/ srog chags med pa'i sa blangs te lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas rig pa 'dis chu la gdab bo// gang zhe na/ na maH
210b5(rgyud): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta sha sa na nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba duSh+Ta staM b+ha ya hUM/ nA dI ba ra d+ha ri ne/ sa ma ya ma nu ma ra phaT phaT swA hA/ 'dis srang ba byas nas phyogs rnams bcing
210b6(rgyud): ba dang / grogs rnams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / kha bcing ba dang / gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang / bgegs bcings pa las yang srang
210b7(rgyud): bu la lan bdun bzlas nas rked pa'i phyogasu bcings pas thaMd yongasu 'chags pa dang / bzlas pa'i dus thams cad dang / khrus kyi dus thams cad dang / gdug pa'i bgegs rnams
210b8(rgyud): par gzhom pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i don du sngags 'di stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad byed// pad+ma'i gdan la phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o// 
211a1(rgyud): las rnams thams cad thams cad kyi rnam pa gzhan du mi 'byor// de nas sgrub pa pos sa las byung ba'i phye ma la sogs pa rnams blangs nas ji ltar bde bar khrus bya zhing
211a2(rgyud): srog chags med pa'i chus khrus byas te/ thams cad las thams cad la srog chags med pa nyis kyis bya'o// de nas khrus byas nas sa'i rang bzhin nam gzhan dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i dri dang / 
211a3(rgyud): yo byas kyi khyad par gyis rje su byug par bya'o// chu'i nang du 'chil ma dang / bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa yang dor bar mi bya'o// rtse bar yang mi bya'o// snying rje dang ldan pas bdag dang sen thaMd la
211a4(rgyud): saM ser brtag par bya ste/ bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal nye bar 'gags pa dang tshor bas mngon par non pa dang / chu rlabs bzhin du mngon par 'byung ba'i rab tu sbyor
211a5(rgyud): ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'di ltar sgrub pa dang bral ba sngags shes pas gang de bzhin du dug dang / gcod pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par
211a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa la sogs rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi phung po nye bar 'gog par bya bzhin pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thibs po gnas pa'i bdag nyid mthong zhing gnas med pa dang skyob pa med pa dang / 
211a7(rgyud): skyabs med pa dang / shin tu dman pa'i yid can gyi bdag nyid du brtag nas sgom pa po mgrin pa nub tsam gyi chu na gnas pa 'am/ lte ba tsam du gnas pa'i chu de nyid kyi nang du sems rtse gcig tu
211a8(rgyud): nye bar bzung bar bya'o// dang po re shig pad+ma chen po'i 'dab ma la me tog chen po dang ldan pa pad+ma chen po'i lo mas nye bar mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po chebai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin las byung ba
211b1(rgyud): sdong bu dang / rin po che ma da ka las grub pa'i pad+ma'i ge sar dang / shel las byas pa'i sdong po legs par kha phye ba dang / de'i rjesu skyes pa'i shel dang pad+ma rA ga'i me tog rnams kyis mdzes pa'o// 
211b2(rgyud): de'i steng du seng+ge'i khri rin po che du mas nye bar mdzes pa ras bcos bu bang gis bkab pa'o// de'i steng du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya ste/ chos ston par mdzad cing
211b3(rgyud): bzhugs pa gser gyi mdog tu snang ba kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan pa tshang chen po na mkha' lta bu mchog tu bris bzhin pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar
211b4(rgyud): bzhugs pa/ g.ya su 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ pad+ma chen po 'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rnga yab bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das
211b5(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i grwa na 'khod de/ lus dmar ser gur gum btags pa'i kha dog lta bu'o// g.yon du 'phags pa mthu chen po thob ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o// de bzhin
211b6(rgyud): du byang chub sems dpa' brgyad la/ 'phags pa byams pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / na mkha'i mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal
211b7(rgyud): ngang/ 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang / nor bzang zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bcu po 'di rnams kyi ga ya su rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsam par bya ste/ tsan+dan dang / spos dang ldan dang / dog dang
211b8(rgyud): 'og dkar dang / 'dod pa dang / nye ba'i 'dod pa dang / mu khyung dang mu khyud brgya do// de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / 'phags pa
212a1(rgyud): shA ri'i bu dang / ba lang bdag dang / b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len dang / pi len da'i bu dang / 'phags pa sgra gcan zin dang / 'phags pa 'od srung chen po dang / 'phags pa kun dgal
212a2(rgyud): bo zhes pa'i nyan thos chen po de rnams dang nye bar/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// rang sangs rgyas rnams dang nye bar rang sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// 
212a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' brgyang po rnams kyi gnasa'ang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du/ kun nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
212a4(rgyud): chen po dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas bzhin du lha dang mi'i me tor rnam pa sna tshogs pa la me tog man+da ra ba dang / mar+tha
212a5(rgyud): rab chen po dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / d+ha nA ka ri ka dang / baN+Di ka dang / in+d+ra ba ra'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa tshang chen po phung po chen por gnas pa ri rab tsam gyi me tog gi
212a6(rgyud): phur mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya zhing / 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' rnams la phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
212a7(rgyud): mtshan dang / kha dan rnams dang / lha dang mi'i mar me mang po bye ba khrag brig brgya stong phrag yid du 'ong ba rnams kyi mchod par bya'o// de bzhin du gtor ma dang / bdug pa dang / lha bshos dang mched
212a8(rgyud): ba dang / bsnyen bkur la sogs pa yo byad lha dang mi'i nyer 'bo rnams dbul bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer mngon par 'phro
212b1(rgyud): bzhin pas bdag nyid dang phyogs thams cad kyang kun tu snang bzhin par bsgom par bya'o// sgom pa po bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu thob bo// nges pa
212b2(rgyud): byang chub mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyuraro// de lta bu sogs bsam gtan rnams// 'jig rten skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// 'byung po kun kyang legs pa dang // sngags pa rnams la phan
212b3(rgyud): don dang // de tshe bsam gtam dang po'i gtso// sngags pa kun la phan don du// sems can rnams kyi phyir gsungaso// de nas thub mchog bdun pa yi// dkyil 'khor rnam par brjod par bya// thub
212b4(rgyud): bas dang po gsungs pa yin// gnyis pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang // gsum par yang ni de las gzhan/ dang por mchog gi dngos grub ste// bar ma la ni de bzhin gzhan/ 
212b5(rgyud): chung ngu la ni phran tshegs 'grub// thub pa mchog gis nges par gsungs// de bzhin ras ris bsam gtan ni// thu bo bar ma chung ngu ste// thams cad sdig pa 'jig byed pa'o// de las
212b6(rgyud): gzhan yang mkhas pa ni// bsam gtan rnam pa rab bsgrub bya// bsam gtan de la rab gnas na// sngags rnams de la 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bshad// zlos pos bsam
212b7(rgyud): gang na bsgoms nas ni// sngags kyi mchod yan der phul nas// ji ltar bde bar gshegasasu gsol// chu tshogs de las bsgral nas ni// de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro// gnas ni sngon du nges ba
212b8(rgyud): bar/ cho ga mthong bas legs zhi bar// de la sngags pas gsang sngags bzlas// sngar las ji ltar brjod pa bzhin// rang gi lha ni spyan drangs pa// der ni sngags kyis gshegastsol/ 
213a1(rgyud): de nas bdag nyid de bzhin nyid// grogs po rnams ni bsrungs byas nas// dge ba'i las kyis de nyid shes// cho ga'i las la dga' zhing 'dud// rnam pa sna tshogs bstod ma
213a2(rgyud): kyis/ gang zag mchog la kun bstod nas// rang sngags sngags kyis mgon po dang // nyan thos rang rgyal bse ru dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// 'jig rten gsum po rjes 'dzin
213a3(rgyud): bzod// de nas gsang sngags bzlos pa po// stan de la ni slar langs nas// thag ring kan su song nas ni// phyi rol rlung gi rnam par spangs// snabs dang mchil ma rnam par der// bshang dang gci
213a4(rgyud): de bzhin no// nyin par byang du kha phyogs shing // mtshan mo lho ru kha blta'o// sngags zlos pas ni nam yang der// don rnams bsam par mi bya'o// der ni rang las byed gsungs pa'i// sngags kyi
213a5(rgyud): bzlas pa mi bya'o// rangab sngags 'gro ba mtshan sa gas kyi// de tshes steng nyer 'dug ste// dag pa'i chu yis le re/ bya/ gtsang ma'i gos mtha' chur gzhug bya/ sa yi phung
213a6(rgyud): bdun nyid kyis// 'bad pas rkang pa bkrus byas nas// rab tu 'dzag pa bdun blangs nas/ bshang ba 'dzag pa sum cu ste/ gnyis ka'i mtha' la lag pa dag / mchil ma dor ba nyid dang ni/ 
213a7(rgyud): snabs la'ang gnyis te de bzhin no// de nas 'bad pas nyes reg bya// gnas la ring du song ba'i sar// de bzhin dgra tsam song nas ni// lam la sogs pa yangs pa ru// de nas gzhan gyi
213a8(rgyud): ci 'dod bzhin// lho phyogs mtha' yi phyi rol tu// chu dang g.yang sa med pa dang / de bzhin bye mas khyab pa dang // chu klung spangs shing ngoms kyang spangs// 'bad pas mi gtsang chu spangs par/ 
213b1(rgyud): gsang zhing shin tu sbyangs pa dang // bas mtha' ljongs ni spangs pa dang // rnam par dben pa'i sar song nas// sngags pas mi gtsang der bar bya// zlos po dus ni shes byas nas// ji ltar 'dod
213b2(rgyud): ba'i shugs dag min// de nas dag pa'i phyogs song ste// bas mthar de bzhin bshang ba dang // bci ba'i bya ba byas nas ni// de ru lus ni ci bde bar// gnyis ka 'am gsang g.yogs sbas pa dang // skye bo
213b3(rgyud): med pa'i sa sprad par// gsang sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya// de bzhin kho nar thams cadadu// ri bo dang ni tshang tshing dang // bas mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' ba// de bzhin rgyal bas spangs pa
213b4(rgyud): yi// gdug pa'i sems can rnam bral bar// gas nga sngags rgyal po thams cad sgrub// rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i yul// skye bo gtsang sbra spyod la dga'// ma dang pha la gus pa dang / 
213b5(rgyud): gnyis skyes rigs kyis der ba ru// lha rnams dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gnas der yin gyis gzhan du min// nyam sa dga' skal lnga la shing rta'i 'gram// ya mu na nyid rab mdzes
213b6(rgyud): pa// sin d+ha nar ma da bak+She/ zla ba'i cha ni gtsang ma'i 'gram/ ka be ri dang dbyangs can nyid// chu klung chen po shI ta nyid// 'di grub zhing gzhan ma yin par// stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis
213b7(rgyud): bshad// stobs bcu pa yis gsungs pa'i zhing // byang phyogs lam med ri bo dang // kha che ngari rgya yul dang // bal yul de bzhin mang yul dang // rgya nag che dang li yul nying // de dag ma
213b8(rgyud): lus grub pa'i zhing // byang gi phyogasu brten pa yi// gang yang ri ngang chu bo yang // bsod nams yul du rab tu brjod// nas dang gro ni za ba'o// gang du sems can snying rje ldan// de ru cham
214a1(rgyud): bar dngos grub 'gyur// dpal gyi ri bo brag 'i che// lho phyogs yul du gnas pa yi/ dpal ldan 'bras bung mchod rten ni/ sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel 'dzin/ der ni sngags
214a2(rgyud): rnams bsgrub par bya// myur du las dang las rnam so// rdo rje gangan dang mchod rten che// chos kyi 'khor lo mdzes pa dang // gang du thub gtse zhi bar gshegs// der yang dngos grub blta bar bya// lha las
214a3(rgyud): babs pa'i mchod rten ni/ sa pak+She dang cho 'phrul che// ser s+ya zhes bya'i grong mchog dang / lum bi'i tshal du 'khrungs pa deng// gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal bas bstod cing ra
214a4(rgyud): bsngags pa'i// bya rgod phung po'i ri der dang // de bzhin brag dang bsil ba'i tshal// me teka zhes bya'i grong mtsho ka dang / de bzhin rtag tu kA shi'i grong // bcom brlag ka n+ya kub ji
214a5(rgyud): dang nas steng grong ni 'phags rgyal dang // mchod rten de bzhin yangs pa can// rtag tu sa steng mi thi la// grong dang grong khyer gtso bo rnams// gang gzhan rgyal ba yang dag 'byung // rab bsngags bsad
214a6(rgyud): nams yul dag tu// de rnamasu ni dngos grub sgrub// 'di rnams las gzhan yul rnams ni// grong dang ljongs dang ri bo dang // gnas dang grong mcheg gtso ba ni// 'o ma 'am 'bab tshul bsten pa/ de
214a7(rgyud): ni rnams dben rjes 'jug cing // bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' bar 'gyur// gnas ni bla khab med pa dang // rtag tu khang pa stong pa ru// sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'o// sngags rnams rjes 'thun las rnams
214a8(rgyud): ni/ sngags pas rtag tu yul dbu su// sngags bzlas yang dag 'dod par bya// bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson// sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms// tshul khrims spyod cing shin tu brten// 
214b1(rgyud): 'byung po kun la phan par dga'// sngags kyi spyod pa la dad pa// brtul zhugs can gyis sngar bzlas// gtsang ma'i yul dang gtsang sbra can// kla klo rkun ma spangs pa dang // dmyal bar ni// der ni bskal
214b2(rgyud): pa chen por gnas// dam tshig snang ba bral ba'i phyir// dmyal ba'i mi bzang mun pa ru/ byis pa'i skye bo 'tshed par byed// dam pa'i chos la smad pa dang / mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa dang // ye shes
214b3(rgyud): byis pa'i ngo bo 'am// rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal can// rig pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa// mi bzang dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// de phyir sdig pa mi bya zhing // log par smra ba'ang smad pa yin// dam pa'i
214b4(rgyud): chos la brnyas pa dang // log par lta ba spang pa yin// de phyir rtag tu dang gyur nas// gsang sngags cho ga rtag tu bsten// bden par smra zhing chos shes pa// sems can rnams le rtag tu phan// sngags shes
214b5(rgyud): sngags ni bsten par byed// de yi dngos grub nges par 'gyur// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yis// las ni rnam pa sna tshogs byeng // las rnams bya ba rnams kyis byed// rtag tu
214b6(rgyud): phan pa'i bya ba yis/ bya ba'i las dang yang dag ldan// de la rtag tu grub par 'gyur// bya ba'i don dang don kun phyir// las don rtag tu bya ba'o// bya ba'i don du bya min gang // bya ba'i las la
214b7(rgyud): sbyar bar bya// 'bras bcas nyid kyi bya don gyi// bya ba nyid du rtag tu bya// bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid// bya ba las 'bras rtag tu'o// 'bras med 'bras bu nyid 'gyur zhing // 'bras bu nyid
214b8(rgyud): kyang rtag tu 'bras// 'bras med 'bras bu bcas pa nyid// thams cad nyid kyang 'bras bu bcas/ rnal 'byor sngags ni sgrub bya ste// yang dag sbyor dang bral ba yang // bral dang yang
215a1(rgyud): / dag ldan sgrub bo// bsgrub bya sgrub byed med par ni// de la grub pa yod ma yin// grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang // grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin// sngags kyi dngos
215a2(rgyud): grub ma grub pa/ sngags ni sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu// byed par 'dod pa de las te// 'dod pa'i las ni byang bar 'gyur// las min las ni thams cad la// las kyi rgyud ni mi bya'o// 
215a3(rgyud): sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i// las ni mtha' dag brtsam par bya// brtsam dang rtsom pa'i 'dud pa yi// las nyid brtsam pa'i mi bya'o// bya ba ma brtsam sngags rnams
215a4(rgyud): nI/ lus can kun la 'grub mi 'gyur// sems can kun rjes skyong ba yi// thub pa'i gtso bos sngon gsungs pa// gsang sngags smras pas bstan pa yi// rgyal ba'i sras
215a5(rgyud): kyi yang dag sdom// sgrub po sngags ni kun shes shing // rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la tshig/ sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin// lam ni byang chub rgyur gyur pa// sngags kun nyid
215a6(rgyud): ni sgrub par byed// rig pa mnyam par 'gyur ba yin// de ni ring por mi thogs par// mkhase bas dngos grub 'gyur ba yin// 'byung po thams cad zhi don du// sangs rgyas kun gyis
215a7(rgyud): rab tu bsgrags// gsang sngags tshul gyi lam 'dis ni// mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yi// de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam// chos don thams cad rdzogs par byed// de yi mthar thug dpung
215a8(rgyud): gnyen ni// dang po gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid// de bzhin 'dir ni lhun grub tu// 'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub thob// sna tshogs las dang chos shes pa// sngags rnams byed pa
215b1(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin// tshul khrims bsam gtan rnam thar rnams// 'di rnams mdor bsdus thob pa yin// dngos grub don du sgrub byed pa// rgyal ba gtso bos gsungs pa yin// gang zag rkang pa'i
215b2(rgyud): don theb pa// dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang // de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin gtso// tha mas rgyal srid rgyu yin te// lha min lha yo 'jig rten gyi// de bzhin de rnams bdag po ni/ sngags pas thad
215b3(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// bya ba 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur// gtsang sgra'i kun spyod yang dag ldan// tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag tu dga'// sngags rnams kun tu gsungs pa yin// de nas sngags
215b4(rgyud): pas sngags bzlas bya// sngags pa 'byor ba 'ang da pa yis// rnam pa sna tshogs las byed te// de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang // tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin// tha mas long spyod 'phes
215b5(rgyud): ba yin/ khar mas gong ma'i lus can nyid// mchog nyid kyis ni ldang ba nyid// zlos pos rtag tu thob par byed// sngags bas bzlas mthar ngal bso zhing // ji srid du su brtag par bya// 
215b6(rgyud): bzlas pa'i dus la bab pa na// der ni sgrub par bya ba yin// de bzhin las rnams sgrub par byed// de la rtag tu bzlas pas skyes bu rang gi sdig pa zad par byed// sngags pas sngon las
215b7(rgyud): kyi tshi ga gang byas pa skye ba rgyud pa rnamasu grub par gnas pa de/ de bzhin du las tshogs la rnyed par 'gyur ba de skyes pas sngags bzlas pas// slar yang sngags zlos pa po'i sdig pa
215b8(rgyud): zad pa'i don dang / las de 'joms shing sngags grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du mchog dang / bar ma dang tha ma'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa dang bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus par zad
216a1(rgyud): par byed cing / skye ba brgyud pa rnamasu gang bar byas/ sdig pa de thams cad 'jig par byed de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas pas/ lus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
216a2(rgyud): rgyar gyis rgyan pa dang / thub pa rnams kyis gnas pas dga' ba dang // yon+dan thams cad kyis grags par 'gyur ba dang // gnod sbyin gyi khang par gnas pa'i rgyal po nyid dang / rtag tu den thad kyi
216a3(rgyud): dngos grub kyang thob pa dang lnga no// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i
216a4(rgyud): rtog pa las/ ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byam ste dgu pa rdzog so// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cangad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs
216a5(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub se/ mas dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig khyod kyi rig pa'i
216a6(rgyud): sngags rjesu spyod pa sems can mtha' dag gi don la brtson pa/ sems can rnams gang gis bzlas par bya ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang / gang dang ldan pas bgrang bar bya ba'i bgrang phreng gi cho ga
216a7(rgyud): rgyud thams cad kyi thun mong gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga sngags thams cad kyi cho ga de legs par nyon la/ legs par yid la zung shig bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sems
216a8(rgyud): dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das leg so leg so// bac+doMs bdag cag la rjesu brtse bas nye bar blangs nas rig pa'i sngags thams
216b1(rgyud): cad kyi spyod pa dang / dam tshig la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yang de bka' stsal du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
216b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman ras gzigs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po rnam par dbye ba rgyas par bshad par bya'o nyon cig/ gang gis sngags
216b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa/ sems can gyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa de gang zhe na/ dang po re shig/ sngag su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha nAM/ a tsin+ta b+hU ta/ rU pi nAM/ r+ya \u0f7f
216b4(rgyud): a~M ku ru ku ru sarba aR+tha sA d+hA ya/ sarba duSh+Ta bi mo ha ni/ ga ga nA ba laM be bi sho d+ha ya swAhA// rig pa 'dis bgrang phreng thams cad la las bya'o// sbyang ba dang / dbugs pa dang / blang ba dang / d+hU ba la so/ 
216b5(rgyud): pa'i las rnams bya'o// dang po bgrang phreng shing la ni// lan gra ngas sum cu rtsa bdun du// de yis mngon par bsngags byas nas/ brtul zhugs can gyis srung ba bya// mtshan mo gcig
216b6(rgyud): phyag nyid log nas// der ni rmi lam brtag par bya// mi ma yin gzugs kun rdzogs pa// mi sdug lhag par mche ba gtsigs// sngags pa la ni des smras pa// bcom ldan sems pa ji bzhin la
216b7(rgyud): sgrub pa the rangs langs nas ni// shing de ru ni 'gro bar byed// mi sdug gzugs ldan gtsigs pa che// rmi lam du yang ma mthong na// sngags pas shing de bor bar bya// de nas gzhan du 'gro bar
216b8(rgyud): gyis// dang po ru rAk+Sha yinate// de las gzhan pa dbang mo'i shing / be de tse ni 'dod pa'o// gzhan yang 'bras bu 'byung ba yi// shing la 'dzegs pa'i legs rdzogs pa'i// grogs dang
217a1(rgyud): lhan cig 'dzegs par bya// grogs po med par gyur na ni// rang nyid de la 'dzegs par bya// steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gan su// 'dzegs nas phun tshogs brtul zhugs can/ 
217a2(rgyud): de la rtag tu bag yod pas// steng gi yal ga'i 'bras bu blangs// steng gi sa la legs sbyar bya// steng gi mchog gi dngos grub du// gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin// bar mar dngos grub
217a3(rgyud): 'bring po ste// tha ma la ni 'og ma'o// srog chags rnams kyis ma smad pa'i// 'bras bu de rnams yang dag blangs// nub kyi yal ga las thob pa/ rdzas kyi rgyur ni bsgrub par bya// byang gi gnod
217a4(rgyud): sprin mo la sogs// lha rnams lhan cig 'gugs par byed// dgug pa'i bya ba bshad pa ni// kun gyi don du ni phyir// lha dang lha min ka yul 'gyed dang // mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams/ 
217a5(rgyud): 'did pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed// 'byung po tha ma sa cang rgyas pa'i phyir// 'bras bu dang bcas las rnams ni/ ma lus spyod pa byed pa'o// shar gyi phyog su yal ga dang / 
217a6(rgyud): der gnas 'bras bu 'byung ba rnams// de bzhin la zad pas byas gyur na// tshe ring po yi don gyi rgyu// rtag tu sngags kyi dngos grub 'bras// rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin// gang zhig
217a7(rgyud): lhar ni 'gro ba yi// yal ka lo mar rab ldan pa// sems can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed// de na zlos po 'bad pas spang // lho ru rten pa'i yal ga la// 'bras bu gang du yang dag brjed/ 
217a8(rgyud): phyogs des gdung dbye dgra rnams kyi// srog ni 'jig par byed pa yi// bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu// de ni zlos pos 'bad pas spang // 'og tu 'phyang ba'i yal kar gnas/ 
217b1(rgyud): 'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa/ lha ma yin dang ldan pa yi// sa yi 'og tu de rnams 'gro// de rnams 'bras bcas phreng ba ni// blangs nas yang dag rab bsgrags pa// 'og tu 'gro ba'i 'bri shing
217b2(rgyud): de nas de ni sa 'og 'gro// de ru rab tu zhugs nas lha'i// bde nyid zlos pos deng 'gyur// lha min bu mos yang dag ldan// de ni bskal par gnas par byed// bgrang phreng 'bras bu kun blangs nas// de nas
217b3(rgyud): zlos pos bzlas pa bya// lhan cig bsrung ba byas nas ni// de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro// de nyid ring po'i gnas ni// gtsang ma'i phyogs der sngags pa ni// de bzhin rtag tu 'dug par bya// bkrang
217b4(rgyud): phreng skyes pa sbyar bar bya// brtson pas bgrang phreng 'bras bu blang // de nas kun tu yang dag spyad// der ni phreng ba dbug par grags// gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig dang ni/ 
217b5(rgyud): grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// sngags shes der ni sbyang bar bya// rtag tu snga ma'i sngags kyis ni// brgyad dam bdun du bzlas byas pa// de nas de ni dag par 'dod// pad+ma'i rtsa lag legs
217b6(rgyud): brjod pas// bu mos bkal ba'i srang bu yi// sum 'gyur lnga dang ldan pa yi// brtul zhugs can gyis phreng thag bya// sngags kyi de nyid shes pas rgyu// 'bras bu phra mo bzlum por bcas
217b7(rgyud): rtag tu srog chags bu ga med/ yan lag ma nyams ma smad pa// mdzes shing kha dog sdug pa dang / bu ga med cing gas pa med// ring bu zlum po ji bzhin pa// de bzhin ru rak+Sha dang ni// bo nga
217b8(rgyud): tse dang in+d+ra k+Sha/ 'bras nyid rtag tu lung thang mdzes// 'bras bu dam pa 'am gang gi tshe/ sngags pa mchog tu brtson pa yis/ 'bad pas bgrang phreng ba rgyu bar bya// gser ram yang ma
218a1(rgyud): dngul dag gam/ nor bu shel las byung ba dang // mu tig dung nyid mu sa ra// byi ru yis kyang bya ba ste// phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs bya// gzhan yang rin chen las byung ba'i// bgrang
218a2(rgyud): phreng bzang po bya ba dang // sa las byung ba'i ldum po yi// ril bus bgrang phreng can dag ni// mnyam par gzhag ste srang bu brgyu// gzhan yang ril bu 'ga' zhig gam// 'bras bu 'am khams
218a3(rgyud): la byung ba yis// ku sha'i rtse mos brgyus pa yang // zlos pos 'bad de bya ba yin// brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu lnga// lnga bcu 'di dag par ma yin// sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa yis// 
218a4(rgyud): 'bras bu'i tshad rnams brgyu bar bya// stong rtsa brgyad pa nyid bya @/ phreng ba 'di ni thu bo yin// phreng ba rnam pa 'di bzhin ni/ sngags pas rtag tu brgyu bar bya// de nas rgyus te
218a5(rgyud): sngags rnams ni// phyi mo gsum mam gnyis nyid dang // rgyu lcags las byung gdu bu dang // de bzhin gser dang dngul dag dang // de nas zangs byung gdu bus kyang // phreng ba kun
218a6(rgyud): nas rgyu bar bya// de nas mtha' ru yang mig bya// de la rim gyis dgod par bya// 'bad pas mdzes par bkri ba bya// sangs rgyas ma lus bzhugs par ni// yongasu gsal bar byas de nas// 
218a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin// sbrul gyi gdengs ka'i rnam pa bzhin// yongasu bkris pas rgyan pa yin// mu tig do shal rnams mtshungs shing // mgul rgyan rnam par sprul pa'o// 
218a8(rgyud): de nas 'bab chu dge ba'i mthar// dri ma med la khrus byas nas// go rim ji bzhin khrus byas te// chu yi gnas la ldang bar bya// de bzhin brtson pas nye reg bya// bgrang phreng srad bu blang
218b1(rgyud): nas ni// ba yi rnam lngas rab tu bkru// sa yi phye mas rab bkrus nas// gtsang ma'i gos la dri bzang gis// rje su nye bar byugs pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa'i kha dog kyang // tsan+dan dkar po gur gum pa
218b2(rgyud): 'bad pas dron mos bkru bar bya// de bzhin gnyis ka 'gro bar 'gyur/ ji lta'i gan su song nas ni// gang du ras ris bar ma ni// rgyal mchog thub pa'i gtso bo ni// shAkya seng+ge mi yi mchog ston pa'i gzun
218b3(rgyud): brnyan de bzhin du// sa steng rgyal ba'i ring sel can// mchod pa de yi spyan sngar dgod// de dang nye bar gzhag nas ni// de tshe de'i spyan lnga ru// dam tshig la gnas stong rtsa brgyad/ son pa 'am brgya yang
218b4(rgyud): gcig tu ni// brgyad dang bcas pa bzlas byas nas// nyin mtshan pa spong bar gnas gyur nas// bdun pa'i thub la phreng ba dbul// snga ma de bzhin zlas bya dang // cheng nyid de dang mnyam par bya// 
218b5(rgyud): de nas phreng ba yongasu bzlas// mtshan mo de nyid du 'khod de// ku sha ting ba'i sa bzhi la/ sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya/ rmi lam gang dang gang mthong ba// dge ba'i rmi lam
218b6(rgyud): mthong na ni// rmi lam nges par bstan pa yi// dngos grub de yis bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas nyan thos bse ru rnams// gal te rmi lam mthong gyur na// sngags pas 'bras bu bcas par 'grub/ 
218b7(rgyud): nges par de yi cho ga bya// dge slong gzugs dang bram ze yi// gzugs bstan sna tshogs mdzes pa mthong // gal te rmi lam de mthong na// phreng ba dbul bya de bzhin du// sngags kyi dom kun sgrub pa
218b8(rgyud): bo// de bzhin gdon mi za bar 'grub// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen rjes
219a1(rgyud): kyis rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byam las bcu pa bzang phreng gi cho ga'i rab 'byam rdzog so// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas
219a2(rgyud): slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems
219a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u rdzogs pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang / sbyin sreg gi las rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa'i sgrub pa yod de/ me la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho
219a4(rgyud): ga las gang du rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can rnams rab tu sbyor zhing gnas par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ rig pa'i sngags kyi tshogs gsang chen ni/ tad+ya thA/ oM tiSh+Tha
219a5(rgyud): ha ri ping+ga le/ hi rak+Sha di hi da dA pa ya hUM phaT phaT sA hA/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni mchog gi snying po la sa thams cad byed pa// 'dod pa thaMd gter ba'o// dang be re
219a6(rgyud): shig sgrub po pos me'i snying pa 'di lan cig bzlas pas mar gyi bsregs blugs gsum me la sbyin sreg bya ste me lha spyan drangs par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du rab tu sbyar te// zhi ba can dang / 
219a7(rgyud): rgyas pa can dang / drag po'i les rnams la yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyuraro// mya ngan med shing zhi don du// khyad pa brlan dang bcas pa nyid// mtho gang tsam ni khru gang tsam// sor mo
219a8(rgyud): gsum du'ang mtho ba yi// snams pa'i rnam pa rab tu shes// cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin// bu ka med cing ser ka med// de bzhin ne tso'i bshog pa 'dra// ljang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam// 
219b1(rgyud): kha dog nag po spang bar bya// srin po rnams kyis zos pa spang // bu ga med pa'ang yang dag sbyin// gzhan yang kha dog mchog min pa// tha ma'i chos kyang spangs pa'o// de rnams skam dang rlon
219b2(rgyud): pa'ang yin// de yi tshe yang brtsam par bya// ma rul yon po min nyid dang // shin tu ring ba'ang spang bar bya// de nas me thab byas nas ni// kun nas zur ni bzhi pa ru// 'on nyid du ni 'bang bas
219b3(rgyud): bsko// khru bzhi pa yi chang dang ni// khru gsum khru ni gnyis pa dang // de bzhin nyid du khru gcig pa// rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang // bye mas legs par sbyar ba de// de nas pad 'dra'i
219b4(rgyud): kha khyer ni// kun nas dkyil 'khor rnam pa'o//  na 'bad pas zur bzhi pa// 'dab ma gsum du bya ba'o// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can// 'di'ang yang dag bsgrags pa yin/ 
219b5(rgyud): mngon spyod la ni sa dbu su// rdo rje bya zhi rtse gnyisu// / rtse mo gsum du bya ba yin// me thab rgya la khru gnyis re// gcing ma'i phyogasu de bzhin padang // chu klung 'gram du de bzhin spyad
219b6(rgyud): bstan pa gcig gi phyogs rnams dang // dur khrod khang pa stong pa ru// sbyin sreg legs par brtsam par bya// de bzhin ri bo'i rtse gnyis dang // rtag tu lha khang steng pa dang // de bzhin nyid
219b7(rgyud): dgon pa che// gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs rnams ni// gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa dang // sbyin sreg las ni thams cad la// de rnams gnasu gsungs pa yin// khru gang tshad du
219b8(rgyud): gnas pa yi// ku sha'i khris la nyer 'dug nas// der ni sngags shes khyad par du// sbyin bsreg gi ni las bya'o// gnas de nyid du rab gnas pas// myur du dngos grub the tshom med/ 
220a1(rgyud): shar dang byang dub phyogs pas// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa bya/ lho ru drag po'i las rnams te// de ni sngags pas spang bar bya// shar bltas zhi ba'i dngos grub ste/ rgyas pa ca
220a2(rgyud): yang byang du phyogs// de'i sngags ni dus rtag tu// rig pa'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya// bil ba arga slak+Sha dang // n+ya gro d+ha yis rgyas las bya// mngon spong shing ni skam po dang // che ba skyar dang rnon po
220a3(rgyud): rnams// de dag thams cad spang bya ste// thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bka'// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can// rlon pa'i shing gis rab tu shis// de bzhin drag las la shing skam// tshwa ba sgyur dang rnon pa
220a4(rgyud): rnams// yam shing de rnams med na ni/ shing la de rnamasu rtag bya/ rtse mo gnyi su rtag pa bya// sngo dang snum dang 'dra ba dang / rma bya'i mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa'i// rnam pa de lha'i ku sha yis// 
220a5(rgyud): khor yug tu ku sha ni// rtag tu 'gram par bya ba ni zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can/ mar gang dang ni mtshungs paso// de bzhin rtag tu skam po'i rdzas// sdig pa'i las ni bya ba ste/ 
220a6(rgyud): 'dir ni rgyal ba mchog gis bkag dri med chu ni dag pa la// rtag tu srin pos spangs pa yi// de nas kun nas bsang gtor bya// g.yas phyog su ni bskor byas te// brtson pas me ni sbar bar
220a7(rgyud): bya/ cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya// gtsang ma'i rtsa yi rtsa ba yis// sgron me tshad dang ldan byas nas// de nas khu tshur brtsam byas nas// 'bad pas ma ni sbar bar bya// kha yi rlung gis mi bya
220a8(rgyud): rtag tu gos kyi mtha' kyang min// sham thabs bla gos mngon par spang // gos gzhan gyis kyang lag pa yi// rlung gi nye bar gzhom pa la// mngon par dga' bas ma yin no// gcing
220b1(rgyud): ma'i rlung yab de bzhin gos// nor bus kyang ni rlung yab bya// rlung ni yang dag 'byung ba 'dis// me ni mnyam par byas pa la// sngags shes pas na me sbar bya'o// sbyin sreg don du mnyam gzhag
220b2(rgyud): pas// de nas g.yas pa min pa yis// der ni bsang gtor byas nas ni// der ni ba yi mar gyis ni// bsreg blugs gsum ni sbyin par bya// de nas kyang phyag bya ste// sangs rgyas kun dang skyob pa
220b3(rgyud): dang / rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po la// de nas ci 'dod phyag bya'o// de tshe me yi snying po yi// sngags ni lan brgya bzlas pa yi// brtsom ldan dri zhim me tog gis// rtag tu me ni spyan
220b4(rgyud): drang bya// sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas// gnas la mkhas pas gdan dang gnas// sngags des dbul zhing gzhan gyis min// zho dang mar du bsres pa dang // sbrang rtsib
220b5(rgyud): pa'i yam shing ni// de las lan gsum sbyin bsreg bya// rgyas pa'i don du sngags dang las// kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba yis// 'khrugs pa der ni nges sbyar bya// skom pa
220b6(rgyud): tshim par bsam par bya// zhi ba'i las dang rgyan pa can// de la gsang sngags rig pa yis// lha yi gzugs ni dga' ba'o// mngon spyod las la thun mongs pa'o// nges par 'byung
220b7(rgyud): ba'i lha rnams las// gzhan pa'i gzugs ni blta bar bya/ rim pa ji bzhin me thab 'dir// ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dang // mar la lan 'dun yongs bzlas pas// de tshe spyan du
220b8(rgyud): rnam pa deng // ji ltar slar yang spyan drangs pa/ lhas par gnas pas gnyis ka gnas// yam shing rdzas dang 'asres pa dang / mang dang sbrang rtsi mnyam bstan pa// de bzhin nyid du na
221a1(rgyud): bsres pas// stong ngam 'byam gyi chud dang ni// brgyad dang brgya du'ang rtag par bya// de bzhin sngags pas rim pa bzung / lan bzlas shing me la do/ 'ang ba'i me yi phre
221a2(rgyud): bdang // de bzhin me lce gcis gyur pa/ zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sres bya/ dub med la'ang rgyas pa can// du bcas dran pa'i las rnams ni// rgyas pas smad cing spangs pa yin/ me mi
221a3(rgyud): dag ldan gyur ma/ sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sbyar/ zhi brtson la kha dog dkar// rgyal ba mchog ni cag tu bsngags// gal te me dkar sbyin sreg byed// de yi sngags rnams 'grub par 'grus
221a4(rgyud): de bzhin tug tu la don par/ rgyas pa can gyis dngos grub 'dang // nag 'a du ba'i kha dog dang / ser skya yang ni sdig pa can// kha dog rna mo gsum rab bsgyur bas// dngos slab rnam gsu
221a5(rgyud): ngag yin/ gzhan pa'i kha dog sprin mdog gam/ slar yang bstan pa'i sa steng der// sngags pa de la dngos grub med// de lha'i kha dog 'dra ba'am/ rnam pa sna tshogs la
221a6(rgyud): dog can/ me ni 'bar bde mthong na// slar yang las rnams brtsam par bya/ phyir zhing bzlas pa bya ba yin// gal te/ sngags ni grub myur na// las kyi chog mthong ba yis// slar
221a7(rgyud): yang sbyin sreg la rab 'jug gshegs gsol spyan drang nyid la ni// mau yi sngags ni brjod par bya// sngar ni rab tu rtag pas kyang // dkyil 'khor 'di ni gshegs su gsol// sbyar
221a8(rgyud): drangs po ya~M las rnams ni// de nyid du ni las rnams kyang // de nyid kyis ni bya ba yin// me yi spyod pa de bzhin gzugs// ras ris kyi ni spyan sngar brtsam// der ni sngags rnam
221b1(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur bar// sngon gyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// rgyal bas sngags pas las rnams ni// thams cad de nyid du bya'o// gzhan pa'i las ni bya ba ste// sdig pa'i las ni khyad par du
221b2(rgyud): gang du rgyal mchog gis smod pa// 'jig rten 'gal dang smad rnam so// ldang dang 'khor los bsgyur ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang // de bzhin mngon shes lnga dang ni// 'jig rten
221b3(rgyud): lha nyid ldan pa 'grub// rtag tu ras ris la btson shes// sbyin sreg las la mkhas pa ni// sa yi 'og gi bdag po 'am/ yang na bar snang spyod par 'gyur// sa bla'i lha dang gnod sbyin nyid// rtag tu
221b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gugs// rgyal srid bdag bo nyid dang ni// yul dang yang na grong nyid dam// rig pa 'dzin dang lha min nyid// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// 'byung
221b5(rgyud): thams cad 'gugs par byed// sems dpa' chen bo bdag nyid che/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ sa bcu la ni yang dag brten/ sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs byed na/ 
221b6(rgyud): sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos// sde dpon bdag po de bzhin du// khyad par 'jig rtem dbang phyug dang // 'byung po thams cad kun dbang byed// de bzhin nyi mi bdag nyid// 'byung po thams ca
221b7(rgyud): dbang don dang // yang na sa steng rgyal po mnyam// de bzhin rtag tu las kun la// thams cad sbyin bsreg gis ni bya// kun nas kun tu bcom ldan pas// las kun yang dag bsten par bya// de
221b8(rgyud): cher nges par bsgrub par bya// dpal don las ni mchog yin te// bar ma nyid kyang sgrub par byed/ yang na chung ngu nyid kyang ngo // de bzhin du ma rdzas rnams kun// de bzhin slar yang 'grub par
222a1(rgyud): gsungs// sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas// 'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub mthong // phyag rgya bcings dang rin pa nyid// las rnams kun la rtag tu bya// sbyin sreg las la
222a2(rgyud): rab 'jug pas// bdag nyid srung bar byas par 'gyur// de nas sngags 'di bklag par bya// 'di ni rtag tu las rnams la// bdun bzlas pa 'am brgyad bzla so// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bau d+hi satwA nAM/ a
222a3(rgyud): pra ti ha ta ga ti ma gA tA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM dz+wa la tiSh+Tha hUM/ ru ru bi shwa sam+b+ha be swA hA// sngags kyi rab sbyor 'di yis ni// slar yang shing la bzlas bya re// gnyis bzlas pa 'am bdun bzlas pa// 
222a4(rgyud): sngags rig des mer sbyin bsreg bya// me tog bdug pa dri dag kam// mdor na thams cad nyid kyang ni// gsang sngags 'azla sa pa'i chu rnams kyis/ 'di nyid kyi ni bsang
222a5(rgyud): gtor bya// de nas las rnams thams cad ni// rtswa 'dis cho ga brtsam par bya// las rnams dag ni thams cad la// snga ma 'i rab sbyor nyid kyis bya// sngar gyi sgra can ma bcings
222a6(rgyud): nas// phyag rgya chen mor grags ldan ma// srung ba byas par gyur de nas// zlos pos rig pa cig gis ni// las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya// dngos grub rgyu la mkhas pa yis// 
222a7(rgyud): gal te dge mtshan mthong gyur pa// rtag tu dge ba'i sgra grags na// de la sngags kyi 'bras bu ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin mchog rtsol 'gyur// dang po las la rab sbyor dang // sngags kyi rgyu
222a8(rgyud): la rab 'jug pas// 'bras med 'bras bur bcas pa nyid// dngos grub de la brjod par bya// rgyal ba'i sgra 'am pa Ta ha// rnga bo che yi kr-i gra ga na// brtson ldan kun 'gro'i dngos grub
222b1(rgyud): ste/ sbyin sreg las la yang dag bsten// gzhan yang dge mtshan dpal dang ni// 'dab chags sgra ni bzang po dang // rnam pa sna tshogs dgra dbyangs sam// rgyal bas bsngags shing rab snga
222b2(rgyud): pa/ bkra shis bzang po yid 'ong dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sgra dang ni// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // de bzhin bum pa gang ba dang // mchod yon
222b3(rgyud): mthong na dngos grub rgyu// kha dog rnam pa du ma dang // rab sngags 'jig rten gyis mchod pas// dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma// mthong nas de rnams blta ba la// gsang sngags spyod
222b4(rgyud): tshul sna tshogs 'grub// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi
222b5(rgyud): rtsa ba'i rtog pa las// bgrang phreng srad bu'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam bcug pa yongasu rdzog so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang
222b6(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzi gas dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa'
222b7(rgyud): chen po khyed kyi rig pa'i gsang chen yod// sngags thams cad kyis sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i dam tshig shes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod las byung ba
222b8(rgyud): chos kyi sprin la 'thun par rab tu zhugs pa/ na mkha'i rang bzhin/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi mnga' bdag ches gtso bor gyur pa sems dpa' chen po
223a1(rgyud): dper na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi mtsho'o// ches gtso bor gyur pa lha dang mi rnams kyis nang nas skyes bu'i khyu mchog sangs rgyas bac+doMs yin
223a2(rgyud): no/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan cing // gtso bo dam pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs
223a3(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa rnams kyis sngar gsungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi mchog gi snying po mchog tu bsang ba kun nas bkris par 'dod pa sangs
