397a5(rgyud): la cig phul nas grogs rnams la'ang bgos te khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyuraro// lo stong du 'tsho bar byed// sngon spyad pa byas pas 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing ri'i
397a6(rgyud): rtse mor ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas gso sbyong can gyis srogrog mkhar gyis rtag tu blangs nas 'o mas sbyar te 'jam par byas nas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i
397a7(rgyud): pa'i mtho gang gi tshod kyi ngang pa bya'o// ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa 'dris gzhug par bya'o// de nas rnam par dben pa'i phyog su ras ris bzhugs nas dri
397a8(rgyud): dang me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mchod de 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin nas gos gtsang ma bgos pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji srid ngang pa g.yo bar byed
397b1(rgyud): pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngar yongasu bzla bi gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// slar yang brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o// thang
397b2(rgyud): 'ong bar byed// 'jigs par mi bya'o// bsngags bzlas pa'i rma byas reg par bya'o// ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed// lus kyi nang du son par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// de nas sgrub pa
397b3(rgyud): bo'i lus su mi snang bar 'gyuraro// skad cig de nyid la sga li zhing 'khyil ba lo brgyad gnyis len pa rnam pa nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog ltar snang ba thogs pa med par 'gro bar
397b4(rgyud): byed// gang mthong ba dang / lta bar byed pa de dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyuraro// rig pa 'dzin pa thaMd 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te bskal par gnas shing gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe lha rnams
397b5(rgyud): skye bar 'gyuraro// sngon spyad pa byas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o// gso sbyong can gyis
397b6(rgyud): mi smra bar thog phog pa'i shing brangs nas 'o mar nyin zhag bdun du gzhug par bya'o// de nas phyung ste sa dkar po dang tsan+dan gyi chus mnyes pas ji srid rje
397b7(rgyud): phog pa'i 'khrur bzhug par bya'o// de nas sgrub pa po gso sbyong can gyis bzo bos seng ge byed bzhug par bya'o// de nas rgyu skar snang ma la dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rgya chen po
397b8(rgyud): rgya chen po byas nas dge 'dun gyi bstan pa'i spangs mo bza' bar bya'o// ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// de nas
398a1(rgyud): / sgrub pa po gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas lag pa g.yas pas seng+ge mnan te ji srid seng+ge g.yo bar byed pa/ de srid bzlas par bya'o// 
398a2(rgyud): g.yon pas dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan ma skye ste 'jigs par mi byed// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas yungs kar rnams kyis seng+ge la bzhu par
398a3(rgyud): bya'o// seng+ge sgra chen po sgrogs par byeda'o// sgrub pa po yang ma bsams par dgon pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyuraro// de nas sgrub pa pos lan bdun brjod nas seng+ge la 'dzegs te rig pa 'dzin pa
398a4(rgyud): thams cad kyang 'dus na seng+ge la zhon te 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar 'gyuraro// yid kyis rlung ltar 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor du ma dang / bskal par gnas shing gang gi tshe 'chi
398a5(rgyud): de'i tshe gang du 'dod par skye bar 'gyuraro// sang+ge'i sgrub thab so// na sgrub par byed par 'dod na dkar po'i zla ba nya nas brtsams te/ mi smra bar 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing ji snyed kyi
398a6(rgyud): ma zla ba gsum gyi bar du ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas ras ris g.yo bar 'gyu ro// yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan g.yo bar byed// nor gyi dngos grub chen
398a7(rgyud): bor 'gyuraro// nI lA Ta ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags te mdud pa bya'o// byad g.yul du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te spyi bor bzhag par byas na g.yul
398a8(rgyud): du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ gyad kyi dngos grub bo// dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas 'o ma dang lhan cig zangs kyi snod bzhag ste brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas pa byas nas 'thung
398b1(rgyud): de bzhin du ni ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas 'od zer byung tse sgrub pa pos bskor ba byas nas steng du 'gre ste rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur
398b2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i gzugs can lo brgya stong phrag gsum du 'tsho bar byed// nag pa'i brgyad pa la mtshan me cig smyung bar gnas pas gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du gi ba bzhag nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid
398b3(rgyud): du bzlas par bya'o// de'i tshe blang bar bya ste blangs pa tsam la sred med kyi bu'i stobasu 'gyur te gzhan gyi mtshon cha rnams mthu med par 'gyuraro// gang phreng ba dang ldan pa de gnas se sum brgya
398b4(rgyud): 'tshe bar byed// nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung b.raganas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bil ba'i shing gi me rab tu sbar nas be kaM ka ta'i ye shing la tsha ba'i til mar gyis
398b5(rgyud): btags pa stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig dang che cig rnye// dkar po'i bcu gsum pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas sa las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i lha byas nas
398b6(rgyud): do'i bar 'bras thug po che'i stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig nyi ma bdun la gang bu mo 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur// nage po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas dur khrad du sa
398b7(rgyud): ste sa kha ma lhung ba'i ba glang ni lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byug pa byas nas ma nyams pa'i thod pa blangs te tsan+dan dmar po'i chus bkrus me tog dmir po dang / dri dang me tog gis
398b8(rgyud): mngon par mchod cing de nas thod pa la nye bar 'dug ste/ gsang sngags bzlas pas dgug par bya'o// ji srid thod pa g.yo bar gyur pa de sridu'o// de'i tshe grub par 'gyuraro// de'i tshe sen
399a1(rgyud): mos gang bkug pa de 'ong ste/ gang brjod pa de byed// zhi ba byed par 'dod ra ras ris kyi spyan sngar pad+ma stong phrag brgyad spyir sreg gyis shig zhi bar 'gyuraro// ras ris kyi spyan
399a2(rgyud): sngar mA la ti'i me tog zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig zhi bar 'gyur// sden spyad pa byas pa/ nag po'i bco lnga la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod
399a3(rgyud): rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma rgya chen po dbul bar bya'o// phyi rol tu 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin te/ de nas na ga ga sar gyi phye mas gzugs brnyan bris
399a4(rgyud): shig/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba yang byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ ji srid du skar mda' ltung ba de srid bzlas par bya'o// slar yang ji srid ras ris 'gul ba de srid bzlas par bya'o// 
399a5(rgyud): dngos grub kyi mtshan ma gzhan rnams kyang 'byung ste/ de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md la phyag byas nas 'phur ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// 'dod pa'i
399a6(rgyud): gzugs can dpag tshad stong nas mthong bar byed cing thos par byed// rig pa 'dzin thams cad kyis gnod pa medo// sngon spyad pa byas pas nag pa'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas
399a7(rgyud): bas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas ma nyams pa'i lus blangs te dri dang me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mchod nas lag pa g.yas pas byin te ji srid 'bar ba de srid 'bar ba de srid du
399a8(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// 'bar ba tsam gyi rig pa 'dzin pa stong gis yongasu bskor te na mkha'i mthil du 'phur bar byed// lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa ska li zhing 'khyil ba rin pa 'dzin pa zed
399b1(rgyud): kyis gnod pa med pa'o// 'bebs pa la 'dug pas so// dug 'joms pa la yal 'dab kyi so// bdag nyid srung ba la bzlas pa so// dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga'i bar du gzugs
399b2(rgyud): brnyan gyi spyan sngar gso sbyong can gyis dag pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas bzlas par bya'o// gang 'dod pa de thob par byedado// mar la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas 'thungs shig/ 
399b3(rgyud): nyi ma bdun gyis yid bzhungs par 'gyuraro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar ma l+li ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mtshan mo bdun la rdzas skye bar 'gyur// dkar po'i bcu bzhi la
399b4(rgyud): mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas/ u dum ba ra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas u dum wa ra'i yaM shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg
399b5(rgyud): gyis shig/ dong tshe lnga brgya rnye do// nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gso sbyong can gyis mar me stong phrag brgyad sbar nas mar me 'khyil pa ste nga phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ phyi nas bzlas
399b6(rgyud): pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas mig thob par byed// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs pam rib bsrel dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten du bzhugs nas stong phrag brgyang mngon par bsngags pa byas
399b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas nyi ma cig la thun gsum du yongasu bzlas pa lan bcu gnyi su bzlas par bya'o// rna ba so sor rnye do// nang la 'phags
399b8(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug te ti nge 'dzin nges par skyes pa'i chags ras sam 'bras bu can la kha dag ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir bzhugs par bya'o// de'i spyan sngar mchod pa chen po
400a1(rgyud): // byas nas stong phrag brgyar bzlas par bya'o// ku sha'i stan la 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing dus gsum du khrus byed cing gtsang ma bgos pas yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i gso sbyong can gyis
400a2(rgyud): tshes gcig nas brtsams nas ji srid cig gi bar du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// sngon spyad pa byas pa'i 'o ma dang / nas zan za ba 'am ba lang gi gcin dang nas zan za
400a3(rgyud): bas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gso sbyong can gyis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mar me brgyad so sor sbar te pad+ma stong gi mchod par bya'o// nag po'i phyogs la
400a4(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// dkar po'i tshes cig nas bsgrub par bya'o// zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// gal te rgyal po
400a5(rgyud): 'gyur na sgrub pa po'i khang pa 'bar bar byed cing me tog gi chun du g.yo bar byed na dkyil 'khor ba'i rgyal por 'gyuraro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor byas nas
400a6(rgyud): dri dang me tog dang bdug pa lag pa dang / gtor ma yang phul nas me tog gi ge sar brgya phrag gsum blangs te brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas mar gyi mar me gsum sbar te u
400a7(rgyud): dum pa ra li yaM shing gis me rab tu sbar nas me tog re re la brkyang brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas mar gyis byugs te sbyin bsreg bya'o// gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyuraro// mtshan mo bdun
400a8(rgyud): du dus gsum du yongasu bzlas par byed na de'i mtshams med pa lnga bsrabs par 'gyur// nyi ma so sor brkyang brgyar zlos par byed na sdig pa rnams bsrabs par 'gyur// rtag tu bzlas pas ga
400b1(rgyud): / 'dod pa'i grong ngos sor rnyed pa dang / mig gis gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur// rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang / smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// til dang / mA Shar sbyin sreg gyis shig nor skyed par byed// baTa'i myugu
400b2(rgyud): no dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyuraro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar klu shing gi me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis mi bdag
400b3(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas yang shAkya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la kun tu gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
400b4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u mtha' dag rnam par bkod pa'i khyad par gyi tshogs sbyin sreg gi las rab tu sbyar bas rig pa sgrub pa po'i
400b5(rgyud): me la rab tu spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang gang du rab tu gnas pas rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems ca na gyis rab tu sbyar bar bya ba yod/ de gang zhe na/ 
400b6(rgyud): 'di'i rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM tiSh+Tha/ ha ri sin la lo hi tAk+Sha/ de hi/ da dA pa ya hUM phawa swA hA/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni me'i snying po ste/ las
400b7(rgyud): thams cad byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa bdag nyid dgongaso// sgrub pa pos 'dis me la sbyin sreg bya ste lan cig bzlas pa'i bsregs blugs gsum me la sbyin bsreg bya'o// 
400b8(rgyud): me spyan drangs par 'gyu ro// de bzhin du zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can dang drag po'i las rnams rab tu sbyar ba la yaM shing gi shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/ zhi ba'i don du mya ngan med
401a1(rgyud): pa'i shing bla na dang bcas pas khyad par du byas pa mtho gang ngam khru gang tsam mam sor gsum pa yang sgrub pa dang / 'jam zhing mnyen pa rab tu bsngags pa ni cho ga 'di bsgrub pa
401a2(rgyud): bya'o// bug pa med cing khong stong yang ma yin pa ne tso'i bshog pa 'dra ba dang / de bzhin du ljang ku dang / lo ma bskam pa 'am/ kha dog nag po yang sbyin par bya'o// srin bu rnams kyis zos pa
401a3(rgyud): spangs nas bug pa med pa yang kun tu 'jog pa kha dog gzhan mchog dang tha ma nyid kyang spangs nas skam po de rnams kyang spangs pa bsregs par kun tu spyod// ma rul cing mi 'khyog pa
401a4(rgyud): nyid dang gzhan spang bar bya'o// de nas me thabs kun nas gru bzhi pa byas nas 'og tu nyid du bskor bar bya ste/ gzhu gang dang / khru gang gi tshad las khru gsum 'am/ khru gnyis sam/ khru bzhi
401a5(rgyud): ste/ de bzhin kho nar srog chags rnams spangs pa rtag tu bye ma bsngags te de la pad+ma'i rnam paso// de nas kha khyer kun nas dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa gru bzhi pa yang 'bad
401a6(rgyud): paso// ras ris kyi spyan sngar zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can yang rung ste 'di rnams yang dag par rab tu bsgrags mngon spyod du ni bshad pa la/ dbu su rdo rje bya ba ni/ rtse mo gnyis ka rtse gcu
401a7(rgyud): pa/ gzhan yang me thab khru gnyis pa/ thad kar yang ni bdun pa'o// de bzhin gtsang ma'i phyogs rgyab tu// chu klung ngogs kyi phyogs cig gam// brtan pa'i phyogs sa ma/ dur khrod dam khang
401a8(rgyud): stong sbyin sreg legs brtsam bya'o// de bzhin kho nar ri rtser yang // lha yi khang pa stong pa dang // rtag tu dgon pa chen po dang // de bzhin du yang gsum rnams ni// sgrub po'i phyog su gsung
401b1(rgyud): pa yin// gang zad mchog gi gnas de rnams// gsungs pa'i sbyin sreg las kun las// ku sha'i khres la nyer 'dug pas// gnas nas khru yi tshad las ni// sbyin bsreg las rnams khyad par du// 
401b2(rgyud): der ni gsang sngags shes pas bya'o// dngos grub myur ba kho nar gnas// nyi du gnas par the tsom med// shar du bltas dang byang du bltas// zhi dang rgyas pa can la bya// drag po la ni lho ru ste// de nas
401b3(rgyud): sngags pas rnam par spang // shar du kha bltas zhi ba 'phel// rgyas pa la yang byang bltas pa// 'di rnams sngags pas dus lhan cig/ rig pa bzlas pas yang dag rtsam// bil ba arka ba lak+Sha/ 
401b4(rgyud): n+ya gro d+ha yis rgyas las bya// mngon spyod can la shing rnams ni// dkar dang tsha ba sgyur dang ro// de rnams thams cad spang bya ste// thub pa rnams kyis bkag pa yin// rtag tu zhi dang rgyas las la/ lpa
401b5(rgyud): bcas shing ni rab tu sngags// de bzhin skam po drag la so// thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu spangs// de rnams med pa'i yam shing gis/ shing de rnamasu brtag par bya// ljang dang snum pa
401b6(rgyud): 'dra ba dang // rma bya'i mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa// de bzhin ku sha'i rnams pa yis// zhi dang rgyas pa rtag tu bya// mar gang dang ni 'dra ba dang // de bzhin dkar ze'i rtsa rnams kyis// sbyin pa'i las
401b7(rgyud): rnams rtag tu bya// rgyal ba mchog gis bkag pa yin// 'dir ni dri med tshu la yang // dag pa srin bu spangs pa las// rtag tu de nas mngon par bkru// kun nas bskor ba bya ba yang // rang snang
401b8(rgyud): phyi rol brtson pa 'am// cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya// gtsang mas rtsa yis sgron ma'i tshad la bya ba'o// de nas khu tshur tshad byas na// 'bad pas me ni sbar bar bya// kha yi rlung gis bu mi byi// 
402a1(rgyud): de bzhin gos kyi mtha' yis dang // gos kyi chun po 'am sham thabs dang // sgrib g.yog dag ni spangs pa yis// na mkha'i nor dang tha dad rlung // nye bar bcom dang mngon dga' ba 'am// 
402a2(rgyud): gcing ma nyams pa bral bas dang // de bzhin gos dang nor bus kyang // rlung yab bya'o rlung bzang pos// me ni yang dag brtsam par bya'o// de las gyur pa'i rlung 'di yis// sngags shes me ni sbar
402a3(rgyud): bar bya// shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyin sreg don// bud med mchog gzhan brtag pa dag/ byas nas yang ni mtha' rung ni// ba yi mar gyi bsregs blugs gsum// der ni sbyin bya de las ni// gang yang
402a4(rgyud): tshad du bya ba'o// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad dang // rang rang sngags kyi mgon po la// de nas ji bzhin 'dod phyag bya// de tshe ma la sbyin bsreg bya// gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas pa
402a5(rgyud): yis// rtag tu me ni spyan drang // bdag nyid rtsom pa'i dri zhim po'i// me tog kho nas rtag tu bod// sngags pa gnas la mkhas pa yI/ gdan ni gnas la phul ba pa// gsang sngags nges
402a6(rgyud): so gzhan du min// zho ldan mar dang bsres pa la// sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing gsum// rgyas don me la sbyin bsreg bya// sngags kyi las kyis thams cad// pad+ma'i gdan la nye 'dug pas// 
402a7(rgyud): zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin bsreg bya// rgyas pa can la 'di rnams nyid// sbyin bya gzugs 'thun sngags rnams kyis// mngon spyod can du gnas pa la// gzhan gyi gzugasu blta bar bya// dri ma med
402a8(rgyud): pa'i lha rnams ni// rim pa bzhin du me thab tu// ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dri// bdun du yongasu bzlas pa yis// mngon par bos pa de yis tshe// 'byung gnas nges par gzhag pa rnams/ ji ltar
402b1(rgyud): gnyis kar gnas de bzhin// yam shing rdzas dang bsres pa dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi yang dag ldan// de bzhin kho nas zho bsres pas// bya'o stong ngam 'bum tshad dam/ yang na brgya rtsa brgyad rtag bya// 
402b2(rgyud): sngags ni blangs nas de bzhin du// rig pa lan cig bzlas pa yi// mig dang gtsug phud 'bar ba yi// phreng ba'i me la me lce cig/ de bzhin nyid du zhi ba'i las// sbyin bsreg nges par bya ba
402b3(rgyud): yang / rgyas pa can la de dang dbang // drag po'i las ni smad pa ste// rgyas pas spang so sbyin bsreg las// rab sbyor me ni bsngags par 'gyur/ sgra can brgyad cu'i stobs dang ldan// rgyal ba
402b4(rgyud): mchog gis rab tu bsngags// der ni gsang sngags rtag sgrub byed/ dkar ba'i me la sbyin bsreg bya// gal te kha dog dmar de bzhin// rtag tu rgyas pa'i dngos grub 'dod// nag po dud la
402b5(rgyud): ser skya la'ang // g.yon pa can zhes bya ba nyid// kha dog rnams gsum rab 'jug pa// dngos grub rnam pa gsum yino// sngags pa las gzhan kha dog gam// rnam pa sna tshogs
402b6(rgyud): kha dog nyid// de la sngags kyis dngos grub med// slar yang lag pa'i 'thil 'dir ni// rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog nyid// kha dog gsal ba de 'dra yod// me ni 'bar ba mthong nas ni// slar
402b7(rgyud): yang las rnams brtsam par bya// spyan drang byas la gzugs kha dog// gal te sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur// slar yang sbyin sreg rab 'jug pa// las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis// spyan drangs
402b8(rgyud): gshegasasu gsol ba nyid// me la sngags ni brjod par bya// sngar ni rab tu btags pas kyang // dkyil 'khor 'di ru rnam pa gzhan// mchog de nyid kyis de gyis shig/ sbyin sreg 'di la
403a1(rgyud): spyan drang dang // gshegasu gsol ba'i las can gyis// las rnams de nyid kyis bya'o// der ni me yi spyod pa'i las// de bzhin gzugs dang ras ris kyi// spyan sngar brtsam
403a2(rgyud): nas 'grub par byed// de la sngags ni sngar brjod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bas bsngags// las rnams kun nas der bya'o// gzhan pa'i las rnams mi bya ste// khyad par sdig pa can gyi las// rgyal
403a3(rgyud): ba mchog gis smad pa dang // gang du 'jig rten dang 'gal smad// 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du langs// de nas byang sems sa yi bdag/ de bzhin mngon shes lnga thob pa// de nas lha nyid 'dru
403a4(rgyud): bar byed// 'dir ni rtag tu sbyor shes pa// ras ris sbyin sreg las la mkhas// sa 'og bdag po nyid dang ni// bar snang la ni spyod par byed// de nas bla'i lha dang ni// gnod sbyin nyid dam
403a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo// 'gugs par byed cing rtag tu yang // rgyal srid kyi ni bdag po nyid// yang na yul 'dir 'khor ba nyid// yang na ri ga dang rig 'dzin nyid// lha min nyid sems can
403a6(rgyud): kun da dbang byed rjes 'gro 'gugs par byed// sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// sems chenas bcur gnas bcas pa// sbyin sreg las kyis 'dra
403a7(rgyud): par byed// sa stengs mi rnams smos ci bgos// lhag ma'i bdag po nyid de bzhin// khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid// 'byung po kun la yang dag nges// mi bdag nyid dang de bzhin yang / 
403a8(rgyud): dbang gi don du sems can kun// mi bdag des sam mi des ni// sa steng thams cad mnyam pa yis// las rnams de bzhin kun nas ni// rtag tu sbyin bsreg gis bya'o// nges par las
403b1(rgyud): kun yang dag rten// bdag nyid brtsom pas lhan cig sgrub// dpal gyi don du de yi las// mchog dang bar ma nyid dang yang // yang na chung ngu nyid bsgrub bya// de nyid du ni rdzas kun gyi// dngos grub brjod
403b2(rgyud): ba'i don du slar// lhan cig dngos grub blta bar bya// sbyin sreg las la legs 'jug pa// las rnams kun la phyag rgya bcing // bdag srung mar dang ldan pa yi// sbyin sreg las la rab
403b3(rgyud): 'jug byed// de nas ras ris kyi gsang sngags 'di// bdun bzlas pa 'am brgyad bzlas pa// rtag tu las 'dis spyod lam bya// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nan/ a pra ti ha ta ga ti satwa
403b4(rgyud): nan tad+ya thA/ oM dz+wa la tiSh+ThahUM/ mu ru bi shA sam+ba be swA hA/ shing la sbyor ba 'dis bzlas te// slar yang gnyis sam bdun bzlos pas// sngags rin me la sbyin sreg gyis// me tog 'dun
403b5(rgyud): ba dri yang rung // kun nas thams cad nyid la ni// lan bdun bzlas pa 'di nyid kyis// khyod kyis rab tu brjod par bya// la sa rnams thang rtsom byed pa// cho ga rgyu yi snga ma
403b6(rgyud): yis// rab sbyor nyid kyis bya ba'o// las rnams kun la sngar bcings pa'i// phyag rgya chen mo grags ldan ma// de bzhin bsrungs pa byas gyur nas// dngos grub rtul mkhas pa yis/ 
403b7(rgyud): las rnams thams cad brtson par byas// gal te nus pa mthong ba na// dge ba'i sgra rnams nyid dang ni// rtag tu 'bras can sa de yi// gsang sngags ji ltar 'dod bzhin du// nges par
403b8(rgyud): mchog sbyin 'di sbyin pa'o// dang po las kyi rab sbyor ba// gsang sngags rgyu yis rab zhugs pa// 'bras bur bcas pa kho na yi// dngos grub de rnams bsgrub par bya// rgyal ba'i sgra dang sa
404a1(rgyud): ha rnga bo che yi dngos grub nges// thams cad du ni smad par brjod// sbyin bsreg la ni gnas bcas pa// gzhan yang dge mtshan mchog dang ni// mdab chags can rnams dge ba'i sgra/ 
404a2(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs nges sgrogs pa'i// sgra yang rung ste rgyal bas bsngags// rab bsngags dus bcas lha rnams dang // yid 'ong rnam pa sna tshogs sgra// bdug dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // btsun
404a3(rgyud): mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // de bzhin bum pa gang ba dang / mchod yon mthong na dngos grub rgyu// rnam pa 'di yis bsngags pa 'am// rab bsngags 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i// dge slong dang
404a4(rgyud): ni dge slong ma// de rnams mthong na gsang sngags kyi// sna tshogs spyod yul dngos grub bo// zheso// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal bo che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde ral pa gyen rjes kyi
404a5(rgyud): rtog pa las bgrang phreng srang bu'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam bcu gcig pa yongasu rdzog so// / de nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar klu shing gi me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis mi'i
404a6(rgyud): bdag po dbang du 'gyur// nad thams cad las rkang shu dang / gdug pa'i ma rnams la sa'i gang bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byin na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur// sngon spyad pa byas pas
404a7(rgyud): ba byung lngas lus sbyang ba byas nas dus gsum du khrus byas te 'o ma btung bar bya'o// rtsa ba'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o// phyi nas nag po'i brgyad pa la ras ris kyi
404a8(rgyud): spyan sngar ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ bil ba'i yam shing la mar dang zho dang / sbrang rtsi btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 
404b1(rgyud): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi spyi bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar byedado// des sgrub pa po la bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// de nas 'phags pa
404b2(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste mchog gsum po rnams gang brnyed pa de rnyed// rig pa 'dzin pa nyid kyi rgyal srid dang / khyod ci 'dra ba'i bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba nga'o// zheso// dngos grub
404b3(rgyud): 'di ni bla ma mchod pa dang / snying rjes sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas sbyin pa nyid kyis sgrub par byed// nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod
404b4(rgyud): pa rgya chen po byas nas arga'i yam shing gi stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig// gang 'dod pa de skad cig nyid la 'gugs par byed// a ka ru dang / bri yang ku dang na ga ge sa
404b5(rgyud): rnams cha mnyam pa phye mar byas te kham phor kha sbyar du byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas lus la byugs te g.yul du zhugs nas gzhan gyis
404b6(rgyud): mi thub par 'gyuraro// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// 'bum phrag bcu gcig zlos shig 'phags pa
404b7(rgyud): 'jam dpal mthong // ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bdun bzlos shig mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis btab pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bco lngas zlos shig nad 'jom
404b8(rgyud): par byed// sngon spyad pa byas pas 'bum phrag bcu gnyis zlos shig/ bcud dam bcud kyis len song sor rnye do// de zos pas gnyer ma dang skra dkar spangs par 'gyuraro// lo brgyad
405a1(rgyud): /  wa gnyis lor pa'i rnam pa yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas yungs kar rgyal po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig rgyal po'i btsun mo
405a2(rgyud): dbang du 'gyuraro// mtshan mo bdun gyis 'di la nor rab tu sbyin te 'dod pa nye bar gzhag pa ni ma gtog so// ras ris kyi spyan sngar arga'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 
405a3(rgyud): gser srang brgya sa sor rnyed// 'bras yos stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ bgegs med par 'gyuraro// bi n+ya ka'i shing stong sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skye bo tha~Md dga' bar 'gyur// 
405a4(rgyud): 'bum phrag gsum zlos shig rked pa'i nad med par 'gyuraro// rims kyi btab pa la ku shas phyag par bya'o// bu mos dkal ba'i srad bu la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsdu
405a5(rgyud): pa byas nas bcing bar bya'o// bskal pa bzang bor 'gyur ro// dong ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gos bye ba bcu gnyis so sor rnyedado// rgyal gyi lcags
405a6(rgyud): las byung ba'i srang shin tu mdzes pa la 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu pa byas nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten ras ris bzhugs nas nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas
405a7(rgyud): mchod pa rgya chen po byas te 'khor lo blangs nas ji srid du mtshan ma byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// gang gi tshe me rtag 'phro bar byed pa dang / ji srid 'bar 'gyur ba de srid bzlas
405a8(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas grub par 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa thaMd 'du bar byed cing 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar byedado// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang / 
405b1(rgyud): thob pa med par 'gro bar byeda'o// snga bar langs nas lor bzlas par bye'o// mchog sbyin par bye'o// zla ba drug tu lan cig brjod pas nang chen ze gralo// zla ba cig tu zlos shig dus ma yin par
405b2(rgyud): gu gul gyi 'dug pas mche ba'i dug 'bebs par byeda'o// nyin cig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa rnam su 'ong // bud med dbang du byed pa la
405b3(rgyud): ras ris kyi spyan sngar/ lA pan la sbrang rtsi btags pa mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig gyis shig dbang du 'gyuraro// 'di ni yugs mos skyes bu yi'o// rgyal
405b4(rgyud): bo ni ras ris kyi spyan sngar arga'i yaM shing la/ zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa/ stong phrag ba rgyang sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyu ro// rgyal po'i blon po
405b5(rgyud): la sogs pa la mtshan mo thun gsum du la na tshwa nyi shu rtsa cig sbyin sreg gyis shig dbang du 'gyuraro// mgo bo la lan gsum mam bdun du mngon par bsngags
405b6(rgyud): nas rgyal po'i sgor 'jug par byed na rgyal po'i nang chen por 'gyuraro// brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa'i rma bya'i mdongs kyis phyag par byas na dug 'jom so// ldong ros
405b7(rgyud): a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums par byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas yang dag par brtsam par bya ste skal pa bzang por 'gyu ro// ras ris kyi spyan
405b8(rgyud): sngar dkar po'i tshes cig nas brtsams te/ be ma dang nas zan za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos lan gsum brjes te/ a ka ru dang du ru ka dang / tsan+dan rnams
406a1(rgyud): bsregs shing dkar gsum gyis gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma chu las skyes pa 'am/ zang las skyes pa'i dri zhim tha'i me
406a2(rgyud): dang kha'i mar gyis mar me gsum// mthar mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// gang don du gnyer ba de rnye do// thun mtsham su bza'
406a3(rgyud): yang ji ltar nus pa sbyino// ring srel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas a shwat+tha'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi
406a4(rgyud): dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ de nas ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ba dang / sa 'gul ba dang / mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba
406a5(rgyud): dang / phreng ba g.yo bar byed pa ste/ mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi grub par 'gyuraro// rna ma'i mig sman a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du gtums te stong phrag rdzogs pa'i bsregs
406a6(rgyud): blugs byas nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug te ji srid grub pa rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'bras bu can la gong 'dod pa'i rdzas de'i ming bris te stong phrag
406a7(rgyud): brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa byas nas gang du klu gnas pa'i mtsho phran der dor bar bya'o// de'i klu des las thams cad rdzogs par byeda'o// nyi ma bdun gyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gos
406a8(rgyud): sbyin par byedado// 'bras bu can la mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas mngon par bris te/ de bzhin du khron pa 'am/ mtsho phran du bzhugs par bya'o// de nas skyes bu chur byi 'dzul byed du/ 
406b1(rgyud): gzhug go/ der yang sgra chen po skyes bus thos te phyogs che ge mo na rdzas la sogs pa gan so// de nas blangs par bya ste chu klung gi mtha' sgrol bar byed pa bgrod bka' ba can gyi mdun pa
406b2(rgyud): 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang rung ste lha rnams dran pa byas te gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa dbang du bya'o// de 'phags pa'i zhal du yang bcugs nas cung zad yang
406b3(rgyud): dag par gsungs par mdzod cig ring por mi thogs par dbang du 'gyuraro// chu snod du byas nas de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bsams te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par
406b4(rgyud): bsngags pa'i chu des mche ba can la gtor bar bya'o// dug med par 'gyuraro// de la brjod pa'i tsho gas dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa ni don med par mi 'gyur ro// sa la ma lhung ba'i
406b5(rgyud): ba byung blangs nas tsi ru bza' zhing mi smra bar dkyil 'khor byas nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te ji srid gsum pa'i bar de srid du bzlas par bya ste 'bum bzlas so// 
406b6(rgyud): zla ba drug tu tshangs par spyod pa dang brtul zhugs 'di nyid spyad cing zla bas dngos grub dang / zla ba drug gis 'gro ba mtha' dag mngon par gsum du mthong bar 'gyuraro// lus kyis kyang
406b7(rgyud): mchog gi dngos grub thob par byed// zla bas sngags thams cad grub par byedado// gang 'dod pa'i klu'i rgyal po mngon par bris nas de'i steng du rkang pa g.yon pa bzhag ste g.yo/ 
406b8(rgyud): ba'i phyog su 'bum bzlas par bya'o// klu'i rgyal po de 'ong ste de ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed// klu thaMd kyi gan su rab tu 'jug par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o// der rab tu
407a1(rgyud): 'jug par bye'o// de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po bris nas sgrub par byed na bka' bsgo ba byedo// thams cad 'dzin pa'i gtsang ma'i gnas nas rdul chung ngu blangs te sbrul
407a2(rgyud): gyi steng du yongasu thor cig/ sbrul bzlog par byas par 'gyur ro// slar yang gal te grol bar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste gos dkar po'i kha dog can la sa las byung ba'i phyag rgya byas nas stong phrag
407a3(rgyud): brgyad mngon par bsngags te mche ba'i steng du 'jog tu bcug nas khug shig shing slong bar byedado// ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dang / ral gri dang / sta gri dang / 'khor lo dang / b+huSh+TaN+Dal
407a4(rgyud): sogs pa rnams pa byung lngas sbyangs nas stong phrag rdzogs pa'i bsregs blugs bya ste/ rdzas gang yang rung ba blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar cho ga sngon du 'gro bas 'bum phrag lngar
407a5(rgyud): zlos shig phyis nas ji ltar byas pa'i rin gyis ldeng ros blangs nas byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar te/ ji srid me'i mdog tu gyur pa de srid du bsreg par bya'o// de nas
407a6(rgyud): rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba las byung ba'i 'o ma bu mos bsrubs pas mar du byas nas thal ba mar la gdab par bya'o// de bzhin du zhos bkang ba'i snod sbrang rtsis bka' ba la yangango // de nas blangs
407a7(rgyud): te gur gum gyis za ma tog tu bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid srung ba byas te zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas ras ris la mchod pa
407a8(rgyud): rgya chen po byas te a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma gsum gyis kun tu dkris nas bzhis dgab par bya'o// ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas ji srid dro ba dang / du ba
407b1(rgyud): 'dul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dro bzhin pa la thig le byas nas sems can thams cad dbang du byedado// du bas mi snang ba'o// 'bar bas na mkha' la 'gro'o// lo stong phrag
407b2(rgyud): bcur 'tsho bar byed// sems can thams cad kyis mi tshug so// de bzhin du mig sman pa bla sgrub par byed pa dang / gi bam la cho ga 'di'o// dkar po'i bco lnga la pad+ma'i 'dab mar bzhag ste ras
407b3(rgyud): ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas lag pa kha sbyor gyis blangs te/ ji srid dro ba dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'di nyid la dngos grub rnam pa gsumo/ 
407b4(rgyud): ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bcur zlos shig/ de nas bzo bo dbang po mtshang ba min pa gso sbyong can gyi lcags gsum gyis pad+ma 'dab ma bcu pa 'am/ brgyad pa gdan dang rgyan
407b5(rgyud): gyis brgyan pa byas nas gur gum dang / gi bam dang / ga bur rnams na mkha'i chus btags pa pad+mar bcug cing / dkar po'i brgya dag ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas
407b6(rgyud): mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste sdig pa bshags pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas nas lag pa g.yas pas pad+ma blangs nas ji srid
407b7(rgyud): 'bar ba de srid bzlas par bya'o// de nas pad+ma des 'khor dang bcas pa rig par 'gyuro// sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugaso// lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byedado// de bzhin du gdu du
407b8(rgyud): dang / cod pan dang / lcags sgrogs dang / rdo rje dang dgra sta dang / 'khor lo yang zhes pa'o// 'di ni 'khor lo'i khyad par te lpags lnga pa'i 'khor lo byas nas so rnon po 'khor lo
408a1(rgyud): mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa mtho gang gi tsha // gang+gA'i 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gong bur bya'o// de la 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas tsan+dan dmar pos
408a2(rgyud): mchod de ka ra bI ra'i me tog dmar po dang phreng ba phul nas dkar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyi smyung bar gnas pas spongs mos dge 'dun la ston mo byas te dngos grub stsal bar bya'o// gtsang
408a3(rgyud): ma gos gtsang ma bgos pas snying rje'i sems kyis rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa rnams phul nas ji ltar nye bar
408a4(rgyud): 'byor pa'i mar me phul nas 'khor lo'i phyogs bzhi ru yang mar me bzhi dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ tsan+dan dmar pos btags pa rnams
408a5(rgyud): la lan re bzlas te re res bsnun par bya'o// ji srid stong phrag brgyad kyi bar du'o// de nas 'khor lo sgra dang / 'od zer 'phro ba dang / de nas 'bar ro// gnyis pa la 'khor lo nges par
408a6(rgyud): 'gro ste de nas sgrub pa pos sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas rig pa zlos shig/ de blangs par bya'o// blangs pa tsam gyis 'khor dang bcas pa rig pa 'dzin par
408a7(rgyud): 'gyur te dpag ched stong phrag bcur rig pa 'dzin pa chen po klu dang gnod sbyin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mang du 'dod par 'gyuraro// lo stong phrag lnga 'tsho bar byed// shi na yang bde ba can du
408a8(rgyud): skye bar 'gyuraro// de nas ril bu sgrub par 'dod na/ se saM le ta ka dang / tsan+dan dmar po dang / rgya skyegs dang / gu gul dang / tA ra bar ta ka'i rtsa ba dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / gi ri kan+ti dang / 'bru'i phub ma
408b1(rgyud): dang ru rta dang / rgya spos dang / sbrang rtsi dang / pi pi ling dang / tu ru ka ka rnams/ cig tu byas nas phye ma zhib mor byed du gzhug go// de nas ser skya rgyud mtshungs pa'i 'o ma blangs nas bu mos bsrubs pa'i
408b2(rgyud): mar gyis cig tu byas phye ma des rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam gyi ril bu byed du gzhug go// de nas dkar po'i brgyad pa 'am dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas yan las
408b3(rgyud): brgyad pa'i gso sbyong can gyis ril bu lnga tsam blangs te a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums pa byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bgrang phreng dang til mar dang / phye ma la sogs pa gzhan
408b4(rgyud): la sbyin par bya'o// ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste mchod pa'i cho ga byas pas lag pa g.yas pas mnan te ji srid du 'thul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// yang dag par bshes
408b5(rgyud): khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyuraro// lha gzugs can rnams 'ong ngo // grub pa rnams thams cad 'thon nas mthong ngo // lo brgya phrag sngar 'tsho bar byed// de nas 'bar byed nam
408b6(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro// dngos grub rnams pa gnyiso// 'di yang bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa'i las sgrub pa'i thab su 'gyuraro// gsum pa 'am bdun pa'i sgrub pa la maHma
408b7(rgyud): med pa lnga byed pa yang 'grub par 'gyuraro// rtsa ba'i snying pos kyang las 'di rnams 'grub par byed pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed// bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rtogs par
408b8(rgyud): sgrub thabs thams cad ces bya ba 'di rdzog so// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sangs
409a1(rgyud): rgyas kyi spyan gyis yang dag par gzigs nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbu su son pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka'
409a2(rgyud): stsal pa/ mi dang 'byung po'i dbus gnas pa'i// sems can rnams la rjes brtse bas// dkyil 'khor las can thams cad ni// sems dpa' chen po spros shig smras// sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor
409a3(rgyud): lha rnams dang // phun tshogs thams cad mngon par 'phel// sgrub po rnams la phan pa yin// don phyir 'dren pas rgyas par smros// ngo mtshar rmad byung thams cad kyi// lus can bar mar
409a4(rgyud): gyu ba rnams// khyod kyi tshig gi mchog gyur pa/ 'byung 'gyur de dag thos nas ni// myur du lha rnams sgrub pa la sems can gang du rab zhugs pa// de nyid du ni sngar bshad pa// byang
409a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang // sangs rgyas bye bstong rnams kyis// thams cad de la rjes yi rang // dkyil 'khor sdig pa kun 'joms pa// dngos grub kun byed dge ba ni// sem
409a6(rgyud): can rnams kyi mgon pas smras// sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor khyod kyi tshig/ sems can cho ga yang dag 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gang 'di thos nas ni// rab tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur// dpal min
409a7(rgyud): 'joms shing zhi ba dang // de bzhin nad dang dgra 'phrog cing // dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi// gzi brjid stobs ni rnam par 'phel// mthong ngam thos nas de nas ni// rab tu dad pa skyed
409a8(rgyud): bar byed// gang yin de rnams bdag gis ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni// thob pa'i tshe du'ang lung bstan to// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur ba// 'dzin rten mgon po rnams kyang ni// 
409b1(rgyud): rjesu yi rang 'gyur ba yin// dkyil 'khor phun tshogs 'phel byed pa// de bzhin yon tan kun sdud pa// sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba// sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten mnan/ yang
409b2(rgyud): dag bka' yis smos shig smos// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos
409b3(rgyud): phrag pa cig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la tha mi dad pa'i tshig
409b4(rgyud): su bcas pa'i bstod pa'i tshig gis mngon par bsto do// shAkya'i rgyal po lha'i rgyal// phun tshogs yon tan du ma can// rab bsngags rdzu 'phrul rab ma nyams// rgyun tu dkar ba'i gos
409b5(rgyud): dang ldan// mchod sdong zhal ni 'dam skyes dri/ zla bzang snying po brtan pa 'dzin// gang phyir khyod ni phun chog sa nyid// 'di ni 'gro ba de dag gi/ dga' bas dga' bar byed pa ni// 
409b6(rgyud): mgon pa lha rnams kyi ni ste// rang bzhin dran pas kun tu snang // de yi tshig ni rab rig pa// dpa' de chags pa zad pa nyid// 'bras bu gsum nyid 'dzin par byed// de de bzhin du de yis ni// 
409b7(rgyud): lha yi mdzes mas kun bsrungs pa// brgyad kyis 'di ni dbang zhal las// skyes pa'i dpa' bo rab stobs dang // g.yo ba'i spro dga'i dbang po dang // kun nas gser gyi ri dang ldan// 
409b8(rgyud): phan yang ni lhan cig gdan// lha dang lnga min lham bcas pa'i// lhag pa'i theg pa thams kyi// 'jin rten par de'i srid pa dang // skye ba khyod kyi srog la sogs// byung ba mdzes ldan ma cing
410a1(rgyud): / kyi 'di yi mig ni dga' ba ste// gang rnams zla ba lta bur dkar// lha rnams kyis bzung ri bong can// kun da du gu dkar po yi// gos ni 'anabs nyid cegar/ badz+ra byin 'das brgya pa yi mig
410a2(rgyud): sa bsrungs phrag par phyogs gcig 'gro bla ma'i ri la ri bong can// rgyal po'i dpung ldan brgya byin ni// mig brgya brtson 'grus ma nyams pas// grangs dang chu gter chu 'byin pa/ tshogs kyi sgra ni dga' ba dang // 
410a3(rgyud): dri med spyan ni dga' ba la'ang // nyi ma'i 'od zer dam pa ni// rnam pad zas dang dri 'khor ba// bum dkar gang ba so so yi// bum pa de rnams dbang bskur zhing // tsan+dan sa mchog yan lag bshad// gi ba~M thig le
410a4(rgyud): rnam par bkra/ yan lag dam pa yongs 'du ba'i// dga' ba mchog gi yan lag dang // lus med gzhom pa'i che du byas// yan lag chags pa byas mtha' las// khrus ni stug pos mi 'gro bas// 
410a5(rgyud): gzhan du 'chi med legs pa ni// de 'og thal mo sbyar ba yi// dug gis btab pa smad pa ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog brjod pa'i// char ldan khyed kyi zhal du ni// sngon las khyod
410a6(rgyud): ni lam gyi mgo/ dri ma bzhin du spangs pa yang // me tog ldan pa'i zla ba la// rnam par cher phyin longs spyod ldan// bcings pa lta bur 'di rnams nyid// bcos nas sngar med cho ga yis// bcu par byed ni
410a7(rgyud): zhi ba ste// mgo med 'gro ba mtha' yas las// gang phyir srid pa mtha' med cing // dri mas lha dang lha min yang // de yi brtul zhugs phan tshun du// dam pa'i spyan gyi 'od kyi snang // 'khyil pa can
410a8(rgyud): yangs yan lag mchog phyog su lha rnams gnas pa dang // mi rnams byang chub rnam sangs rgyas// rab tu byed 'gyur zhes pa ni// mi rnams 'byung dang sdud pa'i las// de phyir rnams pang chu skyes ni
410b1(rgyud): lha yi yan lag dam par son// dpa' bo'i yan lag dkris chags bral// 'chi bzhin sa yi lus kyang 'khod/ kun nas gtod dang kun nas sdud // yang dag sa dang phyogs dang ldan// rnam bzhi mnyam par
410b2(rgyud): byang chub ldan// byang chub shing drung bdud dpung las// rnam par rgyal ba thob pa dang // sangs rgyas go 'phang 'pho med dang // klu yi shing gi rtsa ba ru// zhe sdang rtsub po'i nags rnams kyis// rkang pa steng bu
410b3(rgyud): me yi ched// rmongs mun dri ma snang byed pa// khro bo'i me ni 'bar ba la// mi g.yo rab tu sbyin par byed// phyag rgya rdo rje lta bu sgom// gzhal ba'i 'khri shing gzugs brnyan brtan// dmar po'i me ni 'bar ba
410b4(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa'i nyi ltar rnam mdzes pa// yan lag stobs bskyed phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan
410b5(rgyud): 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis mngon bar bstod nas rang gi stan la 'khod de/ byang chub sems dpa chen po'i ting 'dzin kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par
410b6(rgyud): zhug so// snyems par zhugs ma thag tu sems dpa'i chen po'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma byung ste 'od zer de rnams kyis gang+ka'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas
410b7(rgyud): kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang bar byas par gyur to// dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de dang / yud cem de la sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar gyur to// gang sangs rgyas
410b8(rgyud): kyi zhing de rnam su bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la leg so zhes bya ba byin te// leg so leg so// sems dpa' chen po chen pa smros shig
411a1(rgyud): mthu cher po sems cad sdig pa can thams cad dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba smros shig/ gang gis de lta bu de rnams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa mu med pa rnamasu sangs rgyas bcom ldan
411a2(rgyud): 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dang / lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la leg so zhes bya ba gnang ba dang / sa chen po ri dang / nags
411a3(rgyud): dang / phug tu bcas pa 'di rab tu g.yo so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ bcom ldan
411a4(rgyud): 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sngags bshad par brtsam so// dang por re shig bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon dam tshig mthong bas slob dpon dang mtshungs pa'i rje su gnang
411a5(rgyud): gnang ba thob cing dad pas byang chub tu sems bskye dag/ sems can rnams kyi stobs dang / stobs ma yin pa shes pa/ ser sna med cing g.yo sgyu med pas nag po med cing ha cang
411a6(rgyud): mi sbom/ ha cang mi phra ba dri ngan pa med pas dngong po mtshang ba ma yin pa/ mdzes pa/ snying stobs dang ldan pas sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam ga
411a7(rgyud): dang / shes rab dang / snying rje dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa/ sems can gyi dgongs pa dang / bsam pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dang ba/ cha mang po mngon
411a8(rgyud): par shes pa/ gsal zhing gsal bar smra ba/ dkyil 'khor grub pa'i las la bya ba/ rigs gsum gang yang rung ba'i rig pa la sogs pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa/ phyag dang dkyil 'khor
411b1(rgyud): gyi rab tu sbyor ba shes pa/ mchod rten gyi las byas pa/ ha cang mi rgan byis pa dang / rigs dma' bar skyes pa ma yin pa/ gzhon zhing lang 'tsho dang ldan pa dang / tshul bzang po'i sgrub pa pos gsang ba'i
411b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// zhes so// de nas 'di lta bu'i slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga brtsam par bya ste/ nus med 'dul med nyes ma yin pa/ dkyil 'khor yang dag
411b3(rgyud): rab sbyar bya// rmongs pa'i sems dang chags can la// dkyil 'khor bstan par yang mi bya// gang zhig bslab la yud tsam yang // lhag par 'gro ba'i lus can des// mtho ris thar pa yang dag 'grub/ 
411b4(rgyud): yid kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyuraro// byang chub sem ni rjes zhig pa'i// dngos grub dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur// byang chub dra bar rig thob pa'i// sems de las ni yang dag brtsam// de nas dkyil
411b5(rgyud): 'khor slob dpon gyis// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rab tu dang ba'i sems can rnams// bdag nyid kho nar rab rtogs bya// de la bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor bri// de nas dkyil 'khor sgo
411b6(rgyud): dpon gyis// stobs kyis sngon 'dul si tha'i lus// cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la// grong dang grong khyer grong rdal dang // ljongs rnamasu ni byang shar gyi// phyogs kyi cha ru mchod yon byin// sa yi mthil
411b7(rgyud): du ji ltar// sa phyogs sngags la sngags 'gyur ba// snum zhing ljon shing me tog bzang // 'bras bus yang dag mang po can// rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa'i phyogs// dkar dang ser ba'i sa bzhi
411b8(rgyud): lar gyo me bong ba gseg ma bral// rnga bo che yi sgra dbyangs dang // lam gyi mazhi mdo dur khrod dang // lha gzhan yongasu bzung ba dang / shis cing sdug bsngal rdzogs spangs la// gang du kun nas rgyang grags
412a1(rgyud): / lnga'i chang du chu klung steng ka dang // mtsho phran chu bo rab 'bab pa// ljon shing mchod rten lha khang dang // me tog nyid ni dus rgyun tu// shin tu rgya chen yang dag ldan// cho 'phrul
412a2(rgyud): phyogs ni gang rung la// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma yi// dkyil 'khor slob dpon sa phyogs der// nyi ma gung la seng nas ni// ral pa gcig ma'i snying po yi// mngon par mdzes pa'i las
412a3(rgyud): bya'o// theg mar rab dag sems can kun// byams dang snying rje dang ldan pas// dkyil 'khor gnas deng yid kyis dmigs// dge ba'i rig pa gdon par bya// sgrol ma'i snying po dam pa dang // de
412a4(rgyud): bzhin dbyangs ni rje su gdon// 'dir ni sangs rgyas mchod don du// dkyil 'khor lus can kun gyis bri// phyogs kyis 'gro ba'i gnasu gnas// thog mar gtor ma byin byas nas// dri yi
412a5(rgyud): yam shing yang dag ldan// gan su gnas pas kun zos nas// go rims bzhin du spyan drang ba'i// dbyangs kyi tshig 'di brjod par bya// slob dpon ming ni che ge bdag bcom ldan 'pha
412a6(rgyud): ma sgrol ma yi/ dkyil 'khor dag ni bri bar 'tshal// bdag dang sems can kun gyis gang // bdag mthar 'dug pa'i sems med pa// bskyed cing bkur stir byed pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang
412a7(rgyud): ba'i// sems can rnams la phyir zhing ni// mang du rab tu dad pa'i ched// dkyil 'khor bri bar bdag 'tshalo// de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum brjod// de nas sems can de rnams ni// dkyil 'khor gyi
412a8(rgyud): ni slob dpon gyi// mtshan mo mthong ba sbyin par byed// de nas bris pa 'am gzhan du song // tho rangs rmi lam rnam par spyad// sa yi phyogs der song nas ni// khru brgya yi ni tshad du yang // kun na/ 
412b1(rgyud): gru bzhi pa ru bya// phyi rol dpag tu med pa yi// dkon mchog gsum gyi tshang song nas// sa la shing dang phub ma dang // thal ba sol ba so phag dang // skra dang ser mo mchod sbyin gyis// so phag nag pa la
412b2(rgyud): sogs gang // gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dge ba yi// mi dge'i zug rngu thams cad kun// lhag ma med par bsal nas ni// sa yi gong bu de nyid du// gzhan yang chu klung chen po yi// 'gram gnyis sa ni
412b3(rgyud): sbyang byas nas// rab tu bcug ste tho bas brdung // tsan+dan chu yis yang dag gtor// de ltar byas nas ma ltung ba'i// ba byung tsan+dan chu bsres nas// khru brgyad pa yi phyogasu ni// phyi rol gyis kyang khru bcu yis
412b4(rgyud): tshang du yongasu sbyangs pa la// gso sbyong byin nas byung/ tu gzhug/ ji srid sa yi phyags der ni// shin tu 'jam zhing shin tu ni// legs par rdzogs par skyed kyi bar// de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni// de
412b5(rgyud): nas khru bzhi'i dza du ni// grwa bzhi seng ldeng phur bu brgyad// sor mo bcu gnyis tsha du bya// gzhonu mas bkal srang bu ni// tshon sna lnga pa legs 'jam pa// shin tu sra ba bcom ldan
412b6(rgyud): ma'i dra ba'i snying po lan bdun gyis// sngags pas phur bu la dkris nas// bdun byas srong la gdab par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis// gtsang ma'i 'os ni bcos pa yis// dkyi
412b7(rgyud): 'khor sa yi dbus do ru// rtsa ba nag po med pa yi// bum blang dri yi chu dang ni// me tog sgrol mas bkang ba la// mgrin par me tog phreng bar bkris// a ma'i yal 'dab kha dgab bya// pus me
412b8(rgyud): dag ni nges btsugs nas// rtsa ba'i rig pa bdun byas te// yang na nyi shu rtsa cig brjod// de nas phyogs bcur kun bltas nas// 'di ni bsgrags bya che ge dag/ gnas 'dir sangs rgyas mchod pa'i
413a1(rgyud): / phyir/ sems cad kur gyi ting 'dzin ni// bsam byas dkyil 'khor bris pa 'dir// sangs rgyas phan par mdzad pa kun// dkyil 'khor du ni byon par mdzod// da lha 'dir ni byon nas
413a2(rgyud): kyang / bdag gi mchod yon pa zhesu gsol// de dbus nyid du brtag bya ba// gan su bris pa'i bcom ldan 'das// spyan drang bya zhing lha rnams kyi// gnas mdor bstan nas brjod par bya// dka' ldan du ni
413a3(rgyud): byang chub sems// 'jig rten gzhan du gang gnas pa// de bzhin kha ba'i gan su dang // gang ldan pad+ma'i dbang phyug 'byung // lcang lo can du nor dbang phyug/ te se ru ni bde byed bshad// mchod yer snad ni
413a4(rgyud): bkang ba yis// de rnams gnas ni rnam bsams bya// de nas zhal ni sgrub bsnyen bkur// dkyil 'khor las rnams thams cad la// ming dang gnas ni yongs nyams na// phyin ci log tu
413a5(rgyud): ldog par 'gyur// de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni// nyin re nyin re tsan+dan gyi// chu yis byug tu gzhug par bya// mtshan mo 'i thun la'ang de bzhin bya// bar 'dir yo byad thams cad ni// rnam
413a6(rgyud): par 'byor par 'gyur ba yin// de la 'di ni brjod bya ste// dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa yi// phye ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin skyes// rdzi ba'i me tog dang mtshungs pa'i// phye mas dkyil 'khor kun tu bri// 
413a7(rgyud): pad+ma ra gla ut+pa la/ phye ma mtha' dag gis gdab pa// gur shum chu dang mtshungs pa dang / uSh+ma rA ga yi dkyil 'khor// zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs shing // de bzhin ma ra ka tas kyang // de tsam pa
413a8(rgyud): dog rin chen ma// ljags kyang rung ste ming can lnga// yang na dris brtags phye mas sam// ji ltar snyed pa rnam sprul pas// rab bkug rin chen phye ma yis// yang dag pa yis dngos grub 'dod/ 
413b1(rgyud): nor bu 'ching bu mtshungs min gang // pad+ma rA gas rnam pa kun// dkyil 'khor yo byad thams cad kyang // slob dpon gyis ni gzho nu ma'i// lag pas byed du gzhug par bya// bram ze rgyal rigs rigs skyes pa/ 
413b2(rgyud): byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang / ma nor skyes pa rab mdzes pa// dbang po ma tshang ma yin pa// mdor na bud med mtshan nyid dang // yang dag ldan par skyes pa yis// 'di 'dra'i gzho nu ma cig gnyis// gsum
413b3(rgyud): la gso sbyong sbyin nas ri// 'o ma'i zas kyis mngon dga' bar// byas nas dkar po'i gos bgos te// dkyil 'khor yo byas thams cad ni// byed gzhugs dkyil 'khor yo byad kun// legs bsams
413b4(rgyud): so sor brtags pa yis// chu dang rnam par dben pa dang // dge slong 'dul ba byas pa dang // yongasu sbyangs pa byas pa dang // gtsang sbra'i spyod pa sngon 'gro bas// slob dpon rang gi lhag gnas ched// phyed ma
413b5(rgyud): thams cad 'dug pa dri// gtor ma dang ni mar rnams ni// cho ga can gyis byed du bzhug/ de nas slob dpon yo byad kun/ tshogs nas dkyil 'khor rang nyid bri// slob ma yongasu gzung bar gyis/ 
413b6(rgyud): de rnams sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge slong dge 'dun la rab dang // yan lag cha shas kun rdzogs pa// bden par smra dang sbom pa min// mdzes pa mthong dang kha dog gtsigs// gzung bar mi bya gcig
413b7(rgyud): gnyis gsum// bco brgyad dang ni gzhan bcu drug de rnams skyabs gsum yongasu 'dzin// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang // 'o ma'i ston mo bza' ba dang // 'o ma'i shing las byung ba yi// so
413b8(rgyud): shing sor mo brgyad kyi tshad// bcom ldan rtsa ba'i snying po yis// lan ni nyi shu rtsa bdun du// mngon par bsngags nas pa yi gcin// rab sbyar mtshan mo'i thun mtsham su// dkyil 'khoras ba
414a1(rgyud): / phyi rol tu// shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yis// khres la rims pas nye 'dug nas// snying po re re lag par byin// rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun bzlas// gtsug tor bcing la ra
414a2(rgyud): bdur bzlas bya// de nas so shing de rnams la// byin nas rang rang so shing bzal// ral gcig ma yi snying po yis// lan bdun bsngags pa'i dri yi chus// spyi bor mngon par gtor bar bya// 
414a3(rgyud): de nas de rnams la brjod pa// bcom ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// dbang phyug mchog gi thugs rje can// chen po'i mchog ni sbyin pa po// bsgral bka' sgrol ba dran par gyis// ma
414a4(rgyud): ldan 'das ma sgrol ma yang // rig pa'i rgyal mo chen po ste// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// bskyed par byed ma dran par gyis// de yi 'og tu slob dpon gyis// slob ma
414a5(rgyud): de rnams kun la ni// 'dod chags bral dang ldan pa'i chos// brtan par byas nas de rnams bdun// shes rab pha ro/ phyir bklag bya// de lta bu yi cho ga yis// bud med
414a6(rgyud): rnams kyang yongs bzung bya// langs nas bu mos bkal pa yis// srang bu tshon sna lnga pa ni// mi mnyam rgyud du bsgrim pa la// dri yi chu yis mngon bkrus nas// re rer pad+ma'i
414a7(rgyud): bgrang phreng gis// gsang gtor byas nas rtsa ba yi// snying po lan grangs nyer cig tu// sngon bsngags de la 'dir brjod bya// dpal gyi gzhi ni yod pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams
414a8(rgyud): kyi zhabs mtshan ma// byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba ste// pad+ma'i bgrang phreng de phyir bsngags// de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis// slob ma rnams la cha phra mos// lag pa la ni
414b1(rgyud): bcing bar bya// slob ma rnams la gang kho na// de nyid slob ma bdag nyid bya// de nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas pa// shar du mngon phyogs bla gos ni// phrag pa cig tu byas nas ni// 
414b2(rgyud): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ni kas la rab tu gtsug byas te// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba dang / rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub thams cad dang // rang rgyal 'phags
414b3(rgyud): pa nyan thos dang / lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang // lha mo'i dri dang me tog gi/ phreng ba yongasu 'dzin pa yis// kun la gsol ba gdab par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpo bdag/ che
414b4(rgyud): ge mo zhes bya ba yis// bcom ldan 'phags ma sprul ma yi// dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal lags na// de dag rang nyid byon par mdzod// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
414b5(rgyud): kun dang // byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas/ nyan thos lha klu gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha min na mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rang gi rig pa sngag
414b6(rgyud): tshogs kyis// yongs bskor sems can thams cad la// rje su brtse bas byon nas kyang // 'dag la rjesu gnang bar mdzod/ de ltar yang gnyis yang gsum du// de nas
414b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis// rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pa dang // dkyil 'khor sa bzhi la bltas nas// dbu su me tog phreng ba der// gal te me tog phreng ga yo byed// de nas
414b8(rgyud): byon par shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas byang sems la// dri yi chu yis mchod yon dang // me tog phul cig de nas ni// khru brgya'i phyi rol sa bzhi la// yengasu sbyang
415a1(rgyud): byas pa ru// a pA mArga'i yam shing gis// me ni rab tu sngar byas nas// shar du mngor phyogs ku sha yis// rtsa ba'i snying po sbrang rtsi zho// mar gyis bsregs blugs brgyad
415a2(rgyud): brgyar dbul// de nas sangs rgyas byang sems dang // lha rnams la'ang mchod yon dbul// de nas dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi ru// gso sbyong yongasu blangs pa yis// skyes bu srung ba'i phreng
415a3(rgyud): ba dang // dbang po tshang ba bzhag par bya// de la 'dir ni brjod bya ste// gang zhig rnam pa gzhan bya ba// skyong ba bral bar 'gyur ba ste// dkyil 'khor dam tshig brgyad rnams ni// yang dag 'byung bar mi
415a4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de phyir cho ga byas pa yis// slob mas dam tshig shes par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gang // rab gnas slob mas thabs cig tu// song nas ku sha bting ba la/ 
415a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// tshogs rjesu dran pa yis/ g.yas pa'i gzhogs kyis nyal bar bya// de nas tho rangs slob dpon gyis// gtsang ma shar du kha phyogs pa/ 
415a6(rgyud): rmi lam rnam par dpyad par bya// de la 'di ni brjod bya ste// gang zhig tsan+dan bil ba sogs// u dum ba ra sogs n+ya gro d+ha// rgyal mtshan phreng bas khyab pa dang // rmi lam rab tu dad pa'ang rung // kha cig
415a7(rgyud): me lce mdzes pa dang // de ltar mthong ba de dngos grub// mchog gi bar du 'o ngang ba dang // kA raN+Da ba krung krung dang // rma bA ra ha Na rnams ni// gang zhig de lta bu mthong 'gyur// rmi lam bar ma'i dngos
415a8(rgyud): grub de// myur bar kho nar 'byung bar 'gyur// ma 'am ra ha Na yang rung // de bzhin pi waM thogs pa dang // kuN+Da la sogs pa yang rung // de bzhin a srag d+hi mthong na// gang yang rmi lam mtho
415b1(rgyud): / byed ba/ mi rnams tha ma'i dngos grub de// sgrol ma'i rtog par nges par bstan// gtum po khyi yi lag pa rnams// gang gis mthong bar gyur pa dang // khung bu rnga mo shing rta sogs/ mthong dang reg pa
415b2(rgyud): nyid sogs sam// rgya skyegs til mar gyis reg pa// gang gis rmi lam du 'jug pa// de yi dngos grub nges par gnas// dam tshig tsam du 'byung bar 'gyur// de lta bu sogs yon tan ldan// 
415b3(rgyud): rmi lam blo yis rnam dpyad nas// de ltar rab blo gang shes nas// slob ma de la rmi lam gyi// lung du yang ni bstan par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni// gal te khyim gnas gyur pa 'am
415b4(rgyud): dge slong dge slong ma dang ni// dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma yang rung / chen bo de rnams gso sbyong ni// bzung ste phye nas slob ma rnams// gso sbyong yang dag gus par bya// slob ma rmi lam mi
415b5(rgyud): dge ba// bstan pa sngon du sbyin bsreg bya// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni// snga ma kho nangs dang ni// ras ris mthar ni a lA sa// zangs las 'byung ba rab zhugs te/ 
415b6(rgyud): yang dag 'dzeg par byed bzhug/ de nas dkyil 'khor sa bzhi la// tsan+dan chu yi legs par byug/ slob ma thams cad gnas cig tu// snying pos srung ba byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor phyi yaM gnas
415b7(rgyud): cig tu// nyer 'dug dam tshig shes pa rnams// nang du rab tu gzhug par bya// de nas nyi ma nub du su// dkyil 'khor thig le gdab par bya// bu mos bskal pa'i srad bu ni// tshen sna lnga pa rtsa ba yi
415b8(rgyud): snying po lan bdun bsngags byas te// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// phur bu de rnams srad bus bcings// de dag thams cad khru yi tshad// gsum byas srad bus yongs dkri bya// 
416a1(rgyud): phyi nas kun tu dung dang ni/ rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang // mkhar rnga rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// mkhar ba dang ni pheg rdong rnams// kun nas 'khrol bar byed du gzhug// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa ngan som
416a2(rgyud): phyi rol du ni dgram par bya/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa// mtshon sna lnga pa'i thig skud kyis// khru brgyar byas nas thig ga ba bya// de lam dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ste// de nas kha dog thams cad pa/ rtsa ba'i
416a3(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings nas ni// rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgyad bzlas// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa yi// nyan thos dge 'dun rnam
416a4(rgyud): la ni/ phyag byas dkyil 'khor khor yug tu// rgyang grags lnga pa lhag gnas che// ral pa gcig pa'i snying po yis// gdug pa'i sems can thams cad kyi/ sems ni bcing bar bya ba'o// dkyil 'tsho
416a5(rgyud): yang ni thams cad kyi// slob dpon gyi ni yo byad nam/ ral cig snying po nyid kyis ni// thog mar srung bar byas nas ni/ byang shar phyogs nas brtsams byas te// rengs pa'i thig ni gdang
416a6(rgyud): par bya// rtsa ba'i rig pa zlos pa nyid// dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhas pas bris// yongasu bcad cing lus dkar ba'i// slob de de bzhin gshegs rnams la// phyag rgya rin chen phye ma so// pad+ma'i
416a7(rgyud): rigs la phyag byas te/ phye ma ser pos bcom ldan ma// 'phags ma sgrol ma phyag byas nas// ljang ku rnams kyis nyan thos kun// rang sangs rgyas kun phyag byas nas// nag pos rdo rje'i rigs
416a8(rgyud): la'o// de ltar dang pos dkyil 'khor gru// bzhi sgo bzhi pa'i snying por ro// phyi nas gnyis la khru gnyis kyis// tshad du rab tu 'jug par byed pa'o// gsum pa mtho gang pa de'i nyis 'gyuraro// de ltan
416b1(rgyud): thams cad du rim gyis bris ras nang gi dkyil 'khor du bri bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad der rang byon par mdzad du gsol/ 
416b2(rgyud): 'bru thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad dang / sman thams cad dang / dri dang me tog thams cad dang / tsan+dan gyi chus yongasu bkang ba/ mA ShA'i yal mdab kyis kha bkab pa// du ku la'i ras dkar bas
416b3(rgyud): mgrin pa bcings pa/ gser dang dngul las byung ba/ dkyil 'khor de'i yo byad thams cad ras ris gnyis pa'i mthar me tog gi phreng bas dkris nas rtsa ba'i rig pas bsngags pa de rnam par
416b4(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bum pa zhes bya ba ste snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbu su bzhag par bya'o// de la 'di brjod par bya ste/ dam tshig don dang bsod nams don// 'dod don so sor dmigs byed/ 
416b5(rgyud): sdom pa bzung bar byed gyur nas// gang du gnas pa/ thams cad nas// dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bri bar bya// gzhan gyis mi thub thugs rje che// sangs rgyas byams ma spyan mar bcas
416b6(rgyud): 'di rnams ming ni kun drang nas// de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya// 'jig rten gsum rgyal dkar mor grags// de bzhin du ni khro gnyer can// khros ma zhes ni grags pa ste// 'di rnams ming ni
416b7(rgyud): kun dran nas// spyan ras gzigs ni bri bar bya// rig pa mchog las slar 'jigs byed// rdo rje ser skya rdo rje ni// drag por bzhed dang seng+ge dang // de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur nyid// 'di rnams ming ni kun nas
416b8(rgyud): ni/ phyag na rdo rje kun tu bri// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyis dbu su phye ma dkar po dang / yungs kar dkar po bsres pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
417a1(rgyud): ring po che'i seng+ge'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'od kun tu 'phro ba/ gtsug tor nas 'od zer 'byung bzhin pa'i bcom ldan
417a2(rgyud): 'das rnams pa mchog thams cad dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis rkyad pa dang por bris shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi gzhog gnyi su phye ma ser po dang pad+ma ge sar phan tshun
417a3(rgyud): bsres pas bcug tor gyi rgyal po rnams kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / cha byad dang / dbyings kyi rnam pa can rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin
417a4(rgyud): gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa/ sa bon gyis gang ba dang / 'brus phyag na bsnams pa la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / kun nas 'bar ba'i
417a5(rgyud): btsug tor dang / gdugs dkar po dang / gzi brjid phung po dang / nor bu'i phung po dang / gser gyi phung po dang / rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang / kun nas phung po dang / nyon mongs pa
417a6(rgyud): dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phung po dang / ma nor de bzhin nyid kyi phung po dang / rtag pa'i phung po dang / dngos po med ba'i rang bzhin gyis phung po dang / thams cad phung po dang sgra dbyangs
417a7(rgyud): snyan pa'i phung po dang / 'jig rten gsum pa'i phung po dang / mtha' yas phung po dang / bsod nams phung po dang / lha'i phung po zhes pa 'di rnams g.yas kyi gzhog su nye bar bzhugs pa'o// 
417a8(rgyud): g.yon du 'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / mngon par 'phags pa dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / mngon par mtho ba dang / sa'i 'dab ma dang / 'dab ma brgya pa dang / 
417b1(rgyud): 'dab ma stong pa dang / 'od zer dang / 'od zer chen po dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od zer dang / bkod pa'i 'od zer dang / dkar po'i 'od zer dang / pad+ma'i 'od zer dang / bkod pa'i gtsug tor dang / bdud bzhi'i rnam par
417b2(rgyud): 'dul ba'i gtsug tor dang gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gtsug tor zhes pa 'di rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa dang / lung bstan pa zhes gtsug tor
417b3(rgyud): gyi rgyal po 'di rnams g.yon gyi steng du bri bar bya'o// gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i nye log su 'phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad bri ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma sbyar ma
417b4(rgyud): dang / mdzod spu dang / zla ba dang / snying rje ma dang / byams pa ma dang / mi 'jigs ma dang / lung bstan ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ 
417b5(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'brugs pa rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
417b6(rgyud): bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye ba'i snying po zhes pa 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa la nges par rtag
417b7(rgyud): bzhin pa/ rang gi gzugs las rab tu snang ba'i sku bri'o// gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo gzhan gyi mi thub pa chen po zlo ba'i gzugs can pad+ma'i gdan
417b8(rgyud): la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ rtse gsum dang zhags pas phyag brel pa cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs snyan la blta ba'o// gzhan du rgyal ba'i gtsug tor
418a1(rgyud): gyi nye log su phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / phyi ras dge sbyong ma dang / de bzhin gshegs
418a2(rgyud): pa'i ma dang / sangs rgyas dkar mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lcags kyus 'gugs ma zhes pa 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
418a3(rgyud): sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa'o// 'di rnams kyi steng du gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brgyad la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin ba
418a4(rgyud): pa'i kun tu snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gsum dang / de bzhin na ne/ gas pa'i 'dus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
418a5(rgyud): sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten zhes pa 'di rnams kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis yong su bskor ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ rab tu dang
418a6(rgyud): ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po kun nas
418a7(rgyud): 'od pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ phyag na pad+ma ste/ de rnams thams cad lha'i gzugs g.yas pas sa bon gyi gang ba dang / phyag g.yon pas mchog sbyin pa/ rang gi cha byad kyis kun tu gnas
418a8(rgyud): par yang // gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i steng du rang sangs rgyas brgyad ji ltar rig par bri bar bya'o// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das snyan grags zhes bya ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / steng
418b1(rgyud): / drang srong dang / drang srong chen po dang / lha'i drang srong dang / mA da ra dang / brtsegs pa dang / legs par brtsegs pa dang / brtsegs pa chen po zhes pa rang sangs rgyas brgyad po 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis te
418b2(rgyud): bar 'dug pa/ ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ bla gos ser po ca no// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon du snam sbyararo// mdun gyi 'og
418b3(rgyud): tu chos kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad pa la gnas pa'o// de'i yang nye logasu khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa zhes bya ba
418b4(rgyud): ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'i 'og tu pad+ma rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal
418b5(rgyud): mo bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ dpal dang / ras kyi smad g.yogs dang stod g.yog can/ thal mo sbyar ba byas pa cung zad sgrol ma'i
418b6(rgyud): gzugs la lta bar gyur pa/ bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o// de'i gong du pad+ma chen po zhes bya ba'i khro bo mdog dmar po kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'brugs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar
418b7(rgyud): 'dug pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o// zla ba'i rgyal po de rnams thams cad kun nas 'bar ba chen po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang rnam pa
418b8(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i gzugs 'chang ga dang dang ras kyi smad g.yog can/ rgyan tha~Md kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lu su bya'o// sgrol ma'i g.yon gyi gzhon su byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen po thob sku
419a1(rgyud): mdog dkar po ral pa'i cod pan 'chang la rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ dpa pa'i snod g.yogs can/ dngal dang ras kyi smad g.yogs can/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
419a2(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa 'gro ba zhes bya ba pri yang ku ltar sngo sangs cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang / pad+ma'i
419a3(rgyud): gdan la nye bar 'dug ga ral pa'i cod par 'chang ba/ g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i smad g.yogs dang / dang la'i stod g.yogs 'chang ga/ shin tu dang ba'i sku/ 'od zer 'bar ba/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub la
419a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o// dri ma med pa 'gro ba'i steng gi g.yon du bco ma ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang bgrang phreng dang / ka yang bzhi nag po can
419a5(rgyud): dang rab tu dang ba'i sku 'bar ba'i phreng ba las 'khrugs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu 'dod pa phun tshogs byed pa pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa sku dkar po pad+ma'i sdong bus dkris pa'i lus can phyag
419a6(rgyud): g.yon pas pad+ma dang / g.yas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag du bkod pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin ras can/ phyag na rdo rje'i g.yas kyis snam bu cig la
419a7(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bri bar bya'o// 'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog dang nyal ba dang / legs par grub par byed pa dang / rdo rje sde dang / dpung bzang dang / ral pa byen rjes dang / rin pa/ 
419a8(rgyud): bzang po dang / legs 'grub dang / sde bzang dang / stobs po che dang / rnam par 'joms pa dang / ki lI ki la dang / mchog dang / legs 'dul dang / 'gro lding ba dang / sngon rabs dang / rin chen ki lI dang / byis/ 
419b1(rgyud): pa'i ki lI dang / legs par ki lI dang / legs par gang ba dang / gang 'a chen po dang / lha mthar byed dang / rdo rje chen po dang / 'bar ba zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams sngags kyi rgyal po chen po ste/ kun nas 'bar ba'i bres
419b2(rgyud): bas 'khrugs pa/ rma ba la nye bar 'dug pa/ ut+pa la ltar sngo bsangs/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer du byas pa phyag g.yon pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa'o// 'di dag
419b3(rgyud): gi 'og tu rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mabri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma ma kI dang / rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang / rdo rje rgyal ma dang / rdo rje rnam par rgyal ma dang / dmar
419b4(rgyud): ldan ma dang / grags ldan ma dang / bi shini rdo rje spyan ma dang / rdo rje khro gnyer ma dang // rdo rje khu tshur ma dang / rdo rje mi 'jigs ma dang / rdo rje phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje sgra ldan ma dang / rdo rje dge legs ma dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma
419b5(rgyud): dang / rdo rje ma mo dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / rdo rje gnam lcag/ sa ma dang / dus kyi rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje gtsug bud ma dang / rdo rje bka' sgo chen mo dang / rdo rje 'od dang rgyal ba ldan ma
419b6(rgyud): dang rdo rje gzugs ldan ma dang / rdo rje spyan ma zhes pa nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di rnams rdo rje rigs kyi rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa/ ud pa la ltar sngo bsangs kun nas 'bar
419b7(rgyud): ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa cung zad bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan par byas pa dang / dar dang ras kyi sham thabs dang / dang la'i steng g.yogs panams pa/ g.yon pa rdo rje dang // yas pa bcom ldan 'das
419b8(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ lhas bstod pa'i gzugs 'chang ba'o// de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa/ rang gi gzugs dang / cha byad dang dbyibs bzhin du
420a1(rgyud): bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yas kyi gzhog su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston kha'i sprin ltar dkar ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ khong dpag med dbu su bzhugs
420a2(rgyud): pa/ dang la'i stod g.yogs can/ dar la dang ras kyi sham thabs can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par byed pa/ 
420a3(rgyud): pad+ma'i gangan la sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan gyis rgyan par byas pa'i lus can/ cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na
420a4(rgyud): ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog can/ pad+ma'i gdan la rgyan tham sa cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ dar dang ras kyi sham thabs can/ stong g.yogs dmar po 'anabs pa
420a5(rgyud): phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ phyag g.yon pas rnga yab kyis brel ba/ 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i phyag cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa
420a6(rgyud): gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.ya su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma chen po pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs ma kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa rab tu
420a7(rgyud): dang ba'i sku/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ cung zad 'dzum bzhin pa/ der dang ras kyi sham thabs can/ steng g.yogs dmar po brlabs pa/ phyag g.yon pas ut+pal yongasu bzung nas g.yas pas
420a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ lus cung zad 'dud pa/ lang tsho dang po can/ ha cang mi sbom/ ha cang mi phra ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras

426a5(rgyud): mA la/ ba la ma la ma la/ ka la ka la/ na la/ ha la ha la/ hu lu hu lu/ he be d+hi satwa/ pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa na ma te ru/ ku ru ku ru/ hrid yaM/ ma nu sma ra/ i daM tsa me/ kAr+yaM ku ru swA hA// 'di ni bcom
426a6(rgyud): ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i snying po ste/ nyi ma so sor tho rangs langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
426a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor byas te dri dang me tog la sogs pa mngon par bkram nas de nas lan bcu gsum brjod par bya'o// de nas nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed// zla drug kho nar byas pas ji ltar
426a8(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du yid kyi shing rta yong su rdzogs par byedado// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ gal te mtshams med pa
426b1(rgyud): byas pas kyang ma grub pa na de'i tshe mtshams med pa byas pa dang / bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus par gyur cig zheso// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
426b2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis rjesu skyes pa bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtogs pa chen po'i rgyud phyi mar 'jig
426b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rin pa sring mo bzhi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug bzhin pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par gzigs par gyur pa/ rtog pa bzhir skyes pa/ thung ngu'i
426b4(rgyud): gzugs can// na mkha' la 'gro gas 'og dang mi snang ba dang / ro langs dang / 'thab rtsod dang / rkang pas rab tu 'grod pa dang / rgyas pa can dang / mngon spyod can dang / dbang du byed pa dang / bskal
426b5(rgyud): pa bzang po nyid rab tu sbyin pa po tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa las bzlog pa/ rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid can gyis
426b6(rgyud): lhag pa'i cha khyim du skyes pa/ kun tu ston par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mkhyen pa'i mthu'i don gyis ched stong phrag pas kyang stong phrag brgya po des kyang lan cig
426b7(rgyud): gzhom pa tsam dang / dpe tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i yul 'jig rten du ma'i 'byung gnas rang bzhin du gnas pa la ltos nas ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar bcom ldan 'das ma
426b8(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjesu sgrub pa 'di rnams gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das yid du gyur pa dngos grub rab tu brtsol bar mdzad par gyur to// tad+ya thA/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ na ma AH
427a1(rgyud): a ba le ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ oM dza ye swA hA/ rgyal ma zhes bya ba'o// tad+ya thA/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ oM bi dza ya swA hA/ rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'o// 
427a2(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ oM a dzi te swA hA// mi thub ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ oM a pa ra dzi ti swA hA// gzhan
427a3(rgyud): kyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'o// zhes pa de lta bu sring mo bzhi'o// lnga pa ming po ni/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ar+d+ha te/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ a~M ki ni ki ni sarba ta thA ga tA ud+b+ha ba shAn+te/ 
427a4(rgyud): bar de/ ut+ta ma ta thA ga tA ud+b+ha ba hU~M phar swA hA/ ming po gtum bu ru zhes pa'o// sngags kyi rgyal po yongasu bsgrags// mdor na nga rgyal can rlom pa// phyi ma'i rgyud kyi las rnams ni// ji lta ji ltar
427a5(rgyud): rab sbyar ba// de lta de ltar sgrub par byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rang gi rdzu 'phrul yang dag par bstan par 'dod pas/ stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das
427a6(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te rang gi rdo rje yang dag par bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te byang chub sems
427a7(rgyud): dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smra so// byang chub sems dpa' bdag kyang rtog pa'i rgyal po rgyud phyi ma 'dir bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mthu kun tu
427a8(rgyud): bstan pa'i don du 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod rten rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjesu spyong pa sbyin par bgyi'o// de la rje su yi rang ba'i byang chub sems
427b1(rgyud): / dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe mchog gi grub pa dang / mchog gi las byed pa tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams kyang khyad par du 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjesu sbyong ba pos gang
427b2(rgyud): rtul ba las byung ba 'di rnams rigs dang / pha rol gnon par byed pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la
427b3(rgyud): 'di skad ces smraso// phyag na rdo rje gsungs shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// phyag na rdo rje snyoms par zhugs pa de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
427b4(rgyud): khams 'di kun tu snang bar bya'o// de nas phyag nad rjes phyag gi sor mo rab tu brkyang ste rdo rje rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje dmar po dang / rdo rje mthar phyin pa
