453a1(rgyud): / par bya'o// longs spyod 'dod pas rgya skyegs kyi 'dab ma la gnas pa'o// log par 'dren pa nye bar byung ba bdag gis so phag la kum tu gnas pa'o// che 'dod pas thung ngu bcu la gam
453a2(rgyud): ba'i sa'i snying po la gnas pa'o// slob dpon rgyas par 'dod pas a riSh+Ta dang / thod pa la kun tu gnas pa can nye bar phyung ba mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// lan bdun du mngon par dbang
453a3(rgyud): bskur bas ni/ dpal med pa la rab tu zhi bar byedado// lan bcu gnyis mngon par dbang bskur bas ni rgyal por 'gyur// lan sngar mngon par dbang bskur bas na dbul po nor dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
453a4(rgyud): phyi nas slar yang mchod de gshegasu gsol bar bya'o// 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang bskur ba'i zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// dkyil 'khor 'di kun tu bris
453a5(rgyud): nas ring por mi thogs pa nyid du bcom ldan 'das ma rab tu dgyes par byed// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyad na rdo rje la

453a8(rgyud): las byed pa phyi ma 'di'i lam rab tu gnas pa'i ched du 'di skad dus kyang smras smra so// bcom ldan 'das rab tu gnas pa dang smon lam brjod par bgyi'o// sngags kyi spyod pa de lta bu
453b1(rgyud): 'di ni ci nas de sems can rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyur yong su 'gyur ba dang / ci nas de thams cad 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad kyis 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
453b2(rgyud): dang / dus ma yin pa'i char ltung ba dang / sdigs pa'i char byed pa'i mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / dud 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / de la yang bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang /

453b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi dngos grub yid kyi shing rta yongasu rdzogs pa dang / bdag dang skyes bu'i rnam pa 'di nges par sgrol ma'i che du de lta bu'i gzugs kyis bdag
454a1(rgyud): dang byas mardo rje zung med kyi gzugs kyis dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang / cha byad kyis sems can yong su smin par bgyi'o// de nas yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzis
454a2(rgyud): dbang phyug la rje su rtse bas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'dzin rten skyong ba gzhan rnams dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
454a3(rgyud): po la sogs pa rnams dgug par byas nas de lta bu'i gzugs kyis skyes bu chen po'i rnam pa byed par 'gyuraro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams thams cad kyis 'di skad ces

454a8(rgyud): kyis dge slong gi cha byad kyis dang / skad cig gis sman dang rtsi'i gzugs kyis dang / yud tsam gyis brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis 'phags pa'i lam du 'jug par bya'o// skad cig gis bdud kyi gzugs kyis
454b1(rgyud): / gzhan gyi gzugs sprul te dbang sgyur gyi lha'i dbang po dang / dga' ldan dang / 'tshe ma dang / 'og min dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / dur khrod dang / drag po dang / khyab 'jug dang
454b2(rgyud): nor lha'i bu dang / nor sbyin dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / 
454b3(rgyud): sha za dang / hrul bum dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / seng+ge dang / glang po che dang / ma he nang / spre'u dang / phag sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyi 'dab chags dang / 
454b4(rgyud): ri dang / shing dang / 'bras bu dang / kos dang chos gos dang / gzhon pa dang / mal stan dang / rnga ba Ta ha dang / dung dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzugs kyis spras pa dang / 
454b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / mtshungs par 'gyu ra te rigs kyi bu 'di ni kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rtags dang / dbyibs brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gzugs dang mtshungs par
454b6(rgyud): 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyun
454b7(rgyud): gis mthu chen pos 'dir 'ongs pa ste/ bdud dpung dang bcas pa'i yul la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / gang du 'dud dpung bcas pa'i yul du gnas pa byang
454b8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rig pa dang / sngags kyi spyod ba'i thabs kyis sems can rnams yongasu spyod par byed// ji 'dra ba'i son phyogs bcu rnamasu tshad med
455a1(rgyud): cing grangs med pa rnams yongasu dag pa dang / yongasu ma dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam su sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs par gyur to// bsam pa ji lta
455a2(rgyud): ba'i gzugs kyis rang dang ji lta bus gdul bar bya ba'i sems can rnams gnas la gsum pa phyir mi ldog pa la 'jog par byed pa'o// ji srid sangs rgyas kyis gzugs kyis gang yang
455a3(rgyud): sems can gyi chags pa zil gyis mnan te rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i yo byad dang / yongasu longs spyod par 'dod pa de rnams kyis zhen pa spang ba'i ched du de rnams la yo byad rnams
455a4(rgyud): byin nas phyir mi ldog pa nyid la rab tu 'jog par byed// nges pa slar yang dam tshig des byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzinas dbang phyug gis bang
455a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'
455a6(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa rnams yid kyis bshad pa la bdag rab tu spro ba chen po bgyid do// bdag rta mo grin zhes bya ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po smras
455a7(rgyud): ba yang bcom ldan 'das dang phan tshun phan pa dang / 'jam pa'i sem su gyur cig/ 'di ni bdag gis gsang sngags 'bras bu chen po gzi brjid chen po las kyi don thams cad
455a8(rgyud): sgrub pa po 'gyur te/ yang 'dir na mo rat+na tra yA ya na mo a mi tA thA ya/ ta thA ka tA ya/ ar+d+ha te/ samya kAM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ mahA/ 
455b1(rgyud): / kA mu Ni kA ya/ sarba sa twA ya/ a nu kaM pa kA ya/ sar+b+ba satwA d+ya sa na b+hI te ni/ sarba sa twa makra ka rA ya/ sar+b+babi n+ya rA dza a d+hi bi kr-i tA ya ma hA rA dzA prok+te/ 'di rnams la phyag byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
455b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gi zhal nas gsungs pa sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub pa bgegs thams cad gsod par byed cing thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod par bgyi'o// oM hu hu hu/ ta ru le
455b3(rgyud): bi ta ru le/ sar+b+ba bi Sha/ grA ha ka dzA li ta bi phu ling+ka/ tri hA sa/ ke sha rA Ta pa/ badz+ra khu ra nir g+hA ta/ ka tse li ta/ ba su d+hA ta la/ ni shA sa/ mA ru Sh+mi b+hi/ d+ha ra ni d+ha ra/ d+hI Sha NA/ tri ha sa/ a pa ri mi ta ba lA rba
455b4(rgyud): ma b+hI Shab+hU ta ka ne/ bur+dz+dza nug+h+na/ ha ya grI ba/ khA da khA da/ pa ra man+te sodz+dza mi di nra/ A be shA ye/ dz+wa la ra bi shA tsaM gra heSh+Ta/ a pri ta ha to// b+ha ba/ badz+ra kiny+dza ra ya si/ i maM duSh+pa gra ha duSh+Ta sar+b+ba bA/ d+hun d+hu
455b5(rgyud): na/ ba Ta phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha bud+d+hi d+harmA/ sad+d+ha/ a nu dz+nyA ka ra shI g+h+raM/ ha ya grI ba phaT/ 'dza ga tr-i ya phaT/ badz+ra ne tA ya phaT/ badz+ra daMSh+TA ya phaT/ \u0f7fkhu rA ya phaT/ badz+ra Ar+ya khu rA ni g+hA ta na ya
455b6(rgyud): phaT/ pa ra man+t+ra bi nA shA nA ya phaT/ rje lo kya b+ha ya~M kA ra ya phaT/ sar+b+ba kar+m+me b+hu a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ badz+ra ku lo rdza sa nA ya phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ hUM yig gsum dang / phaT yi
455b7(rgyud): bzhis bco brgyad kyis lhag pa'i bcu bzhi la brten pa'i rta mgrin gyi zhal gyi sngags rdzog so// oM badz+ra khu ra bi kra tA na na hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM ha ya gri ba hr-i da ya/ ma brta yi lA mi e
455b8(rgyud): e hi/ ma tha la la/ 'adz+ramag 'adz+ra ra ma/ badz+ra kro Ta/ badz+ra ka Sha/ dz+wa lur/ badz+ra Sh+Ta/ han tan/ dpya nga/ bcab tse/ we dz+dza hA/ yA ban+d+ha yang+ka rAH/ sa ha sa ha/ dza \u0f89\u0fa4 dza r+tha/ u ru mu ru/ ru Tu ru ru/ d+hun d+hun kha~M d+hun
456a1(rgyud): ma ba ma ba/ mA ka mA/ ka Ta ka Ta/ sar+b+ba de trA~M/ sar+b+ba yar+tha/ sar+b+ba bi he \u0f7f kA/ sar+b+ba biShi pra bi/ pra bi bra bi pra bi sha ha ya prI ra pri ya dz+wa la a bi sha A bi sha/ 'adz+ra lu ra mA bi la mA ud+hA d+harma sa~M b+ha ba tsa na/ 
456a2(rgyud): ma nu swa ra/ dza ti ma nu sma ra/ hri da ya ma nu sma ra/ bi ki ra bi ki ra/ ga dza ga dze/ nan+da nan+da/ gu lu gu lu/ mu lu mu lu/ ni ha na ni ha na/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT swA hA/ snying po'i sngag so// na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ 'di yang
456a3(rgyud): stobs dang pha rol gnon pa/ dpag tu med pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po lus kyi mchog gi gzi brjid rnam par 'jig 'byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje su 'jug cing mchod pa'i rjes
456a4(rgyud): gnang ba rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad rnam par gnan pa rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
456a5(rgyud): lto 'phye chen pos yang dag par bstod pa/ yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum gyis mchod pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba chen po ma che ba gtsigs pa/ rta mgrin gyi rgyal po'i cho gar
456a6(rgyud): 'gyuro// sdigs pa byang bar byas nas mchod rten du 'bum phrag gsum bzla so// de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ dkar ba'i batsho lnga la mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas
456a7(rgyud): kha char gyi rtse mo ma bcad pa skra dang bral ba'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis pir gtsang ma sar pas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan pad+ma'i
456a8(rgyud): gdan la gnas pa chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// g.yon gyi gzhog su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchod phyir thog dkar po can ston ka'i
456b1(rgyud): / sprin ltar dkar ba pad+ma'i lus dang ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba'i dbu su 'od dpag med dkar po sbyangs pa'i snod kyi nang du gnas pa/ phyag g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa/ g.yon
456b2(rgyud): pas pad+ma rab tu sbyin pas brel ba'o// sgrub pa yang nges par rtog bzhin pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og gi g.yon du ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba'i rta mgrin
456b3(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po bri bar bya'o// rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal spyan dmar po// skra ser skya/ e na ya'i phyag chen po// ras yug gis dkris pa// drag po'i gsus pa 'phyang ba sbrul gyi mchod
456b4(rgyud): phyir thogs pa can spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la nges pa rtog bzhin pa/ 'bar ba'i zhal pad+ma'i phreng ba drug cus daphul rgyan pa'o// de yi nye log su brtson 'grus dang
456b5(rgyud): ldan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa lag na spos phor gyi brel ba pus mo gnyis gtsugs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yon gyi gzhog su khro bo la nges par rtog bzhin ba cung
456b6(rgyud): zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin rdo rje la nyug par byed bzhin pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i gzhogs gnyisu pad+ma'i steng
456b7(rgyud): du gnas pa pad+ma de yang klu gzhen nus yongasu zin pa'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ri mo'i las rdzogs pa dang / mchod pa brgya chen po byas te/ mtshan mo gsum du
456b8(rgyud): sbyang bar gnas pas bgrang phreng bzhag nas mar gyis mar me rgya chen po dang dkar po'i gtor ma phul nas de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngon spyad pa byas pas
457a1(rgyud): mtshan mo gcig tu rab tu bcug te bzhag par bya'o// de nas byung ste rgyal gyis lcags las byung ba'i 'khor lo gso sbyong can gtsang ma dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa'i las
457a2(rgyud): byed pas byed du bcug nas sor mo brgyad pa rgyas pa yongasu zum pa/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'khor lo de yang ba byung lngar mtshan mo gcig tu
457a3(rgyud): bcug nas bzhag par bya'o// de nas gton nas khrus dang rjesu 'thun par byas te gos dkar pos kun nas dkris nas/ ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag ste/ 'dug pa dang / gtor ma
457a4(rgyud): dang / mchod yon gyi snod blangs nas lha thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o// mchod yon phul nas slar yang gsheg su gso la ba yang bdag la byas nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis
457a5(rgyud): yan lag bdun bzlas pa'i thal ba'i rab dang / sgron me la lan bdun bzlas pas sgron me'i ra ba dang / de nas srung ba'i cha ka byas nas yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas
457a6(rgyud): pas/ sa bzhi bcing ba dang / tshul lan bdun mngon par sngags pas na mkha' bcing ba'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas dri'i chus yongasu bkang ba me tog dkar po dang lhan cig pa pus mo
457a7(rgyud): gnyis btsugs pa'i rig pa 'dzin pas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rang gi lha spyan drang bar byas nas mchod yon phul te stan de la lha rnams tshim par bya'o// mar dang sbrang rtsi dang / 
457a8(rgyud): mas bsregs blugs lan 'dun sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas rin pa 'dzin pas lag pa gnyis kyis 'khor lo blangs nas ji srid du 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 
457b1(rgyud): ngo che'i sgra thos pa dang sprin las go lu go lu sgrog pa dang / mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang / ras ris 'gul ba dang / dung gi sgra thos pa dang / dril bu'i sgra sgrogs pa dang / ha ha'i sgra sgrogs
457b2(rgyud): ba dang / rigs kyi bu de rnams grub pa legaso lag so// 'khor lo 'di byang chub sems dpa'i lam bgrod pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho chen po sgrol bar byed// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings
457b3(rgyud): ba rings par ji srid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// byon pa na yang mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// de nas sgrub pa pos mchod yon phul
457b4(rgyud): nas de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sgrub po la gsungs pa/ bu bdud kyi phyogs de rnams nges par thul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam de rnams bgrod
457b5(rgyud): pa tsi bya zheso// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras/ gzigs dbang phyug sgrub pa po la phyag g.yas pas spyi bor myug par mdzad// myugs pa'i skad cig
457b6(rgyud): de nyid las dpag tshad stong du rgya che ba'i bla re g.yer kha'i dra ba 'phyang ba gser 'dab mas rab tu 'phyang bzhin pas sgrol ma baH ngas pa/ oMn+da ni la/ pad+ma rA na/ so so kan+ti ka dang / 
457b7(rgyud): rgyan gyi khyad par gzhan rnams kyis kyang rdo rje'i nus pas rnam par spras shing nye bar smras pa/ bkra shis pa gzhan gyis kyang rin pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa klu
457b8(rgyud): len bzhin bsnyan pa'i sgra dbyangs sprugs pa/ bi zhang dang / rdza rdza dang / gling bu dang / pheb rdob rjesu sgrub pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub pa po'i bla re 'di rang nyid ri// 
458a1(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po de mthus ji srid zla ba dang nyi ma dang skar ma rnams yod kyi bar du 'khor dang bcas pa rol par byed pa dang / rin pa'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad
458a2(rgyud): kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams kyi mnga' ba go/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bya ba byas nas yongasu spyod par byed pa po dang / lhan cig gzhal med khang la 'dzegs
458a3(rgyud): nas 'gro bar byed// 'khor lo de yang 'bar bzhin pa gzhal med khang gi rtse mor rig pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rnam par 'gro ba'i yid kyis bde ba can du 'gro bar byed// gang
458a4(rgyud): du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bzhugs pa der lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namaSh+TA lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /

458a6(rgyud): bdag ste/ gang gi tshe 'chi ba na bram ze rnamasu skye bar 'gyur zhing skye ba dran pa dang / mtshan thams cad yong su rdzogs pa dang / dus thams cad mngon par shes pa dang / nor chen po dang / los

458a8(rgyud): pa dang / thos pa 'dzin pa dang / bzo dang / yi ge da / ri mo thams cad la mkhas pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang sems dpar byed pa de yid kyis rtogs par bya'o// nad thams cad
458b1(rgyud): / rnam par spang ba'i bram ze'i rig su skye'o// zhes so// lan bdun mngon par bsngags gtsug phud bcing ba dang / hUM yi ges 'phel ba dang / gnon pa dang / rmongs par byedado// dzaM yi ges gshes su gsolo//

458b3(rgyud): phye ba dang / brlab par byed pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / gsod par byed pa gzhan thams cad kyang 'dir bya'o// thams cad snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis te drag po yis ni ma yin pa kho na'o// ji srid du
458b4(rgyud): rin pa'i rgyal po rab tu sbyar bar mi bya ba'i gan su rab tu sbyar bar mi bya ste/ gang rab tu sbyar bar byed pa de'i mchog gi sgrub pa mi 'grub bo// dam tshig shes pa med par yang 'gyuraro// 
458b5(rgyud): dngos grub 'di ni sgrub thabs thams cad dang / rgyud thams cad du'o// sor mo la lan 'dun mngon par bsngags par byas nas sprin gnon par byedado// mgo reg byas nas
458b6(rgyud): rgyan pa rgyal bar byed// tha snyad thams cad nyid la yang // yungs kar la lan bdun bsngags pa byas nas ri khe bsnun par byas te rnam par rnyil bar byed// mA la ri'i me tog la la mdun
458b7(rgyud): mngon par sngags bud med gang gis bsnom par sbyin par 'am/ mgo bor blugs na de dbang du 'gyuraro// ru ta dang / shing chen dang / a ga ru nag po dang / tsan+dan dang / gur gum dang / sa hA ka ra'i snyam
458b8(rgyud): dang che ba gsub gyi 'dab ma dang / na le sham dang / ba shu la'i me tog dang / pri yang ku'i me tog rnams phye ma zhib mor byas nas sbrang rtsis sbyar te rtsen ka'i 'dab mar ril bu byed du
459a1(rgyud): gzhug par bya'o// 'di rnams lan lngar yong su bzlas te byin pa de dbang du 'acuro// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis skyes pa dang lhan cig zung med dbang du 'gyuraro// sgrub pa la zhugs pas gang de
459a2(rgyud): gnas pa de nyid kyis phye mas yang dag par brtsams par bya ste lon 'dren rnams kyis zil gyis mi non no// 'di nyid kyis srin po dang yi dgas la sogs pa rnams kyiso// ku t+ya dza'i sa bon
459a3(rgyud): dang / na ka ge ser dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / shrA Sha'i me tog dang / spang spos dang / rgya spos dang / ru rto dang / lag skyes kyis sa bon dang / tsan+dan dmar po dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po'i me tog
459a4(rgyud): dang sa bon rnams cig tu byas nas ba ser skya'i gcin gyis bu mo'i lag par btags par bya'o// de nas ril bu byas nas gri ma la mA la ti'i me tog dkar pos bgo bar bya'o// 'di
459a5(rgyud): rnams kyi lus byugs na log par 'dren pa dang / yi dgas dang / grul bum dang / sha za la sogs pa rnams dang gis kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyuraro// gal te mau sbyin na
459a6(rgyud): khang gi gcin la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas nang rab tu 'jom par byed/ ku gul dang bri ts+yai mar ta'i sa 'on dang / tsan+dan dang / tu ru ka dang / shrA bA la sa ka 'di rnams phye mar
459a7(rgyud): byas nas gos la 'dug par gyis shig// gang gis kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyuro// ldong ros dang / gi baM dang / lag skyes dang / ba ru ra dang / ka dam pa'i me tog dang / shing mngar dang / seM pa
459a8(rgyud): ka'i me tog dang / shing rtsa dang / na le sham dkar po'i sa bon dang / yung ba gnyis dang shu dag rnams pa ser skya'i bcin gyis bram ze'i bu mo'i lag par gso sbyong can gyis btags par
459b1(rgyud): bya'o// ril bu byas nas ut+pa las bsgo bar bya'o// a ti muk+ta ka dang / sA la dang / me tog sngon pos bsgos par bya'o// log par 'dren pa rnams sam/ gzhan rnams sam/ yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul
459b2(rgyud): bum dang / srin po la sogs pa rnams gang gis kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyuraro// nad med pa'i le'u rdzog so// de nas ro langs sgrub pa 'byung ste skyes pa'i rol nyams pa rab tu mdzes
459b3(rgyud): pa la dkar ba'i bco lnga la rje su byug pa byas nas sbyangs pa'i gnod du bzhag nas gso sbyong can des kyang sgra bzhor du bcug nas me tog gi 'phreng ba mgrin pa la bcings te khron pa skam por
459b4(rgyud): zhugs nas ser skya'i ba byung gi ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten de nyid du khron par bzhag nas mchod pa rgya che na po byas te gtor ma dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi rnams kyis
459b5(rgyud): bcings pa dang / phyogs sbyor ba rnams bzhag par bya'o// ro de la 'bras yos dang / phye ba ser skya'i 'o ma dang sgyu ra te ji sridu ro de'i lde byung gi bar de sring du khar bsregs blunas
459b6(rgyud): kyis shig/ de 'chang nas ral gri 'dzin pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dpa'o chen po pha rol gnod par 'gyuraro// nyi ma 'tshang ba dang / mnyam pa'i 'od du 'gyur// lo stong phrag ldang 'tsho bar byed/ 
459b7(rgyud): ro langs kyi sgrub pa gnyis pa 'byung ste dur khrod kyi thal bas ro langs bris nas mchod pa rgya chen po dang / gtor ma byas te de'i mdun du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas seng ldeng gi yaM
459b8(rgyud): shing la che ba'i til mar gyis btags pas ji srid ro langs langs kyi bar de srid sbyin bsreg bya'o// gang yid kyi sems dpa'i byed pa myur du 'gug par byed// bcud kyi len sbyin pa
460a1(rgyud): / byed// de la zhon nas sbyin sreg gis 'gro bar byed/ lo stong phrag bcu gsum du 'tshe bar byed// ro langs sgrub pa gsum pa 'byung ste/ ser skya'i ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar
460a2(rgyud): byugs nas me la sbyin sreg gis byas pa'i thal bas ro langs bris nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te de bzhin du yang dag par bzhag nas be kaM ka ta'i bsregs blugs kyis sbyin sreg byed
460a3(rgyud): cing rig pa 'dzin pas be kaM ka ta sa kun nas bsnun par bya'o// rtsa ba'i sngags dran pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// longs shig longs shig ngu bar byed pa dang / drag du dgod pas grol
460a4(rgyud): bar byed na 'jigs par byedado// ji srid rang nyid las kyi bar du rgya ba na rje su 'gro bar byed de dbang po'i chung ma yang myur du 'gugs par byedado// bcud kyis len du 'gyuraro// de zos nas lo
460a5(rgyud): stong phrag bcu gsum du 'tsho bar byedado// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe nor chen po'i rig su skye bar 'gyuraro// skye ba dran bar yang 'gyuraro// ro langs sgrub par 'gyur ba'o// rma bya dang
460a6(rgyud): na mkha' lding dang / glang po che dang / rta srog mkhar gyis dang / 'o mas dkar po'i bco lnga la legs par brtsegs pa byas nas chu rnam par dbye ba gsum rnams rtsa ba'i sngags
460a7(rgyud): kyis yongasu bzlas nas de ser skya spyod du gzhug go// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rnam par dben pa'i 'byung gi gso sbyong can gyis ser skya de'i 'o ma blangs nas sa'i gong bu de mnya
460a8(rgyud): bar bya'o// de nas rma bya dang / na mkha' lding dang / glang po che dang / rta gang yang rung ba mo 'am gang yang rung ba byas nas ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o// ras
460b1(rgyud): ris kyi zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ mar me rnams dang / srung ba'i cho ga byas nas u dum ba ra'i yam shing gis bsregs blugs bdun gyi sbyin bsreg bya'o// dri

460b6(rgyud): dngos grub bo// de nas rdo rje rnam par byed pa des a ga ru las byung ba 'am/ tsan+dan las byung ba 'am/ lha'i shing las byung ba 'am/ seng ldeng las byung ba 'am/ dri las byung ba 'am/

466a6(rgyud): nas de nas lha thams cad dang / rig pa 'dzin ba thams cad kyis sgrub pa po byang chub sems dpa' la legaso zhes bya ba byin te srid pa gsum gyi chu bo chen po las
466a7(rgyud): bsgral bar byas pa de rnams nges par rgyal ba kun tu snang bas mnan pa byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang lhan cig 'tsho ba'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
466a8(rgyud): gis lha thams cad la kheg so zhes bya ba byin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyag g.yas pa/ sgrub pa ma'i spyi bor sprug par mdzad// de nas sgrub pa pos gang yid la snying
466b1(rgyud): bsems pa der 'gyuraro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lha nyid gang 'dod pa de rnams ched gzhan du snang ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// 
466b2(rgyud): ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gru 'dzin deng mthong bar 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu chen po phyag g.yas pas gzung ste rig pa'i rgyal po rta mchi
466b3(rgyud): kha yang dag par gtad par gyur to// gru 'dzin du song shog gang 'dod pa de sbyin par 'gyuraro// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang bcas pa sgrub pa po'i lag pa g.yas rtsu
466b4(rgyud): nas rgya mtsho'i dbu su wA dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dag / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs sgrub pa po'i rig pa'i rig
466b5(rgyud): pa'i tshogs la me tog kyi char 'bebs pa dang / rnga bo che dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga bzhi pa dang / rdza rnga rnams sgra srin bzhin du glu 'dzin du 'gro bar byed// rgya mtsho'i steng nger rgya
466b6(rgyud): mtsho chen po rig pa'i rgyal pos mthong nas skyes bu dam pa de yang chu klung thams cad kyis yongasu bskor ba'i rin po che'i mchod yon rab tu stsol bar byed par 'gyuraro// legs
466b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba yang gnang bar mdzad// rigs kyi bu leg so legs par 'tsho ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ga nas// 
466b8(rgyud): de nas rgya mtsho'i chen po bsgral nas gru 'dzin du song ste/ mthong ba dang der gang rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
467a1(rgyud): ci dang / lto 'dre chen po rnams thams cad mched yin gyi snod kyi me tog gi char chen pos sgrub pa po la bsu ba la 'ong bar byed// de nas klu 'dzin mthong nas sna tshogs pa'i na
467a2(rgyud): dang sman gyis bskus pa/ mu tig gi do shal rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa/ gser dang shel las byung ba dang / bai n+dur+ya las byung ba dang / in+d+ra nI la las byung ba dang / 'thon ka chen po las byung ba
467a3(rgyud): them skad dang / snam bu rnams kyis sna tshogs pa'i me tog nye bar mdzes pas rig pa'i rgyal po dang / sgrub pa po de la mngon par dbang bskur ba byas byas nas sgrub pa po la smras pa
467a4(rgyud): gnas 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba khang la dbus mar ji srid byang chub kyi bar du rang ni gnas bzhin du
467a5(rgyud): kun tu skyed cing gan so// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshul ba la mngon par dbang bskur te/ rig pa'i rgyal ba rab tu bgrad bar gyur cha// 'di ni dngos grub ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i mthu
467a6(rgyud): rnam par bsgyings pas mtshams med pa byed pas kyang / 'di 'grub par byeda'o// rta mgrin rgyal pos rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad la smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma dang 'phags pa
467a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba dbus ma'i khang par rang gi gnas bzhin du bzhi la gnas pa'i rig pa sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / gzhan rig pa
467a8(rgyud): thams cad pha rol gnon pa chen po'o// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni ma bsgrubs pa nyid du las byed de gtan pa gcod par byed pa dang / hUM yig gis rgya mtsho skams par byed pa dang / sor mo'i/ 
467b1(rgyud): / bsdig mdzub kyis thams cad rengs par byed pa dang / oM yigs 'gugs par byed pa dang / phaT yi gas lhun po rnams yang rnam par 'joms par byed pa dang / yid kyis bzlas pas sem
467b2(rgyud): thams cad dbang du byed pa dang / aM ya~M gis spyan pa dang / hUM yi gis gshegs su gsol ba dang / phaT yi gas gsod pa dang / swAhA'i yaM gis 'tsho bar byed pa ste/ mdor na rig pa rnams kyi chog
467b3(rgyud): ji snyed pa de thams cad rig pa 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa bsgrub par bya'o// 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi cho ga thun mong ba ste/ gang la cho ga med pa dang / sdig pa
467b4(rgyud): byed pas kyang lan gsum bzla'o// rta mgrin rig pa'i rgyal po brtson 'grus chen po sangs rgyas thad kyi rjesu gnang ba stobs dang pha rol gnon pa chen po 'di lan
467b5(rgyud): gsum gyis mtshams med pa byed pas 'grub par byed// dad pas byang chub kyi sems yongasu bzung ba 'dod ba chen po dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ ser sna med pa dang / byas
467b6(rgyud): ba bzo ba dang / sangs rgyas dang chos la mngon par dad pa dang / ma dang / pha dang / ma dang phar shes pa dang / myur ba kho nar bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma bsgrub pa
467b7(rgyud): 'grub par yang byed// mdor na las thams cad pa ni brjod pa nas rig gcod par 'dod pa dang / ser bar 'dod pas 'di brjod nas te 'di ni las thams cad pa'o// 'di ni byang chub
467b8(rgyud): sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi khyad par gzhan gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta ste/ rig pa'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rdzogs pa'i che du rta mgrin rgyal po
468a1(rgyud): mgul du'o// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu rnam par babyings pa zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzog so// / de nas 'od dpag med mthong bar 'dod na kha tshar ma bcad cing skra dang bral
468a2(rgyud): ba'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis bde ba can 'jig rten gyis kham su 'phags pa 'ong dpag med gser ltar ser ba/ pad+ma la bzhugs pa 'drir
468a3(rgyud): bzhug par bya'o// 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i gzhogs g.yon du rta mgrin rgyal po zhal rnam par 'gyur ba 'jigs par byed pa gsus pa 'phyang ba pad+ma la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug pa/ 
468a4(rgyud): me dmar ser 'bar ba 'phro bzhin pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i mchod phyir thogs pa can/ lag 'gro'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ ral pa 'od dpag med 'dzin pa/ sor mos log par 'dren pa
468a5(rgyud): la bsdigs par byed pa/ de'i rgyab nas log par 'dren 'bros par byed bzhin pa'o// g.yas kyi gzhog surna ma par rgyan pa sbyangs pa'i snod dang / gos dang phyag g.yas pa
468a6(rgyud): sgrub pa po la dbugs 'byin par mdzad bzhin ba'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser ltar se rab ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba'i dbu su 'od dpag med man
468a7(rgyud): ngos 'dzin par byed pa/ pha rol gnod pa'o// 'od dpag med kyi steng gi sprin de la sprin gseb nas gnas gtsang ma me tog rab tu 'thor bzhin la 'drir gzhug par bya'o// bcom ldan
468a8(rgyud): 'das kyi pad+ma de yang klu gzhon rnams kyis 'dzin pa'o// 'og tu lag na spos por thogs pa'i sgrub pa po pus mo gnyis btsugs 'od dpag med la rnam par lta bzhin pa'o// ri
468b1(rgyud): ma las yong su rdzogs pa dang / sgrub pa pos gtor ma dang / mar me dang / mchod pa rgya chen po byas te zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas sbyangs pa'i snod dang gos 'di nyid kyis mi/ 
468b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po rta 'grin bkug nas mchod yon phul te sgrub pa dang / slar yang gshegasu gsol te ba ser skya'i mar dang / pad+ma'i sa bon dang / na ga ge sar rnams cig tu byas nas/ nyi ma
468b3(rgyud): bdun du sbyin sreg gyis shig/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lha rnams tshim par byed pa byas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas smon lam gdab par bya ste/ ji srid du sa rnam par 'gyur ba drug
468b4(rgyud): tu g.yo ba dang / mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang / sprin las gu lu gu lu'i sgra sgrogs pa dang / me tog gi char ra tu 'bebs pa dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char 'bebs pa dang / dril
468b5(rgyud): bu'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa rings par bzlas par bya ste/ ji srid du rig pa'i rgyal po brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon pa
468b6(rgyud): rta mgrin rin pa thams cad kyis sgrub pa sa la 'ong ba de srid du'o// de nas sgrub pa pos me tog dkar po dang / dri'i chus yongasu bkang ba'i snod kyis mchod yon phul nas smon lam
468b7(rgyud): gdab po// 'di skad ces smra so// khyod legs par 'ong so// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pha rol tu phyin pa dang bcas pa'i tshe du slar yang legs par 'ong so// rtsa 'grin 'di
468b8(rgyud): ni brtson 'grus chen po stobs dang pha rol gnon pa rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lan gsum bskor
469a1(rgyud): ba byas te pus mo btsugs nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// khyod la snang bar gyur pa dang yin pa de rnams lhan cig 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
469a2(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag g.yas pa sgrub pa po'i spyi bor myug par mdzad de 'di skad ces gsung so// skyes bu dam pa brtson 'grus chen po stobs dpa pha rol gnon pa
469a3(rgyud): khyod kyis gang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon pas rig pa'i rgyal po bsgrubs pa legaso leg so// khyed cag gis mngon par 'dod pa smros shig/ mchog sbyin par bya'o// / 
469a4(rgyud): 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste bcom ldan 'das bde ba can du 'gro bar 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'od dpag med de dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
469a5(rgyud): dag/ 'jig rten gyi kham su'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste sgrub pa po phyag g.yas pas
469a6(rgyud): bzung nas rta mgrin rgyal po la yang dag par gtang bar gyur te rig pa'i rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa 'di bzung nas me tog gi char rab tu 'bab pa'i bde ba can
469a7(rgyud): gyi 'jig rten gyi kham su song shig/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa der bstong du bcug nas slar yang
469a8(rgyud): gru 'dzin gang na yod pa der shog shika/ de nas rta mgrin rig pa'i rgyal pos sgrub 'bo bzung nas me tog gi char 'bebs pa'i bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu song ste/ sgrub
469b1(rgyud): / pa pos smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston pa la ltos shig/ ltos shig/ de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos der
469b2(rgyud): bstod du bcug nas slar yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gru 'dzin pa der 'ong bar mdzad// de nas sgrub pa po 'jig rten gyi khams deng 'phags pa 'ong
469b3(rgyud): dpag med kyi drung du chos nyan no// dngos grub 'di ni gnas ma yin pa rnams la gang sbyar bar mi bya ste/ gang zhig byed na dam tshig las 'da' bar 'gyur// zhes brjod nas
469b4(rgyud): mchog gi sgrub pa rnams la 'di gnas ma yin pa rnams la rab tu mi sbyor te de'i dam tshig med/ las de rnams thams cad rtsa ba'i sngags kyis
469b5(rgyud): byed du gzhug go// thal bas thal ba'i rA ba'o// sgron me gsum gyis me'i rwa ba'o// tshul lan 'dun mngon pa ra sngags pas na mkha'i bcing ba'o// yungs kar dkar
469b6(rgyud): bos sa bzhi bcing ba'o// til gyi sbyin sreg gis log par 'dren pa thams cad dbang du 'gyuro// ske tshe'i sbyin sreg gi yi dgas dang / sha za thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// 
469b7(rgyud): ra bi ra'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis khro bo thams cad 'grub par byed// me tog thams cad che ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg gis 'jig rten pa'i rig pa'i/ 
469b8(rgyud): rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// d+hu d+hu'i sbyin sreg gis dbang phyug chen po dbang du 'gyur// pri yang ku'i me tog dang / mA lA ti dang / so so gan+d+hi dang gu gul ba ser
470a1(rgyud): skya'i mar dang lhan cig tu byas nas sbyin sreg byed na rig pa thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / rkang gnyis dang / 
470a2(rgyud): rkang bzhi pa thams cad dbang du byedado// gi baM la lan 'dun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas thig le byas te/ mche bas tha dad par za bar byed pa dang / tha snyad las rgyal bar byed// sngar brjod
470a3(rgyud): pa'i cho gas pa ser skya'i mar blangs nas lus la mngon par byugs te mer rab tu 'jug par byed// seng ldeng las byung ba'i rdo rje blangs te/ hUM yig dang lhan cig pas phug gis
470a4(rgyud): sgor lha ma yin gyi bu mo byung ba dang / rab tu zhugs pa 'khor lo'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung // gal te 'khor rab tu 'jug par byed na dam tshig dran pas hUM yi gis phung pos 'khor lo
470a5(rgyud): phye mar byas par 'gyuraro// de nas ril bu'isgrub pa 'byung ste/ rin pa 'dzin pa ril bu sgrub par byed bas tsan+dan dmar po dang / me tog lnga pa dang / pad+ma ge sar dang
470a6(rgyud): 'bras sa li dmar ba'i phub ma dang / ka tin ka'i myu gu dang / d+hu ka'i sa bon dang / 'bru dang / ma sha'i myu gu dang chu ta dang / rgya spos dang / tu ru ka'i til mar rnams cis
470a7(rgyud): tu byas te/ cha mnyam pa cig tu byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i 'a ser skyalo'o ma la gso sbyong can gyis ser skya de la rnam khar dben par rtsa ba'i sngag su bzlas nas khyim du
470a8(rgyud): btags te/ lenas par btsags pa'i tshul mngon yang sngags nas nyi ma bdun du sbyang bar bya'o// khyim du 'am rnam par dben pa'i phyog su yang rung ste/ de nas srung ba byas
470b1(rgyud): pa'i ba lang gi rdzi nges pa bzho bar bya'o// de nas lo ma de gtsang ma'i phyog su rnam par dben par bum pa la bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag grub par byed du
470b2(rgyud): gzhugo// mar des rdzas rnams btags pa byas te lcags gsum gyis yongasu dkris pa byas nas de yang ba ser skya'i ba byung lngar ril bur mtshan mo cig tu bcug nas gzhag par
470b3(rgyud): bya'o// de nas gton nas dri'i chu las gzhag par bya'o// dkrus te pad+ma'i 'dab mar gi baM gis byugs la gzhag pa bya'o// de nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par gzhag nas srang
470b4(rgyud): ba'i cho ga byas pas gtor ma dang / mar mi dang / mchod pa'i cho ga rgya chen po byas te de nas rig pa 'dzin bas lag pa gnyis kas pad+ma 'dab ma rnams kyis ril du
470b5(rgyud): brgyad blangs te pad+ma kha sbyor du bzhag nas pa ser skya'i mar de nyid ma la ti'i me tog dang cig tu byas nas bsregs blugs bdun sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rang ni
470b6(rgyud): lnga spyan drang ba byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar ji srid du rur 'phrul bar byed pa/ 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// du la 'phrul bzhin pas
470b7(rgyud): mi snang ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / na mkha' la 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyu'o// nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs pa'i 'od kyis rin pa 'dzin pa mtshan thams cad yang dag
470b8(rgyud): par rdzogs pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed// lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rgyal rigs kyi khyim du skye bar
471a1(rgyud): 'gyuraro// skye ba dran par yang 'gyuraro// 'di nyid kyis pad+ma'i sa bon dang / paN+Di ka ra'i sa bon dang / tu ru kas dang / a ka ru nag po dang / tsan+dan dmar po dang / so so gan+d+hi ka dang / ma
471a2(rgyud): la'i me tog dang / gur gum dang / ldong ros dang / gi baM rnams pa ser skya'i 'byung rnams gzhon nu ma gso sbyong can dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pas btags par bya'o// de nas rig pa
471a3(rgyud): 'dzin pas bri yang ku'i shing blangs nas khang pa brtsegs pa gtsang mar shing 'pho ba gso sbyong can byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pas lag pas tha ma tan
471a4(rgyud): byedu gzhug go// za ma tog der ril bu nyi shu rtsa cig bcug nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas te gtor ma yang phul nas za ma tog blangs te gos gtsang ma g.yogs
471a5(rgyud): mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pa rig pa'i lha rnams spyan drang bar byas nas ji srid du dro bar byed pa dang / du ba 'thul bar byed pa dang / 'bar bar byed pa de srid
471a6(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// dra bzhin pa la dbang du byed/ mi snang bar 'gyur// du ba 'phrul bzhin pa la rig pa 'dzin ba gzho nu'i mchog gcig go// 'bar bar byed pa ni rig pa
471a7(rgyud): 'dzin pa drug dang lhan cig 'gro ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis yongasu bskor nas lhun po'i rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dka' mgur yongasu spyod par byed// l-i stong phrag lnga
471a8(rgyud): bar byed// gang gis tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe nor chen po rnamasu skye bar 'gyuraro// skye ba dran par yang 'gyuraro// 'di nyid kyis mig sman ldong ros sgrub par byedado// dkar po'i bco lnga la dpa' bo'i rin
471b1(rgyud): / gyis nyos pa'i gi bai blangs nas mtshan mo cig tu sbyang bar gnas pas nyi ma gung la bram ze'i bu mo gso sbyong can gyis bed+ma'i 'dab mas pa ser skya'i kho mas btags par bya'o// ras ris
471b2(rgyud): la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhugs nas srung ba'i cho ga byas pas rang gi lha rnams spyan drang ba byas te mchod yon dang shed na phul nas
471b3(rgyud): bri yang ku'i me tog dang ba ser skya'i 'o mas bsregs blugs 'dun sbyin sreg gyis shig lha rnams tshim par byed pa byas nas slar yang lha de rnams mdun du pad+ma kha sbyor
471b4(rgyud): du ril bu bcug nas ji srid du du ba 'thul pa/ dang / dro bar byed pa dang / 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o// dri bzhin pa la ni thig le byas pa'i skye bo thad dga'
471b5(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// dub 'phrul bzhin pa la ni mi snang bar 'gyuraro// rab tu 'bar bas thig le byas nas rig pa 'dzin pa drug gi yong su bskor ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams
471b6(rgyud): kyis lhan cig rtse bar byed// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe nor chen po'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur// skye ba dran par yang 'gyur// til gyis sbyin sreg gyis shig klu dbang du 'gyur// nya dang sha
471b7(rgyud): sbyin sreg kyis shig/ yi dgas dbang du 'gyu ro// mA la ti li me tog gi sbyin sreg byed na lha mo chus byung dbang du 'gyuraro// pri yang ku'i me tog gi sbyin sreg kyis shig lha dbang du
471b8(rgyud): 'gyu ro// sa so gan+ti ka'i sbyin sreg byed na gnod sbyin dbang du 'gyur// yungs kar dkar po la lan 'dun mngon par bsngags las gang gi spyi bor byin pa de dbang du 'gyur// gdon gyi zin pa/ 
472a1(rgyud): dang rims kyis btab pa dang / srin pos zin pa'i mdun du ske tshel lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas sbyin sreg byed cing de'i thal bas snun par byed na grol bar 'gyur/ 
472a2(rgyud): mgrin rgyal ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di yang rdzogs so// // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu bsgyings pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad du
472a3(rgyud): 'gyur ba de 'byung ste/ rig pa'i rgyal po gang la cho ga med pa de rnams cho ga 'di nyid kyis sgrub pa dang rtog pa'i rgyal po de nyid kyis thams cad byas te mdor na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang
472a4(rgyud): lan gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur// ri kyi bu gang dang pa dang ldan pa ser sna med pa g.yo med pa/ phra ma med pa/ rin pa'i rgyal po la gus pa'i gang rtan pa pa la mchod par byed pa dang / 
472a5(rgyud): klog par byed pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan la ston par byed pa dang / ser sna med par gyur nas skye ba dran par 'gyur// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa dang / sangs
472a6(rgyud): rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon pa pa'o// ral pa rkyen ba rjes kyi rgyud byi mar rta mgrin rgyal ba cho gzhin ma la// sngar yang dus de nas shar gyi phyogs kyi chanas
472a7(rgyud): mngon par dga' ba'i dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sgrol ma mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal bar bya ba dang / bgrang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
472a8(rgyud): dpa' chen po rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi thams cad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i stobs kyis skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gsang sngags
472b1(rgyud): thob pa gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa gling bzhi pa bar ma 'di nyid du 'ongs nas ji ltar byung ba'i pad+ma'i gdan
472b2(rgyud): la gnas pa de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar 'phel ba'i stobs dang sgrub pas pad+ma'i gdan de la bzhug so// de lta bu la sogs pa gzhal du med cing
472b3(rgyud): grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs pa de rnams skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis gling bzhi pa bar
472b4(rgyud): ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du'o// de nas mau 'dra gas pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rgyud phyi ma 'dir bcom ldan
472b5(rgyud): 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sngags kyis spyod pa la so sor rje su yi rang ba'i ched dang / srung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i ched dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
472b6(rgyud): zad pa'i ched dang / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrolo ma'i dngos grub kyi tshe du bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsgrubs pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa/ 
472b7(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma a k+She b+h+yA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/ samya kAM bud+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/ ra tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ trA sa ni tra sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti han/ sarba kar+m+ma pa/ 
472b8(rgyud): ra ba rATi/ sAH/ na mo rat+na tra yA ye/ na mash+tsaN+Da sUr+yA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+yA te/ sa mya kr-i bud+d+ha ya tad+ya thA/ tsin+ni ma ti/ tsan+te ka raH/ mi khA mi lA/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+yA ta/ si la si la/ d+harma a

473a2(rgyud): ya na maHpuSh+pa ke te ga ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+hi te/ samya kI bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe buSh+pe puSh+pe buSh+pe puSh+pe puSh+pe puSh+pe sAhA// gzungs 'di'i me tog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas te cho ga

473a4(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyuraro// na mo rA tA yA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba nI ba ra Na/ baSh+kaM b+he ne ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+hi te/ samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+phunan+tu me/ saH
473a5(rgyud): bA pA ni/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha sat+ye na/ d+har+m+ma sa t+ye na/ saM d+hi se t+ye na/ in+d+ra sa t+ye na/ Sha ru Na sa t+ye na/ ye lo ka sa t+yen/ bI ra Na sa t+ye ne sa t+yo na/ sat+ya sa tsa nen s+phu Tan+tu/ sarba 'a ba ni sarba bud+d+ha ad+hiH

473a7(rgyud): rA tra yA ya/ na mo be ro tsa nA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+yA te/ samya kA bud+d+hA ya/ na ma A kA sha gar+b+hA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ ka la ka ga ki li ki li/ hu lu hu ru/ 
473b1(rgyud): bai tsamarash+mi sats+tshe da di/ A kar+N+Na Amya mA kA sha gar+b+ha badz+ra kA ru NikA/ bA ra ya/ shu ba tan/ ya bud+d+ha bi dza ya tsar char/ Nang tsi ri swAhA// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya bachi/ 
473b2(rgyud): gzungs bklags pa 'grur ba ste/ skrag pa dang / rgyan po dang / dug dang / dug brtan pa dang / byad ste ma dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun la sogs pa rnams gnon par byedado// gang du bris pa
473b3(rgyud): gnas pa 'am/ mgo dang lag pas bcang bar byed pa de la nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad mgo ba thams cad mi 'byung // 'di rtag tu bzlas pas dri ma med pa'i tingange 'dzin so
473b4(rgyud): sor rnye do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo bai ra tsa nA yata thA ga tra ya/ na ma A ka sha kar+b+ha ya/  d+hi satA/ ya/ ma hA sA ya/ ma hA kA ru NI kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ badz+ram+bu badz+r-im+ba/

473b7(rgyud): nas lag tu bcang bar byed pa de yang yon tan 'di rnamaso// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba durga ti pra ri sho d+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+sha te/ samya k+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ sho d+he

474a1(rgyud): 'gyu ro// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pas skye ba bzhir skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu zad par

474a3(rgyud): 'di'i cho ga ni 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs baM bzhugs nas de'i mdun du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba ser skya'i ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs/

475a1(rgyud): / dpa' rnams kyi rtsa ba'i rig pa'i gzungs 'di ni bklag pas grub pa/ ma bsgrungs par yang las rnams 'byung ba ste/ zla la nyal gso sbyong can gyis nyin

477a5(rgyud): na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyuraro// sbyin sreg gi las thams cad la nyi ma bdun du sbyin sreg bya'o// mdor na nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyuraro// sna ma'i me tog gis

477a7(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la sems kyis dmigs pas sa las byung ba'i ka pa la dang / sil+la ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas gzhonu mas mdud pa brgyad brgya bya'o// de nas
477a8(rgyud): de dri'i chus bkrus nas shing la bzhag ste/ de yi mgo la 'acing bar bya'o// de bzhin du ma he dang / ra rnams dang / phyugs rnams la chom rkun gyis nye bar 'che ba la rA la 'ching bar bya'o// bum pa chus gang ra/ 
477b1(rgyud): byas nas gtsang mas brgyang brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas te nad pa'i sked pa la bcing bar bya'o// rang gi gan su 'gyuraro// khyim du tshangs pa'i srin po dang / sha zas nye bar 'tshe ba rnams la sbyin sre
477b2(rgyud): gyis shig/ ji ltar nus pa'i gtor ma bya'o// zhes te 'di ni ri khrod lo ma can zhes bya ba'i gzungs ral pa gyen parjes kyi rgyud phyi ma gsungs pa byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo sde
477b3(rgyud): yang // slar yang dus de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor phyag g.yas pa ra
477b4(rgyud): tu brkyang nas nyug par mdzad de 'di skad ces bka' sprul to// rigs kyi bu rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de 'di klog par byed pas 'grub par sangs rgyas tha~Md kyis rjesu
477b5(rgyud): yi rang bas gsung so// rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po phyi ma de la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i cheng dang / ral pa rkyen brjes kyi rgyud phyi mar bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma
477b6(rgyud): sgrol ma'i sgrub pa po'i dngos grub byed pa rtag tu byed du gzhug go// blo gros dang ldan pas gang dge ba'i tshes grangs la bris naso// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sngags kyi tshig rnam
477b7(rgyud): bka' stsal te/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harma ya/ na ma swe b+hA yan maHsarbA nA~M/ sabyA kle bud+d+ha ka Ti nAn mo me d+hA ya/ pra mu mA nA~M/ sarba bud+d+haH d+hi satwA nAM/ na maHsa myar+k+ka tA nA~M/ na maHsa d+ya k+Sha ta~M ban+da nAM/ na ma
477b8(rgyud): ar+d+ha tAM/ na ma~M nA kA mI nA~M/ na maHsa kri dA kA mI nAM/ na maNi shro tra banA nAM/ na ma ad+ha ta/ mar+d+ha tA/ a ba ra dzi ta hri da yaM/ mA baN+Da yi Sh+ya mi sa mya k+saM bud+d+ha/ b+hi Sha ta/ ma nu mo da taM/ de ba ga Ne swar+Na kar+m+ma ka raM/ 
478a1(rgyud): shu D+hi/ bgi chul ma sa g+ha/ h+yaM shrA n+yakar shu h+ye / thA sams d+ha nA~M/ de bzlas pa ra dzi Na hring ya~M/ mA btim sarba' gA tha sha mA nA~M/ sam ar+thas d+ha nA~M/ d+hats+yai/ sa ma
478a2(rgyud): nA sha nAM/ ni t+yai dza ya/ ka ri h+ye Sha Thakra s+ye gas ba ra dzo ta pa Sha kr-i t+ya/ nA sha ni tse ga ra dza/ any+dzi ri pra nA sha nA kr-i t+ya kar+m+ma Ni/ be tA ro duHswa pA bi a tha sU ta na de gang nA ba/ kan+d+haH/ yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa/ 
478a3(rgyud): baR+Sha ka rAyAM/ kun nu me ni t+yai sa man+ta tsa/ te dze ni e hi ny+dza/ dri ti ya ka dz+wa rA pro tI yak+Sha/ an+de ke b+h+yo/ rak+Sha yai bi Sha ma dza ra karmA Ni bi She b+huk+ti ga ra~M tsi ba b+h+ya dz+yaM brdza yi Sh+ya ti ya s+yai Tha ma b+ha taH
478a4(rgyud): yam+b+ha ya s+ya da kA sha~M ra/ ranAt+na mA la mi yai tre dz+r-i kri bra ma ma Sha ha te/ dza ya mar+tha/ ka mo la ba taN+Do/ shri kA mo la D+ha te shri yaM/ bi Tha ke raN/ sa~M rba tre/ kyai pra ma bA ti~M/ dza baM/ aHShiH/ pra bak+Sha mi/ 
478a5(rgyud): rat+na ma la ti/ bi pru taM/ tA ba tA lo/ ka nA tha hI dISh+Ta sat+ka nu ba dru tAM tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha na ka ri bi pra la ka ri ya sha ka ri/ bid+d+ha ka ri a yun+ta ti a la kyi pra sa ma ni d+haM narba n+ya li D+hA/ 
478a6(rgyud): ni ba shri ka ri/ sarba gra ha/ nak+Sha traH/ ba sha ban+ti mi me/ k+Shadza na ni/ su tra dza na ni ba ri bA ra bad+hA nI/ A yun+da ni/ pri ti kA ri / dzam+bA ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ a mo ha shak+to kany+dza na/ ma la gr-i ha sau mya/ ka ra Ni
478a7(rgyud): sar+b+ba kA li kA lA hA bi pra ha/ bi rA da pra sha mi na/ ba la Ne tra/ ni bA ra Ni pa ra sai n+ya saM d+ha nau tsit+ta nin lo ka ra Ni/ sar+b+ba la pra sha ma na~M sarba ki ShI Sha nA sha ni swA hA/ tsu nu tsu Tu/ tu nu tu Tu/ mu Tu ma?/ 
478a8(rgyud): Tu/ swA hA/ sar+b+ba de ba a nu drA te sA hA/ sarba na grA sa~M rak+Shi te sAhA/ aM ni ri phaT/ han han phaT/ da kyang hu phaT/ ba tsaM ba tsaM phaT/ yeShAM bi d+ha ShAn+ti bi sha ma tsit+ta yan+ti/ haha ni/ kA kho R+Sha kurban+ti/ ka rA
478b1(rgyud): / la nri kr-ita d+ha a thA ya ru mo ne drwab phaT swA hA/ a ny+dzi swam+b+ha yA mi bi dzi shaswA u da ga tse ri sarbaduSh+Ta sa ma d+ya d+hiH/ tsanA dza na ya mo hU~M hUM laT phaT swA hA// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'dab mas nus
478b2(rgyud): byas te rin po che'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan pa las thams cad byed pa 'di ni rtag tu grung ba byed pa'o// de bzhin nyid du yang gro ka'i 'dab ma la bris pa 'am gang du 'am der yang rung
478b3(rgyud): ste la la'i bgegs srung ba dang / bsod nams mchog dang / sdig pa dang dri ma 'joms pa dang / g.yul du 'am/ rtsod pa 'am/ thams cad du rgyang pa sbyin zhing dge ba'o// gang 'di
478b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa la rin bzhi pa bris pa dang / skyes bas rtag tu klog pa de la 'jigs par 'byung bar ma 'gyu'o// klog pa dang 'dzin pa thams rtag tu srung bar byed/ 
478b5(rgyud): bsang ba rnams kyis yongasu skyong bar byed// cho ga'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu mthar byed pa ni ji ltar rin po ches spras pa'i phreng ba steng du rnam par 'bar ba'i dpal gang yin
478b6(rgyud): pa de rig pa 'dzin par byedado// 'di las gdon de rnam par nyams par byedado// nad rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo // bu che bo rnams kyang 'phelo// 'khor bzang po can rnams par gan so// / 
478b7(rgyud): rig pa 'di ni thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can la phan pa'i don gyi ched dang byis pa rnams khyad par du bsrung bar bya ba'i ched do// lha dang rgyal po
478b8(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de yang phyogs bcu rnamasu kun nas gzigs par mdzadado// dge ba'i don rnam par 'phel ba dang
479a1(rgyud): / TIg pa thams cad kun nas zad par 'gro ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa rnams dang / nyes por byas pa rnams las kyang grol te/ 'di the tshom med do// ral pam
479a2(rgyud): brjes kyi rgyud phyi ma'i gzung so// de nas 'di las rgyud 'dir byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid gsung so// 'di lta ste/ gtsug
479a3(rgyud): phud dang / go cha dang / ra ba dang / snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po dang / zhes pa ste rnam pa lnga'o// rtsa ba'i rig pa la ni drug bcur bshad do// don thams cad sgrub pa de khang
479a4(rgyud): bor re shig ra bi ta dang / bi Ni ka dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthar thug pa rnam so// mthe chung khab kyi rnam pas nges par btsir ba'i gung mo dang / mthe bong dag tu bshad do// 'di ni
479a5(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gang pa'i phyag rgya ma zhes rnam par grags te don thams cad sgrub pa'o// rim patshim par byed pa la mthe chung gnyis bsnun par
479a6(rgyud): bya ste/ rnam par tshim par 'gyur ro// khyag bar gnas pa ni mthe bong gnyis ka khab kyi rnam pas so sor g.yo bar bya ste/ snying po rnam par shes par bya'o// 
479a7(rgyud): bstong pa kho na'i ming gis so// nye ba'i snying po la mthe bong gnyis 'di lta ste/ nang kho na'i khu tshur ro// mthe bong lcags sgrogs gi cha'i sgra'i dang / bsdigs mdzus
479a8(rgyud): khabye ba khang du byas pa 'di na go cha'i mtshan nyid do// rtag tu bdag nyid la rab tu sbyar bya'o// bsdigs mdzub gnyis nges par btsir nas gung mo dkris te khab kyi
479b1(rgyud): rnam pas bsdigs pa 'di ni gtsug phud kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ste/ bdag nyid kyi gtsug phud bcings pa'i dus su rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// slar yang khu tshur bcings nas
479b2(rgyud): bsdigs mdzub kha phye ba khab kyi rnam pa ste/ 'di ni bzlas pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do// de lta bu kho na yong su gyur pas bsdigs mdzub khab kyi rnam pasar
479b3(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya bya'o// khu tshur bcings nas bsdigs mdzub gnyis lcags sgrog gi rnam pa ste/ mtshan ma 'di ni dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyag rgya'o// rkang pa ma nyams
479b4(rgyud): ba la g.yas pa'i rkang pa rab tu gzhag nas kar gyi sbyor bas yongasu bskor bar bya ste/ gzhan du bskor nas lag pa gnyis kas rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i las
479b5(rgyud): sbyaro// dpral bar yang las thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'gyuro// de nas phyag rgya 'acing ba dang / bzlas pa'i dus dang / nyal ba'i dus dang / rnam pa
479b6(rgyud): gzhan du yang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// gdon gyi las dang las thams cad la rtsa ba'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shA
479b7(rgyud): thub pas ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar spyan ras gzigs dbang phyun la rjesu brtse bas bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i don du phyag rgya
479b8(rgyud): 'acing ba gsung so// de la 'di rnams yang dag sbyar bya ba// yams ni bde bar bya dang mkhas pa phyag 'tshal la// rig gsum la yang thun mong phyag rgya ni// de rnams
480a1(rgyud): nye bar drangs pa phyag 'tshal phyag rgya ni// g.yas pa'i sor mo'i tshigs la tshigs kyi rtse mo kun/ phyag rgya nyid ni rje su bcing bar gyis shig dang / rtag tu gsol
480a2(rgyud): ba 'debs la gtsang ma gsol ba 'debs pa'i// phyag rgya de bzhin kho nar g.yas pa sor mo yi// tshigs rnams tshig su byas nas rje su yi rang bya// mchod pa thams cad
480a3(rgyud): kho na gtsang mas rtag tu ni// mchod pa rtag tu rjesu yi rang byed pa dang // sor mo rnams kyi bdud rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan// tshigs kyi rtse mo mthe bong snying por yang dag ldan// 
480a4(rgyud): 'di rnams rgyal ba yi ni phyag rgyar 'gyur// ser mo'i rtse mo yang dag sbyar ba gung mo dang // mthe bong gnyis kar gang dra mi 'gyur phyag rgya yis// bzlas pas mchog sbyin yid kyi bzlas
480a5(rgyud): bas phyag rgya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de rnams thams cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / du gshegs pa'i mtshan ma ston par mdzad bzhin pas slang
480a6(rgyud): bzhengs pa'i mtshan ma mdzad do// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sa dang / na mkha' la gnas pa dang // sems rab tu 'gul ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa
480a7(rgyud): 'di rang 'gul bas skrag cing me tog gi char 'bab pa dang // bar snang las spyod pa'i 'byung ba bye bas thams cad du 'gro ba'i gdug pa rab tu btu'o// de nas yang byang chub sems
480a8(rgyud): dpa' mthu chen thob kyis de bzhin gshegs la shAkya thub pa la yong su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o// 
480b1(rgyud): / stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu des na/ ral pa rkyen brdzes zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ rtog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang grub
480b2(rgyud): shig/ rig pa dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mdo sde zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i le'u rab 'byam zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ thabs kyi skyed pa zhes bya bar yang zung
480b3(rgyud): shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam gyis de rnams yang dag par ldan par 'gyur// chos du zhig gis lhag
480b4(rgyud): bar gnas pa lags byams pa/ des dang chos bcus 'di lta bu mthong ba kho na ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / 
480b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / yi dgas la sogs pa rnams kyis kun tu bsrung bar gyur pa dang / gzungs mnyam pa'i sems zab
480b6(rgyud): mo'i bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i ches las kun tu gnas pa'i sa ji srid 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang / bris nas 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / glegs pa du 'gyur ba byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang / 
480b7(rgyud): tshe dang nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / bde ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba ste/ phan yon mang po nyid dang / phan yon chen po nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs dang / lha dang bcas pas byin gyis
480b8(rgyud): brlab pa/ ga pa dang / sngags chen po 'dus pa 'khor lo'i pha rol tu song ba/ bdag gis kyang yang dag par rgyu skar dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang lor bde ba'i ched du mtho ri su skye ba
